1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA bod+d+ho sadatI pIt+taMka/nA ma ma hA yA nu stu hA/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/'phags pa byang chub sems dpe'i sde snod ces bya ba/theg pa
1b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
1b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdog gis thos pa dus gcig na/
2a1(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/dbyar gun su gnas nus/zla ba gsum 'das
2a2(dkon brtsegs): te/dgag dbye mdzad nas/chos gos mdzodade/chos gos zin nus/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
2a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/bcom ldan 'das le dge
2a4(dkon brtsegs): slong dang dge slong me dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /mu stegs
2a5(dkon brtsegs): can sna tshogs dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams dang /lce dang klu dang gnod sbyin
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /dri za dang l+h+wa ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang / 'phye chen po rnams kyis/bla mar byas/bkur
2b2(dkon brtsegs): bstir byas/ri mor byas//mchod par byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang /zhal zlas dang /mal stan
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dang na ba'i gsos smon dang /yo byad mong po yang brnyeso//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dge
2b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhub su ldan pa/bde bar gshigs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
2b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/
2b6(dkon brtsegs): lhar bcas pa dang/bdud du bcas pa dang /tshangs par btsas pa dang /dge sbyong dang /bram zer btsas pa'i skye dgu'i
3a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di dang /lha dang me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams zil gyis mnan t+te/
3a2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas nas/bsgrubs te bzhugs shing //chos ston pa ni tshangs pa spyod pa/thog
3a3(dkon brtsegs): mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/the mor dge ba/doni bzang po//tshig 'bru bzang po//ma 'dres po/yongs su
3a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang ba/rab tu ston to zhes/bcom ldan 'das kyi dge bar grags pa'i sgra tshi gsu
3a5(dkon brtsegs): bcud pa/rgya chen po yang mngon par byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das yul mu ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing /mthar gyis rgyal po'i kha
3a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po gang na yod pa der gshegs te/byon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la bzhug so//
3b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa/
3b2(dkon brtsegs): phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/bdag dbong ba mang ba/nor dang yo byad mang po/gser dang dngul mang ba/nor dang 'brus yongasu gang po'i mdzod dang
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bang ba mang ba/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /mun shel dang /byi ru mang ba/glang po che dang /rta dang /ba lang dang /
3b4(dkon brtsegs): lug mang ba/bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba zhig gnas te/dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las mngon par
3b5(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /thabs gcig tu yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/rgyal po'i
3b6(dkon brtsegs): khab kyi grong khyer chen por byon nas ngo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na d+ya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhi no gshegs
3b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig po dang zhabasu ljon pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/
4a1(dkon brtsegs): //bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/de chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dag
4a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bar du dge ba/the mar dge ba/don bzang po//tshig 'byo bzang po//ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag po/yongasu byung ba
4a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to zhes dge slong gau ta mA de'i dge bar grags pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa rgya chen po de lta bu yang mngon par byung ba/khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong gis thos nas/
4a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta bu dag mthong ni legs par 'gyur gyis bdag dge slong gro ta
4a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam//de nas khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi gro
4a6(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po nas byung //bcom ldan 'das kyang sta dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs byesnoms chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor
4a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te spyod lam mdzes pa dang /mngon du gshegs pa dang /phyir sdig par mdzes pa dang /gzegs pas
4b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzigs pa mdzes pa dang /brkyang ba dang bskum pa mdzes pa dang /chos gos snam sbyar dang /na bza' dang /lhung bzed bsnams pa/mdzes pa dang kun nas
4b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pas bsod nams kyi phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gsheg so//khyim po dag tshong dpon bzang skyong dang /khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bcom
4b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mdzes shing dga' bar gyur pa dbang bzhi'o/yid zhib/dul ba dang /zhi gnas dam pa brnyes po/glang po lhor dbang po dul po/mtsho ltar dngas
4b4(dkon brtsegs): shing gsal ba/rnyog pa med pa/lha du mas mchod pa/gnod sbyin du mas mchod pa/mi du mas mchod pa/gasder gyi kha dog gi sku/skyes bu chen po'i
4b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/dpe byung bzang po brgyad cus pa rgyun thaM/me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs shing me tog gi chu ba chen po tu bebs bzhin du
4b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab me bye ba brgya phrag stong yod pa lo zhabs 'dor zhing gshegs pa rgyud ring po nas mthong ste/spyod lam brgya spring mang pos gshegs pa
4b7(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to//de dag sems dad par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gi le ba der dong ste/lhags nas/bcom
5a1(dkon brtsegs): /ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khong //
5a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das le khyim bdag bzang skyong dang /khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gris 'di skud ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gr-i ta ma'i dpal
5a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon par mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma gzi byin gyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon pa ma do//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ni 'od kyis 'khor
5a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag zil gyis gnon par mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ni gzugs kyis 'khor 'di zil gyis gnon par mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ni sku'i
5a5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog gser lta bu'o//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ni sku gser ltar mdzes so//bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ni dngos po thams cad kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
5a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gau ta me ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma bdag 'di snyam
5a7(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas ci zhig gzigs nas khab nas khab ma mchis par rab tu byung snyam du sems so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
5b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong gis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do//rgyal ba'i dpal dang grags dang gzugs dag ni//sngan chad bdag gis ji skad
5b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa bas//de las lhag par gser gyi gzugs bzhin du//mdzes dang ldan par lham me rab tu gda'//gzugs ni shim du mdzes shing blta na sdug/sku yi
5b3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog gser gyi mdog 'dra bas//skar ma dag gi dbus na zla bu ltar//dge slong mang po'i dbus na mdzes par mdzad//mi mchog gi ni spyi bo bltar mi ganga'//
5b4(dkon brtsegs): ri rab bzhin du mngon par 'phags paR+Ya gda'//gtsug gi spyi bo lha yi gdugs bzhin du//kun nas byin gyis gzholnga bar gyur pa lags//dbu yi sgra ni
5b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam zhing rab mnyen la//an da rnyil dang stang zil khe dog 'dra//g.yas su 'khyil la shin du 'jam pa ste//rma bya'i mgrin pa ji bzhin nyid du gda'//
5b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba mchog gi dpral pa shin du mnyam//khyod kyi smin tshugs 'ja' khug lta bu ste//'od gsal ba ni skar ma'i snying po ltar//rdul bral smin mtshams spu ni shin
5b7(dkon brtsegs): du mdzes//spyan bzangs khyod kyi spyan ni dgar 'gyur ba//'gro ba rnams la mthong na mdzes shing dga'/bdag ni blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur te/
6a1(dkon brtsegs): /mthun pa rnam dgu spyan la dag b+hU d+hA N+Da//rnas bla dam shA sman rgyu rgyu mASh+Tas//de skar gsod na sgyu rab tu ga smra
6a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgros ni bim pa byi ru bzhin//dag cing rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra//dul la dgos pa'i tshe mo snga ni mdzes pa ste//snang bar byed pa rab tu dkar pa'i tshems//
6a3(dkon brtsegs): pad ma'i rtsa ba ba zho chu skyar 'dra//sa zhing dam la thags bzang shin du dag/tshems dang tshems ni mnyam zhing shin du 'byor//rgyal ba'i mche ba mdzes shing
6a4(dkon brtsegs): rdul mi mnga'//ngang pa'i khyu na dang pa'i rgyal po ni//rnam dag dkar zhing rab tu dkar ba bzhin//bde bar gshegs pa'i lcags kyis zhal khebs te/
6a5(dkon brtsegs): ut+pal dmar po rnam dadug zangs kyi mdog/nyi ma 'char che nor bu dag mdog bzhin//srab la ring zhing skyon med shin du yangs//gau ta ma'i snyan ni rab tu legs
6a6(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i 'gram pa sring ge 'jigs med bzhin//tshangs bcas 'jig rten lha dang mi la yang //bdag gis gang yang ma thos ma mthong ngo //bde gshes
6a7(dkon brtsegs): mthu yis mgur ni mthong na ni//mgur gyi mid pa gtsang la 'od gsal to//drang po dbus su 'gro ba yin po gsal//ro yi ro mchog mi dang lha yi
6b1(dkon brtsegs): lha//dpung mgro rab tu zlum zhing thal gang rgyas//bdun po mtho ba 'jig rten kun du brags//mgon po mi dbang snying po dpal gyis kyang //ri yi rtse rtsa
6b2(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma 'char ba bzhin//mtho ba gnyis ni zhabs kyi mthil nas skyes//phyag la so gnyis skyes thal gong gnyis skyes te//mtho ba gcig ni lhag khung nyid
6b3(dkon brtsegs): na cig/dge zhing dag ste 'od gsal rab tu rgyas//bcom ldan gau to ma'i phyag ring ba//ji lhor glang po'i rgyal po'i sna bzhin no//phyag gnyis po ni 'dud
6b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma bgyis par//pus mo gnyis la phyag gis rab tu reg/sku yi ro stod seng ge bzhin du 'phags//sku ni sred med bu ltar rab tu brtan//n+ya gro bzhin
6b5(dkon brtsegs): du chu zheng grub pa'i sku//bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs po che//sku yi spu rnams g.yas 'khyil gyen du phyogs//re rer skyes shing shin tu 'jam
6b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste//ji ltar pade chu drang 'dam mi gos//de bzhin rdul dang du byas mi dgos so//rta mchog dul ba yin ji lta bar//'odoms kyi sba ba sbubs su
6b7(dkon brtsegs): nub ces gda'//brla ni rab zlum smig ma'i snying po bzhin//khyod kyi rje dang byin gyis rim bzhin mchis//zhabs gong dung ltar mtho zhing rting pa che//khyod
7a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag dang zhabasdu ni dra bas 'brel//sen mo ring zhing sor mo nyi shu mnyam//sen mo zangs 'dra ser mo me tog can//khyod kyi zhabs
7a2(dkon brtsegs): mthil 'khor lo rab kyis mtshan//rtsib mo stong ldan rab tu 'od gsal ba//long bus long bu 'thab par mi 'gyur zhing //gom pa dag ni sa la yong mi 'dod//
7a3(dkon brtsegs): sa la kun du sor bzhi mi reg par//'jig rten rnams kyi gtso bo rab gshegs te//khyod ni gang du gom pa bor bar yang //rin chen pad+ma skye ba ngo mtshar
7a4(dkon brtsegs): to//rgod par ma gyur dal zhing brtan par gshegs//stag dang lha dbang 'gros kyis gzhan gnon zhing //bag tsha med par stabs ni bsgyings te gshegs//
7a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo khyod kyi 'gros 'dra su la'ang med//mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar snang las//lha yi me tog char ni rab 'bebs shring /goklu dbang sgras ni khyod
7a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod par gyis//cho 'phrul 'di 'dra 'di dag rmad du byung //khyod kyi gzugs ni rnam thos bu bas lhag/gzi brjid dag ni nyi ma brgya pas 'phags//
7a7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs bcas lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na//khyod 'dra'ang med na lhag pa ga la mchis//bdag gis khyod kyi cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas//yon tan lhag
7b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag gzigs byur no//de bzod pas nA mo dbang ba byung sgyum//bdag ni de la the tshom 'tshul bur gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag tshod//
7b2(dkon brtsegs): dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gtse ba bcus gces par mthong ste//bcu gang zhe na//'di
7b3(dkon brtsegs): lte ste skye bso gtse ba dang //rga bas gau tse ba dang /na bas gtse ba dang /'chi bas gats+tsha ba dang /mya ngan gyis gtse ba dang /smre sngags 'don pas gan+d+he
7b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang /yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang /'khrug pas gtse ba dang /'khor bas gtse ba dang bcu ste//khyim bdag 'jig
7b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gnas pa gi tse ba 'di banus gtses par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o zhes dad pas khyim nas khyi ma med par
7b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//'khor ba'i sbom du chud pa yi//byis pa so so'i skye
7b7(dkon brtsegs): bo kun//skye bas nye bar gces pa dang //nad dang rga bas rab tu gzer//mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don//'tshe ba'i dbang du song mthong nas/
8a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i sgrom las thar bya zhes//bskyab pa'i phyir ni mngon par byung //kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni zhe sdang zhing kun nas
8a2(dkon brtsegs): mnar sems kyi dngos po bcus gcig la gcig mnar sems su byed par mthong ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag nyid la gnod pa byas shes sems la kun nas mnar
8a3(dkon brtsegs): sems skye ba dang /gnod pa byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag gi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): mdza'o lo gnod pa byas so zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag gi mdza'o la gnod pa byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skyo ba dang /bdag gi mdza'
8a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas so zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza'
8a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byed par 'gyu ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /gnod pa'i
8a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sdang ba nyid dang bcu'o//khyim bdag kun nas monar sems kyi dngos po bcu po de dag yin te/kun nas mnar sems thams cad sel po bla na med pa yang dag
8b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshogs su
8b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//kye ma'o sems can zhe sdang che//gcig le gcig ni phan tshun du//kun nas mnar sems dngos po bcus//kun la kun nas man
8b3(dkon brtsegs): sems gyur//bdag dang bdag gi nye du la//gnod pa byas dang byed pa dang //gnod pa byed par 'gyuraro zhes//de yi kun nas man+dar sems skye//gang rnams bdag
8b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mdza' ba//de dag gi ni don byas dang //byed de byed par 'gyur ro zhes//de yi kun nas mnar sems skye//gnod pa'i sdang dang bcu yin te//gang gi mnar
8b5(dkon brtsegs): sems 'phel 'gyur ba//de mthong kun nas mnar sems rnams//mi 'dod pas na rab tu byung //kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni blta bar byas pa lta ba
8b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa'i thibs pa bcus blta bar byas pa sna tshogs dang //lta ba ngan pa'i thibs po dag gis nan par mthong ste//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag tu lta bar gyur pa lta
8b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ngan pa'i thibs po dang /sems can du lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa'i thibs po dang /srog tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /gang zag tu lta bar gyur pa lta
9a1(dkon brtsegs): bdUn pa thi byas po dang /chad par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thobs blo dang /lta bar gyur pa sna ba ngan pa thibs po dang /bya ba mod dra rnga//
9a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /rgyu myed par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /mi mthun pa'i rgyur lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang
9a3(dkon brtsegs): log par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa'i thibs po dang bcu'o//khyim bdag lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po de dag yin te/lta ba thams cad gzhig pa'i
9a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
9a5(dkon brtsegs): 'o'adi nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigos su bcud pa 'di dag gsungs so//byis pa so so'i skye bo kun//bdag tu lha dang sems can lta//srog tu
9a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba rnams kyi yang //lta bo thebs pos rab tu g.yogs//rtag dang chud par lta ba dang //bya med lta la gnas pa dag/yang dag lta la dgod do zhes/
9a7(dkon brtsegs): dedophyir nga ni rab tu byung //kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni zug rngu chen po bcus bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du zug rngus zug
9b1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sred pa'i zug rngu dang /ma rig pa'i zug rngu dang /'dod pa'i rdza dang /'dod chags kyi rug rngu dang /zho sbyong gi zug rngu dang /gti mug gi zug rngu dang
9b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyi zug rngu dang /lta ba'i zug rngu dang /'byung ba'i zug rngu dang /'jig pa'i zug rngu dang /bcu'o//khyim bdag zug rngu chen po bcu po ni de dag yin te/zug rngu
9b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsal ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o zhes dad pas khyim+b+ha nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan
9b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs smra bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//srid po'i zug rngus zug pa rnams//thog ma'i mtha' ni mi shes te//ma rig pa yis mdongasu byas nas
9b5(dkon brtsegs): mun pa nas ni mun par 'gro//srid pa'i zug rngus zug pa dang //'dod chags zug rngus rgyus pa dang //zhe sdang zug rngus rgyal ba na//phung po dag ni lon pur
9b6(dkon brtsegs): byed//da ti mug+na gi ni zug rngus dkris//dra rgyal dag gi zug rngus bsnyems//'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ni//lta ba'i zug rngus ma 'phrod 'gyur//byis pa so so'i skye
9b7(dkon brtsegs): kun//phan tshun tshig gi mtshan cha yis//'di ni brdzun gyi 'di bdon zhes//phan tshun du ni rtsod par byed//zug rngus zug pa'i sems can gyi//skyabs dang dpung pa nyen
10a1(dkon brtsegs): /'gyur ba yis//m+bA r+d+ha Sh+yan+ya pa'i de brdzun gshogs//'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur//gzhan yang ma'i khyim bdag
10a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni srid pa'i rtsa ba las byung tho'i chos bcu bo dag gi rtsa nga'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa'i mthong ste/dA nu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sred pa la
10a3(dkon brtsegs): brten nas kun du tshol ba dang /kun du tshol ba la brten nas rnyed pa dang /rnyed pa la brten+da nas nga yir 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la brten nas rnam par nges
10a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rnam par gdon mi za ba la brten nas 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang /'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas/lhag par chags pa dang /lhag par
10a5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa la brten nas ser sna dang /sor sna la brten nas yongs su 'dzin pa dang /yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas yongs su bsrung ba dang /yongs su bsrung
10a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la brten nas sdug bsngal ba ste/yongs su bsrung ba'i gzhi las dbyig pa thogs pa dang /mtshon cha thogs pa dang /'thab pa dang /'tshang 'bru ba
10a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /'gyod pa dang /rtsod pa rnams 'byung ngo //de'i phyir phra ma la sogs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/khyim bdag
10b1(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i chos bcu po de dag gis 'jig rten gnas pa'i rab tu gnas pa mthong nas rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par bya'o zhes khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//sred pas med pa'i sems can
10b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams//'di nas 'dir ni kun du tshol//rnyed pa rnyed nas nga yir 'dzin//de las rnam par nges par 'gyur//bye ba 'di dag bya'o zhes//'dun pa'i
10b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags rab tu 'phel//'dun pa'i 'dod chags 'phel bas na//lhag par chags phyir ser sna 'gyur//ser sna'i nyes pas 'jig rten na//kun du//
10b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa sra bar 'gyur//yongs su 'dzin pa kun bsrung ba/rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur//byas pa kun du bsrung ba'i phyir//dbyig pa dang ni
10b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshon 'debs shing //sdig pa thams cad byed pas na//de las sdug bsngal 'phel bar 'gyur//srid pa'o gzhi bas sdug bsngal kun//shin tu 'byung bar
10b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas na//rtsa ba med cing gnas pa yi//byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'dod//gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni yog pa'i chos
11a1(dkon brtsegs): bcus log pa nyid du nges par mthong ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/log pu'i lbu ba dang /log pu'i rtog pa dang /lcog du rdza/
11a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang /log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /log pa'i 'tsho ba dang /ldog pa'i rtsol ba dang /ldog pa'i dran pa dang /log pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang /log pa'i
11a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang /log pa'i shes pa dang bcu ste/khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni log pa'i chos bcu po de dag gis//log par nges pa
11a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ldog pa thams cad las yang dag par zla ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//
11a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya tshur bsten pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'i
11a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gsungs so//gang dag log pa'i lha chags dang //log par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang //log pa'i tshig tu smra ba dang //log pa'i las mtha' spyod pa
11a7(dkon brtsegs): dang //log pa'i 'tsho dang log rtsol dang //log pa'i dran dang mnyam par 'jog/log pa'i rnam grol rdzogs pa dang //log pa'i shes la gzhol ba yi//
11b1(dkon brtsegs): log par nges pa'i phung po ni//byis pa de lnga gnas pa dag/yang drug nyid la dgod do zhes//de phyir nga ni rab tu byung //gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten
11b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de ni lam ngan par zhugs shing mi dge babacu'i las kyi lam rnams kyis phal cher ngan song du gzhol ba/nganani song du 'bab pa/ngan song du 'bab par mthong
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma zer ba dang
11b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po dang /tshig 'khyal ba dang /brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba dang bcu ste/khyim bdag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
11b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis/'jig rten gyi gnas 'di nas lam dran par zhugs shing phal cher ngan song du gzhol ba dang /ngan song du 'bab pa/ngan song du bab par mthong
11b6(dkon brtsegs): nIs/ngan song thams cad la yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes dang pa
11b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan po'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
12a1(dkon brtsegs): srog garjod pa yi sems can dang //gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang //'dod pas log par g.yem pa dag/sems can dmyal bar
12a2(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'gro/dbyen byed pa dang tshig rtsub dang //brdzun du smra zhing mi sdom pa//byis pa kyal pa smra ba rnams//so so'i skye bo slu bas bcings//gzhan
12a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod lam brnab sems dang //gnod sems dag ni mang ba dang //mi mang lta bu log zhugs pa//ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur//lus kyi
12a4(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa rnam gsum dang //ngag gi sdig pa rnam bzhi dang //yid kyi sdig pa rnam gsum ni//sdig byed pa dag rab tu byed//sdig pa'i las rnams byas pa na//de
12a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir dran 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//ci nas ngan 'gror mi btang bung //bskyab pa'i phyir ni rab tu byung //gzhon yang kye me'o khyim bdag 'jog rten gnas pa
12a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu dag gis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang //kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang ldan par mthong ste/bcu gang zhe na/
12a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste ser sna'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /gnod sems kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa
12b1(dkon brtsegs): dang //lo lo'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /g.yeng ba'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /'chal pa'i shes rab kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /srizhu med
12b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /the tshom gyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /ma mos pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /ma gus pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon
12b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang bcu ste/khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu po de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par mthong nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i
12b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar bya'o zhes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //'di la chos nyid ni
12b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//'jig rten 'di dag phal tshur ni//kun nas nyon mongs bcu yis gzir//'dus byas kun nas nyon mongs dga'//nam yang skye
12b6(dkon brtsegs): brar byed mi 'gyur//byis pa so so'i skye bo kun//ser sna'i dri mas nyon mongs te//bslab pa yang dag gzung nas kyang //sdom pa med cing nyams par spyod//
12b7(dkon brtsegs): byis po bzod la rgyab kyi phyogs//brtson 'grus chung ba le lo cin//sems kyang gnas pa me yin pa//shes rab 'chal pa blun zhing rmongs//pha dang ma dang bu pho dang /
13a1(dkon brtsegs): bla ma la ni sro zhu spyas//'jig rten snang mdzad sangs rgyas drug/mthong nas b+h+r-i dran nom nur pyod//zab mo rgyal bsdu gzigs pa yis/
13a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ni slong bar byed//mun pa'i phung pos rab tu khebs//'phags pa'i tshogs la gus mi byed//kun nas nyon mongs 'di gzigs nas//'dus
13a3(dkon brtsegs): byas gang la'ang mi dga' ste//nyon mongs med pa 'dus ma byas//mya ngan 'das pa thob par bya//gzhan yang kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta
13a4(dkon brtsegs): sti phrag dog dang ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba dang ldan par shes//kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnom pa 'di ni 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i ling tog gis khebs par mthong //kye ma
13a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag 'jig rte ni gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste gti mug gi 'obs su chud par mthong //kye ma'i khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i rlung
13a6(dkon brtsegs): gis ded par mthong //kye ma'o khyim bdug 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i zug rngus shin tu zug par mthong /kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten
13a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa'i du bas shin du bdugs par mthong /kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'dod
13b1(dkon brtsegs): chags kyis myos kun du 'bar bar mthong /kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste zhe sdang gi drug glos khobs par mthong /kye ma'i khyim bdag 'jig rten
13b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste sgrib pa'i tsher mas bskor bar mthong //kye ma'o khyim bdag 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'khor ba'i 'brog pas brtson 'grus nyams
13b3(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ste/khyim bdag 'jig rten na gnas pa yongs su 'khri ba bracu po de dag gis yongs su dkris par mthong nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
13b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dron de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//rga bas skyes bu rnams kyi gzhon pa 'joms//
13b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang rnam par 'jig cing gzugs ngan byed//dran dang blo dang dga' ba med par byed//'gro ba rnams ni 'chi ba'i sgo mor khrid//nAd ni stobs dang
13b6(dkon brtsegs): drag shul rab tu 'joms//mthu dang pha rol gnod pa thams cad 'phrog/dbang po'i grong rnams mtha' dag 'joms par byed//mgon med shin du rtul bzhan
13b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//'chi ba srin po lta bur mi bzad de//rtag tu skye dgu rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang //stobs kyis rab tu mnon nas 'gro ba yi//phangs pa'i tshe ni/
14a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lus zad par mthung //rga ba dang ni 'tshongs skyo gyur to//'jig rten dag ni nad kyis gtses rig nas//mi dga' mi 'chi ni ni
14a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yi//chos rnams tshol phyir nga ni rab tu byung //me gsum gyis ni 'jig rten rib tshig pa//'gro ba dag la skyabs gzhan mu mthong nas//de ni skyabs dang
14a3(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen gyur byas te//bdud rtsi tshe ng+ge 'bu ma rnams zhi bar bya//skye dgu dag ni lam rnams rab stor cing //mig rnyed 'dongs pa rmongs par gyur
14a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong //ngo ni 'jig rten dag le mig sbyin zhing //lam rnams bstan phyir de ni rab tu byung //sgrib pa dag gis bsgribs shing kun bsgribs nasmra//
14a5(dkon brtsegs): the tshom kun nas langs pa'i sems can rnams//the tshom rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ba dang //chos rnams bstan phyir nga ni rab tu byung //sems can 'di
14a6(dkon brtsegs): dag phan tshun mi mthun te//blugs dang skabs tshal gnod paSh+Ti nyes pa can//'gras pa dag gi sgyums ni bya ba dang //'ad+mo lnga phan 'dod phyir ni ngadab byung /
14a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang me dang sdug pa'i mchog rnams la//nga rgyal dbang gis mi gus sems can dang //nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyil ba'i phyir//khyim bdag de phyir
14b1(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu byung //chags pa yis ni sgribs pa'i sems can rnams//rdzas phyir ltung bar byed pa na rjong pa dang //nor bdun rgya chen rab tu rnyed gyur to//des na snyoms//
14b2(dkon brtsegs): can dbul ba med par bya//sems can 'di dag phan tshun gsod byed cing //lus ni gdon mi za bar dor dgos kyang //byis pa drin med bdag lus gso mthong
14b3(dkon brtsegs): nas//srid pa gsum las nga ni rnam par log/ji ltar khyod ni don mi shes pa bzhin//de 'dra bas ni 'jig rten gsum po gang //'jig rten dag la don rnams bstan/
14b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//phan par 'dod pas nga ni rab tu byung //sems can dmyal bar lhung ba'i sems can dag/mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas kyi//sdug
14b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal drag po byed pa mthong bas na//de dag thar pAr bya phyir da rab byung //gcig la gcig ni gnod byed sems can rnams//byol song 'gro bar rnam par spyod
14b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas//skye dbu mgron med mgon ni bya ba'i phyir//snying rje'i bsam pas nga ni rab tu byung //gshin rje lhas ni gtses pa'i sems can rnams//bkros
14b7(dkon brtsegs): skom mi zad sdug bsngal gzir mthong nas//byang chub dam pa thob nas de dag la//bdud rtsi ro mchog kha zas sbyin par bya//mi yi kun du tshol ba'i sdug bsngal
15a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /lha rnams shi 'phos sdug bsngal rig nas ni//'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal sdug bsngal gyis//nyen pa mdzod nas nga
15a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu byung //khrel ba dang ni ngo tsha medre pa dag/'dod pas rab tu rgyal ba'i sems can rnams//ma dring sring mo bla ma'i chung ma la//nyal ba khyi dang
15a3(dkon brtsegs): phag rnams ji bzhin no//'dod pa'i dga' ba yis ni 'di dag mdo//sems can bud med dbang song 'di mthong nas//tshong dpon+da bud med dag ni mi
15a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas//khyim yang spangs nas nga ni rab tu byung //byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i dga' la gnas//thams cad sdig pa'i rtsod pa'i dbang du song //
15a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud rnams thams cad la ni dbang byas te//byang chub rim par 'tshang rgyang rab byung //khyam na gnas pa dag ni nyes pa stong //'di 'dra ba yi gnod pa 'di
15a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas//sa rnams thams cad rnam par spangs nu sa ni//skye ba zad par bya phyir nga rab byung //de nas khyim badrag lnga brgya tsam po de dag kye ma'o 'di ni sangs/
15a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yin no zhes ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur to//de dag gis sangs rgyas so sangs rgyas so snyam du rig nas sgra skad mgrin gcig tu/bcom ldan 'das la
15b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su bcad pa 'di dgra gsol to//tshong dpon 'dus pa lnga brgya tsam po dag/rga bas 'jigs skrag rgyal ba'i drung du mchis//'di la chos mchog dam pa rgyu
15b2(dkon brtsegs): che ba//rga 'chi mthar 'byin rab tu bshad du gsol//srid pa'i 'gro ba yongs dag bsam pa dag/bcom ldan srid pa la 'jigs las rnam par grol//'byung
15b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig par mdzad pa skyabs mdzod de//srid pa'i khyim zhugs 'gro ba thar par mdzod//dpa' bo 'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol//rdul bral dri mi mnga'/
15b4(dkon brtsegs): la rnam dag sems//rdul la mkhas pa kha lo bsgyur ba'i mchog/bdud rtsi dam pa chos kyi rgyun phye shig/skyes bu dam pa gzugs rab mchog 'dzini pa//
15b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'dra sa dang lha yul gang na med//mi mnyam mnyam pa dam pa 'jig rten gtso//bde bar gshegs pa rab mchog chos gsungs shig/dri gsum dri ma
15b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs shing skyon mi mnga'o//mun pa rab rib mi mnga' rnam dgu spyan//mun dang bral zhing gti mug dra ba bsal//rdul mi mnga' ba mtshungs med chos rnams gsungs//
15b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mgon med sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams//srid pa'i mtshor lhung skyabs med thams cad la//thugs rje brtse ba bskyed de byams pa'i thugs//rgyal ba myur
16a1(dkon brtsegs): drongs pha rol bgod par mdzod//nga rgyal gti mug rgyags pas brgal dka' zhing //nAd dang rtsod mad rmya rlung song pa'i chur//'gro ba/
16a2(dkon brtsegs): lhung nas khyer ba bskyabs med la//thugs rje skyed la srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol//gser gyi ri ltar rnam par dag pa'i sku//gzi brjid nyi ma bye ba rgya bas lhag
16a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum zhing snyan pa tshangs dbyangs mchog mnga' ba//chos mchog brjod pa mdzes pa rab tu gsungs//chos 'di kun ni rang bzhin rnam par dag/rang
16a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'od gsal ye nas rtsa ba dag/ma byas byed pa tshor ba po dang bral//gzhan las ma gsan rnam dag thams cad gzigs//spyad pa rab spyad grags
16a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas pa//rang byung stobs bcu mnga' zhing 'jigs med pa//mtha' yas ye shes na mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs//rab sbyin dge sbyong mchog gis
16a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bshad gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du gyur te//kye ma'o khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su smin gyis
16a7(dkon brtsegs): ci nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyim pa'i mtshan ma spangs te/rab tu byung ba thob nas thams cad zag pa zad pa'i mthar byed pa de lta de lta bur ngas chos
16b1(dkon brtsegs): bas+thAn hU~M sgyum du dgongs su//de nas bcom ldan 'das rat+ta rgyu sbyang go ba snang ma sgrol mo grangs bcus te bya zhugs so//de nas khyim bdag lbu brgya
16b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dga' ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang gus pa nye bar gzhig no/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdog lnga brgya tsam po de
16b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyed rnams gtse ba bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/skye bas gtso ba dang /rga bas gtse ba dang /na bas
16b4(dkon brtsegs): gtse ba dang /'chi bas gtse ba dang /mya ngan gyis gtse ba dang /smre sngags 'don pas gtso ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang /yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang /'khrugs
16b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gtso ba dang /'khor bas gtse ba ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams gtse ba badru po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas man
16b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dngos po bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gong zhe na/'di lta ste bdag nyid la gnod pa byas shes sems la kun nas mnar sems skyo ba dang /gnod pa byed do zhes sems
16b7(dkon brtsegs): la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /gnod pa byed par 'dod par gyur to zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas shos sems la kun
17a1(dkon brtsegs): nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa
17a2(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas shes sems la kun nas mnar sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i
17a3(dkon brtsegs): don byed do zhes sems la kun nas mnang sems skye ba dang /bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnar soms smra ba dang /gnod pa'i rab
17a4(dkon brtsegs): tu sdang ba nyid dang bcu ste/khyi bdag khyed rnams kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po bcu po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams lta ba sna tshogs su
17a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /sems can du lta bar gyur pa
17a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /srog tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /gang zag tu lta bar gyur pa lta ba dran pa thibs po dang /chad par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa
17a7(dkon brtsegs): thibs po dang /rtag par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /bya ba med par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /rgyu med par lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs
17b1(dkon brtsegs): bau dang /mi mthun pa'i rgyur lta bar gyur pa lta ba ngan pa thibs po dang /log par lta bar gyur pa lta ba dran pa thibs po ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams lta bur gyur pa lta ba ngan pa
17b2(dkon brtsegs): thibs po bcu po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams zug rngu bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste sred pa'i zug
17b3(dkon brtsegs): rngu dang /ma rig pa'i zug rngu dang /'dod pa'i zug rngu dang /'dod chags kyi zug rngu dang /zhe sdang gi zug rngu dang /gti mug gi zug rngu dang /nga rgyal gyi zug rngu
17b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /lta ba'i zug rngu dang /'byung ba'i zug rngu dang /'jig pa'i zug rngu dang /bcu ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams zug rngu bcu po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam
17b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i chos bcu po 'di drug las thar par 'dod dam+ba/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste sred pa la rten nas kun du tshol
17b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /kun du tshol ba la brten nas rnyed pa dang /rnyed pa la brten nas nga yir 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la brten nas rnam par nges pa dang /rnam par nges pa la
17b7(dkon brtsegs): brten nas 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang /'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas lhag par chags pa dang /lhag par chags pa la brten nas ser sna dang /ser sna la
18a1(dkon brtsegs): /brten nas yongs su 'dzin pa dang /yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas yongs su bsrung ba dang /yongs su bzung ba la brten nas sdug bsngal
18a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcu ste/yongs su bsrung ba'i gzhi las dbyigs pa thogs pa dang /mtshon cha thogs pa dang /'thab pa dang /'tshang 'dru ba dang /'gyed pa dang /rtso de
18a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams 'byung ngo //de'i phyir phra ma la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/khyim bdag khyod rnams sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i
18a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bcu po 'di dag las thor par 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa nyid bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste log
18a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lta ba dang /log pa'i rtog pa dang /log pa'i ngag dang /log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /log pa'i 'tsho ba dang /log pa'i rtsol ba dang /log pa'i
18a6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang /log pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /log pa'i shes pa ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa bcu po 'di las thar par
18a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste srog cod pa dang /ma byin par
18b1(dkon brtsegs): lon pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /ngag rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa dang /brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang
18b2(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam/gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas nyon mongs
18b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste ser sna'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
18b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /le lo'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /g.yeng ba'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /'tshal ba'i shes rab
18b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /srid zhu med pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /the tshom gyi dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /ma mos pa'i dri mas kun
18b6(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa dang /ma gus pa'i dri mas kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu po 'di las thar par 'dod dam/
18b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcu las thar par 'dod dam/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste phrag dog dang /ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba
19a1(dkon brtsegs): /las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams ma rig pa'i ling tog las thar par 'dod dum/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams gti mug
19a2(dkon brtsegs): gi 'obs las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa'i zug rje//
19a3(dkon brtsegs): las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams 'dod
19a4(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi me las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams zhe sdang gi dug las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyed rnams sgrib pa'i tsher
19a5(dkon brtsegs): ma las thar par 'dod dam/'di lta ste khyim bdag khyod rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las thar par 'dod dam+ba/khyim bdag khyed rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs
19a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu po 'di dag las thar par 'dod dam/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis sgra skad mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//
19a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gtse ba bcu las thar par 'tshal te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste skye bas gtse ba dang /rga bas gtse ba dang /na bas gtse ba dang //
19b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bas gtso ba dang /mya ngan gyis gtso ba dang /smre sngags 'don pas gtso ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis dAts+tsha byA dang /yid mi pad+mo bas ga ba dang /'jug pas
19b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang //'khor ba'i gtso ba las bcom ldan 'das bdage cag thar bar 'tshal lags so//de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i brla du chos bcu po 'di dag thams
19b3(dkon brtsegs): cad rgyas par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag la bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag rnams mig ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i
19b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/mig ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste mig ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go//de bas na khyim bdagra rnams mig bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//
19b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste yid ni mi sems
19b6(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par mi rig go/de bas na khyim bdag rnams yid la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//khyim bdag rnams gzugs ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci
19b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/gzugs ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste gzugs ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go/de bas na khyim bdag rnams gzugs la yang bdag med do///
20a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes gnas par bya'o//khyim bdag rnams sgra dang dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na
20a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rab tu byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste chos ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go/de bas ni khyimo bdag rnams chos kyi bar du yang bdag med do zhes gnas pa
20a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs kyi phung po ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste gzugs
20a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go//de bas na khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//khyim bdag rnams//
20a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i phung po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phung po dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam
20a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i phung ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste rnam par shes pa'i phu po ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go//de bas na khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes
20a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams ni thar par mi 'dod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa'i khams ni byed pa med
20b1(dkon brtsegs): pa g.yo ba med pa ste sa'i khams na m+b+hi sems shing rnam par ma rin no//de bas na khyim bdag rnams so'i khams la bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//khyim bad+ma/
20b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bAr par mi 'dod do//de tsal
20b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe ni/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mi sems shing rnam par mi/rig go//de bas na khyim bdag /
20b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o//de ltar ni khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin por
20b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa las byung ste/rkyen la rag ltas pa stobs med pa nyams chung ba rkyen rnams las byung ba/rkyen rnams yod na chos rnams gdags par 'gyur
20b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkyen rnams mdan chos rnams gdogs par mi 'gyur ro//khyim bad+ma ga rnams chos thams cang ni btags pi tsam ste//'di la lam chad pa mya ngan
20b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/rga ba 'am/'chi ba 'am/'pho ba 'am/'byung ba gang yang med do//de ltar khyim bdag rnams khyed rnam grangs 'odas
21a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/kun brtags pa las byung ba/rgyun las rag las p+ta/stobs mod pa/nyams chung ba//
21a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen rnams las byung ba ste/rkyen rnams yod na chos rnams gdags par 'gyur gyis/rkyen med na chos rnams gdags par mi 'gyur ro//chos thams cad
21a3(dkon brtsegs): no btags pa tsam ste/'di la lam chad pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/rga ba 'am/'chi ba dang /'pho ba 'am/'byung ba gang yang
21a4(dkon brtsegs): med par rig par bya'o//de ltar na khyim bdag rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyur
21a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi yang dgra pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa med na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par gdags par mi 'gyur ro//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa
21a6(dkon brtsegs): yod na ma rig pa gdags par 'gyur gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na ma rig pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro//ma rig pa yod na 'du
21a7(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed yod na rnam par shes pa gdags
21b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi 'du byed med na rnam par shes pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs gdags par 'gyur gyi rnam par shes pa med na ming
21b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs gdagos par mi 'gyur ro//ming dang gzugs yod na skye mched drug gdags par 'gyur gyi ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug du gdags par mi 'gyur
21b3(dkon brtsegs): ro//skye mched drug yod na reg par gdags par 'gyur gyi skye mched drug med na rig par gdagus par mi 'gyur ro//reg pa yod na tshor ba gdags par 'gyur gyi reg pa med
21b4(dkon brtsegs): na tshor bar gdags par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba yod na sred pa gdags par 'gyur gyi tshor ba med na srid pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro//sred pa yod na len pa gdags
21b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi sred pa med na len pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro//len pa yod na srid pa gdags par 'gyur gyi len pa med na srid pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro//srid pa yod
21b6(dkon brtsegs): na skye ba gdags par 'gyur gyi srid pa med na skye ba gdags par mi 'gyur ro//skye ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi skye ba med na rga shi gdags par mi 'gyur te/rgas
21b7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/rgas pa dang /gtugs pa dang /spyi zing ba dang /skra skye ba dang /gnyer ma mang ba dang /tshe nyams pa dang /dbang po yongs su smin pa dang /'du
22a1(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams kyi dngos po rnyings pa ste/de ni rga ba zhes bya'o//'chi ba zhes bya ba gang zhe nu/'di lta ste 'tsho ba dang /'pho ba dang /'tsho ba'i dus byed pa dang /
22a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po rnams zhog pa dang /lus bor ba dang /ris mthun pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang bral ba ste 'di ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o//de la rga ba 'di dang /'chi ba 'di ni rga shi zhes
22a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de ltar skye ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi skye ba med na rga shir gdags par mi 'gyur te/skye ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/skye ba dang /rdzogasnga par skye ba dang /
22a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang /mngon par 'grub pa dang /phung po rnams 'byung ba dang /skye mched rnams rab tu 'thob pa dang /ris 'thun pa dang phrad pa ste de ni skye ba zhes bya'o//
22a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa yod na skye ba gdags par 'gyur gyi srid pa med na skye bar gdwags par mi 'gyur te/srid pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dod pa'i srid pa dang /gzugs kyi
22a6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa dang /gzugs med pa'i srid pa ste/de ni srid pa zhes bya'o//len pa yod na srid pa gdags par 'gyur gyi len pa med na srid pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/len pa
22a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'dod pa'i len pa dang /lta ba'i len pa dang /tshul khrims dang brtul shugs kyi len pa dang /bdag tu smra ba'i len pa ste/de ni len pa zhes bya'o//
22b1(dkon brtsegs): srod pa yod na lon pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/srod pa med na lon pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/sred pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste gzugs la sred pa dang /sgra la
22b2(dkon brtsegs): smad pa dang /dri la sred pa dang /ro lnga sred pa dang /reg bya la srid pa dang /chos la srid pa ste/de ni sred pa zhes bya'o//tshor ba yod na srid pa gdags par 'gyur
22b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshor ba med na skyed pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/tshor ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
22b4(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
22b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ste de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o//reg pa yod na tshor ba gdags par 'gyur gyi rig pa med na
22b6(dkon brtsegs): tshor bu gdags par mi 'gyur te/reg pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lci ste mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg
22b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste de ni reg pa zhes bya'o//skye mche drug yod na reg pa gdags par 'gyur gyi skye mche drug med na reg pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/skye mched drug ces bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
23a1(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mched dang /rna ba'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched dang /yid kyi skye mched de/de ni skye
23a2(dkon brtsegs): mched drug ces bya'o//ming dang gzugs yod na skye mched drug gdagis par 'gyur gyi ming dang gzugs med na skye mchedado drug gdags par mi 'gyur te/ming dang
23a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs shes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshor po dang /'du shes dang /sems pa dang /reg pa dang /yid la byed pa dang /'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /'byung ba/
23a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi gnas pa ni ming dang gzugs te/'di ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o//rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs gdags par 'gyur gyi rnam par shes
23a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med na ming dang gzugs su gdags par mi 'gyur te/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes
23a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/de ni rnam par shes pa zhes
23a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//'du byed rnams yod na rnam par shes pa gdags par 'gyur gyi 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/'du byed rnams shes
23b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste gzugs la kun sems pa dang /sgra la kun sems pa dang /dri la kun sems pa dang /ro la kun snyoms pa dang /reg bya la kun sems/
23b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /chos la kun sems pa ste de dag ni 'du byed rnams shes bya'o//ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams shes bya'o//ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags
23b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ma rig pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /sngon dang phyi mo'i mtha' mi shes
23b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /nang mi shes pa dang /phyi mi shes pa dang /nang dang phyi mi shes pa dang /sdug bsngal mi shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba mi shes pa dang /'gog pa mi
23b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /lam mi shes pa ste/de ltar rkyen mi shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba mi shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa
23b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /nag po dang dkar po dang /rkyen dang /rkyen ma yin pa dang /snang ba dang /mi snang ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /bsten
23b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang /bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang /gang mi shes pa dang mi mthong ba dang /mngon par mi rtogs pa dang /khong du mi chud pa de ni ma rig pa
24a1(dkon brtsegs): /zhes bya'o//tshul bzhin ma sbyin pa yid la byed pa yod na ma rig pa gdugs par 'gyur gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na ma ri//
24a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gamo/bdag 'das
24a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gAm/ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig na/bdag 'das pa'i dus na gang du byung ba zhig/bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur
24a4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram/ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba zhig na//
24a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang du 'byung bar 'gyur//bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes nang du bdag ci/bdag su zhig/ci yod dam/ci med dam/
24a6(dkon brtsegs): ci byung ngam/ci ma byung ngam/cir gyur/gang du byung /bdag cir gyur/glang du byung ba zhig/ci bdag byung ba zhig na/bdag gang du byung ba zhig/bdag der byung ba
24a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam zhes the tshom za zhing yid gnyi su gyur te/de ltar tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byung bas lta bar gyur pa drug las lta ba gang yang rung ba cig byung bar gyur/
24b1(dkon brtsegs): te/bdag yod ces lta bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag med ces lta bar gyur pa dang /bdag la bdag yang dag par rje su mthong zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag la bdag
24b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /de ni bdag ste de 'jig rten no zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /gral te rkyen+da la brten te 'byung ba ni rtag pa brtan
24b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can ther zug pa yang dag par 'dug pa 'am 'dug par 'gyur zhes lta bar 'gyur ba de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyu gyi yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa med na
24b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par myi 'gyur te/yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag dang sems can dang /
24b6(dkon brtsegs): srog dang /skyes bu dang /gong zag dang /skye ba po dang /shing las skyes dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po ste de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o//
24b7(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo thog pa dang mi ldan pa rnams bdag ces rtog cing yongs su rtog pa dang /sems can dang /srog dang /skyes bu dang /shed las skyes dang /shed bu dang
25a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa po dang /tshor ba po zhes rtog cing yongs su rtog pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun+d+ha rtog pa zhes bya'o//de ltar yang drug pa ma
25a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa kun mi rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyur gyi yang dag pa ma yin pa kun+da mi rtog pa med na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la
25a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yod na ma rig pa gdags par 'gyur gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na
25a4(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa gdags par myi 'gyur ro//ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur
25a5(dkon brtsegs): ba nus skye ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi skye ba med na rga shi gdags par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro////bam po
25a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po//de ltar na khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rtog pa las byung ba rkyen la rag las pa stobs med pa/rkyen
25a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams las byung ba yin te/rkyen med na chos rnams gdags par mi 'gyur ro//khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam ste/'di la lam chad
25b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skyo ba 'am/rga ba 'am/'pho ba 'am/'byung bya glang yang med do//khyim byudag rnams 'di lta ste dper na chu mtsho chen po la
25b2(dkon brtsegs): nya gnas par gyur pa/khyim bdag rnams de ji snyam du sems/nya de dag ci zhig gi mthu/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chab kyi mthu'i//
25b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa chab kyi mthu'o//de la khyim bdag rnams ci chu de sems sam/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//bde bar
25b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag rnams de ltar chu sdems pa med pa la nI'i stobs shig yod/bcom ldan 'das stobs ma
25b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so//bde bar gshegs pa stobs chung ngo //bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag rnams de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa
25b6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba/stobs med pa nyams chung ba rkyen rnams las byung ba ste/rkyen rnams yod na chos rnams gdags par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag rnams chos thams
25b7(dkon brtsegs): cad btags pa tsam ste/'di la lam chad pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/rga ba 'am/'chi ba 'am/'pho ba 'am/'byung ba gang
26a1(dkon brtsegs): /yang med do//khyim bdag khyod rnams de bas na rkyen de dag la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs la/de'i tshe yid brtan du mi rung ba dang
26a2(dkon brtsegs): yid brtan pa ma yin pas skrag par gyis shig/skrag par gyur pa de ni 'bros par gyis shig/chos gang las 'bros pa'i chos de gang zhes tshul
26a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du so sor rtogs shig/tshul bzhin du sngo sor rtogs pa de ni chos gang chos dri las 'bros pa'i chos de rtogs par gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe
26a4(dkon brtsegs): nu/khyim bdag rnams rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams rdul dang bral ba'i phyir
26a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams bdog dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni sems can med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams skye
26a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /rga ba dang /nu ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las
26a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni srog med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams dus gsum yang dag par chad ni chos thams cad gang zag med pa'o//
26b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams sgra dang /skad dang dbyangs dang /tshig gi lum nas brjod du med pa'i phyir/chos thams cadra yi ge med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams dmigs pa med pa'i
26b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos thams cad ni tshigs pa med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad ni zhi ba'o//khyim bdag rnams na mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyir
26b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni kun du dor ba'o//khyim bdag rnams nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa'o//khyim bdag rnams gnas
26b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma grayos pa'o//khyim bdag rnams mi gnas shing g.yo ba med pa ldan pa'i phyir/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o//
26b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams rba klong dang bral ba'i phyir//chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams mtshan ma med dbyings med pa la snang ba rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams/
26b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni kha dog med pa'o//khyim badrog rnams nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad nA nga yi bag med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams sems dang yid dang rnam par shes
26b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o//khyim bdag rnams mig gi lam las shin du 'das pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid
27a1(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam las shin du 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni kun gzhi med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni dor ba med cing bsnan pa med pa'o//khyim bdag rnams sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba mod
27a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//khyim bdag rnams rang bzhin gyis nyams chung ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni rkyen las rag las pa'o//khyim bdag rnams mig ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur
27a4(dkon brtsegs): pA/mi rtag pa mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa'i snying po med pa nyams chung ba zhig pa/yun thung ba yid brtan du mi rung ba sdug bsngal ba nad mang ba gtso ba mang ba yin te//
27a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams kyis mig de la gnas par mi bya'o//khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa
27a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa yid brtan du mi rung ba snying po med pa zhigs pa nad can sdug bsngal ba/nad mung ba/gtse ba mang ba yin te/khyim bdag khye
27a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yid de la gnas par mi bya'o//yang khyim bdag khyed rnams 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/mig 'di ni gnyer mi bzod de lbu ba lta bu'o//mig 'od
27b1(dkon brtsegs): nI ring du mi gnas te chu'i chu bur lta bu'o//mig 'di ni lus dang /nyon mongs pa dang /sred pa las byung ba ste smig rgyu lta bu'o//mig 'di ni rang bzhin
27b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis snying po med do chu shing lta bu'o//mig 'di ni phyin ci log las byung ste sgyu ma lta bu'o//mig 'di ni log pa dang /yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba ste rmi lam lta
27b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'o//mig 'dri na rkyen la rag lus pa ste brag tsho lta bu'o//mig 'di ni las kyi mig yor gyis kun du snang bya ste mig yor lta bu'o//mig 'di ni sems 'khrugs
27b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de sprin lta bu'o//mig 'di ni skad cig tu 'jig pa dang ldan pa la glog lci bu'o//mig 'di ni bdag po med des dang mtshungs kyi so//
27b5(dkon brtsegs): mig 'di ni bdag po med de chu dang mtshungs so//mig 'di ni sems med de me dang mtshungs so//mig 'di ni srog rmed de rlung dang mtshungs so//mig 'di ni gang zag med
27b6(dkon brtsegs): de nam mkha' dang mtshungs so//mig 'di ni 'byung ba chen po'i kun gzhi ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o//mig 'di ni bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba ste stong pa'o//mig
27b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rtsa dang rtsig pa dang /shing dang /rdo dang /mig yor lta bu ste bems po'o//mig 'di ni rlung gi 'khrug 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ste byed pa med pa'o//mig 'di ni
28a1(dkon brtsegs): grwasrog ste mi gtsang ba dang rnag bsags pa'o//mig 'di ni gsob ste/g.yo ba kun du nye ba zhig pa rnam par 'thor ba 'jig pa'i chos cano//
28a2(dkon brtsegs): mig 'di ni rtag tu rga ba'i zil gyis non pa ste khron pa rnying pa dang mtshungs so//mig 'di ni mthar 'chi ba ste mthar mi gnas pa'o//khyim bdag rnams mig ji lta
28a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyang rig par bya'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te chos thams cad kyi bar du rig par bya'o//khyim bdag
28a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhan yang 'di lta ste mig dang /rna ba dang sna dang lce dang /lus 'di ni byis pa so so'i skyo bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste yid 'din
28a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste gzugs 'di dang /'di lta ste sgro dang /dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /chos 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
28a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim
28a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnams tshor ba'i phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams 'du shes kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i spyi
28b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams 'du byed kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam+ba mo//'di lta ste khyim bdang
28b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams
28b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsa mo//
28b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste khyim bdag rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba'i chos 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo//de bas na khyim bdagra khyed rnams
28b5(dkon brtsegs): dad par gyis shig/mi 'dod par gyis shig mi 'dod par gyur nas bu drang chung ma rnams nyo bar ma len cig/nor rnams ma len cig/de dag mi yin par gyur
28b6(dkon brtsegs): nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyis shig/dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas mi 'dod par gyis shig/khyim bdag rnams rab tu byung
28b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi 'dod pa gang zhe na/gang so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la yang 'jigs par lta zhing
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par bzung nas slob ste/tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas so//tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa ni mig mi
29a2(dkon brtsegs): len rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid mI len/gzugs mi len/sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang chos la mi lin/gzugs dang tshor ba dang /'du
29a3(dkon brtsegs): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi len/sa'i khams mi len/chu'i khams mi len/me'i khams mi len/rlung gi khams dang /nam
29a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len te/khyim bdag rnams 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa'o//mig gi khams mi yin to//gong ma bzhin
29a5(dkon brtsegs): du sbyar te/yid kyi khams kyi bar du mi len to//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te gang mi len pa de yongs su mi spong ngo //ci yongs su mi spong zhe na/mig yongasu
29a6(dkon brtsegs): mi spong rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid yongs su mi spong /gzugs yongs su mi spong /sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang /chos yongs su mi spong
29a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /tshor ba'i phung po yongs su mi spong /'du shes kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /'du byed kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /rnam
29b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i phung po yongs su mi sbyong /sna'i khams yongs su mi spring /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams dang /rnam
29b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yongs su mi spong ngo //de nam mi spong ba de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//kun nas nyon mongs pa med na yang bar 'gyur
29b3(dkon brtsegs): ro//de nas nam yang bar gyur pa de na de mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nam mi snang ba de na gang la yang khong khro bar mi byed do//de nam khong khro bar mi byed pa de na bdag la
29b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod par mi sems/gzhan la gnod par mi sems/gnyis ka la gnod par mi sems te/de gnod par mi sems pas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
29b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//khyim bdag rnams de la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhe na/de la mig yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/rna ba dang /
29b6(dkon brtsegs): sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' mod kyi/khyim bdag rnams gang mig la brten nas nga zhe 'am nga'i zhes yang dag pa ma yin pa mi 'dzin pa
29b7(dkon brtsegs): de dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o//gang dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin zhe na/'dod chags dang bral ba ni yongasu mya ngan 'a
30a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'o//zhe sdang dang bral ba ni yongs su mya dran las 'das pa'o//gti mug dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o//
30a2(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/yang khyim bdag rnams mi shes pa ni 'das pa la med par ma gyur/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa
30a3(dkon brtsegs): la med par ma 'gyur mod kyi mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes so//khyim bdag de la gang zhe na/'di lta ste zad pa shes pa'o//de la zad pa shes pa
30a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/zad pa shes pa ni 'das pa ma yin/zad pa shes pa ni mu 'ong ba ma yin/zad pa shes pa ni de ltar byung ba ma yin mod kyi/khyim bdag rnams
30a5(dkon brtsegs): gang brten te mi shes pa dang /bral nus shes pa skyes par gyur pa de ni mi shes pa dang bral ba'i shes pa'o//mig la brten nas mi shes pa dang bral zhing
30a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skyes kyang mig ni de'i ba ma yin no//gang 'i ba ma yin pa de yongs su ma gzung ba'o//gang yongs su ma gzung ba de spangs pa'o//gang spangs pa de
30a7(dkon brtsegs): ni grol ba'o//gang las grol zhe na/bdag tu 'dzin pa las grol/sems can du 'dzin pa las grol/srog tu 'dzin pa las grol/gang zag tu 'dzin pa
30b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /chad par 'dzin pa dang /rtag par 'dzin pa las grol 'dzin pa thams cad las grol/yongs su rtog pa las grol te/de yongs su mi rtog go//yongasu
30b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ci la mi rtog ce na/nga dang nga'i zhes mi rtog ste/de mi sogs shing sogs par mi byed la spong zhing mi len te/spangs pas yongasu
30b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das so//grol lo/byung ngo //rab tu rnam par grol lo//bra lo//gang las byung zhe na/sdug bsngal thams cad las byung ngo //khyim bdag khyed rnams
30b4(dkon brtsegs): byung bar 'dod na chos gang yang blang bar mi bya'o//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/khyim bdag rnams len pas ni srid par 'gyur ro//mi len pas na srid pa med do//de la khyim
30b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnams mig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin no//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
30b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa nas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yong su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin mod kyi/khyim bdag rnams gang rnam par shes pa la brten te/nga dang nga'i zhes yang
30b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa de dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o//gang dang bral na yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yin zhe na/'dod chags dang bral ba ni
31a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'dus pa'o//zhe sdang dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o//gti mug dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las
31a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'o//mi shes pa dang bral ba ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das bya ste/yang khyim bdag rnams mi shes pa ni 'das pa dang /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa la
31a3(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur pa ma yin mod kyi mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyeso//khyim bdag rnams de la shes pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste zad pa shes pa'o//de la
31a4(dkon brtsegs): zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/zad pa shes pa ni 'das pa ma yin/zad pa shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa ma yin/zad pa shes pa ni da ltar byung ba ma yin med kyi//
31a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams mig la brten te/mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes par gyur ba de ni mi shes pa dang bral ba'i shes pa'o//mig la brten te mi
31a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes kyang shes pa'i dbyings ni nga'i bo ma yin no//gang ngo yi ba ma yin pa de yongasu ma gzung ba'o//gang yongs su
31a7(dkon brtsegs): ma gzung ba de spangs pa'o//gang spongs pa de grol ba'o//gang las grol zhe na/bdag tu 'dzin pa las grol/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /srob tu 'dzin pa
31b1(dkon brtsegs): dung /gang zag tu na byA dang /chad par 'dzin pa dang /rtag+sa byAr 'dzin pa smras grol/ngas s+yA tog+h+ra pA lhas grol tu dri yongasu ma gu g+ho/yongasu mo rtog pas
31b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ci la yang mi rtog ce na/nga zhes mi rtog nga'i zhes mi rtog ste/de mi sogs shing sogs pa med do//len pa med cing spangs pas yongs
31b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das so//grol lo//byung ngo //rab tu rnam par grol lo//bral lo//gang nas byung zhe na/sdug bsngal thams cad las byung ngo //khyim bdag khyed
31b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'byung bar 'dod na chos gang yang blang bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/khyim bdag rnams len pas ni srid par 'gyur gyi mi len pas ni ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan
31b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan nga'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so//len pa las ni 'jigs skye ste//de phyir dran 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//'jigs bcas
31b6(dkon brtsegs): nanunas ni 'di mthong nas//mkhas pas de nI mi len to//lam gang nyid la bsgom bya ba//shes rab kyis ni de lta ste//shes rab kyis mthong 'gyur bas//rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyuro//
31b7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched thams cad stong pa ste//snying po med par g.yo zhing gsog/skye dbu rnams ni sred pas smras//de la chags par mi bya'o//chos rnams stong par ngas mkhyen te//chos rnams
32a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po med par mkhyen//bde brnyes mya ngan mi mdzad do//ngas ni mi g.yo bde ba brkos//gang gis 'di ltar chos rnams kun//stong pa nyid du shes pa ste/
32a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dag ni kun las tha~Mr//de la rtsod pa med pa yin//'dod pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin kun dang //gtso ba thams cad kyi yang bskyed pa yin//yong su 'dzin po dag las yin
32a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes so//len bya dag las phred pa 'byung bar 'gyur//srid pa las ni rdzogs kyi sme'i b+h+yo//de ni 'jun pA dang ni 'grub par 'gyur//skyes nas nad dang rga dang 'chi ba dang /
32a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod sdug bsngal chen po gzhan dag gnon//'dod pa med na lon pa yod ma yin//len pa med na srid par mi 'gyur to//srid pa mngon par 'grub las 'das pa ni/
32a5(dkon brtsegs): rgan dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//de phyir khyed kun gcig tu 'dus gyur nas//yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par spang byos la//bu dang chung ma dag la dga' spongs te//dge slong
32a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di myur du blang bar byos//shes kyi khe 'dod rnyed pa 'dod ma byed//ngan ngon tsam dag gis ni chog byas la//gdol pa dag dang 'dra ba'i dma' sems kyis//gzhan
32a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi grong du nye bar 'gro bar byo//nga ni tshul khrims ldan zhes bdag ma bsgoms//'di ni tshul khrims ngan zhes gzhan ma bsdus//tshul khrims tsam gyis gzhan la gang bskus
32b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/bsnyems phyir de ni tshul khrims 'tshal zhes bya//ji ltar ri dwags dag ni rgyus zin pa//de dag nyid du de zin gsod pa ltar//de bzhin bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa de/
32b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyams pa de nyid kyis ni de bcom mo//'chi bol-I bsam pa can gyi gang zag dog/gzhan la brnyas pas bdag nyid nyams par byed//de bas tshul khrims 'chal gsang
32b3(dkon brtsegs): mi brnyas na//khrims ldan tshangs par spyod la smos ci dgos//drang srong nges pa'i rjesu slob pa dag/rnam par grol ba zhi ba 'di tshol zhing //lus dang srog rnams la yang
32b4(dkon brtsegs): mi lta bar//rtag tu dben par dgon par gnas par bya//gnod pa'i wa sa gcer bu gsang tshig dang //'jig rten rgyang phran gsang tshig rnam spongs la//stong pa
32b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ldan par gang gsungs pa//zab mo'i chos la dga' ba bskyed par byos//nang dang phyi rol dag gi skye mched ni//bcu gnyis po ste sems kyi rtsa bar bshad//de
32b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kun kyang las kyi rgyu lngas byung //lus kyang rgyun ring sems pas bzhag po'o//mig dang gzugs snod la ni brten byas nas//rkyen rnams las kyang rnam par shes pa
32b7(dkon brtsegs): skye//'grub ma tshang na ni nub 'gyur te//ji ltar shing med me ni mi 'bar bzhin//de ltar chos 'di thams cad rab skyes pa//phan tshun 'dus pa las ni 'byung bar
33a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//byed pa po dang tshor ba mi dmigs te//bya ba dag ni sgyu ma lta bur snang //dra ni nang dang phyi rol chos rnams kun//stong pa nyid de sgyu
33a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dra bar mkhyen//byis pa mi shes log par 'dzin pa dag/nga dang nga yi nyes kyang rnam par rtog/mig ni nang na cung zad yod ma yin//phyi rol gang du'ang
33a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can mi dmigs te//mig ni bdag med byed med srog med de//chos rnams kun kyang de ltar shes par byos//mig ni sems shing grol bar 'dod pa
33a4(dkon brtsegs): yin//de bzhin rna ba dang ni sna dang lce dang //lus dang yid dang gzugs kyang byed med de//chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra bar ltos//ji ltar rgya mtsho dag
33a5(dkon brtsegs): gi chu las ni//lbu ba rdos pa chen po ma byung ba//de la mig ldan tshul bzhin nges brtags na//lbu ba rdos pa nyam chung snying po med//de bzhin phung po lnga yi
33a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid//lbu ba lta bur nyam chung gang shes pa//gtse ba thams cad dang ni skye ba dang //rga dang mya ngan gtse las grol bar 'gyur//gang dag nga yi bstan
33a7(dkon brtsegs): la rab byung nas//chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de//yul gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par za//de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mchod pa byed//de nas/
33b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam sa phyogs de nyid na gnas pa de dag chos rnams kyi mig rdul med cing da ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/'di lta ste dper na gosu drag pa nag po
33b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba//tshon du bcug na myur du tshon 'dzin pa de bzhin du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam pos phyogs de nyid na gnas pa de dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
33b3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lde brgya tsam po de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par gzer
33b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod/yang dag par rab tu dgu' bar byas so//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te/khyim bdag rnams mig kun du 'bar te/cis kun
33b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang gi mAM dang /gti mug gi mes kun du 'bar ro//skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na bya dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang
33b6(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pas kun du 'byar te bdog gir bya ba sdug bsngalo zhes ba shadro//khyim bdag rnams rna ba
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyi bar du kun du 'bar te/cis kun du 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang gi me dang /gti mug gi me dang /skye ba
34a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /rga ba dang /nA ba dang /'tsho ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pas//
34a2(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'bar te bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngalo zhes bshad//khyim bdag rnams gzugs kun tu 'bar te/cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang
34a3(dkon brtsegs): gi ma dang /gti mug gi mes kun du 'ab rI//de ltar sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang reg bya dang /chos rnams kyang /gong maM bzhin du sbyar ro//khyim bdag rnams
34a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi phung po kun du 'bar te/cis kun du 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi ma dang /zhe sdang gri me dang /gti mug gi mas kun du 'bar ro//tshor ba'i phung
34a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phung po dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang de bzhin no//khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams kun du 'bar te/cis
34a6(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang gi m+me dang /gti mug gi mos kun du bar ro//khyim bdag rnams chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang
34a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams kun du'abar te/cis kun du 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang gi me dang /gti mug gis mes kun du 'baro//
34b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pas kun+da du 'bur te/bdag/
34b2(dkon brtsegs): gor bya ba sdug bsngalo zhes bshad//de bas na khyim bri dag rnams mig blang bar mi bya'o zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du khyim bdag rnams
34b3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bas na khyim bdag rnams gzugs blang bar mi bya/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /
34b4(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang /chos byung bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po blang bar mi bya'o//tshor ba'i phung po dang /'du shes kyi phu
34b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang /'du byed kyi phung po dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//de lta bas na khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams blang bar mi
