34b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bas na khyim bdag rnams
34b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bas na khyim bdag rnams 'jig rten 'di blang bar mi bya'o//'jig rten pha rol blang bar mi bya'o/
35a1(dkon brtsegs): /zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bsgrub par bya'o//khyim ba dag khyed rnams nam mig mi len cing /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /
35a2(dkon brtsegs): yid mi len pa de na khyed rnams mig nas yid kyi bar la mi gnas por 'gyur//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs mi len cing /swA dang dri dang /ro dang /reg bya
35a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos rnams mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs kyi phung po mi len cing /tshor ba'i phu
35a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'du byed kyi phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nas
35a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga mi len pa de ni khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga mi gnas par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam sa'i khams mi len
35a6(dkon brtsegs): cing /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /namakha'i khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams na mkha'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyuraro//khyim pa
35a7(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i khams mi yin pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyuraro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam 'jig
35b1(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di mi len cing /'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyuraro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad mi
35b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gronas pa de ni khyed rnams mi 'byung mi 'jig/
35b3(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na khyed rnams skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang //
35b4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams lngas yongs su thar par 'gyur te/sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do//de nas bcom ldan
35b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yi sa//'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar//
35b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa skyabs med gtso bo ste//de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams//brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur//dang
35b7(dkon brtsegs): po chud som ma byed par//brtson 'grus brtan brtsom byos shig/gang la gnas te rnam bsgom pa//shes rab kyi ni de yang ltos//shes rab kyis ni de mdong //
36a1(dkon brtsegs): ste//rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//gang la gnas te sems bsgom pa//thams cad stong par shes par bya//chos rnams stong
36a2(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas ni//byang chub nyid kyang stong pa nyid//'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang //me gsum de dag shin du mi bzad po//des na 'jig
36a3(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di kun rab 'bar yang //byis pa rig nas gnyid log khong mi chud//skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang /smre sngags 'don cing sdug bsngal yid mi bdes//
36a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni//chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis
36a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig/bdag cag rnams kyis bde
36a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cog/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces gsungs pa dang
36a7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar 'gyur te/de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to//'di la
36b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//de dag gis ni ngur smrig bsgos//de dag gis ni sgra yang bregs//kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas//de nyid du ni
36b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom gyur//ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas//dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang //lha rnams 'dun du mngon sum+b+ha du//ched du brjod pa che
36b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod//'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la//sngon tshod sbyin pa byin pas nA//gang na badri ba mang ba dUr//shin du dga' zhing 'ongs par 'gyud//de dge
36b4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni cha mthong nas//dad pa rab tu skyes par gyur//de dag sems ni dang ba la//chos rnams kyis ni mchog bstan to//dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos
36b5(dkon brtsegs): naso//bdag tu lta ba rnam par bshig/stong nyid mngon du byas nas ni//de dag skye ba kun las grol//khyim bdag gi le'u ste dang po'o///
36b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pasnga rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegasaso//
36b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang /gnod sbyin ji 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas 'jig rten na shin du dkon pa
37a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul snyamo//de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs
37a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa/reg phun sum tshogs pa/bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/gnod sbyin ji 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod
37a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms de bzhiso//bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe steng gI bar snang las ji 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri
37a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gis leg so zhes bya ba byin te rje su yi rang po'i sgra phyung //de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/bdag gis ni da bzod de
37a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyis//de khyod kyis ni dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig/de ni khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar
37a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod
37a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms blangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las des bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas sa phyogs de nas slar
37b1(dkon brtsegs): log go//de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang /klu stong phrag du ma dang /gnod sbyin drang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen
37b2(dkon brtsegs): po stong phrag du ma dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma drang /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du dong ngo //
37b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so//de nas gnod sprin ji 'jigs 'khor dang bcas bas lha'i me
37b4(dkon brtsegs): tog man da ra ba dang /ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom
37b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to//gtor mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo skur te phyag 'tshal nas bcom
37b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen/de'i khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa yang mkhyen nas 'dzum
37b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do//chos nyid ni 'di yin te nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshog 'di lta ste/ser po dang dmar
38a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas
38a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid med par byas te/sems can dmyal ba'i sems can nas/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/slar log nas
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po//kha cig ni phrag par nub po//kha cig ni pus mor nub po//
38a4(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid ni 'di yin te/nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer zhabs kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyuraro///
38a5(dkon brtsegs): nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zeng gnam logasu nub par 'gyur ro//nam gshin rje'i jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la
38a6(dkon brtsegs): lung ston pa de ni 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro//nam mi rnams la lung ston par de ni 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur//nem lha rnams la lung ston pa de na/
38a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer g.ya su nub par 'gyur ro//nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer bus mor nub par 'gyur ro//nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston pa de na
38b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer phrag pur nub par 'gyur//nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na
38b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsugi mtshamasu nub par 'gyuraro//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/mthong nas bdag gis chos gos
38b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar bar tud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu
38b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//'jig rten kun lnga sman pa'i slad//'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa
38b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan//sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir//de ring su yis sa bon btag/de ring su la lung yang ston//gang zhig mthar phyin rab tu zhugs//dpa' bo rnam
38b6(dkon brtsegs): pAr 'dren pa rnams//rgyu ma ma chis par 'dzum pa mdzad//thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa bstan//'od zer don ni bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das
38b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa//'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la//ji 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis//bsod
39a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dag ni phul bas na//de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad//gnod sbyin 'di nas shi 'phos nas//sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur
39a2(dkon brtsegs): ro//sum cu rtswa gsum shi 'phos nas//'thab bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur//'thab bral na sde ni dga' ldan 'gro//'dod pa 'dod pas dga' byu ste nas
39a3(dkon brtsegs): mI yi nang du skye 'gyur te//rgyal po rdzu 'phruldan par 'gyur//'khor los bsgyur ba mi yi dbang //gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste//mi yi 'jig rten
39a4(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos nas//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur//bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni//rtag tu bsti steng byas par 'gyur//lha yi nang dang mi nang du//
39a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang du kun du 'gro//phyis de rgyal snying bor nas ni//khyim med par yang rab tu byung //rkyen gyis byang chub thob 'gyur te//da ni mthar yang
39a6(dkon brtsegs): thug par 'gyur//gnod sbyin dag n+ya sum khri dag/gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas//sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas la ni gus
39a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas//sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing //de na mtha ni thug 'gyur te//dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na//ston pa la ni su mi mchod//
39b1(dkon brtsegs): gnodu sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams//byang chub nA chog la rab tu zhugs pas//de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des//num du'adrangan 'grong 'gro mi 'gyur//kha cig srog chags kun
39b2(dkon brtsegs): phan bying//byang chub dam pa ra bo tshol zhing //sangs rgyas 'dren pa sto ba rnams la//bkur bsti dag no byed par 'gyur//bya cig srungs rgyas byung
39b3(dkon brtsegs): chub phyir//stong phyug gnyis dang gsum dag kyang //me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis//mchod pa dag ni mchod par 'gyur//drag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can//
39b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren po bye ba phrag stong la//kha cig bkur bsti byed 'gyur te//'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg/de nas ji 'dzegs de yi bu//ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che//
39b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces//des kyang sems ni bskyed par 'gyuraro//des ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas//thams cad du yang smon lam btab/
39b6(dkon brtsegs): nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te//byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do//de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des//ngan 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas//sangs rgyas byams pa
39b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas ni//gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur//gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni//na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur//na bza' bye ba 'phrul nas ni/
40a1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du ni rab tu byung //srog chags kun la phun pa'i phyir//byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing //l-i yang lnga brgya tshong ba na//
40a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur//'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis//sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod//dang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa//de snyed bskal par
40a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur//dper gsungs pa ni de snod du//de dag khyed kyis shes par gyis//de dag dpeng yong shes nas ni//de bas lhag par spyad par gyis/
40a4(dkon brtsegs): sngar nI dper rnams gang spyod pa//gang gA yi bye skyed kyis//bye snyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas//de dag kun la bsti stang byed//e ma'o ye shes e ma shre
40a5(dkon brtsegs): e me bla na med pa'i semaso//sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni//de ltar rlom par mi 'gyur ro//de phyir sems can+da kun gyi mchog/sangs rgyas su snang /
40a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te//de na de yi mtshan btags pa//sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags//lo ni bye ba bdun nur yang //srog tshogs rnams la chos bstan te//phyis
40a7(dkon brtsegs): dodong shang gnyis gtso bo ni//de nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur//rab tu 'dul ba'i sems rnams kyi//'dus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur//de la thaM ma gcig pon//
40b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bya ba nyi shur 'gyur//'dus pa rnams ni glang brjod pa//nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste//de yi nyan thos ji snyed pa//byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do//
40b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas//de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das//lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu//de yi dam chos gnas par 'gyur//bskal pa
40b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tshang bar ni//sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur//bskal pa cig la'ang 'byung ba ni//de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//mi rnams mkhas pa gang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni//sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa//tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang //rab tu 'dun pa nyid du/bya//tshul bzhani ma yin rnam par spongs//
40b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin la ni rtag tu bsgoms//mang du thos par rab tu bya//des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel//byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi//rtsa ba'i don ni
40b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi ste//sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong //byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang //bla na med pa'i thog pa mchog/byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan//
40b7(dkon brtsegs): the tsom gcod pa bzong po yis//nyan thos kyi ni lam bstan to//sems can gang dag 'di 'dod pa//de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o//chos rnams kyi ni mchog ston pa/
41a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'//de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te//bcom ldan 'das 'di
41a2(dkon brtsegs): nas rI'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs grag gis//bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhigro bskyed do snya mo//de nas gnod
41a3(dkon brtsegs): sprin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa//grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po
41a4(dkon brtsegs): byo rgod phung po'i ri la gshegs kyis de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang /ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'dus la mchod pa'i las la spyo ba bskyed cig/de nas
41a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas bzung ste/ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'o bar gyi lam de thams
41a6(dkon brtsegs): cad pa sig ma dang /gyo mo dang /sdong du ma dang /tsher ma rnams med par byas so//me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byaso//lam de dag thams
41a7(dkon brtsegs): cad bsal nas//spos kyi chus kun du chag chag btab po//lam der gos 'tshams med par bting ngo //lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis
41b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bar bkang ngo //lam de dag tu gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis shin du brgyan to//sbom der gdugs dang dam pa'i snying po rab kyi
41b2(dkon brtsegs): snod nas bdugs so//steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lnga ldi sbyangs te shin du brgyan to//lam der sil ston sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so//lam de nas
41b3(dkon brtsegs): mda' rgyad gang tshun chad tsam me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma ma dkar pos khebs shing ngurA pa sgra 'byin par byas sngo//lAm dre gser blabs pas
41b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yog so//lam de gser gyi dru ba dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yogs so//de nas gnod sbyin rje 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du de lhu
41b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bkod pa byas nas/lus chen po mngon par sprul te/'khor dang bcas pas dga' mgu rungs rab tu dga' ste mo sa shing yid badre ba skyes nas dga' ba'i
41b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang bde ba'i sems dang /mnyen pa'i sems dang /rnam par dang ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /rab tu sim po'i sems dang /
41b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang /chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang /dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang /byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang /
42a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu smra dang /mamanyam pa dang /rnam pa mas nga/'dug rten gangam pa ma spyan du las gyud pa smra gas ma /
42a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /sems can bzlas cad la byams pa'i ste nas dang /snying rje'i sa sa dang /dga' bru'i sems dang /ting mas kyi se rjes dang /sangs rgyas kyi sa
42a3(dkon brtsegs): rjid kyi spyod du gyur pa'i sem dang /snying po'i banas dang /brten pa'i sems dang /mi byed pa'i sems dang /ma zhigs pa'i sems dang /nyan thas dang rang sangs
42a4(dkon brtsegs): ma de ba'i semapa dang / chub sam pa'i sna ng+yas rgyud pasgru pa'i sas skye ba ma ldan 'das sbrel bad+ma song ste sbyin nas bcom ldan 'ad rten
42a5(dkon brtsegs): ga papa phyug 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byis nas phyogs gcig tu 'dzin go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/gnod sbyin rje 'jigs kyi
42a6(dkon brtsegs): bor+d+hal mo smr-i te/bcom ldan 'das le tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gisal to//sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog/chos rnams sbyin dam pa ston//'jig tu
42a7(dkon brtsegs): mgon la bdag gis ni//bla na ma mchis mchod par bgyis//'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin//skabs bcu dang ni rab ldan te//mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas//
42b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can don rnams bgyid par shog/sum cu rtswa gnyis mtshan rnams dang //dpe byad bzang por rgyud nu ldan//'jog rten mgon po 'od byed pa//'jig rten snang
42b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed par shig/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//spyan pa'i chos ni rab ston cing //rnam po bcu gnyis dam pa yi//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shig/
42b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyul ba ji lta de bzhin du//chu 'a la rnams ni rab sbyin cing //srog chags bye ba dum yi//sems rgyan rnams kyi don bgyid shog/dpa' chen glang rnam
42b4(dkon brtsegs): mo byon pa//'jig rten mgon po 'ad mdzad ltar//byang chub dam par ba rtogs nos//lam de rab tu ston par shog/sems can 'dongs pa kun gyi phyir/
42b5(dkon brtsegs): migo dang ldan pa nyid gyur te//gan du rten dang skyabs dag dang //de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog/ji ltar 'dren par grol mdzad bzhin//'gro ba lngarang ni
42b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa yi//srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog/bdag gi sdug bsngal kun nus dgrol//'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yod min pa//lha dbang lha ma yin
42b7(dkon brtsegs): klus mchod pa//gzi brjid dag ni mtha' yas 'od mdzad pa//rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis//bdag ni las mchog dam pa 'di dag gis
43a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dbangs steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin//bsod nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan//chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra
43a2(dkon brtsegs): byar shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs pa//chos kyis dam pa rnams kyi phyir//
43a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa//sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te//de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'//'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//'jig rten///
43a4(dkon brtsegs): snang mdzad mchog la ni//lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis//mchod pa byas par 'os par 'i gyur//byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas//shing mchog drung
43a5(dkon brtsegs): du rab 'dug ste//sdig can bdud las rgyal nas ni//srog chags rnams la chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha stong phrag du ma dang //gnod sbyin
43a6(dkon brtsegs): dang //srin po stong phrag du ma dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang /srog chags bya ba
43a7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi
43b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rnon po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid tshun pos 'od zer ni rab tu 'gyod/nying ni rab tu g.yo bar byas/me tog
43b2(dkon brtsegs): gi tsher ni rab tu 'bebs/sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol bar byas te/gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon por byas pa
43b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis pad+mo ma la zhabs bzhag ste/ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs pa byon nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
43b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog chos kyi gdan dam pa gdan bzang po//'jig rten gsum po kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i gdan
43b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig/de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs te/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /'jig rten rnams la snying rtse
43b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa byang
43b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'chad par 'gyur te/de'ang sems can thams cad the tsom du gyur pa la rab tu ston pa/sems can thams cad kyi the tsom
44a1(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa/sems can thams cad kyi the tsom skye ba gcod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
44a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/de na lha bye ba drug cu rtsa la rgyad kyis ras bcos bu re re de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/de
44a3(dkon brtsegs): drug kyang der gdan du bting bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan pa shrams pa de lnga bzhugs so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la
44a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs pa//'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni//lha yi gos rab dam pa ma chog/lha yis rab tu bting ba pa//de la rnam
44a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa bzhugs//thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin//sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag/'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing //skye bo
44a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas//de na rab tu snang bar gyur//de na chos 'dod rnams la ni//skyob pas sangs rgyas rdzu
44a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul ston//lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang //grum bum yi dgas srul po rnams//de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste//sgrib po dag ni med par gyur//
44b1(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang //khrag khrig phrag ni brgya rnams dag/rnyed dka' yi ni tshig gsung ba//sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lta//rgyal po gzugs can snying
44b2(dkon brtsegs): po yang //de tshe blon pos yongs bskor zhing //'jig rten gyi nI mgon po mchog/spangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur//ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang //
44b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang //srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gizigs nus//'jig rten+da the tsom gang yod pa//rkang/
44b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog la dris shig dang //the tsom dag ni dris pa rnams//rnam par 'dren pa ngas bshad do//de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
44b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi sems can ji snyed 'dus nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis ngal bar shes nas sems can thams cad kyis bsems te phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i
44b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mau dgal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma
44b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa rnams la som la//ma lhags pa rnams tshol te rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang bsdus shig/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can
45a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi hU~M phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so//de nas tsho dang ldan pa mo dgul gyi bla chen pos bsam+b+has te/bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya/
45a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po gau la ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa 'od srung chen po longs shig/
45a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /bdud du bcas pa dang /tshangs par bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye
45a4(dkon brtsegs): dgu rnams dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/ston pas bka' stsal gyis btsun pa 'od srungs bdag cag
45a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong gi sgra 'dong ngo //de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po
45a6(dkon brtsegs): lha 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po khyod song shig dang /kho bo yang khyod skyong ba'i rje sku bzhin du 'ong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa
45a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos stan de la sprul pa sprul te/rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
45b1(dkon brtsegs): po 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bAdar nas rang rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de ma
45b3(dkon brtsegs): nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der song ngo //tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po che dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi
45b4(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa mthong ste mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa 'od srung khyod spyan las ga la
45b5(dkon brtsegs): bIbr-i de nas sprul te/sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa
45b6(dkon brtsegs): ni myur ba l-i brten pa 'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces
45b7(dkon brtsegs): smras so//tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par
46a1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur/gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o////bam po gsum pa/
46a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/bla gos phrog pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/bcom ldan 'das la
46a3(dkon brtsegs): ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'dras la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/
46a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag la skabs phyo na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'gre' zhig
46a5(dkon brtsegs): zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod de
46a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas nges khyod kyi sems
46a7(dkon brtsegs): rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na
46b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyo las kha nA mya tho ba ma mchis pa dag lugs/ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /lu/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang /ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang /yid kyi
46b3(dkon brtsegs): las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi bskyod mi nus pa rnams lags/sa nas sar 'phang ba la mkhas
46b4(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang /rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang /yongasu 'dren par gyur pa dang /sgron mar gyur pa dang /stegs su gyur pa dang /
46b5(dkon brtsegs): them par gyur pa dang /grur gyur pa dang /sgrol ba po dang /pha rol tu 'phro bar gyur pa dang /gnas dang /mgon dang /skyabs dang /dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang /thams cad
46b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bzlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyings kyis don de nyid kun zhus
46b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa//dpa' bo de yi don ci lags//gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgya ga/yon tan chos rnams brjod gsol//srog chags kun la smin
47a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du//dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod//ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas//mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/byang chub snying por rab gnas
47a2(dkon brtsegs): nas//sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul//bye ba dag gi zhing poskyod nas//ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya//byang chub sems dpa' gang gi doni//'di 'dram
47a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig ni ci zhig lags//sangs rgyas chos kyi mchog rnams dang //byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol//srog chags kun la sman slad du//pad+ma bzhin du ma
47a4(dkon brtsegs): chags shing //sems can bye ba grol mdzad par//'jig rten 'di na ji ltar spyod//mkhas pa lha dang klu dwag dang //mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis//ji lta//
47a5(dkon brtsegs): bur ni mchod gyur pa//zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol//de nas bcom lda no 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu
47a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to//chos gcig po gang zhe na//'di lta/
47a7(dkon brtsegs): ste bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang
47b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu dang /byang
47b2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems ji lta bu/de skad ces gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to//shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ba ni mau
47b3(dkon brtsegs): phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o//brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o//mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o//ma 'khrul pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o//shin du gnas pa'i phyir ma
47b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul po'o//mi ldog pa'i phyir shin du gnas pa'o//sems can la blta ba'i phyir mi bzlog pa'o//snying rje tshon po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta
47b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo bo'o//bdag la bde ba/
47b6(dkon brtsegs): mAm yin pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o//lan du phan 'dogs par ro ba med pa'i phyir bdag bde ba ma yin po'o//zang zing med pa'i
47b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o//sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas zang zing med pa'o//mthu chung ba'i sems can blta ba'i phyir sems can gyi phyir 'brang
48a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//mgon du gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la blta ba'o//skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o//ma 'khrugs
48a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no//shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o//rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu du yang dag par brtags pa'o///
48a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o//ci yang med pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba'o//shin du yong su dag pa'i phyir ci yang med pa'o//rab tu byung bar byas
48a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir shin+da du yongs su dag pa'o//nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o//phyi shin tu yongasu dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o//de ltar shA ri'i
48a5(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed pas snying po zhes bya ba nas phyi shin du yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste bsam pa ni de lta bu'o//byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na//
48a6(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni nyon mongs po thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o//sems de ni theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'brel pa med pa'o//sems de ni pha rol gyi rgol
48a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i phyir brtan pa'o//sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o//sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir
48b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'o//sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o//sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o//sems de ni gnyes
48b2(dkon brtsegs): po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o//sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o//sems de ni sems can thams cad kyi
48b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa la mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o//sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o//sems de ni shes rab
48b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o//sems de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o//sems de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir
48b5(dkon brtsegs): yangs pa'o//sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o//sems de ni snying rje chen po ma bcad pa'i phyi ri thams cad kyi
48b6(dkon brtsegs): rjesu song ba'o//sems de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i phyir mngon du 'gro bar byas pa'o//sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o//sems
48b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni bde ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so//sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung ba'o//sems de ni bzod pas bsnyems par dka' ba'o//
49a1(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni brtson 'grus kyi thul bar dku' ba'o//sems de ni bsam gtan drug gris nye bar zhi ba'o//sems de ni shes rab kyi
49a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi gnod pa med pa'o//yang sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang
49a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'i//sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o//sems de ni de bzhin
49a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi rtsa ba'o//yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub
49a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin te de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang /byang chub kyi sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub
49a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhes bya'o//sems de ni rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o//'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems
49a7(dkon brtsegs): can zhes bya'o//lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/lus kyi las
49b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su drag pa yin/dug gi las yongs su dag pa yin/yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/lus kyi lasnga ma g.yos pa yin/drag go lus ma g.yos pa
49b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/yid kyi las ma g.yos pa yin te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin/sa nas
49b3(dkon brtsegs): sar 'phang ba la mkhas pa yin/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos po yin/sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yon/rnam par 'dren par gyur
49b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang /sbron par gyur pa dang /stegs su gyur pa dang /zam par gyur pa dang /grur gyur pa dang /sgrol bar gyur pa dang /
49b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du 'gro ba dang /gnas dang mgron dang /skyabs dang dpung gnyen no//thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
49b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyod mi nus pa yin no//de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dang ba yin
49b7(dkon brtsegs): no//dad pa mang ba dang /'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang /chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ser sna med cing lkug par gtong ba dang /lag pa brkyang zhing rnam par
50a1(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba la dga' ba dang /smyon pa 'grod pa la dga' ba yin/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin/rnyog pa med
50a2(dkon brtsegs): pA'i sems dang /'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang /mA la dris pa'i sems dang /de las dung las kyi rnam par smin pA la mngon par dad pa dang /rab tu rtog cing
50a3(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa dang /the tshom med cing som nyi med pa yin no//de nag po dang dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stor bar shes pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i
50a4(dkon brtsegs): las mi byed pa yin te/de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log pa g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /bla ma dang
50a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa dang /brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba spong ba yin te/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs
50a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par len cing spyod do//de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs
50a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i chos can dang /mang du thos pa dang /thos pa la brtson pa dang /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang //
50b1(dkon brtsegs): du ba dang /zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /rtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang /mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang /bsam pa dag zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang /dge
50b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos tha mas cad yong su spangs pa dang /rgod pa med pa dang /khengs pa ma yin pa dang /yab yab po med pa dang /
50b3(dkon brtsegs): mu cor mi smra ba dang /tshig ma 'dres pa dang /dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /sdems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa de dag dang ji ltar srid par 'dren pa bcad pa dang ///
50b4(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu phyung ba dang /khur bor ba dang /the tshom las brgal ba dang /som nyi las brgal ba dang /yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
50b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas de dag la bsnyen cing brten te bsnyen bkur byed
50b6(dkon brtsegs): cing myugu bAr byed kyi yid las byung bar mi byed do//dga' bar byed kyi mi dga' bar mi byed de/des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byas nas de dag
50b7(dkon brtsegs): las chos kyi phan 'dogs par byed de/chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzong stong /yang
51a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang /tshul khrimaswA kyis mdzo rIm+b+ha sku skye ba dang /sa/
51a2(dkon brtsegs): pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyuro zhes yang dag par rab tu ston to//'di ni sbyin pa/'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu/
51a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ser sna/'dri ni ser sna'i 'bras bu/'di ni tshul khrims/'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/'di ni 'tshol ba'i tshul khrims/'di ni 'chal
51a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/'dri ni bzod pa/'di ni bzod pa'i rnam purar+ya smin pa/'di ni gnod sems/'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin//
51a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/'di ni brtson 'grus//'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/'di ni le lo//'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni bsam gtan/'di ni
51a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa/'di ni sems g.yeng ba/'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni shes rab/'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/'di ni 'chal
51a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab/'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa/'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni lus kyi nyes
51b1(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa/'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/'dri ni ngag gi legs par spyod pa/'dri ni ngag gi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni ngag gi nyes par
51b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod do/'di ni dag pa nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par sbyin pa/'di ni yid kyi legs par spyod pa/'di ni yid kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyod pa/'di ni/
51b3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/'di ni dge ba/'di ni mi dge ba/'di ni bye ba/'di ni mi bya ba/'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur/'di ni
51b4(dkon brtsegs): byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang /mi phan pa dang /mi bde bar 'gyuraro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/yang dag par
51b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/snod du gyur pa yang shes nas/zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/'di lta ste stong
51b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi gautam dang /mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang /smyon pa med pa'i gautam dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i gtam dang /ma skyes pa'i gtam dang /mi byung ba'i gtam
51b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa'i gtam dang /srog med pa'i gtam dang /gang zag med pa'i gta mo dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam rab tu ston to//'di
52a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste 'dri yod pas 'di 'byung /'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis
52a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rnyog pa/reg pa'i
52a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi
52a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /mya ngan dang /sgeg sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po'i
52a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste 'di med na 'di mi 'byung /'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gegs pas 'du byed 'brugs pa
52a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/'di la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do//de ci'i phyir
52a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/bdag po med pa byed pa po med pa/tshor ba po med pa/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/'di la chos gang yang
52b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa med pa ldog pa med pa/rjes su 'jug pa med de/yang dag pa ma yin pa rmongs pas khams gsum du 'dogs par 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /sdug
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi lam du 'dogs par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no//
52b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la byed pa po med pa de la don dam par bya ba yang mi dmigs te/de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med 'jig pa med do zhes brjod do//des de lta bu'i chos zab mo
52b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas the tshom mi zla som nyi med cing chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/de gzugs la mi chags/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /
52b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ming dang gzugs dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /chos dang
52b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes dad do//shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
52b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongasu mi nyamos so//de gang
53a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la blta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur
53a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge
53a3(dkon brtsegs): bo'i chos yongasu tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur//de brtson 'grus brtsa mas byas khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/bu pho dang bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/
53a4(dkon brtsegs): bram po dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur/yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi 'dod par 'gyur te/
53a5(dkon brtsegs): de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses par na tshod gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu byung ngo //dad
53a6(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtog pas dge ba'i bsam pa
53a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur ro//de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge pa'i chos rnams nyan cing bsgrub pa'i snying por byed par 'gyur te/tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan par mi
53b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas dmas par mi 'gyur/ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la yang rgya tshor yang dag par rab tu ston to/zang zing med pa'i sems/
53b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigasu bcad pa mi shi rang gi tshig yongs su mi spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/ji ltar thos pa dang /ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan
53b3(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston to//chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen por 'jug par 'gyur ro//de ming du thos
53b4(dkon brtsegs): pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par 'gyur/rab tu dben pa dang nges par 'gyur/gso sla ba dang /dgang sla ba dang /dgon
53b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la dga' ba dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don lnga nye bar rtog pa dang /don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa yin/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i//
53b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi rten du gyur pa dang /bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste theg pa chen po bla na med pa sangs rgyas
53b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo//bag yod pa lhung byed par
54a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu/thawAm+b+ha tI/do lta bar yod pa gang na na/'a sbyong pad+ma bau yang dab par snom pan+d+ha//do la dbang yang dag par
54a2(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa gang zhe na/gang mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar me 'dzin mngon rtogs su mi 'dzin/gzugs la chags pa dang /nyes dmigs dang /'byung /
54a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du rna bas sgra dang /snas dri dang /lces ro dang /lus kyi reg bya dang /yid kyis chos
54a4(dkon brtsegs): shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/mngon rtag su mi 'dzin/chos rnams la chags pa dang /nyes dmigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa
54a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bag yod pa zhes bya ba ni gang bdag gi sems dul ba dang /gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba dang /nyon mongs
54a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la dga' ba spong ba dang /chos la dga' ba'i rje su 'gro ba dang /'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa drang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba
54a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang /chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang /zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i
54b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang /gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang /lus kyi ltos par spyod pa dang /dag gi nyos par spyod pa dang /yod kyi ltos par spyod
54b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'byung ba dang /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'ichos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o//
54b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar sha ri'i bu brag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhi ni yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes gang med pa de yang med
54b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma rab tu shes so//de la ci yod ci med na yang dag pa la rab tu sbyar ba lnga ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do//log pa lnga rab tu sbyor ba la ni 'phags
54b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba med do//las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do//gang gi lus kyi rnam par sbyin pa de ni med do//gzhan yang mig ni yod de/gang gi mig de
54b6(dkon brtsegs): ni med do//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni med do//gang gi yid de ni med do//gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
54b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyung ba'i chos can do ni yod do//gzugs rtag pa dang /na pa dang /mi 'byur de'i chos can dang /thang chug pa dang /de bzhin du gnas zhes byed de ni/
55a1(dkon brtsegs): da do//rgyor ba dang /'du shoswA dang /'du blong dang / par shes pa mo d+hAg pA dang /sman la pa dang / shA
55a2(dkon brtsegs): can de ni yod do//tsha bye dang/'du dang/'di byung smras da/rnam pa she ga pa dang /brten pa dang / nag pa dang /skye'o//
55a3(dkon brtsegs): nAn dang /yang dag par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do//gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ma rig pa med na 'a
55a4(dkon brtsegs): byed med pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rgyu sho'i bar du yid n+d+he/skye blo mdun rga shi med do//gzhan yang sbyin pa las ljongs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do//
55a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni myed de//tshul khrims kyis mtho rAsti swA skye ba na yod do//'tsha lci pa'i tshul khrims kyis mthor su skye ba ni med de/
55a6(dkon brtsegs): shes ra'i chen por 'gyur ba ni medade//'tshul pa'i shes ra shos+dza ba rten byer 'gyur ba ni med//bsgoms pas 'brel bar shAgyur ba rnam
55a7(dkon brtsegs): dro//bsnams pas 'brel bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas kun du sbyor ba ni yod do//tshul bzhin ma yin gyi/
55b1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni med do//brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub yod do//le lo can la ni byang chub rnyed do//nga rgyal med pa/
55b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do//nga rgyul can la ni mya ngan lngas 'da' ba med do//gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do//'di ni/
55b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang sems can dang srog dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag go zhes bya ba ni med do//de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed
55b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa ni gang yod par 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod zhes 'dogs so//gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun
55b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dog so//de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed/med ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par
55b6(dkon brtsegs): shes par mi byed//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don kyang khong du chud do//chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te//
55b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'du byed thams cad mi rtog pa dang /'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /chos thams
56a1(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag med pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o//'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i snyoms can rnams
56a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do//'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams
56a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do//chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can
56a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do//mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas phyin ci ldog tu
56a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do//'du byed thams cad mi rtag
56a6(dkon brtsegs): go zhes thos nas shin du mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go//'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas smon lam dang bral ba bskyed do//chos thams cad
56a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgomo//mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes thos nas mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed//
56b1(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin par ni yang dgu pa'o mdza' mngon sum du mi byud do//de ltar shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i chos la btsun+da pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos las yongasu mi nyams//
56b2(dkon brtsegs): myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' la brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///gzhan yang
56b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos bcu la
56b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad/yid ches rab tu rtog/the tsom mi zla rgya cher dga' mgur sti rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rma du 'du shes bskyed do//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste de bzhin
56b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo
56b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//'di lci ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad pa nas ngo mtshar dang
56b7(dkon brtsegs): rmad du 'du shes bskyed pa'i bar du'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs
57a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang //
57a2(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsdam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs
57a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs rnams bsam
57a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshugs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'di lta ste de bzhin gash+ye
57a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs
57a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus cher rtsom zhing mi zhum
57a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gong mi skyo ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du/lus kyi lpags pa dang /rgyus pa dang /
57b1(dkon brtsegs): zlo dang /dbubus dang /rus pa dag lta zhog lnga lum kyisha dang //khrag+h+ra bzlas kyang bu'i tsun 'grus nyams par mi byu zlum du sems bskyed do//shA ri'i bu de ltar dang /
57b2(dkon brtsegs): bsre mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo mtshur rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon por dang yid ches rab tu rtog
57b3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'odas kyi don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
57b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so//sangs rgyas s+thA nI bas+yA m+ba mi khyab/chos kyi sgyu yI s+ye rab tu che//mtshan ma med rnying spyad med na//rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad par byed//'gro ba
57b5(dkon brtsegs): tha dad ji snyed kyi//sgra smad pas ma gyis mi khyab pa//thams cad du ni chos sgrogs te/sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yum dang //dzI tsam sems can thams ca
57b6(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum dag gi dang po kun//sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te//bsam mi khyab la rab tu da//sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'o mtha' yas//'od zer drag
57b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam mo khyab//zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa//thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab//thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das//'jig rten chos la mi gnas te/
58a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rkang pa bsam yas la//byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dad//sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyag/
58a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni//sems can kun gyis shes mi nus//chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la//gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba//drang srong chen
58a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i ye shes stobs//na mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa//sems can gcig gi don phyir yang //bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par//'dul ba'i don la
58a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pas na//de dgra snying rje de 'dra'o//sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan//dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang //dris lan gcig gis tshim byed do//
58a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab//rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa//chos rnams thaMdi thugs su chud//sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dres pa//thams
58a6(dkon brtsegs): cad du ni ye shes gzigasmra//drad pa la ni rab gnas pas//sangs rgyas kun chos chos nyid rnams//bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la//de dag thams cad
58a7(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed//shA ri'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par
58b1(dkon brtsegs): drung//yid ches rab tu rtog/the tshom mi za/rgyu tshur dga' mgu spyi rangs par rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pi'i spu ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o//'di lta ste mi gtsang ba dang /'tshal ma dang /ngar snabs dang
58b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnabs dang /rnag dang /khrag dang /bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /bral ba rus pa dang /sha dang /khrag dang /rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o//'di lta ste de
58b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/yongs su dag pa nyon mongs pa thams cad dri ma dang bral ba'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa
58b5(dkon brtsegs): mu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan drangag tu med pa dang /bstod
58b6(dkon brtsegs): nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu myed pa yongs
58b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa yongasu bsgoms pa yon/
59a1(dkon brtsegs): tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yongasu dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan lta
59a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang /chu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni na mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam
59a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'o//'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa thams cad las log par zad pa'o//'di lta ste de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i sku ni
59a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa'o//na mkha' lta bu'i sku'o//mnyam pa med pa'i sku'o//'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad
59a5(dkon brtsegs): par du 'ophags pa'i sku'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa/zla med pa mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/dag pa dri ma med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med
59a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o//da ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/da ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin//
59a7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang /rus dang /rigs kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin/gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/dpe byad bzang pos rab
59b1(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/sems kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/yid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin
59b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/dran pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/khams kyis
59b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yini/skye mched kyis rab tu phye bo ma yin/skye bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/gnas pas rab tu phye bla ma yon/'jig pas rab tu phye ba ma
59b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/kha
59b5(dkon brtsegs): dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin/rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/dbyibs kyis rab tu phyi ba ma yin/'ong bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/'gro bas rab tu
59b6(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/tingange 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/rnam par grol bas rab /
59b7(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma ya ni/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/mtshan nyid mi mthun pas
60a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba mya yin/chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/stobs su sgro btags pas rab tu phye bam yin/
60a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba mo yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rab tu phye ba ma yin/snying rje chen pos rab tu phye
60a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba mo yin te/sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu drong /chu zla dang /rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur
60a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i sku'o//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa maud pa las byung ba'i sku'o//mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o//mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o//rnam par
60a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa'i sku'o//mi gnas pa'i sku'o//mi bsnyems pa'i sku'o//gnas pa dang rab tu gnas pa dang /mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o//gzugs med pa
60a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o//tshor ba ma yin/'du shes ma yin/'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i rang
60a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o//byung ba ma yin kun du byung ba ma yin/ma byung ba yang ma yin pa'i sku'o//rmad du byung ba rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o//mig
60b1(dkon brtsegs): las byung mA yin/gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/phyi rol ma yin/rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/sgrar gtogs pa ma yin/phyi rol ma yin/snas rnam par shes par
60b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mi yin/d+hir gtogs pa ma yin/phyi rol mo yin/lces bskyed pa ma yin/ror gtogs pa ma yin/lus dang ldan pa ma yin/reg byar gtogs
60b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/phyi rol ma yin/sems la 'jug pa ma yin/yid la 'jug pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ldog pa ma yin/rdzasu
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ma yin/gnas pa dang mi g.yo ba thob pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang /na mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste
60b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/yid ches
60b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog/the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshur dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
60b7(dkon brtsegs): te/bde bar gshegs pa de skad ces gsungs nas/ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo //bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par//byang chub sems dpa'i
61a1(dkon brtsegs): /spyod pa rnam spyod cing //las rnams gsum na shin tu yongs dag par//mtshungs med pad+mo byung gla shegs pa'i sgra tshog//phyog sad
61a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang /snying rta rgya chen bskyed nus sbyin pa byin//'dod la ldog par g.yem pa rtag skyong zhing //namakha' lta bu'i mchog ni
61a3(dkon brtsegs): swA lo//gra sIr ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni//dung ga tu med pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab spyod cing //rgyal
61a4(dkon brtsegs): bi'i sras kyi 'jig rten mchog la phul//g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung //yan lag nyid la ga bcad kyang dgra l-i bzod//brtson 'grus kyi ni pha
61a5(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin spyod cing //sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yengs mi skye//shes rab thabs dga' rgya tshar bsam gtan pa//bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par lta//chos dbyings
61a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku//de 'drar ba dag gyur zhes ni de la smon//srid ngar 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing //mi mchog gos ni byang chub mtshungs med thob//dag pa dri med
61a7(dkon brtsegs): gtsang zhing rdul grol ba//na mkha' 'dra ba yongs pa'i sku thob po//rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral//mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob//mig gi yul kun las ni
61b1(dkon brtsegs): rab 'angs pa//de 'byung sun thuzla pas yang dag thob//bzod mnas stong ma byas ma byung ba//gzugs dang sgra bral yod kyang rnam dag pa//de bzhin gshegs sku mo g.yo grang thob ga
61b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni phyogs bcu'i bde ba gshegs pa mthong //ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus//rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs/khyis pa sgru ba brdzun zhing phyin ci logs te
61b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta bar byos//gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang //ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag/chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i
61b4(dkon brtsegs): sku//chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing na mkha' 'dra//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /
61b5(dkon brtsegs): yid ches rab tu rtog/the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ngo mtshar dang rma 'du shes bskyed do//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
61b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bras ma b+his myi khyab pa la mngon par dad /yid chas rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar med kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/'di ltar shA ri'i bu de
61b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra byung ste/sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
62a1(dkon brtsegs): byanadu khyab par byed mod /shA rI'i Sh+Tha de bzhin blo shogs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni 'dre ba shAH/dge slong ma'i 'khod d+hA
62a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di/dge bsnyen ma'i khor la ni 'di/bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/rgyal rigs kyi 'khor lo ni 'di/khyim bdag gi 'khor la 'di/lha'i kharang la nI 'di/tshangs pa'i
62a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/'di lta ste mdo sde gang dbyangs kyis bskrad pa'i sde dang /lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /gling 'ani'i
62a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i b+h+rUM dang /skyes bya rabs kyi spyi dang /shin du rgyas pa'i sna dang /rmad du byung bye chos kyi sde dang /gtan la dngab
62a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i skye rnams the shad par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs med/'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji ltar 'dus par gyur pa tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag
62a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang /sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bur thos par bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bye ba de bzhin gshegs/
62a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang /chos bstan pa de cig la gcig nges pa'i tshig gi nod par 'gyur ba'ang med de thams cad kyang rang gi chos rnam
62b1(dkon brtsegs): par rig par kun shes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de bzhin gshogs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa bden
62b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'jug go//yang shA ri'i bu de bzhini gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'dzem par 'byung/yid du 'ong ba dang /yid dga' ba dang /dag pa
62b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /dri ma med pa dang /snyan pa dang /mnyan par 'os pa dang /shes par 'os pa dang /mi rtsub pa dang /mi blang ba dang /lus sim par byed pa dang /
62b4(dkon brtsegs): sems sim par byed pa dang /snying dga' bar byed pa dang //dga' ba dang /bde ba bskyed pa dang /kun shes par byed pa dang /gsal zhing 'thad pa dang
62b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /seng ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang /sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang /rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs
62b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /mI 'am ci'i glu'i dbyangs dang /ka la bring ka'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang /tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang /rde'i sgra dbyangs dang /dngal dang ldan pa dang /mnyan pa
62b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /zur phyin pa dang /bsgrags pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang /'khor thams cad du grags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
63a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa du/ na dun na na rgyunan du rgyu na da dag du dun du zla rgyu
63a2(dkon brtsegs): ring bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/dri la byang chub sems dpo'i mngon par dang
63a3(dkon brtsegs): yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//'di la chos nyid ni 'dri yin te de la 'di skad ces
63a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su//'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te//tshangs rnams la ni tshim par byed//'di 'dra'i chos ni phun sum tshogs//
63a5(dkon brtsegs): de yi dbyangs ni byams dang ldan//snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung //btang snyoms dang ni gang ldan pa//thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung //srog chags kun gyi
63a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags me//zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing //gti mug mun pa sel ba ste//phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o//'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams
63a7(dkon brtsegs): na//mar gyur pa yi skad ni mtha' yas pa//kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs la//dbyangs 'di thos nas rje su rtogs par 'gyur//sa bla dang ni de bzhin bor snang lha/
63b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag co 'dra'o skad la 'jug pa ltar//do phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab bzhugs to//rnam par nges thos mya ngan 'das rig 'gyur//rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams/
63b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni//rkang mangs dag dang rkang pa med pa rnams//rnams cad la ni de yi sgra dbyangs 'jug/bsgul nus rab tu 'tshos shing tshar gcod byed//stong gsum
63b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa//tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rang //de dag rje su 'jug dbyangs de sgrogs te//'dul ba'i sems can thar po rig par byed//
63b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste//bzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin//mnyam par bzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chad//sems can thos nas
63b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhi bar byed//sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun skye//sbyin thos tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa dag/mtha' yas sgyu ni sems can thos byed de/
63b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o//dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa//de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yong med do//de la byang chub sems
63b7(dkon brtsegs): dnga'i mkhas dad cing //de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tshom med//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin/shegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
64a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa
64a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa la chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa
64a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/de la byang chub sems dpa'o mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas dad pas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do//de bzhin
64a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o//shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag par bzung ste/gang+gi'i klung gi bye ma
64a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtswa dang /shing gi yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma dang /chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yas chad ji snyed yod pa
64a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te/gcig tu spungs nas mes bsregs te/tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so//thal bar byas nas/'jig
64a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po ga na yod pa de dag tu blugs te/lo stong du dkrugs kyang /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
64b1(dkon brtsegs): do bzhin gshegs pa'i yo shes 'di lta bu yod do//dro byAts+tshinA gA shogs pa'o yo shos d+mo dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po dri dang de drug nas thal ba d+mo dag byungs te/'jog rten
64b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de dang de dag du 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ga mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o//'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig
64b3(dkon brtsegs): gis rtsa ba dang /che ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang /che ge mo zhig gi yal ga dang /che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang /che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o//'di ni
64b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'di ba zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu 'byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos dbyings rab tu
64b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs te/de rab tu rtogs nas/de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu mkhyen nas rgyas par byas ste//
64b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'o//de ltar mthu che ba'o//'di ltar dbang che bar
64b7(dkon brtsegs): grags pa ste/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de baN+DinA gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang /yid ches rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa
65a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyubyams pas yod la spyod pa d+mo dag thams cad ni dge pa'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' m+b+ha thob par sdug bsngal maHra 'byin to//de ci'i nga nan
65a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin du rtogs te/de shin du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed
65a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang chud mi za'o//shA ri'i bu khyod la dpyor bya ste 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpas bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te/'di lta sto par
65a4(dkon brtsegs): na shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis smi'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar brtsal bas chu'i thig pa blangs te ga nu ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa
65a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /'di skad ces kye go'u ta ma bdag gis chu thigs pa 'di khyod la bdams kyis/nam bdag la dgros par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba ngo
65a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te/de'i chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mabar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so//de nas skyes bu
65a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces golu ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyis gi dag la byin cig ces byor na
65b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ye shes yod de/ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
65b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar brtsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te skyes bu de la slar byin no//
65b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/de gang gi don du blta zhe na/'di lta ste shA rI'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thegs pa de
65b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu gzhog pa yun ring po zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du shA rI'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin
65b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dang /yid ches rab tu rtog cing /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
65b6(dkon brtsegs): pu nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir na mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'bu ro//
65b7(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las
66a1(dkon brtsegs): sems cig bskyed pa yang chung m+b+hi zla'o//de nas bcom ldan 'dasal tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan/
66a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa mchis samA/bka' stsal pa
66a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no//bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lags/rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i
66a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas te rnam par shes pa de la glan so//'di lta ste rnam par shes pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/gzugs la dmigs/gzugs la gnas
66a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'brel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa gzugs tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/tshor ba la dmigs/tshor ba la gnas
66a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba la brten nas/skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/'du shes la dmigs/'du shes la
66a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas/dga' ba la brten pas/skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas/'du byed la dmigs/'du byed pa/
66b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas/dga' ba la brten pas/skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang lon pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i//
66b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi
66b3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang /namakha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//glang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun du dbye ba
66b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang /rna bas shes par bya
66b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang /snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang /lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang /lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig
66b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par reg pa ste 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ste/ye shes kyi phyir 'brang
66b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o//rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa las skyes so//rnam par shes pa ni yid la byed pa las
67a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes so//rnam par shes pa ni yongs su rtog pa la skye ste/de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang 'dzin pa med pas bsnyems pa dang /dmings
67a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing /gang 'dus byas la spyod
67a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'dus ma byas la rnam par shes po rgyu ba med de/gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes shes bya'o//
67a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang skye ba dang /'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni ye
67a5(dkon brtsegs): shes zhes bya'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'di ni ye shes te/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
67a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi ze rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa snyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//
