67a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya tshar bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa//
67b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'dog rten khams kyi rtswa rnams ni//de dag skyes bral las med bsngags thal bar byas//lo na bar+Na ts+tsheng drug du rgyu mtshor dkrug sa pa rnams//do'adra/
67b2(dkon brtsegs): pab yi stobs bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas//thal ba blangs nas 'bro ba dag la lung ston pa//zhing rnams rab 'byam dag gi shing rigs 'di//de tshig thal sna 'di zhes
67b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen//'di ltar phyogs bcu drug gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul//thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te//de dag thams cad bgrang yang
67b4(dkon brtsegs): chags med the tshom maud//da ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes na mkha' bzhin//ji snyed ye shes phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud//gang dag 'dod
67b5(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod dang zhe sdang giti mug ldan//spyod pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni//gang gis blangs nyams gang gis thar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen//'jig
67b6(dkon brtsegs): rten mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni//ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab bzhugs kyang //'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung //
67b7(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs sras po dad pa rgyal la dad pa byed///bam po bzhi pa//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
68a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu
68a2(dkon brtsegs): ste rangs pa rnyed cing /ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyangs rab tu rtogs te/de rab tu rtogs
68a3(dkon brtsegs): pas de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas/lham me ljon na/lhung nger mdzad do//de 'di lta
68a4(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na sbyin med pa'i na mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas/lham me lhan ne/lhang nge ba bzhin du/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
68a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas/lham mi lhan ne/lhang der mdzad do//
68a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu srin bu me khyer gyi 'od dre bas ni gang 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin du 'phags/shin du mchog/shin du kha dog dang ldan/shin du 'od gsal/
68a7(dkon brtsegs): shin du rgya che'o//'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od de bas ni rtsig pa chen po'i 'od ni shin du 'phags/shin du mchog pa nas shin du rgya che ba'i bar du'o//gang rtsig pa
68b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sangs rgyas ni/me'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang yin pa dang /sman dang skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/zla ba'i 'od dang /nyi ma'i 'od dang //
68b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal chen bzhi'i ras kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang /gzhal med khang dang /lus kyi rkyen rnams dang /de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral ba rnams dang /dga'
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams dang /'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bya dang /gzhal med khang dang /lus kyi rgyan rnams dang /gang tshangs pa
68b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /tshangs ris pa rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang /tshungs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /gzhal med khang dang /
68b5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/shin tu bzang /shin du mchog/shin du kha dog dang ldan/shin tu 'od gsal/shin du rgya che'o//gang tshangs pa
68b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /tshangs ris pa rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par byas te/'od
68b7(dkon brtsegs): chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge rgyas kyi bar dang /'bras bu che ba dang /'du shes can dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes me
69a1(dkon brtsegs): r+m+mamin dang /mtsho ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /rgyunas snang ba dang /na du man+to gor ba dang /gzhal myong ljang dang /smras kyi 'od dang /gang ldan
69a2(dkon brtsegs): min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /gzhal med khang rnams dang /lus kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/shin du bzang /shin du mchog/shin tu kha dog dang ldan/shin du 'ong
69a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal/shin du rgya che'o//gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang /gzhal med khang rnams dang /lus kyi 'od pas ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
69a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/shin du bzang /shin du mchog/shin du kha dog dang ldan/shin du 'od gsal/shin du rgya
69a5(dkon brtsegs): che'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /tinge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /
69a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol po dpag tu med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//de ltar shA ri'i bu ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
69a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od rab tu btags pa gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i
69b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de 'di lta ste dper na shA rI'i bu 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal pa bzhag na snag chu'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te/lham
69b2(dkon brtsegs): mer mi 'gyur/lhan ner mi 'gyur/lhung ngor mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du shA ri'i bu sbyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'od du gdags pas
69b3(dkon brtsegs): btags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lham mer mi 'gyur/lhan ner mi 'gyur/lhang nger mi 'gyur ro//'od gsal bar
69b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/dam pa zhes bya/bla na med pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs
69b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyi tsA ba'i 'od las kyi rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin du rgyas par 'gyur te/
69b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu zla ba dang /nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi 'byung /nyin mor yang mi shes/mtshan mor yang mi shes/zla ba phyed pa dang /zla ba gcig par yang mi
69b7(dkon brtsegs): shes/dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi/'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od 'dim gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste/
70a1(dkon brtsegs): rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzod na/'jig rten gyi khams rnams med pa 'od kyis khya/
70a2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe nA/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa brnyes pa ste/shU ri'i bu
70a3(dkon brtsegs): don de nyid rab tu rtog par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to//shA ri'i bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snyed pa
70a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rdul phra rab tu byas nas rdul de dag thu bar blugs te/shar phyogs su song nas rdul phra mo dzI snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sA nas/rdul
70a5(dkon brtsegs): phra rab gnyis bor zhing shar phyogs su song na shA ri'i bu rdul phra rab de thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni zod pa mid
70a6(dkon brtsegs): de//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byung nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o//shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/'jig rten gyi khams de drag gi mthul dang
70a7(dkon brtsegs): mu bzung bar nu sa saM pa/gsol pa/bco mo ldan 'jo pa de ni ts+li rdob //bde ba gshegs pa rdo ni mi nus so//bka' stsa la pa/shA ri'i bu rdi ba ni
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
70b2(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du btags pas gdagus pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na brgya'i chur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod
70b3(dkon brtsegs): do//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya se shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o//
70b4(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni rtsig pa 'am/shing ngam/ljon pa 'am/khor yug+sa gi ri 'am/khor yug chen po 'am/ri spros kyi ngad ldad ngam/
70b5(dkon brtsegs): ri btang bzung dram/ri btang bzung chen po 'am/gangs ri 'am/ri gAnya' shing 'dzin tam/de mA yin pa gzhan ri nag po 'am/ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam/gang gis
70b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sgrib par mi nus te/de dag thams cad las thal nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyad par byas kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can
70b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mos par mi 'gyur te/de la sems can la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo //de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom dro/
71a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam du mthong ngo //de bas shin tu rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong ba nas/gang de byas kyang shin tu rgya chen posmra/
71a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/de ltar shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od kyis
71a3(dkon brtsegs): khyad par mthong ste rgyas par bya'o//sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par
71a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo //de ltar shrI ri'i bu na mkha'i khams ci tsam sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can tham cas rtse ba'i phyir/
71a5(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do//de byang chub sems dbus thos nas the tshom med/sdom nyi mi mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/rgya cher dga'
71a6(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste/rlangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//'di la chos nyid 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o//nyi ma zla ba'i 'od gang
71a7(dkon brtsegs): dang //brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang //'og min par gyi 'od rnams kyis//bcu drug char yang mi phod do//'og mo ni gyi ni 'od rnams dang //gang
71b1(dkon brtsegs): /mas/ gung ugyu thu bas//s+yA s+yA r+d+has+sa s+sa ga 'od rje //r+b+ha b+hU nA yang mi 'ad do//rnam pa' dag ni dzinam dang //de tsam 'od kyis shA ga/ rmAH/
71b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen sems can gyis//de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo //sangs rgyas 'di ni mtha' yas te//na mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa//ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur rnams kyis//de 'dra bar
71b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'od mthong ngo //ji ltar skyes bu dmus long gis//nyi ma'i 'od ni de 'dru ba//ma mthong bas ni 'od de la//'od ni yod pa min zhes smra//de bzhin sems can dman pa gang /
71b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste//ma mthong bas na rgyal ba yi//'od ni yod pa min zhes zer//la las 'dom ngo tsam du mthong //la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang //la las
71b5(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum thams cad du//'od kyis khyab par gyur par mthong //sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang //bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa//byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che//sa chen la
71b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang gnas pa//de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od//mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing //bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su//sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed//
71b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te//sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab//bsam mi khyab la dang byas nas//bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab//yang shA ri'i bu
72a1(dkon brtsegs): ltung na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de ni du gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon pa dang yid chus rab tu rtog the tshom mi za rgyu
72a2(dkon brtsegs): cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes bskyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa
72a3(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dang yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba tshul khrims yongs su dag
72a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can 'jig na du byung ste/lus kyi lus yongs su dag pa dang napa/ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/srid kyi las yongs su dag pa
72a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/them pa sdig pa spangs pa/dge sbyong zhi ba bsame gtan pa'i mchog/ti 'dzin dam pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang dag par sgrubs spro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu lhad bcas pa
72a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /bdudan du bcas pa dang /dge sbyong du bcas pa dang /bram zer bcas po'i skyes dgu dang /sgra dang mi dang
72b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma sngon du bcas pa'i 'jog rten na ji ltar de bzhin glu shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag phyur rdzogs pa'i sang+yas r+b+ba swA skAr tshul khrimasna dung ti 'dzin gyi phung po yangs su/
72b2(dkon brtsegs): dge pa chud med pa de lta bungs mi mthong /de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin ge shigs pa ni tshul khrims dang /ting 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
72b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'o//shA r+ya'i bu khyod de btsun gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang ti de la dzin ched med pa'i dpe tsam nyan par 'dod de ma/gsol
72b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge sbyong dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang /ting 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa las brtsams te dpe tsamu bshad na
72b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das lus 'di ltar zlos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni 'di lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni 'di
72b6(dkon brtsegs): lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/sems can gyi khams dang /sa'i khams gang mang /gsol pa
72b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni ma lags so//
73a1(dkon brtsegs): hA/bka' sprul pa/dI de dranan+dan//shU ri'i bu da da banan tu/shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gi skye//dmas ni ma yin no//
73a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/mang lnga las skyes pa 'am/drod gsher lngas skyes pa 'am/
73a3(dkon brtsegs): brdzus te skyes pa 'am/gzugs can nam/gzugs med pa 'am/'du shes can nam/'du shes med pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes maud min gyi
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can+da rnams ji tsam sems can du gdagus pas btags pa de thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/skad cig thad cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par/
73a5(dkon brtsegs): mi'i lus thob par gyur la/shA ri'i bu mir gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par
73a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur zhing /yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa re ras kyang de bzhin ga
73a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sprul te/de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang dbu stong stong du gyur/dbu re re la yang zhal stong stong
73b1(dkon brtsegs): dud+hA/ swA stug+sas stong /d+ma m+b+ha n+ta/debanan//shegs pa dus thams na rnams ba da rgyun pa gyur/ma dzegs pa rnyanarung
73b2(dkon brtsegs): de dezhin ga shegs pa'i so so sbyong dag par rig pa bzhi dang /chags pa myed pa sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur la/shA ri'i bur
73b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs bya gcig gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa las brtsams te/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsngags
73b4(dkon brtsegs): ba brjod sdang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de na de 'dra ste/shrI ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi zed/de
73b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa yang mi zad de/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar
73b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla/
73b7(dkon brtsegs): na med pa dang /de gnyis ni tshad med grangs med pa dang /de gnyis ni tshad mi de grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs so//shA ri'i
74a1(dkon brtsegs): bu stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khyams kyi sems can lta zhog la/shA ri'i bu shur+ya phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
74a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma skyed na/sem+b+has can ji snyed pa dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs dang /de bzhin du phyo gus 'tsho gas
74a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis mi'i lus
74a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i bar du gong ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/'di lta
74a5(dkon brtsegs): skye de bzhini gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pra bla na med pa dang /dri gnyis tshad
74a6(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab nA mA lA dang mnyam zhing mtshungs te/de ltar shA rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i
74a7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du son pa'o//shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dpe tsam du byas pa nyan par 'dod dam/gsol
74b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/'di ltar dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so//bde bar gshegs
74b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshod 'di lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de'i dus de'i tshod 'byung ste/nyi mo bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur nas
74b3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar/kun 'bar/kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro//shA
74b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de'i phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/mnal ba de'i sa phyogs
74b5(dkon brtsegs): de ngo mtshar dang /rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na/sa phyogs de lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/sa phyobras de ngo mtshar dang /
74b6(dkon brtsegs): rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dang ldan par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar /kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu mchod cing 'dar te/'bar
74b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyung ba der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/mnal ba'i sa phyogs de gseg ma dang /gyo ma
75a1(dkon brtsegs): med cing mtho bar gyur pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te/sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyu
75a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/kun tu 'bar/kun du rab tu mchod cing 'bar te/'bar ba gu tig tu gyur nas/'jig pa
75a3(dkon brtsegs): dIng sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/mnal ba'i sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
75a4(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod pa'i phyir yangs shing mnyam par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par 'gyuraro//gzhan
75a5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs
75a6(dkon brtsegs): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sum/man+talA ba'i sa phyogs dur rtswa sngo ba 'khyil pa 'jam pa/g.yas phyogasu 'khyil
75a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba/dri rab tu zhim pa skye bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur
75b1(dkon brtsegs): ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu 'chang cing 'byar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa
75b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tshag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/man lnga pa'i sa phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba yang
75b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/'jam pa dang rnyog pa med pa/rab tu dang ba/'thung 'dod pa/mang du 'thungs kyang nang du mi 'gyur ba dang /yan lug 'dri brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung
75b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar
75b5(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu mchod cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa dor sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs
75b6(dkon brtsegs): sam/bzhugs sam+ba/mnal ba'i sa phyogs der/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rab tu bsil ba'i rlung ldang ba de 'di lta ste dpe
75b7(dkon brtsegs): na shA ri'i bu sos ga nyi ma tsha bas gdungs po'i dus na/skyes bu la la zhig gang+gA'i klung ngu zhugs nas lus bsil bar byas te/rims dang snyoms pa thams cad zhi bar
76a1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/gang gA'i klung nas byung zhing slar byung nas 'chag cing 'gro ba las ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na nags stug po yal ga dang /lo ma
76a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /'drab ma grib ma stug po dang ldan pa chen bi zhig ma thong nas de nags stugs po gang na yod pa der spong ste phyin pa dang /nags stugs po'i dbus na khri'i steng du
76a3(dkon brtsegs): phyar bu bting ba/be'u ras kyis g.yogs pa/ka tsa lin de'i gding ba gting ba/de'i steng dar gyis g.yogs pa/ya thog ma thog tu sngas dmar po bshis
76a4(dkon brtsegs): pi zhig mthong nas de de la 'dug go/de de la 'dug ste 'greng zhing phyogs bzhi kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/shA rI'i bu sa phyogs
76a5(dkon brtsegs): der bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten
76a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'bar/kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs
76a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/mnal ba'i sa phyogs der chu las skyes pa'i me tog/ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po skye bar//
76b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bdun po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/kun
76b2(dkon brtsegs): du'abar/kun du rab tu mchod cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'chi gu pa dI ngas phyogs gdun de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs
76b3(dkon brtsegs): sam/bzhugs sam/mnal ba'i sa phyogs der thang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lta ste/a d+hi mug ta ka dang /tsam pa ka dang /sgyu ma'i me tog dang
76b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ngi sha ka dang /mya ngan 'chang dang /skya snang dang /dong ka'i me tog dang /ta ra ni dang /ko ta ra ni la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs kha dog dang ldan pa
76b5(dkon brtsegs): dri dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos brgyad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gzhon yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar
76b6(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'bar/kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar tau/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/'chig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/bzhengs sam/bzhug
76b7(dkon brtsegs): sam/mnal ba'i sa phyogs de sra zhing mi shigs pa/sa gzhi rdo rjer 'gyur te/shA ri'i bus phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
77a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang nA ra rgya stong gsum b+hA spyang rgan po'i 'dzigasngon gyi khams ldan /rab tu las kyi sman du rlub NA lam+b+ha so/'bang kun du /
77a2(dkon brtsegs): kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshog pa deng sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
77a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chag gas/bzhengs sam/bzhugs sam/min+d+hal ba'i sa phyogs deng spyor bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /bdud du bcas pa dang /tshungs par bcas pang
77a4(dkon brtsegs): dan sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /g+ha dang mi dang /skyo ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/shA ri'i bus phyogs de ni ngo ma
77a5(dkon brtsegs): da kyi chos bcupo 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ya shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos daSh+Ti sa shin dri gas te/de rtogs pa d+ma de bzhin gshegs
77a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sam rgyas ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la glacig tu bde ba des so yang dge par pyong bIr 'gyur ba de lta
77a7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/brgal po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma steng du bzugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin yongs su 'bri ba med pa
77b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad do//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal bar gnas sum/bskal ba brgya 'am/bskal pa stong ngam/bskal pa
77b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag brgya 'am/bskal pa bye ba 'am bskal pa bye ba brgya 'am/bskal pa bye bya stod ngam/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'am/bskyal ba bye ba
77b3(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/de las lhag par yang bzhugs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
77b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ni pha rol du phyin pa mchog gi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa ste/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/de ltar mthu che ba/de
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o//'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i nad du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig la
77b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas bskal ba brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'jug ste/bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtho' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bor du rnam par shes pa de las
77b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du shA ri'i bu gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
78a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sa m+b+ha rgyas pa dang /gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
78a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin las nyams pa med/sems 'gyur ba med/sems rgyu ba med/sems rnam par rgyu ba med
78a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu rgyu ba med/sems rgyas pa med/sems kyi 'dren pa med/sems kyi g.yeng ba med/sems mthong ba med/sems dma' ba mi
78a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kun du bsrung ba med/sems sbed pa med/sems tshim pa med/sems mi mthun pa med/sems 'dud pa med/sems g.yo ba med
78a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa med/sems zhum pa med/sems rtog pa med/sems rnam par rtog pa med/sems yongs su rtog pa med
78a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi rjes su 'byung ba'i rnam par shes pa med/sems mig la gnas pa med/rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang /lus dang /yid la gnas pa med//
78a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la gnas pa med/sems sgra dang /dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang /chos la gnas pa med/sems chos la 'jug pa med/sems rnam par
78b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la 'jug pa med/sems 'das pa la yang mi lta/sems ma 'ongs pa la yang mi lta/sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/de ltar shA rI'i bu de bzhin
78b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin la gnas nAs sems las chos gang yang bas la ba med mod kyi/lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul
78b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar 'jug go//'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa
78b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bral mod kyi gnas kyang mi 'dor te/lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
78b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de skad gsungs nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo //bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par//sngon gyi srid pa'i 'gro bar
78b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod spyad che//tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin bag yod dang //bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas sgoms//rgyal ba'i rtog dang 'bras bu
78b7(dkon brtsegs): dog pa 'di 'dra bas//tshul khrims shin du yongs dag 'jig rten kun gyi mchog/ji ltar namakha' dri med rnam shes spros med ltar//stobs bcu tshul khrims dri ma mod
79a1(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' bzhin//gang gi nub mo rgyal bas drang po byang chub rtogs//ljang gi nub mo tha mar mya ngan 'das gshugs tshe//stobs
79a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med//de bzhin bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang med//stobs bcu rnams kyi tshul khrims phung po nyams
79a3(dkon brtsegs): med do//rdzu 'phru la stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med//bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ni gcig gi gnas//'dren pa la ni rtog
79a4(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par rtog pa med//'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul na mkha' 'dra//dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med 'jug/stobs
79a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang //rtog dang gtong ba med par sangs rgyas sras rnams dang //de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
79a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams de bzhin ga shugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshes pa'i tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyad pa la mngon par dang /yid ches
79a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs ma nyi med tha tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ral ma rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na
79b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/yid ches/rab tu
79b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog/som nyi med/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
79b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad du gnas brtan mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na mchog zhes
79b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul de la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul la yang 'jal zhing yongasu
79b5(dkon brtsegs): dpyod do//gzhal te yongs su dpyad na byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par mi mthong ngo /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la
79b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhal zhing yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do//gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gsheg sa pa'i rdzu
79b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong nas da 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gau shigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis
80a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab po snyam nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom mo//
80a2(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te/dpe tsamra du bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa las khyod nyon par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das
80a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus 'di lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshad 'di lags so//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs

80a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/de'i phyir shA ri'i bu legs par rab tu nyon le yid la zung shig dang bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas
80a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom+b+ha ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu da ji snyam du
80a7(dkon brtsegs): sems/gnas brtan mo dgal kyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba yin nam/gsol pa/dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na 'di ltar gnas
80b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog gro zhes bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du zlos te/mngon sum du gzung ngo //bka' stsal pa/
80b2(dkon brtsegs): shU ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyen thos rdzu 'phrul chen po mo dgal gyi bu chen po lta bus 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing gi
80b3(dkon brtsegs): shing stug po 'am/'dam bu stug po 'am/'od ma stug po 'am/til gyi zhing ngam/'bras kyi zhing bzhin du grang bar gyur la/de ltar gcig
80b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus mthu dang brtson 'grus thams cad dang /rdzu 'phrul dang/chu 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de
80b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gyustong gi char yang /brgya stong gi char yangabye ba'i char yangabye ba
80b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang /bye ba stong gi char yang /bye ba brgya stong gi char yang /grangs su yang /tshor yang /bgrang bar yang /dper yang /rgyur yang nye
80b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul dang /cho'i 'phrul gyi
81a1(dkon brtsegs): dam par nga rol du phyin par//shA ra~M brA gr-I swA tI do zhin ga/shogs pas skye 'dol yungs kar m+b+ha'abru cig bgag na ngan
81a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yungs kar gyi 'bru bzhag pa de yod/de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi mthu dang stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /drag shul thams
81a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bzhag pa'i yungs kAr gyi 'bru snro mo cig tsam yang bskyed

81a5(dkon brtsegs): byin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'o//shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lte zhog la/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham

81b1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyis sems can de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste dper na maud gal gyi bu chen pa/

81b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs thams cad bstan kyang yungs 'bru yang gdeg par mi nus/tha na skra'i rtse mo'i tshe tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshes

81b5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyi tsher gyur pa de na kun
81b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/rlung de langs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri'i rgyal po ring ba dang /ri kho ra khor yug gi ri dang
81b7(dkon brtsegs): khong yug gi ri chen po dang /gling chen po bzhi dang /gling brgyad khri dang /ri chen po dang /rgya mtsho chen po yang dpag tshang sing du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor bar
82a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/gsol pa/ba shags bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te mngon sum du gzung ngo //bka' stsa/

82a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor te/de dag gi rdul yang mi snang ni/ri dang rdo rnams lta ci smos/'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang dkrugs bcom
82a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor te/de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang rnams lta ci smos/dga' ldan pa rnams dang /'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul
82b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang /tshangs pa rnams dang /'od gsal ba rnams dang /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par
82b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//ji ltar 'thab bral gyi dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor te/dkrugs bcom rab tu gter ba de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khadi dang ra ba rnams sna
82b3(dkon brtsegs): smos/shA ri'i bu gal te de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang /des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yos par mi nus na chos gos sam//
82b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gos kyi grwa lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul
82b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lom dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan no//shA rI'i buM gal te
82b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang //lho dang rub dang /byang dang 'og dang steng dang /phyogs 'tshams dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten
82b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rlung mngon par ldang yang /shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor
83a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu
83a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/de la byang chub ses dang mngon par dang /yid ches rtog/som

83a6(dkon brtsegs): yungs kar gyi ni 'bru gzhag pa//g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so//gang rnams phyogs bai cu'i 'jig rten khams//gang gA'i klung ni bye ma snyed //rnam par

83b4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam kIs mi khye bral mengoni par dud/yid rjes rab tu rtog/som med/thets+tsham+ba mA~M thA/rgya cher dag
83b5(dkon brtsegs): mnu se rlangs pa rnyed nas dmatshar dang rgyud du 'du shes bsgrod nan/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni bcu'i 'dir
83b6(dkon brtsegs): stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khro mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa
83b7(dkon brtsegs): spos kyang 'jig rten 'dir ches dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen
84a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs dang /lus kyi rnam par smon pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /mos pa du ma drang myos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs das
84a2(dkon brtsegs): khams du ma dang /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /thams cad du 'gro ba
84a3(dkon brtsegs): lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /bsam gautan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
84a4(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba dang /ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /ston gyi gnas rje su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba
84a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de
84a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/stobs de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par saing+ge'i sgra sgrogs shing khyu mchog gi gnasu zhal gyi mche ba nas sus kyang
84a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar duro//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin
84b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis gnas kyang gnas su gnas
84b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//de la gnas gang gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis
84b3(dkon brtsegs): nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /sdug pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ongs pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do//
84b4(dkon brtsegs): gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /mi dga'
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas te skabs yod do//gang lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang /ngag gi legs par spyad pa dang /yid
84b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /mi dga' ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas mo yin te skabs med//
84b7(dkon brtsegs): gang lus kyis logs par spyad pa dang /ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /sdug pa dang /dga' ba dang /
85a1(dkon brtsegs): naspyod nga man ts+tsha brnyan nu na sa su ma /rgyubs na dun sa sun sgyu sa na
85a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod skyes longs spyod rnon po med ni par 'grub pa de ni gnas myi yin no//gang ser skyeste dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skyengs med do//shA ri'i
85a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skyabs med de gang sbyin pasna dngas byor 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no//gang sbyin pasna longs spyod chen po de mngon par 'grub pa
85a4(dkon brtsegs): na gnas yin te skabs yod do//shA ri'i zla 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang 'phrul pa'i tshul khrims kyi sno s+yA dang /ming ste ba rnye pa den
85a5(dkon brtsegs): glunas ma yin no//gang 'tshal d+ma'i tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas
85a6(dkon brtsegs): na hU~M sgrub sa yod de/kA rI'i sku 'di ni glan sna ma yin ning sgru ba ste med de gang tshul khrims snas sems rkyen danas pa dang /dud 'gro'i sbyi nas das
85a7(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas ma yin no//gang tshul khrims kyis lha dang /ming skye ba thob pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do//
85b1(dkon brtsegs): ri bu gnasnya ma yin zhing sgrubasdu mod do blan du sems kyis gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de nI gnas ma yin no//gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mi

85b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnas ma yin no//gang bzod pas gzugs mdzes pa mngon par grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do//shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs

91b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnam par

92a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las
92a5(dkon brtsegs): len pa gang rtsom pa che la khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang nyan thos su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de
92a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las
92a7(dkon brtsegs): len pa gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang da ltar sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
92b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang da ltar bde ba la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang
92b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang de ltar yang sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhi ni gshegs
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu mkhyen to//las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//'di
92b4(dkon brtsegs): lcer shA rI'i bu 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi dus na sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang /rgyu gang dang /rnam par smin pa gang de bzhin dang
92b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /gzhan ma yin par bsten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du de bzhin
92b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos ston to//de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /
92b7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyis las len pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /gnas gang yin pa dang /rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do//'di lta ste dper na shA
93a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yang mtha' yas
93a2(dkon brtsegs): mu med do//shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las rnam par smin po mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod
93a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas
93a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang yid ches rab tu rtog som nyi med the tshom mi ze rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed na na mkha' lta bur bsam+ba gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmang
93a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes bskyed do//'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te//de la 'di skad ces bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas//skyon ldan las rnams
93a6(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi bsgrub pa mkhyen//dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chags pa med//sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen//'gro ba lnga yis sems can thams cad kyi//
93a7(dkon brtsegs): bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu ni gang 'gyur dang //'jug pa gang dag sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba//de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen//dkar nag
93b1(dkon brtsegs): las rnams kyi ni rnam smin dang //rgyu dang rnam smon ji ltar 'gyur ba yAng //de drag de bzhin gshogs pas rab mkhyen to//phyag gi 'thil na yid bzhin nor du
93b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ni//las gang rnam smin chung ngu'i rgyu dag las//'bras bu dag ni tshad mi 'byin pa dang //tshad med gang dag chung ngu'i rgyud 'gyur ba//de dag de bzhin
93b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen//nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu smin 'gyur dngadA//rang rgyal byang chub rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang //bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin 'gyur ba//
93b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ma lus bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen//lus kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smin byed dang //las kyi rgyu gang bde ba sbyin byed pa//sdug bsngal 'bras po bye ba thams
93b5(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen//sdug bsngal rgyus ni sgrog bsgral nyid gnas dang //bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid gnas dang //lus kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin ma yin pa//d+hU 3na
93b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen//'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi//dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrod pa gang 'jug pa//nyams med de nyid de
93b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gzhan min par//sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis
94a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/stobs de dang ldan pas/dwa bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du/seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing /dge slong ngam/bram
94a2(dkon brtsegs): ze'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa gAng gis kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bam po lnga pa//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma dang /mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis//sems can gzhan rnam
94a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /gleng zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang /mos pa sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//skyes bu gang zag gang 'dod chags la
94a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing /zhe sdang la mos pa'ang rgyas par bya ste/gti mug la gnas shing /zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//
94a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gang mi dge ba lnga gnas shing mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//gang zag gang sbyor du dman zhing rgya chen po
94a7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che ba dman pa la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin
94b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyed to//gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la gnas shing 'gyur ba du dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
94b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhini rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis khyad par lnga sbyor ba dman pa gnas par 'gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
94b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa la gang gis log pa nyid du nges po'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa
94b4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin /
94b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khamasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
94b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa gang gis gzugs kyi khamasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//rmos pa gang gis
95a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khamasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa
95a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis khams gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhini gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis dman pa la
95a3(dkon brtsegs): sten cing dman pa nyid gnon pa dang /khyad par la sten cing khyad par la gnon pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
95a4(dkon brtsegs): mis pa gang gis khyad par du song nas dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
95a5(dkon brtsegs): pa glang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang /kha dog tha dad pa dang /yongs su longs spyod tha dad pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
95a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams por 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
95a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to//mos po gang gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas
95b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin du chos ston to//de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshogs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do na mkha' dang //
95b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas/mngon par dang /yid ches
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog/som nyi med/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed nas/nA mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du
95b4(dkon brtsegs): shes skyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so//'jig rten 'di mos sna
95b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dong //de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa//de dag gi na mos pa'i sems//thams cad 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen//gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la//zhe sdang
95b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga ni gnas 'gyur dang //zhe sdang gnas shing gti mug la//gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen//gti mug gnas shing 'dod chags kyi//sems rgyud byas ma
95b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa//bar bar du ni 'jug pa dang //de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen//gang dge sbyong ba dman gyur la//rgya chen la ni mos pa dang //sbyor ba dam
96a1(dkon brtsegs): /pA do drug gi/dman par 'gyur ba 'dren pas mkhyen//ldog pa'i rjes su song ba dang //'grob med par 'byung ba dang //byams
96a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i//mos pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen//smyo dang kha dog tha dad dang //nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang //gang dag spyi bo las
96a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa//rkang gnyis gtso byos rab tu mkhyen//myos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyenus//'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad//sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs gsum
96a4(dkon brtsegs): //rgyal ba'i thugs sras rab tu mos//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa
96a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs de dag ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'chi zhing 'khor gyi nang du se ng+ge'i sgra
96a6(dkon brtsegs): yid dag par smrig ste/dge slong dum/bram ze 'am/lha'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor batshangs pa'i 'alir lo rlub
96a7(dkon brtsegs): tu bskor ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dran+ta/khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams yang dag tu ji lta ba bzhin
96b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to//khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//khams gang gis
96b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed sogs pa/
96b3(dkon brtsegs): de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//khams gang gis 'byung ba'i khams su 'jog par 'gyur po de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te//gzhan
96b4(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen
96b5(dkon brtsegs): ce na/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//yid kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rab tu mkhyen
96b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
96b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /rlung gi khams rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi
97a1(dkon brtsegs): /khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/kun tu rtog pa las byung bar rab tu mkhyen to//'dus byas
97a2(dkon brtsegs): khams mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//kun nas nyan
97a3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i khams ni phyis 'byung ba'i nyon mongs po'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//rnam par byung ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab
97a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to//'du byed kyi khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa mi reg pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i
97a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /'jig rten gan pa khams gang la gnas pa dang /khams gang la rjes
97a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang /khams gang la gnas pa dang /khams gang la sbyor ba dang /khams gang gis bsam pa dang /khams gang la nges pa du sems pa dang //khams
97a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la brten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
97b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams du ma dang /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de na mkha' dang na tshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa
97b2(dkon brtsegs): khams du ma dang /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs la mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi mod/the tshum mi rmi rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed
97b3(dkon brtsegs): nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ngo mtshar dang /rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/'di la 'di skad ces bya'o//
97b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun na sems can gang //sna tshogs khams la gnas pa dang /khams gang 'jug pa ci 'dra ba//sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen//bsod nams
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams mnI ni gAyo//'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin te//khams rnams gang la gnas nas su//mya ngan 'das pa zhi la reg/rlig gi khams dang gzugs
97b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams//mig ni rnam par shes pa nyid dang //rna bsku dang lce dang lus//yid kyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen//chos kyi khams dang yid kyi ni//rnam par
97b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyang mkhyen//nang gi khams ni stong pa dang //phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen//su dang chu dang me dag dang //rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te//khams rnams
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ni//nam mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen//'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams//gzugs med pa yi khams
98a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang //kun tu rtog las byung bar ni//de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen//ji ltar na mkha' mtha' yas pa//de bzhin khams rnams mu med de//thams
98a3(dkon brtsegs): cad sangs rgyas rab mkhyen kyang //mkhyen to snyam du rlom sems med//khams ni skye ba ma yin zhing //rnam pa kun tu 'gag med de//khams 'di mya ngan
98a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das par ni//skyes bu dam pas rab tu mkhyen//ji ltar na mkha' mtha' yas pa//sangs rgyas ye shes de 'dra ste//mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa//
98a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes des ni rab tu mkhyen//mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen nas su//sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul//sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi pa la//rgyal po'i thugs
98a6(dkon brtsegs): sras dad par byed//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bzhi pa ste/sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa
98a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can
98b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/dbang po/
98b2(dkon brtsegs): brtul ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po bar ma yang rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po rno ba yang rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa yang rab tu mkhyen to///
98b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dman pa yang rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang /mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang /mthar
98b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang zhe
98b5(dkon brtsegs): sdong dang /gtA mug brtan pa skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod
98b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs dang /zhe sdang dang /gauti mug yang skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po
98b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su rtog
99a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshor bcad cing /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug skyo ba de yang de bzhin gshogs pas yang /
99a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po gang dag mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /dbang po gang
99a3(dkon brtsegs): dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen
99a4(dkon brtsegs): to/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas/gong ma bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas//
99a5(dkon brtsegs): gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//pho'i dbang po
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /mo'i dbang po dang /srog gi dbang po dang /bde ba'i dbang po dang /sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang /yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang /yid bde ba'i
99a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang /btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran
99b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i
99b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i///
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las byung la/rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/sna li ma yin/lce la ma yin/lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
99b4(dkon brtsegs): dge pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//gang gis dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /gang sgra'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la
99b5(dkon brtsegs): lce'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
99b6(dkon brtsegs): drug pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//sems can gang sbyin pa'i de bang po can yin la dri yang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang
99b7(dkon brtsegs): po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas de la sbyin pa'i gtam ston to//gang zag tshul khrims kyi dbang po can yin la de la sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin///
100a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbyung ba mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas tshul khrims kyi gtum ston to//sems can gang brjod pa'i
100a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po can yin la de yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchig dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bzod pa'i gtam
100a3(dkon brtsegs): ston to//sems can gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po can yin la de yang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchogs ma
100a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mkhyen pas brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to//sems can gang bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la de yang shes rab la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin
100a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to//sems can gang shes rab kyi dang ngo bo can yin la de yang
100a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas shes rab kyi gtam ston to//gong ma bzhin du sbyar
100a7(dkon brtsegs): te/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la yang bya'o//sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi thog
100b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la sbyor ba de lnga de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog drang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to//sems can gang rang sangs
100b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen
100b3(dkon brtsegs): pos rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to//sems can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po can yin la de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/
100b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas theg pa chen po'i gtam ston to//sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la de
100b5(dkon brtsegs): yang theg pa chen po la sbyor ba de la/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas dbang po tha mra'i gtam ston to//sems
100b6(dkon brtsegs): can gang bskal pa med pa'i dbang po can skal pa med par snang ba de dgra de bzhin gshegs pas skal pa med cing snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jug
100b7(dkon brtsegs): go/sems can skal pa yod pa'i dbang po can skal ba yod par snang ba dag la/de bzhin gshegs pas skal pa yod cing snod du rig nas ri mor byas shing
101a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen//
101a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/'byung ba'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu
101a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to//sems can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang /sbyor ba gang yin pa dang /bsam pa gang yin pa dang /gang gi rgyu las byung ba dang
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gang yin pa dang /dmigs pa gang yin pa dang /rgyu 'thun po gang yin pa dang /sems can gyi dbang po'i mtha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad de
101a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka'
101a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo //'gro bI'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song //sems can rnams kyi spyod dang bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen//
101a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba gang dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba//de 'drar mi yi seng+ge de la chos 'chad do//dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams//de la bde gshes
101b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rmad du byung ba 'jug/sems can bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas//spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog gi chos ston to//gang
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dag mthar phyin skye zhing nyon mongs brtan pa dang /mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar gyur pa dang //skyes bu glang gis dbang po snol zhir gyur
101b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar 'thun pa'i chos ston to//skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang //mi dge ba yi dbang por gyur pa rnams kyang
101b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mkhyen//mig nas gzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang //yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal dbang mkhyen chos kyang ston//dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin
101b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shes rab dang //skyes bu gr-ing la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni//de la dad parje gtam ston de bzhin brtson 'grus dang //bsam gtan shes rab
101b6(dkon brtsegs): drug kyang dam pa'i don du ston//mi yi dbang po rnam pa spyod pa'i bye brag gang //mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang po yang //chos mchog rtogs pas de dag
101b7(dkon brtsegs): gi ni spyod pa mkhyen//sdug bsngal kun las thar par byed pa'i chos 'tshod do//gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir nges la//nyan thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug cha
102a1(dkon brtsegs): smras la//dol+la du rgyub dog 'byung rgya chen gas g+hu na// na shogs stobasna ni mtha' yas sa dka A da//'dan du banan/
102a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa s+t+wa~M/sus byung 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa
102a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du/'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
102a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/yang dag par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams bya tu
102a5(dkon brtsegs): /ga par nges pa'i rlom sa can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/mnges pa'i sems can gyi khams thong de bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//rgyu'i stobs can sngon
102a6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa zung tsam gyi go ba/dbang po rno ba'i sems can de dag la/de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung /ma bstan kyang rung /de rnam
102a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i skal ba yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs mkhyen nas de bzhin du 'thun par chos ston to//ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams
102b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gal te 'thun par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/rjes su ston pa dang
102b2(dkon brtsegs): ma phrad ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la yang /de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar rkyen dang /rgyu dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par gsungs te/'di ltar de bzhi/
102b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa las chos de thos nas tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung/
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo ngo//log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba ma byas na/khro re chung ba/blun pa snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la/de bzhin gshegs pas
102b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung ste/rnam par grol ba'i skol ba med pa de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog ste//
102b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams go gyon to//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu mkhyen te/'dod
102b7(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi lo mo sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/'dod chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/'dod chags kyi lam sngon gyi rgyu las skye ba
103a1(dkon brtsegs): yang yod do//zhe sdang gi ldum rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/zhe sdang gi ldum khong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye ba yang yod/bsam//
103a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/sngon gyi brag la nyal ba las skye ba yang yod do//gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/gti mug
103a3(dkon brtsegs): gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las skyo ba yang yod/gti mug gi lam 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las smra ba yang yod/gti mug gi lam the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba
103a4(dkon brtsegs): yang yod do//de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur/
103a5(dkon brtsegs): la sla ba'i lam yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po brtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to//
103a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bral la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to//dmigs pa bor ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul 'bul ba'i lo bzang rab tu mkhyen to//lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i
103b1(dkon brtsegs): lam yang rab tu mkhyen to//yongs su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon byar shum+b+ha pa bral la myung bya'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to//d+mo lha ma
103b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa gyur lci bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to//so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la bsgom pa'i stobs
103b3(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin pa'i lam yang yodabasgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/bsgoms pa'i
103b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lam yang yod/so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par mi byed
103b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yang yod de/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//bsam pa phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba phun sum
103b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa ma yin po'i lam yang yod/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma
103b7(dkon brtsegs): yin la sbyor ba yang phun sume tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/bsam pa yang phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba yang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang yod/
104a1(dkon brtsegs): de yang de bzhin gshegs pa sna yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//lus skyong la ngag la ma yin sems la ma yin pa'i lam//
104a2(dkon brtsegs): yang yod/ngag spyod la lus la ma yin sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/sems sbyong la lus la ma yin dag la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod//lus
104a3(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin ngag la ma yin la sems kyang mi sbyong ba'i lam yang yod/lus dang dgra dang sems sbyong ba'i lam yang yod de/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
104a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//de ltar shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang /ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa thams cad du de bzhin
104a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med par 'jug go//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu
104a6(dkon brtsegs): med na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpyas de thos nas mngon par dad/yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med the tshom mi za//
104a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed cing na mkha'i lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan
104b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag gsungs so//thams cad lam ni bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen//
104b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can khams ni nges rgyu bcas pa mkhyen//yongs su sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid ma des dang //de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen//'dod chags lam/
104b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa gsum dang ldan//zhe sdang lam gsum de bzhin gti mug ldan//rnam gsum rgya chen mtha' yas nyon mongs ldan//lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas
104b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//dka' ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang //de bzhin dbang po brtul zhing bul ba dang //sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang //de bzhin bul ba'ang
104b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen//bul ba'i lam la sbyor ba bul ba yod//de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyor ba rno//myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba dang //
104b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod//lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la//yang dag bsgom po bskyed pa ma ya ni dang //bsgom pa dag ni skyed par byed
104b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //gnyis ka khyad par sbyor ldan bskyed pa yod//lam ni bsam po yongs su sbyong byed la//sbyor ba dag ni sbyong bar mi byed yod//res 'ga' gnyis
105a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba pyod nga da//dag sangs rgyas thams rlung bzhigs pa sgyu man//sgras ni rnam par stong la dug ga
105a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang rnam par spyong ba ma yin dang //ngage rnams dang ni lus kyang rab spyod la//sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yang //semasna ni sbyong
105a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la ma yin te//lus kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang //ngag dang de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la//res 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi 'gyur yod//
105a4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang de bzhin dag sems spyong lam dang //ji ltar ldog dang 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams//sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas rlob mkhyen te//'di
105a5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs drug pa//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs drug pa ste stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
105a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'chi ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar dri'o//de la de bzhin gshegs b+ha'i bsam gid+d+ha
105a7(dkon brtsegs): dang //rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyin mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang sdud pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gan
105b1(dkon brtsegs): nA/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bdag dang /pha rol gyi bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug
105b2(dkon brtsegs): pri'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang ldang bre yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/sems can rnams
105b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi ni rab tu mkhyen to//sems
105b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi rnam par dge pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
105b5(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o//sems can thams
105b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi kun+da nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o//ma rig pa ni rgyu'o//'du byed ni rkyen to//'du byed ni rgyu'o//rnam par shes pa ni rkyen to//
105b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni rgyu'o//ming dang gzugs ni rkyen to//ming dang gzugs ni rgyu'o//skye mched drug ni rkyen to//skye mched drug ni rgyu'o//rig pa ni
106a1(dkon brtsegs): du/d+hun to//reg pa ni rgyu'o//tsho ba ni rgyun to//tshor ba ni chu'o//smod pa ni rkyen tau//sred pani rgyu'o//len pa ni rgyun to//len pa//
106a2(dkon brtsegs): nI rgyu'o//srid pa ni rkyen to//srid pa ni rgyu'o//skye ba ni rkyen to//skye ba ni rgyu'o//rga shi ni rkyen to//nyon mongs pa ni rgyu'o//las ni rkyen to//lta ba
106a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyu'o//sred pa ni rgyun to//bag la nyal ba ni rgyu'o//kun nas ldang ba nI rkyen to//sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon nongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni
106a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di/rkyen ni 'di yin te/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang drug pa/ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par
106a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang /rkyen gang zhe na/sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyis rkyen gnyis te/gzhal las rjes su 'thun
106a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dang /so so bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o//'di lta ste zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang /lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o//gzhan yang
106a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/'gro ba med par shes po dang /'ong ba med par shes pa'o//gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/skye ba med par
106b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog pa dang /nges par gyur pa lnga mi reg pa'o//gzhan yang rgyu gnyis drang rkyen gnyis te/rkang pa dang ldan pa dang /rig par rnam par grol ba mngon
106b2(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed pa'o//gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bsgom pa dang /rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o//gzhan
106b3(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa'o//gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/bden pa rje su rtogs pa dang
106b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rjes su 'thob pa'o//rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ni sems can rnam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur bya ste/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par/
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//gzhan yang shU ri'i bu sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang tshad med/rnam par dag par dmigs pa
106b6(dkon brtsegs): yang tshad med de/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa 'di dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang
106b7(dkon brtsegs): yod do//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas rnam par dag pa dmigs pa yang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod//
107a1(dkon brtsegs): //mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dzin pas kun nas nyon mongs par dadamyigs pa la ldog pa dang /rnam par dag pa dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang/
107a2(dkon brtsegs): yod de/de la sne zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
107a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so//bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas 'gog pa las ldang ba dang /'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas
107a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su 'thun par snyoms par 'jug go//mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug go
107a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'thun pa dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug te/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang
107a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lte ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa la sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gru/
107b1(dkon brtsegs): bde na rnam par thur pa gsum pa'o//namadu' mtha' yas+t+ra sgyu mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod la snyoms
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa lta ba'o//ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
107b3(dkon brtsegs): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste//rnam par thar pa brgyad pa 'di dag la rje
107b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa dang /mi 'thun par yang snyoms par 'jug snrel zhing yang snyoms par 'jug go//ting 'dzin la yang tIng 'dzin ston la/snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs pa
107b5(dkon brtsegs): ston kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin la tha dad par 'gyur ba gang yang med/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting 'dzin la dmigs pa las ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhags
107b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba med/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'grub pa/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin las ma bzhengs par ting 'dzi
107b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma gzhan
108a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du sus kyang lha mI nus te/nyan thos kyi ting 'dzin ni rang sngangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin
108a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis zil gyis non to//rang sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to//byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni sangs rgyas
108a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ting 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zil gyis mnon pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zil gyis mnon par 'jug
