108a4(dkon brtsegs): gro/gdams pa gang dang rje su bstan pa grang gis nyan thos rnams ting 'dzin bskyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//dri bzhin du rang sangs rgyas
108a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjesu ston
108a6(dkon brtsegs): to//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa
108a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba'i mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpas de thos nas
108b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang /yad chos rab tu rten/snro kyi b+h+yod blo rlom m+b+hiH/rgyu tshor dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rgod rnying namanga' d+ha bsnam b+his mi khyAb+ha da'i phyir ngo mtshad
108b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do//'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing //gang gis ses can rnamang/
108b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung //de yang dpa'i ba chen pos ma khyen//masbyin nas gta na mas ston par mdzad//glang du ma rig skye 'gyung ba//nyon rmongs rgyuni tshul bzhin min//de
108b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni 'du byed de//sdug bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur//srid pa'i yin ldan bskyed pa yi//thams nod rtsa ba tshul bzhi ni min//de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen/
108b5(dkon brtsegs): nus//de bzhin du yang ston pa mdzad//las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs pa//mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de//sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dang //de yi rkyen
108b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par shes//gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba/rgyu gnyis drung ni rten gnyis te//gzhan las rje su 'dzin sgra dang //nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o//tshul
108b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni zhi gnas te//lhag mthong yang ni rkyen yin no//sems can gang gis dril 'gyuraro//de yang 'dren pas rab tu ma rkyen//tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas
109a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams stong par rab tu rtogs//thar pa'i sgo ni bsgoms pas na//sred pa dag las thar par 'gyur//de dag sangs rgyas rab mkhye//
109a2(dkon brtsegs): nasarnam sbyong skyes bu bud med la//stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang //rnam par thar pa rab tu ston//bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa//rang rgyar//
109a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ni nyan thos rnams//de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad//de yi 'gran zla yod par gsungs//sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam thar la//dgra dang bcas
109a4(dkon brtsegs): med dog pa med//sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa//pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
109a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs bdun pa ste/stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun
109a6(dkon brtsegs): par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na//'di la shA ri'i bu/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rje su dran no//
109b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste skye ba gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mama?/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am/bcu 'am/nyi shu 'am/sum cu 'am/bzhi bcu 'am/skye ba brgya 'am/skyo ba stong/
109b2(dkon brtsegs): ngam+ba/skye bo brgya stong nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong gi bar du rje su dran no//'jig pa'i skal pa 'am/'chags pa'i skal pa 'am/'jig pa dang /'tshogs
109b3(dkon brtsegs): pA bi skal pa 'am/'jig pa'i skal pa du ma 'am/'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/'jig pa dang /'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na nga sngon che ge mo
109b4(dkon brtsegs): khrig tu byung ste/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/zas ni 'di lta bu zhig zla/kha drog ni 'di lta bu/mtshan ma nI 'di lta bu/dbyibs
109b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dra lta bu/tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/yun ni 'di srid cig gnas/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/bdag de nas shi 'phos nas cho ge/
109b6(dkon brtsegs): mo zhig tu skyes so//bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/'dir skyes so//zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas/gzhi ci las gyur pa dang /
109b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas du ma rjes su dran no//sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang /rgyu gang gis sems can du 'gyur ba'i rgyu de yang
110a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te//mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to//'das pa'i sems can thams cad myi 'das/
110a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen no//sems gdo gI 'og tu gang la dmyigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang /dmigs pa gang ma chung bas 'gags pa
110a3(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad kyang de bzhin gI shegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//dem+WAr shA ri'i bu gang son gcig seMs gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu
110a4(dkon brtsegs): sems 'di lta bu zhig byung ngo zhes bya ba dA ni bsgral po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang tshig gis bshad pas ston par mi nus te/de bzhin du sum
110a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams rgyud kyi yang thams cad de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems
110a6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/tshad med grangs med brjod du med de/
110b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtha' gnas ni bde bar bstan mi nus so//sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag la/kye sems can rnams
110b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /de sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/nyan thos la bskyed pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par
110b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do//'di lto ste de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pasna de dag la dge ba'i rtsa bya la
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta bur ston te/ci nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa ji/
110b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/lA la nI rang sangs rgya sA kyi thegs pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//le la ni bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
110b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu
110b7(dkon brtsegs): med na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad /yid ches rab tu rtag/som nyi med/the tshom mi za ba nas
111a1(dkon brtsegs): namakha' lta byur bsam gyis ni khyab pa'i bAr du'o//bcom ldan 'asag+nis dA s+yAd gsungs to/byAng b+hu gshogs pas de skad
111a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo //bdag gi dring ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi/'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa ni//bskal pa bye
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrog mtha' yas pa//skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin//ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam par rtag/tshe dang gnas dang mchi ba 'gro ba dang //
111a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa//de mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad//'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos//gang dag 'das pa
111a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yis mu med pa//gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba kun//rgyal ba'i ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen//sems can gcig gi sems rgyud sngon
111a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa//bde bar gshegs pa sa rab tu mkhyen pa ni//bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed du//bshad kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur//sngon
111a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag gi/phyi ma'i mtha' bar dungs bshad kyang //mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi zad de//bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di
111b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'o//sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang gang byas shing //sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsam gyur pa//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas//
111b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon ngag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran//sngon ni bsod nams ji 'dra byas pa rnams//de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te//de dag dran nas gnas ni gsu
111b3(dkon brtsegs): le 'khod//thor ba'i gnas lngas phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur//pad+mo go shegs sngon gyi sbyor ba mtha' yAs+dza te//sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus//
111b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas glags pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la//rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dang par 'gyur//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
111b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste//stobs de dag ldan pa zhes bya ba nas//chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i
111b6(dkon brtsegs): mika rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zho na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /mi las
111b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam por dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /bzang po dang /ngan pa dang /kha dog mdzes pa dang /kha dog mi
112a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa dang /bde 'gror 'phro ba dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams gzigs so//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa
112a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan/ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba dag ste/de
112a3(dkon brtsegs): dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhigo ste/shi bya'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar
112a4(dkon brtsegs): skye'o//dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gsha ni rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no//yang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang
112a5(dkon brtsegs): ljon/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag por lta ba ste//
112a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dag par lta ba yang dog par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nus bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lhar skye'o zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa
112a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu mkhyen to//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mkha'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa brjod du med pa gang
112b1(dkon brtsegs): gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyang shin tu 'das pa thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji rnyed snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'tshog pa dang /'jig pa dang /'chags par
112b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so//sems can gang dgra kha cig snang bar gyur pa de drag thams cad ni 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye bar gzigs so//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig ni
112b3(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang /ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang /bats+tsha ba dang /gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang /brdzun mo'i
112b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /mngon par 'byung bar gzigs so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub mngon
112b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yong gzig so//
112b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so//rang sangs rgyas gang
112b7(dkon brtsegs): dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong bar gzigs so//sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa/phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon/
113a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgya sna dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang
113a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so//yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i phang lo'i tshe de tsam lnga snang bar ma gyur pa'i
113a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni shin tu mang gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de ltar ma yin te/de ltar mi snang bar
113a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do//'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can gang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul
113a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur de dag gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing //
113a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so//de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed
113a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo//byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas na mkha' lta bur
113b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs///
113b2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa'i lha'i migo dri med de//bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs//dris ni rgyal bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing //rgya chen bsam gyis
113b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs//'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa//kha cig me yis 'khor cing sems can gnas//kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong //
113b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzegs//sems can khams ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab//gzugs can gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang //gang dag ngan 'gror
113b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dang bde 'gro ba//thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs//sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang gzugs dang //rang byung 'dren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang //
113b6(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa//thams cid rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs//byang chub sems dpa' srog chags phan 'dogs pa//gang dag byung
113b7(dkon brtsegs): chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing //la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur po//thams cad rang byung 'dren pa dag gis gzigs//gang gis srog chags shin tu phra
114a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong bu//bde gshogs mig ni 'dri 'dra dri mu med//mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste//rgyal sras nges pa rnams ni mngon
114a2(dkon brtsegs): par dang //shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ngo bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/stobs de dang ldan pas nu khyu mchog gi gnas su//
114a3(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyis 'che zhing /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de la de
114a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa de bzhini
114a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegasra pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi zag pa thams cad zad pas bdag skye ba ni zad/tshangs par spyod pa la ni bsten par bya ba ni byas/'di las srid pa
114a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mi shes so zhes zag pa med pa/sems rnam par grol ba/rang gi mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas nas/rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
114a7(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'o//nyan thos kyi
114b1(dkon brtsegs): thog pa'i zug pa zad pa ni tshad du byas pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa zad pa ni chad yod pa ste/snying rje chen po dang
114b2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba spobs pa dang bral ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams
114b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par bcom pa/snying rje chen pos kun tu bzung ba//mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa la lta ba//'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa
114b4(dkon brtsegs): ste skad cig cig dang ldan pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/spyod lam
114b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa'i brag chags med do//'di lta s+t+wa~M shA ri'i bu na mkha' yongs su dag pas rdul dang du ba'i 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa de bzhin dushA
114b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so//de zag pa zad
114b7(dkon brtsegs): par mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa/len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to///
115a1(dkon brtsegs): len pa sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir chos dz+nyAnA te/k+She mA sems can+da rnams ni yang dgu pa ma smin pa kun+tha rtag pa las byung ste/zab
115a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang len pa rnams mi spyad pa la phyir yang dag pa ji lta ma bzhin du khyod kyis rab tu rtogs shig ces de dag la de bzhin gshigs pas dpe dang tshul
115a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o//zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes byar 'gyur zhing shes nas kyang chos gang yang
115a4(dkon brtsegs): mi yin te/len pa med par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'ga' ba de lta de lta bur chos ston to//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
115a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi zab pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to//zag pa kun 'byung ba dang /zag pa 'gag pa dang /zag pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa
115a6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhim rlab tu mkhyen te/mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du
115a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med cing /the tshom ma za ba nas ngo mtshar dang chos kyi bar du 'du shis/
115b1(dkon brtsegs): ts+tshad du//'dus chos nyi na 'di yin te/de la 'di/ rgyus //'don pa'i zag pa med pa'i sa dz+nyAsan/rgyurgyun slob mod dudu brgyud med du/
115b2(dkon brtsegs): skyobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na//zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'odi rab tu gsung //nyan thos rnams kyi zlag zad do shas+t+ra ni//bag chags ma
115b3(dkon brtsegs): tshod dang ldan pa yin//mye yi dam pa 'dran bya mchog rib ste//bag chags bcom nyid tshwad dang ldan ma yin//de byizhin rang rgyal byang chub gang reg
115b4(dkon brtsegs): dege snyi rje che dang skabs pa myed//bcon ldan 'das na sa zad pa//snyid rje tshe dang stobs pa tshad med de//sa sa~M d+d+hi s+t+wa~M zag ra
115b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas ni//'gro ba'i zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing //rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas//chos 'di thams cad log par zhugs
115b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te//de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyed nas//chos 'di mi rtag stong pa bdag med chos//dngas ming gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi//sku la rtogs
115b7(dkon brtsegs): shog ltos shes rab tu ston//'di la skyes bu srog dang gang zag dang //shed skyes shing bu byed pa po yang med//chos 'di thams cad log par chags
116a1(dkon brtsegs): pas na//ston pa snying rje bskyed nas thar ston kyang //bde bar gshegs la skyo bu yod med de//yang dag ye shes nams kyang
116a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med//de phyir rgyal ba rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyong /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams rab tu ston//'di ni pha rol smra ba 'joms pa'i stobs//
116a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas na mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste//mgon po stobs bcu de la gnas gyur nas//mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor//shA ri'i bu 'di ni
116a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su seng+ge'i
116a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang dag par skrag ste/'jig rte nAM 'dar dge sbyong ngam/bram zer bar du sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu
116a6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ro//dge slong shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/
116a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mngon par dad /yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do////bam po drug pa//yang
116b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /yid/
116b2(dkon brtsegs): ches/rab tu rtog/som nyi med/the tshom mi za ba nus ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
116b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po 'di dgra ste/mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog
116b4(dkon brtsegs): cing /khyu mchog gri gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bradud dam/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par mi
116b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//bzhi glang zhe na/'di lA shwa ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i dri bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
116b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas/'khror gyi nang du nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus so zhes zhal gyi 'che ba de la lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
116b7(dkon brtsegs): la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes chos dang 'thun par rgol bar mi nus so//de ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag
117a1(dkon brtsegs): par+ya rdzog s+yA pra sangs rgyas shes bya zhe na/de bzhin gla shogs pas tshe sna thams cad mo mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon//
117a2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang //
117a3(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang /mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams gang yin pa drang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos
117a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang /
117a5(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma thos med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas de dag thams cad
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
117a7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o//de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mnyam mo//mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par na nyam mo/
117b1(dkon brtsegs): khams gsu myu 'do nyid kyis sgron pa m+bud pU mAHma ma//skye ba bo nyid kyis myi skyo bya mAHmA mo//mngon par 'du byed bya'i dzab nyid kyis mngon por 'du r+m+ma rA
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mAnyam mo//'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'byung bar mnyam mo//kun gaN+DI'i ngo bo nyid kyis kun gzhi med par mAnyam mo//dus gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ji
117b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du mnyam mo//ma rig pa dang /srid pa dang /sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang rnam par grol bar mnyam mo//'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan las
117b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das par mnyam mo//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
117b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pas 'khor thams cad mgu
117b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pA bskyed pa/'khor thams cad dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' bu dang /
117b7(dkon brtsegs): da po bskyed pa/snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa nyid/mi 'gyur ba nyid/mi 'khrugs pa nyid//
118a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma pa /'jog pa med pa nyid/rtsod pa med pa do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'dzugs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do//
118a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rgyu gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa/'thab pa med pa'o//de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing /chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/phyogs bcu'i dzi
118a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba shes par dka' ba de dag
118a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/snying rje chen po la gnas nas bstan pa sna tshogs dang /rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis sems can gzhan rnams
118a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par rab tu ston te/de'i chos de yang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i phyir 'byung ngo //gang
118a6(dkon brtsegs): skyon pa ma yin la/smyon pa'o zhes khas 'che ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu so zhes khama'i che ba de
118a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non nas/de dag rgyags pa chad de phan tshun du 'bros so//'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
118b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa mtha' yAs mu mod do/'dri lta skyo na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/shA ri'i bu ro bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang mtha' yus mu mad/
118b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
118b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad /yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang /rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do//'di ni mi 'jigs pa
118b4(dkon brtsegs): dang po'o//gzhan yang shA rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas nga zag pa zang zhes
118b5(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyis 'che ste/de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun par rtsod par byed pa mo'o///
118b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni 'di dag ste/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par 'grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag
118b7(dkon brtsegs): chags thams cad bcom mo//srid pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod pa'i bag chag pa thams cad bcom mo//ma rig pa'i rig pa las so/
119a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bas gti mug la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo//lta ba'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa la
119a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom ste/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob gzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o//don dam par na 'phags
119a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'dun na chos gang yongs su shes pa 'am/spang ba 'am/bsgom pa'am/mngon du 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi 'dug go//de
119a4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni nam du yang mi zad pa ma yin no//de ni shin tu zad pa nyid yin gyi/gnyen pos zad pa zhes mi bya ste/de ni ji
119a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du zad pa'o//gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang med do//gang la zad pa gang yang med pa de ni/'dus ma byas pa'o//de la skye ba
119a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'jig pa med pa/gnas med de/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/chos nyid chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid de
119a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so//gang la 'jug pa med cing mi 'jug pa yang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis zag pa dang
119b1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa sbyong ba mi dmigs te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la gnas nas zag pa stong ba'i phyir chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa'o mo 'dzegs pa//
119b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'khor thams cad shes par byed de/'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi lus sdom par byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par bskyed/
119b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/'khor thams cad dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang dad pa bskyed pa/snying rje chen po sbyor ba de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa de kho na de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa
119b4(dkon brtsegs): nyidami 'gyur pa nyid/mi 'khrugs pa nyid/'byung ba med po nyid/'jig pa med pa nyid/rtsod pa med pa nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa/
119b5(dkon brtsegs): la rtso pa gang yang med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o//de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing /chos kyi dbyings ngos
119b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad lnga thogs pa med do//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab/grangs med
119b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyi zag pa spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to//de ltar shA ri'i bu de
120a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs pa'i mtha'
120a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de rnam pa'i mtha' 'dod do zhes pa'i bar du ste/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas
120a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang /yid ches/rab tu rtogs pas ngo mtshor dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shos bskyed do//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
120a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gzhan yang/
120a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams
120a6(dkon brtsegs): la bar du gcod do zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de lnga gong m+b+ha bzhin du sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod par
120a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos ma yino zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o//del bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/'di lta ste bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig
120b1(dkon brtsegs): gtsug ga na na/'do sa b+h+yo bag med pa'i sems so//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba/chos gnyis te/ban+d+ha mi shes pa dang khrol lhod pa'o//byur du gcod par
120b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i chos gsum ste/lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /ngag gis nyes par sbyang ba dang /snyed kyis nyes par spyad pa'o//bar du gcod par 'a gyur
120b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ban+d+he ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'alci ba ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la/'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang zhe steng dang /gti mug
120b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /'jigs byas 'gro bla ma yin par 'gro'o//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i tshe skye sde ste/lha gang zhe na/'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang /ma byin pa de
120b5(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /tshong 'thung ba'o//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/drug gang zhe na/
120b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /bslab pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gtang ba la ma gus pa'o//bar du gcod
120b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun to/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nga rgyal dang /che ba'i nga tshul dang /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /ngo'o snyam pa'i ngargyal dang //
121a1(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i nga rgyal dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad do/bar+m+mang+ga bang
121a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di lta ste log pa'i lta ba dang /log pa'i rnyog pa dang /log pa'i ngag dang /log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /log pa'i 'tsho ba dang /lag po
121a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba dang /log pa'i dran pa dang /log pa'i ting 'dzin to//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag la gnang
121a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang /gnod pa byedado zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang /gnod par byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun nas
121a5(dkon brtsegs): mAnar sems bskyed pa dang /bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas byed de byed par 'gyur ro//zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang /bdag dang
121a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mdza' ba'i don byas so//byed do byed par 'gyuro zhes kun nas man+dar sems bskyed pa'o//bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe
121a7(dkon brtsegs): naH'di lta ste mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yin te/'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yem
121b1(dkon brtsegs): bladung /n+d+ha drA smA b+hU dang /phram dang /dag rtsub blo dang /rgyog d+hA pA dang / ba sam+bas dang /gnad sems dang /log par smra ba/
121b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i tshesang+ge dag gis dmyang ba la rjes smra lta zhing /gnas pa dang /phyin ci log dang
121b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang /'byung ba la kun nas ldang ba dang /srid pa dang /ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zing dang bcas phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang /dag
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gi las dang /yid kyi las dri dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen to//bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
121b5(dkon brtsegs): du ston to//chos pa na ba de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ste/de dag zhi bar bya ba dang /nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /spang por bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
121b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi lhas
121b7(dkon brtsegs): sim par byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa bskyed pa/'khor thams cad dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /ded po bskyed pa dang /snying rje chen pos
122a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba/de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/de kho na nyid/de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa nyid/mi 'gyur ba nyid/mi 'khrug pa nyid/'byung ba med
122a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/'jig pa med pa nyid/rtsod pa med pa nyid/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
122a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rtsod pa med pa/'thab pa med pa'o//de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas ma lus pa thams cad la thogs
122a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med do//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par
122a5(dkon brtsegs): zin pa'i sems kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams zhi bar bya ba dang /spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//de ltar shA rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i me'i rig ba mtha' yas/
122a6(dkon brtsegs): mu med pa nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mI 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod po de na mkhro'i mtha' 'dod pa zhes bya bu'i bar du ste/byang chub sems dpa'
122a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang /yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med/tshim mi za nas ngo mtshar dang
122b1(dkon brtsegs): rmad ts+tsha bar du 'du shes bskyed do//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du
122b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nas zhes bya bo nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pas/sems can rnams gang la brtan pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i
122b4(dkon brtsegs): lam rab tu mkhyen te/de l+le 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed mi nus so//
122b5(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba'i lam gang zhe na/'di lta ste bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ste/gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o//nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis te/
122b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong ngo nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
122b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//nges par 'byung ba'i chos bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang /tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang /sems su gtogs pa'i
123a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang /chos su btogs pa'i dran pa dang /'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos bzhi'o//nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di
123a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos
123a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga'o//nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul
123a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa ste/'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug go/nges par 'byung ba'i chos bdun te/bdun gang
123a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di lta ste dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
123a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rdza dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang
123a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste 'di bdun yang gong mo bzhin no//nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad do/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'phags pa'i lam
123b1(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyud pa'o//'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang ///
123b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin te/'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no//mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes nga'i chos
123b3(dkon brtsegs): dgu ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba dang /shin tu sbyangs pa dang /badre ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes//
123b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /rnam par grol ba ste/'di dgu yang grong ma bzhin no//nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/
123b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo//'di lta ste srog gcod pa spangs pa dang /ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yom
123b6(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa dang /brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang /phra ma spangs pa dang /ngagra rtsub po spangs pa dang /tshig kyal spangs pa dang /brnab sems spangs pa dang /gnod sems
123b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /yang dag par lta ba ste/'di yang gong ma bzhin te/lam de ni nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dge ba
124a1(dkon brtsegs): A/smad gatshul khrims kyu phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ting 'dzin gyi phung ba dang ldan pa 'am/sa kyi po dang ldan pa'o/na bral ba'i phung ba dang ldan pa 'a/
124a2(dkon brtsegs): rnar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o//gzhan yang nges//
124a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba zhes pa ni yang dag par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/gang yang dag par bsgrub pa de la ni chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/'bri ba 'am/blang ba
124a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/dor bya 'am/gzung ba 'am/spang ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yang dag par bsgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/chos
124a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la nges
124a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa 'khor thams cad mgu
124a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa bskyed pa/'khor thams cad dga' ba dang /rab tu dga'
124b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /dad pa bskyed pa/sgying du rgyun bsna sbyor ba/de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/de na nyid/de bzhin nyid/gawAn mu yin pa nyid/mi 'gyur ba nyid
124b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa nyid/'byung ba med pa nyid/'jig pa med pa nyid/rtsod pa med pa nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang
124b3(dkon brtsegs): med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o//de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/'jig
124b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du
124b5(dkon brtsegs): med/dpag tu med/brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab
124b6(dkon brtsegs): tu ston te/de so sor rtog pas sems can dAr 'jug pa rnams de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu
124b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa 'kho
125a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du sang+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'tsho ste/dge sbyod dam/bram zo 'am/lha 'am/bdud
125a2(dkon brtsegs): dA ma tshangs pa 'am sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
125a3(dkon brtsegs): me 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do//'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ya
125a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med do//sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni
125a5(dkon brtsegs): na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas
125a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad /yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med/the tshom mi za/rgya char dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//
125a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//chos kun mnyam po nyid mnyam par/
125b1(dkon brtsegs): rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs//de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas//de bzhin gshes pas mnyam pa gzigs//so so'i skye bo'i chos gang yin//de dag sangs rgyas
125b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang mnyam//slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang //rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang //gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang /gang dag 'jig rten 'das chos dang //
125b3(dkon brtsegs): dge dang mi dge mi g.yo rnams//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra//stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med//smon lam dag ni rnam par spangs//ma skyes mngon par
125b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du mi byed//'di ni mnyam pa nyid du bstan//'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas//thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa//gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba
125b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du yang rab tu ston//'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol//rnam par thar pa rab tu ston//mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa//gnyis pa yang dag rab
125b6(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan//rgyal bas gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa//ma sten par ni rnam par grol mi 'thob//bkru med pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang /gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang //
125b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis su//gang dag sdom pa nam yong yod min dang //'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang //srog gcod pa dang gzhan la 'tshe ba dang //
126a1(dkon brtsegs): /gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang //nga rgyal mi gus de bzhin bdun pa'o//gang dag log par smra ba brgyad pa ste//thams cad rnam par/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i lam rgyud gcod//gang dag mnar sems dgu dang nyis mang dang //mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang //gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi shes pa//de
126a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la ni nam yang thar pa med//byin ci log la zhugs par rig gyur nas//bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags//rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa
126a4(dkon brtsegs): skye//chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyon par bya//gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la//mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur//rgyal ba nyid kyi ma thos thams cad
126a5(dkon brtsegs): rig/du shes nas mi 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do//ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mang yod pa//byang chub phyogs dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la//bsten
126a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thab pa//gnas med par ni stobs bcu rnams kyis bshad//tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po zhi//yang dag chos dge mnyam
126a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med ldan zhing //chos dang chos ma yin la de mi chags//zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg/gsog gsob na mkha' 'dra zhertAl+le ma brla//sgyu mnyi gzugs
126b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra na mkha' lta bu dang //dag chos rnam pa grang gis rab shes pa//de ni srid bu'i mtsho las thar par 'gyur//thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni//'gro ba
126b2(dkon brtsegs): gang mos srid par 'gro ba la/snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de//mi 'jigs bzhi pa na mkha' 'dra ba'o//de ltar shU ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
126b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang //yid ches/rab tu rtag/som nyi med/the tshom mi za ba nAs/na mkha' lta bur
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed de//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
126b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang /yid ches/rab tu rtog/so mi nyi med the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi
126b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad rje su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/
126b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste/mi ldog par rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de yang /ji ltar ngag gis las
127a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba slab ma yin pa de ltar bsnum+ba gyis mi khyab de ltar mtshungs pa med pa/de ltar dpag tu med/
127a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar brjod du med/de ltar mi bzad cing khong du chud par dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa de ltar sems
127a3(dkon brtsegs): can la de bzhin gshegs pas snying rje chen po 'jug ste/byang chub ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po yang de 'dra'o//de bzhin gau shegs byas byang chub ji ltar
127a4(dkon brtsegs): thob ce na/de bzhin gshegs pas rtse bla med pa gnas med pa'i byang chub thob po/de la rtsa ba gang granas grang zhe na/'jig tshogs ni rtse ba'o//
127a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pas kun tu rtog pa ni gnas so//de bzhin gau shigs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de dag mnyam par mkhyen te/de'i
127a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/sems can 'di dag ni rtsa ba med
127a7(dkon brtsegs): po/gnas med par mi shes pa de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams le de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhan yang shA ri
127b1(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang /nye brar zhi ba'o//de ji ltar zhi/ji ltar nye bar zhi zhe na/nang zhi ba'o//phyi rol nye bar zhi ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig ni bdag gam bdag gis//
127b2(dkon brtsegs): stong ste/de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na 'di phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang yid ni bdag drang bdag gis stong ste/de'i rang bzhin
127b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di yin pas na de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o//de mig stong par yongs su shes nas gzugs la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//yid kyi bar du yang stong par yongs su
127b4(dkon brtsegs): shes nas chos la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi zhes bya na sems can 'di dag ni zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba 'di mi shes te/de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la
127b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ji ltar
127b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal zhe na/rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun+da nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste/nam mkha' lta bu'o//na mkha'i rang bzhin no//na mkha' ni rjes su 'byung ba'o//na mtha' dang
127b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal bas na/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams blo
128a1(dkon brtsegs): bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas/de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od bsal/
128a2(dkon brtsegs): ba khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med par byang
128a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de la blang ba med pa gang /dor ba med pa gang zhe na/blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o//dor ba
128a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pas blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa'i chu bo mnyam pa nyid du gzigs /
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang /pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar chos thams cad tshu rol dang pha rol dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon
128a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o//blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud
128a7(dkon brtsegs): pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes/sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang /dmigs
128b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de la mtshan ma med pa gang mi dmigs pa gang yin/mig gis rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma
128b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o//chos
128b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni mi dmigs pa med pa'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu mtshan ma med pa dang /dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//
128b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/glang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo tham
128b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/gang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'odas pa
128b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o//de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang
128b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa rjes su mi rgyug pa dang /da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa ste/de
129a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi rtog/myu 'ongs pa la rlom sems su mi byed/da ltar byung ba la spros par mi///
129a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na/sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o//zhes sems
129a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams lA de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni lus med pa/mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
129a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par ba ba ma yin pa nas yod kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no//'dus ma
129a5(dkon brtsegs): byas shes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa/mi 'jig pa/mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang bral pa 'dus ma byas shes bya'o//'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang
129a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar khong du chud par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang tshes thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ni dngos po med pa'o//gang dngos po med pa de la gnyis su med de/
129a7(dkon brtsegs): lus med pa/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
129b1(dkon brtsegs): snyi rje chen po 'jug go//shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni dbyer med pa'i gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de la dbyer med pa gang zhe na/de la de bzhin nyidan
129b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so//gnas med pa ni dbyer med po'o//chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so//tha dad pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so//g.yo ba med
129b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/dbyer med pa'o//stong pa nyid ni gnas so//dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o//mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so//rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o///
129b4(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa ni gnas so//'jug pa med pa ni dbyer myed pa'o//sems cin med pa ni gnas so//sems can med pa'i rang bzhin ni dbyer med pa'o//
129b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mkha' ni gnas so//mi dmigs pa ni dbyer mod pa'o//mI skye ba ni gnas so//mi 'gag pa ni dbyer med pa'o//'dus ma byas ni gaunas so//rgyu ba
129b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni dbyer med pa'o//byang chub ni gnas so//nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o//mya ngan las 'odas pa ni gnas so//mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer
129b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu dper med pa'i gnas 'di se naM rnaMs kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
130a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ya mamsasamanasam/mas thas mnas sa sa ma ma
130a2(dkon brtsegs): / chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i glu byang chub ni lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sa s+yAHswAte/sems kyis kyang ma yin no//du
130a3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/byed pa mi pa/rtswa dang /shing dang /rdo dang /mig yor lta bu'o//sems ni sgyu ma dang /smig
130a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang /chu zla lta bu ste/gang gis lus dang sems de ltar khong du chud pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o//byang chub ni tha snyad tsam du bzung ba dri ste/byang chub ni
130a5(dkon brtsegs): lus sam/sems sam/chos ma yin pa 'am/yang dag pa'am/yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/bden pa 'am/brdzun pa gang gis stong ba rjod
130a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/byang chub la gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad du
130a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i gnas cung zad kyang med do//ji ltar na mkha' gnas med cing tshig med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang gnas med pa/brjod par bya ba ma yin
130a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tshol ba na chos thams cad tshig med pa ste/chos la tshig med tshig la yang chos medo//de lta bu'i
130b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o//zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i
130b2(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub ni bzung ba med pa/kun gzhi med pa'o//de lo bzung ba med pa gang kun+da gzhi med pa gang zhe na/'di lha ste mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba
130b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//gzugs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o//yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni bzung ba med pa'o//chos mi dmigs
130b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni kun gzhi med pa ste/de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba med pa kun gzhi med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/mig mi 'jim pa dang /gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so//yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin
130b6(dkon brtsegs): ts+tshing chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so//dri rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so//
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar shes she na/sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so//tshor ba dang /'du
131a1(dkon brtsegs): shes dang /'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so//gnas//
131a2(dkon brtsegs): de yang gnas pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes
131a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dag so//stong pa nyid
131a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis byang chub stong pa stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad
131a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas/stong pa nyid dam byang chub
131a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'di ni tshul gcig pa'i ye shes so//de lnga gnyis po gang gis stong pa nyid dang /byang chub gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis gang yang med do//
131a7(dkon brtsegs): chos de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ming med pa/mtshan ma med pa/'jug pa med pa/rab tu rgyu ba med pa/spyod pa med pa'o//gang
131b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags pa dang /'dzin pa dang bral ba'o//don dam par chos gang yang mI dmigs te/stong pa nyid gang yin byad stong pa zhus
131b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//ji ltar na mkha' na mkha' zhes kyang bya la/na mkha' ni brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no//de bzhin du stong pa stong pa zhes kyang bya la stong pa nyid brjod
131b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin no//'di lta ste ming tsamo du tha snyad 'dod pa 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa ste/ming de yang yul na mi gnas phyogs ni mI gnas so//
131b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du/chos ming gi tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i chos de yang yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te//
131b5(dkon brtsegs): d+ha raM de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen to//thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par grol te/bcings pa yang
131b6(dkon brtsegs): med/grol ba yang med na/dre byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khrong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
131b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'jug go//shA ri'i bu byang chub ni na mkha' dang mnyam ste/na mkha' ni mnyam pa yang ma yin mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no//byang chub kyang
132a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa 'du ma yin/mi mnyam pa'ang mA yin tAM/do dzi pUr chos rnams yang dag par yongs smra grub pa med do/mnyam pa 'am/
132a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa yang ma yin mi mnyam pa yang ma yin par
132a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ji ltar chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin/mi mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par
132a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//chos ji snyed pa de dag kyang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so//yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/chos ma byung ba rnams
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang /byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag po med par 'byung /bdag po med par 'jig ste/rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang /'jig par 'gyur
132a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing /'di la 'jug pa'am/ldog pa gang yang med de/lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to//lam bcad pa 'di sems can rnams
132a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du ma chud pas khong du chud lngar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i bu byang chub de ni ji lta ba
132b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi gnas so//byang chub ji ltar gzugs kyang de bzhin nA/de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo //byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
132b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin te/de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo //byang chub ji lta ba bzhini du sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
132b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo //byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam
132b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o//chos rnams kyi btags pa ni ming tsam du
132b5(dkon brtsegs): zad de/de ni phung po'i khams dang /skye mched rnams su btags pa ste/de dag kyang bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par
132b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so//phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bswaM nA/sngon rje lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin te/sngon gyi mtha'
132b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ma skyes/phyi mi'i mthor mi 'pho'o//bar du'ang dben pa ste/de ltar de dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no//gcig ci lta ba bzhin thams cad kyang de bzhin//
133a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams cad ji lta N+Di d+ma de bzhin tu/de lta bu bzhin no gcig gam mang blar mo 'gyur ro// lta ba ban gyi gnas de snyoms can rnams
133a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis khod du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pASh+Ti snying rje chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i bu byang chub ni rnam pa la
133a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa/rnam pa med pa la zhug ste so//de la rnam pa gang rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/shA ri'i b+h+rUM rnam pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o//rnam pa
133a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o//rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so//rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
133a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin to//rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems gzhal ba dang /bgrang ba dang /so sor rtog pa'o//rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal ba la
133a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'das pa'o//gzhal ba las yong dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/gang na rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o//rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gang na 'dus
133a7(dkon brtsegs): byas la so sor rtog pa'o//rnam pa med pa ni 'dus ma byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
133b1(dkon brtsegs): sa khong du ma chud pas do khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rdo chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa
133b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa'o//de la zag pa me pa gong len pa med pa gang zhe na/zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang //
133b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang /ma rig pa'i zags pa dang bral ba dang /lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o//nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni len pa bzhi dang bral
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/'dod pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang /srid pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang /lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang /tshul khrims dang brtol shugs kyi len pa dang bral
133b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//de la nye bar len pa bzhi po de dag thams cad ni ma rig pa snga 'dongs par byas pa dang /sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang /bdag tu mngon par chags
133b6(dkon brtsegs): pas phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched len to//de la de bzhin gshegs pas/bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir bdag rnam par
133b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa mkhyen to//bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med de/de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo //ma rig pa kun nas/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): mi slong bas srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o//gang skye ba med pa de ni nges par gyur pa'o//gang nges par gyur pa de ni nges
134a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don to//gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o//gang don dom pa de gang zag med pa'i don to//gang gang zag med pa'i don de brjod du med pa'i don to//
134a4(dkon brtsegs): gang brjod du med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to//gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to//gang chos kyi don de de bzhin
134a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i don to//de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo //sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
134a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/'di ltar de bzhin nyid du btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo //de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste mtshan ma med pa dang dmigs
134a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//gang gis mtshan ma med pa dang dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams
134b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//zag pa med pa dang len pa myed pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du
134b2(dkon brtsegs): chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa/dri ma med pa/nyon mongs pa med pa'o//
134b3(dkon brtsegs): de la ni dog pa gang dri ma med pa gang /nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o//mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o//smon pa med pa ni nyon mong//
134b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o//mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni dri ma med pa'o//nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//rang bzhin ni/
134b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o//yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o//'od gr-i sAl ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o//ma spros pa ni dri ma med pa'o//
134b6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o//chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med
134b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//go 'byed pa ni dag pa'o//na mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o//na mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o//phyi rol du mi rgyu ba
135a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa'o//phyi dang nang mi dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//phung po yongs su shes bya ni dag pa'o//khams kyi rlung
135a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni dri ma med pa'o//skye mched stong ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//'das pa la zag pa shes pa ni dag pa'o//ma 'ongs pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni dri ma
135a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o//da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste/de ltar dag pa dang /dri ma med pa dang /nyon mongs pa
135a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste zhi ba'i gnas so//gang zhi ba de ni rab tu zhi bya/de ni tsA bar zhi ba ste thub pa zhes bya'o//
135a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na ji ltar na mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no//byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang de bzhin no//chos ji lta bar sems n+dan yang de bzhin
135a6(dkon brtsegs): no//sems can ji lta bar zhing yang de bzhin no//zhing ji lta bar myong na las 'das pa yang de bzhin no//de bas na chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das
135a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mnyam pa zhes bya ste/mthar thug pa'i rnam pas gnyen po med do//gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o//thog ma nas
135b1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa'o//thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar gzugs can drang gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
135b2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas/sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing sems can rnams la dag pa dang /dri ma med pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa
135b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po la 'jug go/de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang /dri ma med pa dang /nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis
135b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/phyis btang bar bya ba med cing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus par thogs pa med do//de ltar shA ri'i bu
135b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni mtha' yas mu med de/glang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje tshon po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//
135b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med the tsam mi za ba
135b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan
136a1(dkon brtsegs): /pan+de ma de'i tshe chog sgyu bcad pa 'ad dag gar+m+ma sa ste//rna bu mod gnas spyod par//s+yA y+YA N+Das kyi sun byang chub rodardza/
136a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar rtogs pa de bzhin du//srog chags rnams n-i bran la rten//nang gi mig ni stong pa ste/phyirol gzugs pade stong pa'o//ni de nye bde nga
136a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/zhi dang nye bar ni bste//sems can khong du ma chud pas//tshig don rtogs nas sems can la//de dag la ni snying
136a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/byang chub rnying bzhin 'od gsal zhing //rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba de//sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas//de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/chos
136a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang //rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin//blang med dor ba med pa yi//sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/sems can 'di dag
136a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pas//de dag la nI snying rje 'jug/mtshan ma med cing dmigs pa med//'phags pa rnams k+Shi spyod yul 'ad//byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin
136a7(dkon brtsegs): pa//sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/gang dag mi mkhas bcings pa yi//so so'i skye bo mi shes pas//de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la
136b1(dkon brtsegs): / na byas rab tu 'jug/rang banan m+b+ha Sh+Ta sa d+ham+b+ha//skyob zad nga pa med//du la ga smra ba yod man te//man+dan ny-i ga sum klas
136b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol//'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin no//byis pas khyong du mi chud pas//de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/tshul 'di gang gis sangs rgyas
136b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/byang chub las kyisde mi rtog ste//sems kyis kyang ni 'tshang mi rgya//lus ni bems po'i rang bzhin te//sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o//lus dang
136b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rang bzhin te//byis pas khong du ma chud pas//tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas//de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/rang byung ba ni byang chub dam
136b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya chen mchog reg ste//shing mchog drung dungu bzhugs nas sems can khams la rnam par garigs//'khor ba'i khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs
136b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phyem gyur pa//de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyis ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug/nga dang chugs pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dri bas gzigs//sdug
136b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing //bdag dang sems can dang ni srog du lta bar chags pa rnams//gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs
137a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas snying rje mi bzad 'jug/sems can khams ni gti mug lang tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun//nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin
137a2(dkon brtsegs): du snang med lam med mi 'gyur ba//de dag gzigs nas ye shes sna ba dri med 'od bya zhes//de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug
137a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan song 'gro bar zhugs shong lam stor rab tu 'khyams pa rnams//sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yid btags rgyu lhung ba//de drag gzigs/
137a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sngon gyi rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bstan ces//de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug/de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du
137a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad ni//na mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te//'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su//
137a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug/de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
137a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad//yid ches rab tu rtog/som nyi med/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed nas/nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo
137b1(dkon brtsegs): nga /dadu 'dun du ga ///da na turang rnamam rgyu chubasas su du smyan dag
137b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes kyis kyi sa mi dus pa la mngon par dang /ying na rab tu rtag panas ma chur rlung rmad kyi bar du 'du gas pa sbyin rje rje ga
137b3(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas kyinasnyam 'dus pa bcu brgyud ba da ga ste/rnam dadag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa byir sminang du sa ya ga par blog nga chog
137b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas sa zhal sa 9/dge sbyong ngam/rnam pa 'a/'a/bdud dam+be/sa gan+da du ces dung leni pa ma bskyed
137b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskor ro//sangs rgyas kyi rgyas ma 'das pa rnyan brgyad gang zhe na/'di la shArI'i bu klung gi phyir lus mi 'phrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/mas pa
137b6(dkon brtsegs): dang tsun pa la byur byud pa ste 'phrul byed basbyin gshegs pa y-i nA du/deni d+hI nA~M/sa nas bcam ldan 'ad rnams ni ma kyi
137b7(dkon brtsegs): bamed po ste/de bzhin gi shegs pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun tu gcigs pa dang /rnam por gzigs pa dang /sprus pa dang / ba da /cho gas
138a1(dkon brtsegs): /sbyar dang /chos gos dang /lhung bzad bsnams pa dang /mngon du gshegs pa dang /slad gshegs pa dang /byon pa dang /bzhud pa dang /
138a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /munal ba dang /grong dang /grong khyer du 'jug pa dang /'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sa la mi reg ste/'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/
138a3(dkon brtsegs): sa las 'byung zhing dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad ma mngon par 'byung ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'joka go/de la grang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i
138a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg naM/de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi
138a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi dag mod kyi/rnam par 'thor rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so//
138a6(dkon brtsegs): sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o//yang shA ri'i
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/mkhas pa chos dang 'thun par rgol byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshugs pa ni dus su smra ba/yang dag par smra bA/bden par smra ba/tshogs su smai bA/ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'o//shin tu nges pa'i tshig go/
138b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go//mi bzlos pa'i tshig go//don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go//skad cig brjod pas sems can thams///
138b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o//yang shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang
138b4(dkon brtsegs): las byis pa 'am/mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pasra rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di la shA ri'i
138b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dri bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing /sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la
138b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o//ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul phra med
138b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to//de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
139a1(dkon brtsegs): ts+tsho grang las dradud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags ma rnyed par 'gyur ba'o ca co de bzhin gshegs pa
139a2(dkon brtsegs): la med do//yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co'am/rjes su ca co'i byin pa med de/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rjes su chags pa dang //
139a3(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/sems can thams cad kyis bkur ba sti byas kyang thos par mi sems/sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang
139a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa med do//de gang las 'gyod pa 'am/rjes su ca tse 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/mthar phyin pa ci'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
139a5(dkon brtsegs): la med de/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs
139a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med par gnas pa ste/nga'i ba med 'dzin pa med len pa med mdu pa thams cang+ga dang bral ba dang /dri'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co medo///
139a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis
139b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsgyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnol ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do//bsam gtan dung
139b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /g.yo ba la
139b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do//so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do//'das pa dang /
139b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang /spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa la kun
139b5(dkon brtsegs): tu nyams pa med do//ji ltar bdag kun tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang /mi 'ongs pa dang /da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de
139b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems can thams cad brjed nges par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag ga ma/bzhengs sam/bzhugs/sam/mnal/
140a1(dkon brtsegs): ta ma/ba shos gsol lam/gsung ngam/cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang rung ste/rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing ting 'dzin zad
140a2(dkon brtsegs): mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par sems//
140a3(dkon brtsegs): can gyi rIs na/sems can gang mnyam par gzhag kyang rung /mnyam par ma gzhag kyang rung ste/su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems lta bar
140a4(dkon brtsegs): nus pa med do//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar tingange 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/'di
140a5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o//gzhan yang shU ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las/sems mi mnyam
140a6(dkon brtsegs): pAr gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/na mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de
140a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do//rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad
140b1(dkon brtsegs): de'adu shes med do//chos kyi dbyings byung med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi sa kyi phyir de bzhin pa/shegs pa la sangs chub kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes medado//
140b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos pa dang phyi'i 'du shes med do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i
140b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can la yang rjes su chags pa med/tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/phan par gyur pa la yang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/gnod/
140b4(dkon brtsegs): pAr gyur pa lnga yang gnod par byed pa med/'dul bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/log par nges pa'i sems can la yang smod pa ma yin
140b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshe sa thams ca dri mnyam par gnas te/de'i phyir dri bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o//ji ltar
140b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/nyid de bzhin du
140b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i ba ting snyoms med do//bsha
141a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir thA nA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang skyom smra ni lam bsgoms pa yin te/lam ni bsgoms pa'i ma yin no//de bzhin
141a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang /tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang /shes rab bsgoms pa yin tAM/shes rab ma bsgoms pa ma yin
141a3(dkon brtsegs): no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni ye shes dang ldan pa yin te/gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms
141a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i rnam par lhung ba ni ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba
141a5(dkon brtsegs): yin la 'phags pa ma yin pa nges par mi 'byung ba ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/sems can la
