141a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gris grub pa ste/gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma yin no//yang shA ri'i bu
141a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba yang ma yin/dma' ba yang ma yin ste/mtho dman med par gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pa/gnyis dang
141b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa dus las lta ba dus las ma yol ba/mi g.yo ba/rlom sems med pa/mA brtags pa/rnam par ma brtags//
141b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma bsgoms pa/bstan du med pa/yang dag po de kho na de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/shA rI'i bu de bzhin
141b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/shA ri
141b4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do//de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/
141b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o//de yang gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do//snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyam
141b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med do//chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa modo//sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do//rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do//byung
141b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams med do//dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gnod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do//de bzhin gshigs/
142a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi ye shes sngon du 'gro ba skye/'dren de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa'o//sems can thams cad
142a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o//gzhan
142a3(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta ste/'dul ba'i sems
142a4(dkon brtsegs): can la yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so//gal tu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sde
142a5(dkon brtsegs): snod nyan pa gang bskal bar nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyi skal
142a6(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi bzhengs so//de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la blta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang /
142a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba 'am//ngag la ba 'am/sems pa
142b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am//de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o//brtson 'grus brnams pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba de
142b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la
142b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags par mdzad de/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
142b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du/rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni bsnyel ba med do
142b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang //
142b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang /de lnga de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel pa med do//
142b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis btang bar bya ba medo//phung po gsum du rnam par gnas
143a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sems can g+hi dbang po la 'jug pa dang /sems can ts+tsha bsam par 'jug pa pa sems kyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas/
143a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa yongs su nyams pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang /bsam par bya ba dang /brtag par bya ba
143a3(dkon brtsegs): med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do//de ji ltar dran pas badrug don gyi
143a4(dkon brtsegs): mi brjod pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/'di ni de bzhin gshe gros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dang ni
143a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin nyams pa med pa'o//gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/chos thams cad ji mnyam pa ma
143a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no//chos thams cad ji lta bu babyin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa tI 'dzin lhas mi nyams she na/de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa
143a7(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo//ting 'dzin gang dang mnyam po de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la bzhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o//
143b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam mo//zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha'ang de dang mnyam mo//
143b2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/gti mug med pa'i mtha'ang de dang mnyamo//'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha'ang de dang mnya mo//'khor//
143b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtha' gang dag mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' de dang mnyamo//mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin
143b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med ces bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mnyam pa nyid las mi nyams pa/yongasu mi nyam so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa
143b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang /lus dang /yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin nI sa'i khams
143b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga mi gnas/chu dang /me dang /rlung gri khams la mi gnas/'drod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/
143b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin nyams pa med//sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed
144a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o//gzhan yang shA
144a2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang mnyam pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/gzhan
144a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dring mi 'jog par shes pa'o//sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o//so so yang dag par rig
144a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o//tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o//tshig gcig la 'jug pas/bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par ston
144a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'o//ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o//thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o//theg pa
144a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o//sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongasu gos pa'i gre pa'o//chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
144a7(dkon brtsegs): stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston par shes pa'o//'di ni shes rob mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas
144b1(dkon brtsegs): mu med zad mi shes pa'o//gang gi phyir de bzhin gshugs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du/sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i
144b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston te/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
144b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rje su 'gro ba'o//
144b4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rgyan khong du chud pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang gnyis su 'dzin pa
144b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ste/sngon gyi mthar yang ma bcings/phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho//da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te//
144b6(dkon brtsegs): mig dang gzugs la gnyisu 'dzin pa las rnam papor grol ba'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang sgra dang /dri dang /lce dang /ro dang /lus dang /reg bya la gnyis
144b7(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol te/mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o//sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas
145a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par/
145a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyus shes bya'o//ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar/de bzhin gshegs pa sem can rnams la chos ston te/shA ri'i bu 'di ni
145a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes
145a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ngo //lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/gsungs pas kyang
145a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dul/cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/bshos gsol bar kyang sems can 'dul/spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul//
145a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang /bltas pa tsam dang /'od gtong po dang //
145a7(dkon brtsegs): gom pa 'dor ba dang /'jog pa dang /grong khyer du 'jug pa dang /'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang
145b1(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang sems tsAn+d+ra 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad yo shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
145b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ngo //shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi/
145b3(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o//khyad
145b4(dkon brtsegs): par lung ston pa'o//shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o//de bzhin gshegs po'i dag de yang kun shes par byed pa rnam par shes par byed pa/mi mtho/mi dma'
145b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ma yau/'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/gya gyu med pa/mi brlang ba/mi rtsub pa/gzing gzing ba ma yin/gnyen pa/yid du 'ong ba ma 'ochal pa/lag log med pa//
145b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshe ba/mi myur ba/rab tu myur ba ma yin pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba/shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu gnyen pa/shin tu snyan pa/dbyangs snyan pa/rab tu gsal
145b7(dkon brtsegs): babasgrags pa/nges pa/'jam pa/phan pa dang bcas pa/dga' ba ro 'gyur ba/mchod par 'gyur ba/mdzes pa/rdul med pa/rdul dang bral ba/tha ba med pa/dri ma med
146a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ma rmongs pa/gsal ba/thogs pa med pa/yang drug par sbyor ba/'od gsal ba/drung gi 'jungs pa ma yin pa/dum bu ma yin pa/
146a2(dkon brtsegs): drig rig po ma yin pa/bde bya bskyed pa/lus sim par byed pa/sems tshim par byed pa/'dod chags zhi bar byed pa/zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/gti mug
146a3(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba/bdud 'joms pa/sdig po sel ba/rgol ba 'dul ba/gro bar byed pa/rnga'i sgra mkhas pa/dga' bar byed pa/kA le ping ka'i sgra dbyangs/dbang
146a4(dkon brtsegs): bopo'i sgra/tshangs pa'i sgra/rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/sprin gyi sgra/sa'i sgra dbyings/khrung khrung gI s+thA/rma bya'i sgra/khu byug gi sgra/shang shang ti'u'i sgra/dang
146a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra skad/ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i sgra//'ong chu dang phyi bang dang /ma khir dzA dang /dung dang /sil snyanA dang /rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra/kun shus par 'gyur ba/
146a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes par 'gyur gzur phyin pa/yid du 'ong ba/mnyan par 'os /zab pa/lkugs shing dag ba/ma yin pa/bde ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
146a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang yi ge mnyams pa/shin tu nges par smra ba/tshig 'bru dang /don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/dus dang ldan pa/tshod dang ldan
146b1(dkon brtsegs): padus las mi 'da' ba/dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/sbyin pas brgyan pa/tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/bzod pa bsgrug
146b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis 'bar bar byas pa/bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/shes rob kyis nges par brtags pa/byams pas shin tu bas gas pa/
146b3(dkon brtsegs): snying rje mi skyo ba/dga' ba'i 'od gsal ba/btang snyoms nges par brtags pa/theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa/dkon mochog gsum gyi rigs mi
146b4(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa/phung po gsum 'jog pa//rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba/bden pa yongasu bsgoms pa ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/mkhas pas ma smad pa/
146b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pas bstod pa/na mkha' tshad med pa'i rje su song ba/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/
146b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
146b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi
147a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/yid kyis ma yin//rnam par shes
147a2(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o//gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang
147a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rje su song ba'o//sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rje su zhugs pa'o//sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa las
147a4(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu dben pa'o//chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o//ting 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o//dmigs pa las shin
147a5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das pa'o//rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o//srid pa gsum gyis 'gro ba sel ba'o//nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o//bdud kyi
147a6(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad las nges por grol ba'o//sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o//ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o//ma rig pa dang /
147a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi mun pa dang ling tog med pa'o//lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongasu bsgoms pa'o//na mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o//chos
147b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/shA ri'i bu de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi la so//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
147b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o//gzhan yang shA rI'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
147b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jug pa'o//ji ltar 'jug ce na 'di la shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
147b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab/
147b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to//de dag na sems
147b6(dkon brtsegs): can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing
147b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyor ro//sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pas brtul ba dang /ji snyed rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas btul ba yang /
148a1(dkon brtsegs): nga na du du swA sa rgyas na m+b+ha byA b+h+yo ba yang rab n+Da sta na t+su//dge slong po 'dun rnam par byA d+ma rgyur
148a2(dkon brtsegs): da rnam bya d+he ba snang sh+tsa d+has sbyinaswA gnas pa rnam pa de skye ba yang ba t+ta m+b+ha te//dazugs nang du rje DI yid rabA tu
148a3(dkon brtsegs): ngas smra ba hU~M ba /sems rkye thams cad kyi 'das pani rna thaM ni hU~M ba dang /skye ba yang de dzin no
148a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po tha dad pa dang spyod pa tha dad pa dang bsam bA tha dang pA yang rab tu mkhyen to//sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/
148a5(dkon brtsegs): sems gang gi 'ad+ma tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams rjed kyang bsrung ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi ye shes dang rjesu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab
148a6(dkon brtsegs): / ga shegs pa satud ba snrums kyi rgyung byung mau migs /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de sgyu ba'i ye shes dang
148a7(dkon brtsegs): gyun to//de bskyod gshegs pa la 'das par brjod ba ni sems kyi thum du dzi de ba ni/da nanas pa rjem chos ma 'dres pa baDU
148b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'o ye shes mthong ba 'jug/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang //
148b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to//bskal pas tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /chus sdud par
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang /rdul
148b4(dkon brtsegs): phru rab ji snyed pa dang /rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /skad ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam
148b5(dkon brtsegs): re re na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /rang sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'/
148b6(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /zas kyi longs spyod dang dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang /'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang /spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab
148b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang /sems can ji snyed theg pa chen po'i rnam par thar par 'gyur
149a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'bya ma ran sems can skye ba'i gnas ji skad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
149a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las 'byung ba skye ba dang /skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thoms cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pos rab tu mkhyen to//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cu
149a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud la bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la tshe ston te/shA ri'i//
149a4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thags pa'i
149a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba 'jug/ji ltar 'jug ce na 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab
149a6(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /de bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu
149a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te//da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen te//da ltar gyi rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi
149b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char blags pa thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyi sa rab tu mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa/
149b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang /'gags pa thams cad kyang babyung ba'i tshul gyis rab tu
149b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyis bsgrub pa bgreng ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i khams thams cad kyang
149b4(dkon brtsegs): sgo'i rtse mo'i tshe shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnams pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi sems can dmyal
149b5(dkon brtsegs): be'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de'i skye bo'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i sems///
149b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//de ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi
149b7(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//
150a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi lha'i sems can+da gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen//
150a2(dkon brtsegs): to//da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ong rab tu mkhyen to//nyon mongs pa dang /
150a3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to//da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to//'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen
150a4(dkon brtsegs): tote//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshugs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med do//gnyisu med pa la
150a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to//shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chosnga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o//shA ri'i bu
150a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du
150a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang /grags pa dang dpal dang /ngo mtshar dang smad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas lha ma me ldan ne
150b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas mu med do//'di lta ste shA ri'i bu na mkha' mthu' yas mu
150b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu med do//gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
150b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
150b4(dkon brtsegs): chos me 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad yid ches/rab tu rtog/som nyi mi byed/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu ste/rangs pa rnyed cing na mkha' lta/
150b5(dkon brtsegs): bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang /rmad du 'du shes bskrad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas don 'di bka' stsal nas ston
150b6(dkon brtsegs): pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo //'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yang med do//lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems mi g.yo//de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos
150b7(dkon brtsegs): ston te//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur te//khong khro rje su chags nas mngon par 'das//nyon mongs med la
151a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing nyon mongs grol//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/'dren pa la ni dran pa sgrol ba med//rnam thar spyod yul chos ni mngon
151a2(dkon brtsegs): par mkhyen//so so yang dag rig pa skyil med de//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi mu 'dres chos//mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs shing ba shos kyang gsol//'chag
151a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par gzhag/g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems
151a4(dkon brtsegs): can la//tha dang 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med//bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//de dag la ni ma
151a5(dkon brtsegs): brtags btang snyoms med//shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas//de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de//da ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//
151a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med//ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing //sems can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres
151a7(dkon brtsegs): chos//nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med//'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas//lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul//de ni rgyal ba
151b1(dkon brtsegs): sa b+hU rna rmas//b+hadUr+b+ba du skyong byed sa ts+tshas byang chub dang // m+b+ha dAn pa rnam par rgyu m-i g+ha//gang nas TIgs pa dadu rtag tu gyud//
151b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sa'i sa/ rnam dar ga meng par//rlung d+hIng dzin la ts+tshiSh+Tan+tu hrIn+ti byung /rgyusgyu rnams pa nu la sbyin sa da /
151b3(dkon brtsegs): do ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres rgyas//mdzin pa'i shes kyis ni rab smyon cing //sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing //de dag la ni bsam bzhin rgyas
151b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshod//'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro/rang rgyu ma gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te//sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang
151b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bsam ma khyag//tshigs las rlob 'das dri med na mkha' bzhin//sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te//sems ni sngon nas bcing bar 'byur ba
151b6(dkon brtsegs): med//ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'das chos/gshegs dang bzhugs dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang //spyod la mu dge na
151b7(dkon brtsegs): ni mig kyang 'jog/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang //mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul brnga ba zhugs//sems can snying phrin mo zhig 'od kyiti /
152a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba mang po bde 'gyur to//'od kyis rnyog pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur//de ni rgyul bya rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//rang byung ba ni//
152a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung cig brjod pas na//sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te//brag che lta bur dri yi gsung yang thos//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi mu 'dres chos
152a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i lngas byas te//bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad med//sems can bsam la ye shes rjes su zhugs//de ni rgyal ba
152a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te//spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med//namakha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas//de ni
152a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//'das pa'i dus na de yi ye shes zhugs//'gro ba sna tshogs rnama'i byed shes pa yi//chos rnams kun la sgrib pa med pa
152a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du//'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang //sems can
152a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang //de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen//ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing //de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang
152b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//de yi sems ni glu yeng bar mi 'gyur te//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//da ltar lam+b+ha gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag/thams cad rgyal bas chags med
152b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen//'dren pa'i spyod yul na mkha' lta bu ste//do ni rgyal ba rnams kyi me 'dres chos//de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa//bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam
152b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab ste//de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' 'dra bar ni//dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa' dad par byed/shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa//
152b4(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad de/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du
152b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che skye/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/su se kyang
152b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//shA ri'i bu de ltar dang pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
152b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dang /yid ches/rab tu rtog/som nyi med byed/the tshom mi za/rgya cher dga' mgu
153a1(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mutshur dang rmad du 'du shes bskyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsum gyis mi khyab pa'i lo'u ste bzhi pa'o///
153a2(dkon brtsegs): bam po brgyad pa/gzhan yang shA rI'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod rig/
153a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te/byang chub
153a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lam yang dag par ston to//de lta bsi na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar drid pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpal
153a5(dkon brtsegs): ni spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du reg/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod
153a6(dkon brtsegs): du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te/byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ltar rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
153a7(dkon brtsegs): na bskal pa grangs med pas kyang ches grangs med pa/yangs pa/tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
153b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jog rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul//
153b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/glang 'di ltar bcas po'i 'jig rten dang //
153b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud du bcas pa dang /tshangs par bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dong bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
153b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/bsgrubs nas gnaso//de tshe ston te tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mur dag ga
153b5(dkon brtsegs): don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzung po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongasu byang ba/yang dag par rab tu ston to//shA ri'i bu de
153b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtswa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi
153b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po byung ste/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha
154a1(dkon brtsegs): stug go/shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo //yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po
154a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa mod pa bde ba lo legs pa dga' ba 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba
154a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig yod do//yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bskrun pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba
154a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/gzugs bzong ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzangs zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang
154a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa zhig byung ste/yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig du bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to//de nas de
154a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos e mtsho gzhonu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
154a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi snod do//e ma'o gzho nu brtson 'grus spyod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do//zhes de de ltar rig nas bskyed mos tshal gyi se ga la ba dang /gzhon nu
154b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus spyod pa ga la bu dror song ste byin nas stong gi bar snang la bzhugs te/gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to//de la byang chub
154b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rje su 'jug pa ste/de ni byibyang
154b3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi lam zhes bya'o//de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems de pa'i ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam du byams pas
154b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byed do//sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na/na mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems kyi khams kyang de tsa mo//gzhonu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par
154b5(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa gang yang med do//gzhonu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do//
154b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste gzho nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzho nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang dpag tu med do//gzhon nu de ltar na mkha'
154b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas pa/sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so//gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams ni chos mang gis/sa'i
155a1(dkon brtsegs): khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams de lha ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzho nu sems can tshad med pa ji tsam
155a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bsten to//gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na shwar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dang /lho dang nub dang /
155a3(dkon brtsegs): byang dang /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang /phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs
155a4(dkon brtsegs): su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag par gzung ste/de la sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar
155a5(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/gzhan yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs
155a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis pa blangs/gzhan yang sems can gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs na/gzhonu yongs
155a7(dkon brtsegs): su brtag pa bzung ste/de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po zad par 'gyur kyang /sems can gyi khams ni che de dang mtha' med de/gzhon nu sems can
155b1(dkon brtsegs): khams de ltar dpag tu med cing do ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do//gzhon de ji snyam du sems/gung
155b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad bzung bar nus sam/gro sol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ma lpags so//bde bar gshegs
155b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags so//gzhonu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni dpag tu med pa yin te
155b4(dkon brtsegs): gzho nu de'i byams pa ni bdag bsrung ba yin/gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/mchog tu gnod sems med/khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba nye
155b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'joms pa rje su chags pa'i kun nus lhung ba dang bral ba/dad pa kun ston pa 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par blta ba/yongasu gdung ba med pa lus dang
155b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang sems bde ba bskyed pa/gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/gshe ba dang
155b7(dkon brtsegs): khros pa la dang ba bskyed po/g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/khong khro
156a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang bral bya/tshul 'tshos pa dang /kha gsag dang /'dod pa dang /gan gas slongs thams cad dang bral ba/rang gi nAdang /
156a2(dkon brtsegs): drung /bkur bsti dang tshig su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/brgya byin dang /tshangs pas phyag byas pa/rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/mkhas pas bstod pa/
156a3(dkon brtsegs): byis pa thams cad rjesu bsrung ba/tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/'dod pa'i khams la mi 'dres pa/thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/theg pa thams cad kyis
156a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par gzung ba/zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad du zil gyis mi non
156a5(dkon brtsegs): pamatshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang pos yang dag pas brgyan pa/dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/byede 'gro dang /mya
156a6(dkon brtsegs): dAn las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ngan song thams cad dang /mi khom pa brgyad las bzlog pa/chos kyi kun dga' la nI dga' zhing mos pa/'dod
156a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang /dbang po dang /rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor
156b1(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/
156b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/bsdam gtan dang /rnam
156b3(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa dang /ti nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug ge'i rtsa ba nyon mongs pa las byung ba sems nges par rtog pa thos pa 'dzin pas shes rab kyi rgyu bskyed pa'i byams
156b4(dkon brtsegs): pha bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs spel ba/'grogs na bde ba/ldang ba dang slong ba dang 'dug pa dang /nya l-i ba'i
156b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam bsrung bar byed pa/rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/dri zhim pos byugs pa/khrel yod pa dang /ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa/mi
156b6(dkon brtsegs): bam pa dang nyon mongs pa dang dran 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa dang /'bro ba thams cad skyong ba'i byams pa chen po bdag gi bde ba btang ba/sems can
156b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/gzhon nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can thams
157a1(dkon brtsegs): cad la skyob pa'o//yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyod pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o//
157a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa lo zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams
157a3(dkon brtsegs): po ni dmigs pa med pa'o//gzho nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de
157a4(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do//de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zho na/gzhon
157a5(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o//'di lta ste dper na gzhonu
157a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o//gzho nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa'i byang chub sems
157a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o//'di lta ste dper na gzhon 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo
157b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che yin no//gzhonu de bzhin du byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'phro ba ni snying rje chen po yin te/snying
157b2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de yang sems can thams tsong rje su mi gtong ba'o//gzho nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ci na/
157b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur pa rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can dag mthong na/de dag gi/
157b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lto bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos stan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/gzhan yang gzhonu byang
157b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phani ci log gi gnus la gnas te/mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde bar
157b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang /bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na de dag gi yang dag pa me yin pa'i phyin
157b7(dkon brtsegs): ci log spang ba'i phyir chos stan to//zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpe'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//gzhan yang gzho nu byang chub sems dpa
158a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dgra ma la yang g.yem pa dang /sring mo la g.yem par mthong na byang byung
158a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa ste/mu cor smra bas yongasu gang zhing
158a3(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo //'di ltar mi rum ma'i mngal gyi nang na 'dug ste/de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa
158a4(dkon brtsegs): bsten par byed pa lta ga la srid/mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang lhan cig 'du zhing 'khrig par byed pa lta ga la sri de/kye ma'o//
158a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag ni brlag go/rnam par brlag go/rab tu brlag go/'dod tshugs kyis g.yen skye'o//zhe sdang gris ga yin spyo'o//gti mug gis//
158a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yen spyi'o//mi shes pas g.yin spro'o//chos las nyams shing ches ma yin pa la gnas so//mi mthun pA'i ts+tsha sA la ra ba tu spyod do//sems
158a7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba la spyod yul pa'o//dud 'gro'i skye gnas spyod yul pa'o//gshin rje'i 'jig rten spyod yul pa'o//log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o//
158b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyum+b+ha mo//gzhon nu 'di lta ste dpor na wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yungs chen po dang nyo ba zhog na mtshan ma khyis gtses nas g.yangs chen po nas lhung du da bzhin du
158b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu sems can 'di drug kyang wa dad 'drang//gzhon 'di lta ste dper na dmus long khyis gats+tsha sa~M nA ga yang sna chen po dang nye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du
158b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'o gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o//gzhon 'di lta ste dper nu phrag gi mI gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba la spyod yul ba ste/gzhin
158b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'o//de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phrag dang 'dra ste/de nyid ma yin/de nyid sring mo yin na/de chung mar bya ba lte ga lnga sred snyam ste/sems can
158b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas g.yin stsol dang /bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang /bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang /'dod pa'i 'dam bu bying ba de dag gi
158b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstun to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chu
158b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sgrib pa lngas po sgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na skye mched drug la chags shing zhe na/mig gis gzugs mthong
159a1(dkon brtsegs): na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtag su 'dzin pa dang /rna bas+yAs+thA/s+thAs+yA dr-i/sa ra/lus kyis rlab pa la rAg+hA nas/mtshan
159a2(dkon brtsegs): mar 'dzin cing mngon rtag su 'dzin par 'gyur te/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khong khro meng zhing pha ni tshun mi mdza' ste/de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza'
159a3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang mi shes gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod de//kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/zhen cing
159a4(dkon brtsegs): glen pa mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khyab so shing mi dge ba'o//kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni mgyod pas kun nas bskor ba ste blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas/
159a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'o//kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/de dag
159a6(dkon brtsegs): gi sgrib pa thams cad sbyang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhon nu gzhan yang
159a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis nan pa che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non po nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis nan pa/nga'o snyam pa'i nga byab gyis
159b1(dkon brtsegs): non pa/mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/dma' ba las bdag mtho bar sems pa
159b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa khong du ma
159b3(dkon brtsegs): chud par khong du chud snyam du shes pa/gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/rgan pa dang /gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa
159b4(dkon brtsegs): bla me la rim gro mi byed pa/mkhas pa la dge ba gang /mi dge ba grang /bsten par bya ba gong /bsten par mi bya ba gang /bya ba gang mi bya ba gang /kha na ma tho ba
159b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa gang /kha na ma tho ba med pa gang /lam gang /ting nge 'dzin gang rnam pa ro grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang /bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo//bdag ni mchog
159b6(dkon brtsegs): gro snyam du rlom semasu byed pa mthong na 'di ltar nga rgyal gyis rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje
159b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jug go//gauzho nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas srid pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/sred pas 'khol ba/chung ma dang /bu pheM dang /bu mos zin pa
160a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod pas zin pa/don med pas zin pa 'khor ba'i gtan pas zin pa/sems can dmyal ma dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje 'jig rten
160a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam gyis zin pa sred pa'i bcing bas zin pa/rabatam med pa/rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/4de dag rang nyam dang /rang dbang dang /gang du dga' bar 'gro ba
160a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan te zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub
160a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dong bral ba/sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi dge ba'i lam la chags pa la 'di lta ste srog
160a5(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa dang /brnab sems dang
160a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsgru ba dang /mi dge ba'o lam las bzlog pa dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
160a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bzung ste spyod par bya ba'i chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub
160b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas gte sug gis bsgribs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nAg gri ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/bdag dang sems can dang /srog dang /skye ba po dang /
160b2(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes grwa dang /shed bu dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i
160b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong na de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyong zhing lta bar gyur pa thaMd spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub
160b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhonu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/de dag phung po lnga'i
160b5(dkon brtsegs): gshed ma las rab tu thar par bya ba dang /'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu 'da' ba dang /khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhe sems
160b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/gzhonu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa rtso mun+da dza dang /bal ba
160b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bur mi dang po/drang ba ltar 'chos pa/'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba 'gro
161a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa mya ngan lus 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos
161a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub semasong pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//gzhonu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams mthong na/rnam pa
161a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go/bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen pa de yang g.yo ba med par 'jug go/lhag pa'i bsam pa
161a4(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go/lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang po bcos ma ma yin par
161a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go//sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir/de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go//'di lta ste sems
161a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la 'dud pa dang /phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtang bar 'jug go//'di lta ste bdag gi
161a7(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rje su bsrung bar 'jug go/'di lta ste g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba/
161b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i spyod rje chen bye de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug ga/'du lta skye pha rol la bye ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i sbyong/
161b2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba btong bar 'jug go//brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yong sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer
161b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug ste/gzhonu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go/gzhon 'di ltar gang la lnga theg pa chen
161b4(dkon brtsegs): pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur po de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//sbyin pa byed pa dang /tshul khrims byed pa dang //
161b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa byed pa dang /brtson 'grus byed pa dang /bsam gtan byed pa dang /shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//dran pa nye
161b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag par byed pa dang /yang dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o//dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yon lag dang /lam dang /mchog tu dga'
161b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i las dang /mthar gyis snyems par 'jog pa dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /tshig de dag thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o//snying rje chen po ni rang
162a1(dkon brtsegs): byung gi ye shes bsgrub par byed pas na/de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//rang gi bya ba dang /logs par byed pa bya ba dang /
162a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang /sem sa can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste de'i snying rje chen po de yong sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bo bzhin du yongasu//
162a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de
162a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas sems can 'di 'dre ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na/de dag la snying brtse ba dang /snying rje'i sems bskyed do//de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga'
162a5(dkon brtsegs): ba gang zhe na/gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang rjesu dran pa dang dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /dge ba'i chos le mi zhum pa dang /mi
162a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gong ba dang /yongasu mi skyo ba dang /mi dga' ba thams cadra spong ba dang /chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang /sems 'ab tu dga' ba dang /lus
162a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu tshim pa dang /blo rab tu dga' ba dang /yid rab tu mgu ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang /mtshan dang
162b1(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang /chos nyan pas yong su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang /chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang //
162b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba chos la mgu ba dang /sems can la khong khro ba med pa dang /byang chub la dga' ba dang /chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang /nyi tshe ba'i theg pa sel
162b3(dkon brtsegs): pabar sems bskyed pa dang /ser sna tshar gcod pa dang /slong ba la dga' ba dang /gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang /tshul khrims 'tshal ba dag sdud cing byams pa
162b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang /bdag gi tshul khrims yongasu dag lnga sa ngan 'gro dang 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu dga' bar dbugs 'byin
162b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu dga' ba dang /pha rol ngan du zer ba dang /ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /mgo btsod
162b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bzod par nus te/sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang /rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang /rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang
162b7(dkon brtsegs): khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /kha bsag dang /gzhogs slongs med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang /snying po dang ldan
163a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'jug pa rab tu dga' ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du ngangs pa dang /chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa dang //
163a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du phangs pa dang /bla ma l-I pha ma bzhin du phangs pa dang /sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du phangs pa dang /slob
163a3(dkon brtsegs): dpon la mig bzhin du phangs pa dang /nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang /rkang pa bzhin du
163a4(dkon brtsegs): pangs pa dang /chos sla ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phrangs pa dang /chos yongasu tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs pa dang /bskul zhing dran par byed//
163a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par sems pa'o//gzhonu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' pa de la rab tu gnas
163a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/rtag tu chos tshal ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod pa la mi skyo'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms
163a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/rnam gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste nyon mongs pa la bting snyoms pa dang /bdag dang gzhan rjesu bsrung ba'i btang
163b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang /dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o//de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/gang bkur bsti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa
163b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /bkur bsti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang /rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang /ma rnyen pas yid mi 'chad pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang //
163b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'tshal po la blo mnyam pa dang /grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang /ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang /smad pa la yid smod pa dang /bstod pa
163b4(dkon brtsegs): le chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang /sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang /bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang /rje su chags pa 'dor ba dang
163b5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba spong ba dang /mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang /legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la gnyi su mi byed pa dang /sdug pa dang mi
163b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa la mi lta ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dong /mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang /ston par smra ba dang /mi snyan
163b7(dkon brtsegs): po basmra ba la rje su chags pa dang /khong khro ba med pa dang /kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongasu 'jal ba dang /bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa
164a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang /lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang /bsngags pa dang mi bsngags pa la
164a2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid mnyam pa dang /bden pa dang /mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongasu dag pa ste/gzhonu 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang
164a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no//de la bdag dang gzhan rje su srung ba'i btang snyoms grang zhe na/gang yan lag dang /nying lag gi shau ra
164a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no//yan lag dang /nying lagaM gi shwe pa cad kyang 'dod pa med cing /tshol ba med de/btang snyoms pa yin no//
164a5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyang mi 'gyur/drag kyang mi 'gyur te/gnyis ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o//mig gi rnam pas ma yin/gzugs kyi rnam
164a6(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin te/gnyis kas kyang rgyu mi phyin pa nas yid kyis rnam pa dang /chos kyi rnam pa'i bor gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o//
164a7(dkon brtsegs): rma mi phyin cing snad pa med pas de'i phyir bting snyoms shes bya'o//rma phyung ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o//bdag dang pa
164b1(dkon brtsegs): ral ga n+d+hasta ka las bzod pa snga dI'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o//phan par byed pa dang /phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par spyad pas de'i phyir btang snyoms
164b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa sgyur byed pa'o//btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtag pa'o//btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog
164b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//rdza btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po ste/sangs
164b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub
164b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtag tu 'bad bar bya'o//rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba yongasu btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/dus dus su bting snyoms bsgom par
164b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang /bsnyen bkur mi
164b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang ma smad pa dang ma grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs
165a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang /sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms bya dang /tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa
165a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang /bzod pa'i dus ni sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /brtson 'grus nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes
165a3(dkon brtsegs): su 'jug pa btang snyoms pa dang /bsam gtan gyi dus ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la
165a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/'di ni dus du su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o//de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms zhes bya ste/de la
165a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la btang snyoms byed//gzhon nu 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can
165a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la byams pa dang /snying rje dang dga' ba dang /btang snyoms zhes bya'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des
165a7(dkon brtsegs): gzho nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang /snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang bcas rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te/rgya cher yang dag par
165b1(dkon brtsegs): /nanon du brtson 'bras da du du nas tu ma na ston pal 'dun 'grus pa rnams par gyu //blams d+hA s+yA dru dag dung btang snyoms kyi
165b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga par//de la shA ri'i bu pa rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/shA ri 'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/gang pha ro tu
165b3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa drug po de dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi
165b4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
165b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so//de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpo'i ni dge sbyong dang bram ze dang pongs po rnams
165b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyi bdan min te/'di sa ste zas kyis dngas pa l-I zas/sgrom gyis byings pa la snyam/bzhin pa dang /gise dang sgros dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gnas dang /
165b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /na ba'i gcis smr-in dang /mar me dang /sil spyan dang /dran pa dang bran ma dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu ga dang /bai d+yAd+yA dang /dring dang /man shel dang /khyir
166a1(dkon brtsegs): dang \u0f7frin po che thams cad dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing d+hA dang /bskyed mos tshul dang /dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /bu dang /bu ma
166a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rdza chung ma dang /nor dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /bang ba dang /gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang /rtse ba dang /dga' ba thams cad
166a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldeg pa dang /rkang pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /mig dang /mgo dang /shaM dang /khrag dang /rked dang /rus pa dang /'jig rten gyi yo byed gang yang spyong ba
166a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong ba med do//sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag pas sbyin par byed de/bcu gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo mi mthun pa'i longs
166a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin po med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs
166a6(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag nas sbyin pa mod/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btang ba la mgon du gnyer po'i sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
166a7(dkon brtsegs): gdong du blta zhing sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can tha dad par sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med//
166b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdung bas sbyin pa myed/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing tshol zhing smyon pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams
166b2(dkon brtsegs): cod la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyes shing sbyin pa mau de/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa dro bcu sa yongasu dag par sbyin par byed do//gzhan
166b3(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dri gzhan rnam pa bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed de/bcu gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpo'i rnamastso la las kyi rnam
166b4(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin po me/byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa yongasu skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/byang
166b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nu sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rje su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i
166b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa mid/tshul khrims 'chal pa la bskos te sbyin pa med/byang chub sems
166b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongasasu dag par sbyin par byed do//gzhan
167a1(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcu sna yongasu dag par sbyin par byed do//bcu gang nA na/byang chub soms dpa' na/
167a2(dkon brtsegs): la smad nas sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga gzhan du phyogs nas smyon pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs pa med cing sbyin pa medang
167a3(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang phrag dog dang gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ri mor mi byed par sbyin po med/rang gi lag nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ji tsam du spags pa las dbri
167a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med/shA ri'i bu byang chub sem dpa' sbyin pa de rnam po de banus yongasu dag par sbyin par bye'o//
167a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed de/bcu gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa
167a6(dkon brtsegs): mi brtan par sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/yongasu chod par sbyin pa med/gzhan gyi dring 'jog skye sbyin pa med//
167a7(dkon brtsegs): nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/gzugs dang longs spyod dang /dbang phyug lo mngon par dga' bri skyed pa med /byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin dang tshangs
167b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rlung sangs rgyas kyi sngar bsngo zhing sbyin pa myed/byang
167b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med/shA ri'i bu
167b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rnam pa de bcus yongs dag por sbyin par byed do//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus
167b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag par sbyin par byed/bcu gang zhe na/ji tsam du 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang /'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/shA ri'i bu
167b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na/bza' ba byin nas tshe dang spobs po dang bde ba dang stobos dang kha dog phun sum
167b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs pa rab tu 'thob po/btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang sred pa thams cad gsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo//gzhon pa byin pa pa byed pa
167b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//bgo ba byin pas khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang gser ltar kha dog yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs
168a1(dkon brtsegs): bya rab tu 'thob bo//spos dang phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang thos pa dang tIng 'dzin gyi dri dang byug pa phun sum tshugs pa rab tu 'thob po//
168a2(dkon brtsegs): dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang phye ma dang byug pa byin pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//re byin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog
168a3(dkon brtsegs): ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshigs pa rab tu 'thob po//gnas byon pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dong rten dang gling dang skyabs dang
168a4(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//nad pa la sman byin pas mi rga sa ma 'chi shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogasu pa
168a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob po//yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/shA ri'i bu
168a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin no sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dgra yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shrI ra'i bu byung
168a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu 'a thob bo//ba ni gang zhe na/'di lta ste mar sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongasu dag pa phun
168b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//sil snyan byin pas lha'i rna ba yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai b+h+yaH
168b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /dung dang man shel dang /byi ru dang /rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab
168b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'thob po//rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang me tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo//
168b4(dkon brtsegs): rta dang glang po che dang /shing rta byin pas rgyas pa dang yangs pa dang che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//skyed mos tshal dang dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin
168b5(dkon brtsegs): pas bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /tingange 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//nor dang
168b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bru dang /mdzad dang /bang ba byin pas chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//dran po dang /bran mo dang /las
168b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i mi byin pas rang nyam dang /rang dbang dang rang byung gi ye shes yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//bu pho dang bu mo byin pas mdza' ba dang /
169a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa dang /'dod pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//gling bzhi'i
169a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
169a3(dkon brtsegs): pA rab tu 'thob ste/shA ri'i bu phan yon rnam pa bcu po de dag yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar
169a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin na phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo//bcu gang zhe na/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang /ti nge 'dzin dang /shes rab
169a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//dgra' ba'i rtse mo thams
169a6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pas/dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang /rtse ba yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//rkang pa byin pa chos kyi don gyi
169a7(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//lag pa byin pas sems can thams ca la chos kyi lag pa
169b1(dkon brtsegs): /rab du byin pa yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo//rna ba dang sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa//
169b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob po//yan lag drang nying lag byin pas khaM na ma tho ba med cing /mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum/
169b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgribris pa yong su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//
169b4(dkon brtsegs): sha dang khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang srog gi snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa phun sum tshogs
169b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu 'thob po//rkang pa byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus 'thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po//yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin
169b6(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi mchog bla na med cing ltag na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud po ye /
169b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na/'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas
170a1(dkon brtsegs): /hU~M chos yongasu rdzogs pa'i phan yon dag yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro//shA ril bu byang chub sems dpal mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang //
170a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dud pa/bdud rtsi 'dod/snying po 'dod/byang chub 'dod de/yang
170a3(dkon brtsegs): shA rI'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na 'jig
170a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi bde bro thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba gang yang med do//'di lta ste/shA ri'i bu khyim bdag tshun pa zhing skam la gnas nas pa glang dang /gnam
170a5(dkon brtsegs): sdod pa ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te/swa bon btab na rnam grangs 'dris gau shol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang dngul yang 'grub po//dngos
170a6(dkon brtsegs): pi sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'bru dang /mtshungs pa'i nor med do//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di
170a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do//
170b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste shA ri'i bla bas nI rtswa zlum po dang gshor ba zos pa dang /chu grang mo dang dron mo 'thungs pa de las lo ma 'grub ste/zho dang mar gsar dang mar gyi snying po yang /
170b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub po//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/'jig rten gyi zang zing
170b3(dkon brtsegs): byin na de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongasu 'grub po//brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang 'grub po//gnas de gsum yongasu grub nas byang chub sems
170b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa bcu yongasu 'grub po//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongasu 'grub po//las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
170b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongasu 'grub po//las stong gis 'grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu 'grub po//las brgyas
170b6(dkon brtsegs): grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongasu 'grub po//las nyis brgyas grub pa'i gtsug ter spyi bor 'grub po//rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongasu rdzogs pa'i
170b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub po//rnam par bya ba dang yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba dang thags bzang po phrag medapa
171a1(dkon brtsegs): /snyoms shid dkar ba yang yungasu 'grub ste/deltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gu shegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par
171a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pas mngon par 'grub bo//yang shA ri'i bu gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas
171a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/ti nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
171a4(dkon brtsegs): bya spu'i bu ga re re nas ting 'dzin brgya gang grwa'i rgyuni ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang
171a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'o//shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'jig rten gyi
171a6(dkon brtsegs): zang zing gi sbyin pas yongasu gzung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang /byang chub 'dod pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa
171a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ni/'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do//shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zong zing la gnas
171b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar rig par gyis shig shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskul pa grangs med/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu grangs med pa/tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'chos mos shes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skye bu 'dul ba'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams/
171b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo //yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'tshos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag
171b5(dkon brtsegs): bcur gyur to//yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni dgra bcom pa nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas
171b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/dgra bcom pa sha steg gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //shA ri'i bu de'i tshe za ga pa zhes bya ba thags
171b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thag pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/de de bzhin gshegs pa 'ches mos gang na bzhugs
172a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa phyogs dro nas ha cang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do//de nyin par las byas nAs nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag tu dus
172a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ris kyi kha tshar gcig 'dul zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
172a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'dras bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das la ras kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang
172a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te/des
172a5(dkon brtsegs): bskul pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyalnga po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo //de dge
172a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba ngo nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo //dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba dang po pi las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag ste
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas te/des thams cad la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
172b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang /bu dan dang /gos dang /zhal zas dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad kyis bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas nas
172b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod do//de phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya
172b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bye ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du ste/de lo//
172b4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so//de'i dgra bcom pa bya ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi
172b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son bI bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
172b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la bkod do//des chos bstan te/sems can grangs med dpag tu me pa'i don byas nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das so//der bcom ldan 'das
172b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so//de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu ngad yongasu mya
173a1(dkon brtsegs): dran las 'da' bar 'gyur bu bzhin no//shU rI'i ru rAs kyi myur phul ba dang /sems bsgru pas byung mthar gyis
173a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/shA ri'i bu sems ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no//shA ri'i byA gal tA sbyin po tshu la sems kyis ma
173a3(dkon brtsegs): yin na no//sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongasu ma sbyangaso//shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te
173a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu thob par 'gyur ba la ltos/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung yang mang por byed do//ye shes kyi stobs kyis
173a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag par byed do//shes rab kyi skyobs kyis rgyas par byed do//bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drin de nyid
173a6(dkon brtsegs): rje cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so//gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed//long sa spyod mtho ris 'dod
173a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin gyi//bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir//de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyuraro//grogs dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang /
173b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yog dang badro ba nam yang myi 'dod cing //'chi 'pho skye ba kun gyi mi 'dod do//de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen pod 'gyur//zas dang skom dang chos gos gang byin
173b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te//sbyin pas 'tshe ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir//des ni sgyu rtse tsam yang sbyin pa byin//'char ba med cing khengs po med
173b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong //de dag le lo nam yang yod min te//de ltar de dag 'jog rten pan+d+ha phyir spro//rgyal po'i srid dang
