173b4(dkon brtsegs): nor dang 'bru srog gtong //de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te//byin nas dga' ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur//sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed mi dka'
173b5(dkon brtsegs): pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar//slob dang 'jig rten kun lnga de bzhin te//gang gis byang chub mchog spyod spyad pa rnams//sbyin tshwa rtag tu phrag dog med par//
173b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de dag mthong nus mi khro ste//ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra//mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza' zhing //skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med bzhin//de la
173b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gang yod pa//slong ba la ni srid pa med//ches 'dod pa ni rtog 'gyur te//rgyal srod 'dod par mi 'gyur ro//'byung bar rtag tu smra byed cing //chos kyi
174a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed//'dod la brkam pa ma gtogaswA par//su zhig rgyal spyod 'dod par 'gyur//'dod pa'i rgyal srad mi//
174a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing //mtho ris bde ba 'dod ma yin//sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing //grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin//bdag dung nor mdzes gzhan
174a3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang //mang po myur du gtong ba ni//de dag byang chub dam pa mchog/nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro//mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de/longs
174a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin//mtho rIs dag kyang de mi 'dod//mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin//lam shes lam la mkhas pa gang //gang dag bshes
174a5(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ba la//brtan pa dag tu mi byed de//srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur//shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
174a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin phyi'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste//de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug
174a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o////bam po dgu pa//de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang
174b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di gsum ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis legs par
174b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ste/gsum gang zhe na/lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang /ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /yid kyisi legs par spyod pa'o//de la lus kyis
174b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par de nas spyod pa grang zhe na/'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gtsang pa spangs pa yin/ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/'dod pas ldog
174b4(dkon brtsegs): bar g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/'di ni lus kyis legs par spong ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gardzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/
174b5(dkon brtsegs): phra ma dang /ngagra rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni
174b6(dkon brtsegs): brnab sems med/gnod sems med cing yang dag par lta ba yin te/'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o//de 'di snyam du sems te lus kyi legs par
174b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang /ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang /yid kyi legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo//de yang 'di snyam du sems te lus kyi las gang srog gcod pa
175a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yem par ma byas pa de ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes byas snyamo//de la ngag gi
175a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par spod pa gang zhe na/de 'di snyam du sems te ngag gi las gang brdzun du smra pa dang /phra ma dang /ngag rtsu ba mo dang /tshig kyal pa ma smras pa de ni dag
175a3(dkon brtsegs): gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo//de la yid kyis legs par sprod pa gang zhe na/de la 'di snyam du sems te yid kyi las gang brnam sems
175a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyamo//de 'di ltar tshul bzhin so sor rtog ste
175a5(dkon brtsegs): las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang /las gang dag dang yid kyis mA byas pa de ci gdags par nus som/de 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis rtog pa ni 'di snyam du
175a6(dkon brtsegs): sems te la sna gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang /lasa? gang dag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de/sngon po 'am/ser po 'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/leb rgan
175a7(dkon brtsegs): nam shel gyi kha dog du gdags par mi nus te/mig gis shes par bya ba ma yin te/rna bas shes par bya ba ma yin/snas shes par bya ba ma yin/lces
175b1(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin/lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/bskyed pa ma yin/
175b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba mo yin/zin pa ma yin te/de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no//de 'di snyam du sems te tshul khrims de ni gong mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//
175b3(dkon brtsegs): gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de la gdags pa gang yang medado//gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o snyam nas/de 'di ltar legs par spyad
175b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo //gang gi tshul khrims de dang /tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo //de de ltar mo nga
175b5(dkon brtsegs): bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis tshul khrims sam/'chal ba'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo //de de ltar mthong bas
175b6(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang /cho ga dang /spyod pa dang /spyod yul shes bzhin du spong par 'gyur te/shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//de bdag du
175b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs shing mi sbyong /pha rol tu dmigs shing mi spyod de/de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no//bdog tu dmigs na tshul
176a1(dkon brtsegs): /khyim su dmigs par 'gyur gyi/glang bdog tu mi dmigs pa dran tshul khrims su mi dmigs so//gang tshul khrimasu mo dmigasu pa de ni bsgrub
176a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams par mi byed do//gang bskyab pa nyams par mi byed pa de tshul khrims nyams par mi byed de/tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin to//de ci'i phyir mchag
176a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin ce na/des gzhan lngas chos thams cad shes so//gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag med do//gang bdag med pa la ci zhig yongasu gzung por bya/
176a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//lus kyis dag cing dag gis dag pa dang /yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod po dag
176a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa//de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan//shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di//gdong dgra bsrung ba
176a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems draba' mkhas//lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas//de ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya//gang dag ma byas ma bskyed mi yin pa/
176a7(dkon brtsegs): dol khe dog med cing dbyibs kyang med//gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa//de la gdags pa nam yang mi dmigs so//rtag tu tshub khrims ma byas 'dus ma
176b1(dkon brtsegs): byas/ngani mog gos blta bar mi nus te/rna bstu dang lho ye shes ma yin//lus dang yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/gang du dbang pos shes par mi nus pa//da/
176b2(dkon brtsegs): lho snying rje 'jug par mus ma yin//de ltang tshul khrims yongs dag mthong ba de//nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi granas so//tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis
176b3(dkon brtsegs): mi snyoms shing //bdag tu 'dzin pa tshul khrims mi bsrung ste//tshul khrims bsrung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med//de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyang pa spyod//'jig
176b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la ni lta ba gang sel ba//de ni lta ba nam yang mi 'gyur ro//gang la lta med de la gnas med//tshul khrims 'tshal dang tshul khrims de mi snyoms//chos kyi tshul
176b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa kun bsrung ba//de yi cho ga bsam du med par 'gyur//rab tu 'byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni//tshul khrims ldan de gzhan la rtsod mi byed//bdag med 'du she
176b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims mi dmigs te//bdag med de la tshul khrims dmigs pa med//bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa//rtag tu 'jig pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad
176b7(dkon brtsegs): do//bdag med smra ba'i tshul khrims mi sems de//bdag med smra ba tshul khrims gnas ma yin//bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te//bdag med smra ba tshul
177a1(dkon brtsegs): zhems ldam san//tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims sbyin med pa//bdan na tshul khrims ldan nas mi snad //gang la bdag snod rnam
177a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'du shes med//shes rab zab mo byang chub skyed pa spyod//'jigs med gang dag tshul khrims 'di 'dra ba//nam yang tshul khrims 'chal bar de mi 'gyur/
177a3(dkon brtsegs): them cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa//de yi tshul khrims ngo ni 'phags pas bsngags//byis pas gang dag bdag du lta gnas te//bdag ni tshul khrim nas brim
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bsrung zhing //bsrungs kyang tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de//ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi thar to//gang dag bdag tu lci ba kun spangs pa//de ni dri dang nga zhes bya mi
177a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung //tshul khrims ldan pa de la lta med pa//de ni phyir yang log ltung mi 'jigs so//'di 'dra ba yi tshul khrims gang shes pa//de la 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims lta
177a6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus//srid pa gsum na de bdag mi mthong na//khrims dang tshul 'i rgyal mthong 'gyur smos ci dgos//shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims pyod pa'i byang chub sems
177a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i bsam be chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na/dang pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang //brtson 'grus kyi bsam blo 'dus por 'gyur ba dang /
177b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dun pa dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya chen po la dad pa dang /'brags pa la ldang ba byed pa dang /bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang /slob dpon la bya snyen bkur
177b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /chos tshol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang /byang chub yongasu tshol zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byed pa ste/shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub
177b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu po de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro//de chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas nas dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub po//dge
177b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gang zhe na/'di lta ste legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid do//lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o//legs par spyod pa gsum po de
177b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i tshe byang chub gang dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kye rnam grangs
177b6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu tshol lo//'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//sangs rgyas ngag gis bsdigs pa yi//dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed//
177b7(dkon brtsegs): gang las thos pa rnyed 'gyur ba'i slob dpon dang yang rim gro byed//sems can thams cad don gyi phyir//byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med//chos la
178a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te gang zug la//ri mo drug ni rab tu byed//dag ni shin tu sdom gyur te//de ni mi snyan tshig mi smra//'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan//
178a2(dkon brtsegs): nam du 'ang dag rtsub mi smra'o//yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur//nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de//byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi//bsam pa nyid kyis
178a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu blta//rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas//chos 'di lnga ni gus dang bcas//chos la gus par byas pas na//myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya//chos
178a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems pa'i sde snod kyi chos yong su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen
178a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed de//tha na chu rdza gang tsam yad 'bul lo//gzhan yod shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu bskyed de//bcu gang zhe na//
178a6(dkon brtsegs): kye mo lus 'di ni na ba ste//khams kyi sbrul gdug pa bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod do//sdug bsngal mong ba'o//nyes pa med pa'o//skyob
178a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rta 'bras dang /phol mig dang /med bal dang /g.yan pa dang /rlung dang /'khris pa dang /bad kan gyis gang ste nad dang 'dra/pol mig dang 'dra//
178b1(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu dang 'dra/chu bo dang 'dra/gnod pa dang 'dra/g.yo ba/'jig pa/snying po med pa/nyam chung ba/shig shig po yun thung bA/skad cig pa dur khrod du 'jig pa/
178b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blango snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas slob dpon//
178b3(dkon brtsegs): laM rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu bor gang tsam yang 'bul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/
178b4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo //khams ni sbrul gdug ma rungs pa//bzhi po gcig la gcig rten te//re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las//nad po che ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
178b5(dkon brtsegs): mig nad dang ni rna nad dang //sna nad dang ni de bzhin du//so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams//gzhan yang lus las 'byung bar 'gyur//smyo dang 'bras dang po la mig dang //me
178b6(dkon brtsegs): dpral g.yan pa rnams dang ni//nang gzhan rnam pa mang po dag/lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur//lus 'di nad dang mtshungs po ste//lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o//lus
178b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste//yun thung skad cig 'dug pa'o//dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jig/mi rtag mi brtan g.yo ba ste//rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang //lus 'di rnag gi
179a1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba ste//shrig shig po dang yun thung ba//rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis//sangs rgyas kyi ni sku yi phyir//dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya//
179a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du ni rab zag pa//rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis//chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa//sangs rgyas kyi ni sku 'grus po//gang na gzhan gyis thob med
179a3(dkon brtsegs): pade 'dri'i lus ni thob par bya//tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang //bsil ba dag kyang rab bsrung ba//lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang //'chi ba dag gis gzhom par
179a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//gang dag grang dang tshwa bzod pa//lus kyis su ni thams cad du//skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi//mchog gi lus ni thob par 'gyur//'jig rten grags pa'i
179a5(dkon brtsegs): bla ma la//rim gro dag ni rab byas te//snying po med pa'i lus la su//snying po dgra ni blangs par 'gyur//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa des byang chub sems dpa'
179a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la ni rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa de tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo//gzhan
179a7(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/kye me'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/rtag tu bril ba dang /bkru ba dang /mnye ba dang /'jig pa
179b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /'gyes pa dang /dpral ba'i chos can no//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyi bum phra chung tshad dang /che tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig
179b2(dkon brtsegs): go/de bzhin du kye ma'i lus 'di yang snying po med/so ma gtang ba'i snod bzhin te mthar 'jig pa'o//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang /
179b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang /'bras bu ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mthar lhung bar 'gyuraro//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i
179b4(dkon brtsegs): chos can no//shA rI'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rtswa'i rtse mo'i zilnga pa'i theg pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so//shA ri'i bu de bzhin
179b5(dkon brtsegs): du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin du ring por mi glanas so//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po dang 'bab chu dang /'bab chu'i
179b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyun la lbu ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po med rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/
179b7(dkon brtsegs): lbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/char 'bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go//shA ra'i bu de bzhin du
180a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/chu'i chu bur ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o//'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blung do snyam du
180a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim blo dang
180a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya tshor rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//ji lhur rdza
180a4(dkon brtsegs): m+bu'i mkhan+de pa yis//sa las snod rnams byas pa dag/de drug thams ca ma par 'jig s+ho//sems can srog klung dri dang 'dra//ji ltar shong gi yal ga /
180a5(dkon brtsegs): lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams//thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te//mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no//rtsa mchog dag gi zil ba'i thigs//nyi ma yongasu bab pa na//
180a6(dkon brtsegs): yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te//de yi srog kyang de bzhin no//ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi//lbu ba zlos pa nyam chung ba//de ltar lus ni nyam chung ste//snying pa med//
180a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lbu ba 'dra//ji ltar char pa bab pa yis//chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang //skad cig gis ni de 'jig 'gyur//de bzhin lus kyang snying po med//snying po ma yin
180b1(dkon brtsegs): snying por shes//snying po ma yin snying por 'dzin//da dag log rtog spyod yul te//snying po khong du chud ma yin//stong po med la snying po myod//snying po snying por shes pa Ti//de dag yang //
180b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rtog pa'i yul//snying po khong du chud pa yin//snying por 'du shes byas gyur te//rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba//snying po med pa'i lus las ni//snying po dag na len
180b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyis pa 'di bskyed nas//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas
180b4(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la rim glo dang bsnyen bku ro byed de/tha na chu pho gang tsam yang 'bul lo//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/bdag
180b5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/snyoms las can/blun pa
180b6(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba ste mchod sbyin yang med/sbyin bsreg kyang med/legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa yang med/
180b7(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba dang /'dod pa'i zil gyis non to/bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/'di lta ste/
181a1(dkon brtsegs): yid btags kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob ste/'di lta bu'i skyon gnas mnyes par ma/
181a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de nas bdag yi dgas su gyur te/la mang po lo stong phrag mang po/me brgya stong phrag mang por m+me mar mur za zhing chu'i sgra yang mi tho s+ya na/lus kyis
181a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ga la zhig reg ste/bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyis/sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshol par bya zhing
181a4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu btsal ba'i phyir/slob dpon la rim gro bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa
181a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyob dpon la rimu gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'brel lo//de nas bcom
181a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//ji ltar grogs po bstan pa dang //ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar//de dag yang dang yang bsten
181a7(dkon brtsegs): pas//de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur//sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangasra//le lo che zhing brtson 'grus
181b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams//g.yo dang phrag dog sor sna can//byin pa yod par gang blta ba//thams cad du ni rnam spangs nas//bdag ni yi btags bskye gnas su//'jig su rung ba'i
181b2(dkon brtsegs): lus thob bo//yun ring dusu 'khor ba yi//mun nAg phung po 'jigs pa na//bkros pa dI ni sgom pas gzir//sdug bsngal mang po rje su myong //sbyin gnas rnams
181b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ma mthong zhing //bdag gis 'di 'dri'i dal ma thob//lo ni mang po stong rnams smra//chu yi sgra yang yong ma thos de ltar bdag gis 'jog rten na//shin tu dkon
181b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rab skyed de//bdag gis slob dpon menyes byas pas//dal ba 'byor pa bdag gis thob//sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas//bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
181b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen rnyed//byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir//lus dang srog la mi lta'o//sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir//slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la//rnam par drang
181b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyis su//bsti stang gus par rab tu bya//shU ra'i bu sems bskyed pa gsum po 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
181b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim gri dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
182a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar sems bstod de/dadag yun ring por dge ban+de ba shes gnon dang bral zhing sdig pa'i phyogs byis zin pas lce lo n+dan+da sbron//
182a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nyams pa snyoms la sna tsa na blun pasasems can la khu tshur dang thal mos brdegs shing gtses nus bsdus shing rgyu de 'don te/de'i kla ni las sdig pa
182a3(dkon brtsegs): ma med/de'i gni las sdig pa 'byung ba yang med do zhes de ltar brim+b+ha ba dang /de ltar bzod pa dang /de snar mos shing zhesdang gi zil gyis non pa sa
182a4(dkon brtsegs): me dag pas las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/'di lta ste dud 'gro'i gnas sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsha
182a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob ste/'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu ba ma byis pas de na bdag rnga m+b+ha da /ba lang dang /bo bur gyur te/rtsa za zhing
182a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyug pas bsdigs shing 'jigs pas bsdig sbyi nas mi 'dod bzhin du kha l-i bkal lo//bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par bya ste/dge ba'i lus thob kyis
182a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la ma blta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'i zhes/sha ri'i bu sems papyod pa bzhi pa de bskyed na 'o//byang chub sems dpa' tshu
182b1(dkon brtsegs): dpon la rim glo dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//'di'i chos nyid ni 'di lin+da te/hUM la 'di skad ces bya'o//yun ring por
182b2(dkon brtsegs): nI 'phags pa'i lam//mA rig por ni gnas pas na//rnga mo dag drang bong bur gyur//sdug bsngal meng po rjesu byung //mir gyur pa yang bdog gis rkyong //gang
182b3(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i//bzang po yi ni las byas te//de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do//sangs rgyas chos ni rab gnas shing //gus pa dang ni ldan par
182b4(dkon brtsegs): bya//byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la//rim gro dang nA~M bsti stang bya//'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bsam med nas//'khor ba'i 'khor par yongasu 'khyam pa na/
182b5(dkon brtsegs): bye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te//sbyin gnas drug ni nye bar 'tsho ba yin//dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu spangs gyur nas//rtag du sdig pa'i grogs po rab bsten te//
182b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni bstan pa'i rjesu 'jug cing //rgyun mi 'chad par dran song sa la gnas//btson ra dang ni bcing zhing badzugs pa rnams//byed du 'jug cing gzhan
182b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod byas nas//de'i bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro//sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rje su myong //dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mi bstan pas//rnga mo pa
183a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin thong bla yi//dran pa'i mnas sgyus ched gzung gyur nas//dbyusmra pa dag gis brdegs shing khal klung gA/la//ming/
183a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang //'thun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed//shin tu yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur te//dka' ba'i las kyis bu gang
183a3(dkon brtsegs): chung pa bzhin//lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas//zhan bu med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams//dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la
183a4(dkon brtsegs): go yo med pas//bdag gi lus ni nye byar 'itsho bar bya//bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dgu dang //gling dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa/
183a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston pa//ston pa bzhin du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya//rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa dang //dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
183a6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang me tog dag gi chun po yis//rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod par bya//phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa//sems can don la brtson zhi
183a7(dkon brtsegs): don dam gzigs//gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od mjed pa//kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod par bya//sangs rgyas ma ya~M kha la bsgyur rnams la//'jig rten
183b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mchod pa cher byas pas//gang gis byang chub snying por bdag 'gro ba'o//byang chub la ma ni shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di skyod nas/
183b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon lo rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/thun chu bumo gang tsam yang 'bu la/
183b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/bdug yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa le lo can
183b4(dkon brtsegs): brdzun 'grus nyams pa/skyom las can blun pas 'di lta bu'i lta ba dang /'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can+d+ra thams cad dang /srog chags thams cad kyi shA gcig tu blangs
183b5(dkon brtsegs): shing /sha gcig tu gtsor te/bsod nams ma yin pa'i las byed kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do//rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems
183b6(dkon brtsegs): can ji skyed pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang de'i gozhi lngas bsod nams med/de'i gzhi la sra bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do//rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems
183b7(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ba sad cing gtubs kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa mdo snyam pas de ltar byas kyang bsod nam pa dang sdig pa
184a1(dkon brtsegs): /yongasu shes par ma nus te/sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang /gti mug gis zil gyis non pas/bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i lus mang po mngon par 'dus
184a2(dkon brtsegs): te/mi dge ba de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/'di lta ste sems can dmyal bar dman pa 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob ste/de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes ba
184a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pas/de ni bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gyur pas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba/rtsub pa mi bzad pa/'chog pa/'chi ba'i
184a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bir du bde'i sgra yang mi thos na/lus kyis lta ga la zhig rig ste/bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/dge ba'i lus
184a5(dkon brtsegs): thob kyis sbyin gnas rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed
184a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la ro mi gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/the nA chu bum pa gong
184a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyen pa dang //sdig pa'i sems kyis bslus pas
184b1(dkon brtsegs): na//sdig par lta la brten gyur to//bdag gis sdigs pa'i las byas so//rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na//sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa//zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang //
184b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams dag gi 'byung gnas med//rgya mtsho yi ni pha rol na//sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa//thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang //sdig pa'i 'byung gnas mdo zhes
184b3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i lta ba 'di lta bu//yang dang yang du bsten byas na//gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i//sems can dumya lnga bar ring du drangs//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi/
184b4(dkon brtsegs): srings su 'dren pas ma mthong bas//bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kyang //ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs//'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste//de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas//bdag
184b5(dkon brtsegs): gis mi yi dngos thob kyis//bzang po yi nI las bya'o//mir 'gyur ba ni dka' ba ste//mi srog thob pa'ang dka' ba yin//dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste//sangs
184b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin//bdag gis mi rI skye dka' ba yin//tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur//bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang //rgyal ba kun mkhyen bstan pa/
184b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed//lus kyi las dang ngag gi las//yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can//mi 'dod mi bzad 'bras bur 'gyur//phyin chad spyad par mi bya'o//bsam pa rnam par dag
185a1(dkon brtsegs): pA sI//lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi//'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa//bzung po dag gi las bya'o//sangs rgyas sbyi ni byang chub phyir//bdag ni na/
185a2(dkon brtsegs): mar gang grags pa'i//bka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste//bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya//lam ni drang po zhes bya ba//g.yo med pas ni ra bo bsten to//sangs rgyas
185a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ni byang chub phyir//sgyu mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa//de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas//snod
185a4(dkon brtsegs): gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bru la//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu
185a5(dkon brtsegs): tshol bas//slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha nA chu bum pa gang tsAn+da yang 'bul lo//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
185a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed//bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshis gnyen drang bral zhing /sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/'dud pa dang /rA bau tu 'dud pa dang /gus par smra ba dang /
185a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang /ldang ba dang /thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas/sdig pa mi dge ba'i
185b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smon pas/'do lta ste ma'on du skyon gnas thams cad nyo bar 'tsho ba ma yon pa spyad 'a'o sras thor
185b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ba'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas dang bdag zir gyur pa na/mi b+ha kren pa dang /mi 'dzul pa dang /bran du 'gyur bu dang /dazhan gyi dbang du mdun dang /
185b3(dkon brtsegs): da pa la zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang /'dod pa pa chags pa rnams dang / rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rna med dang /log par smra ba rnams dang /tshuladzi
185b4(dkon brtsegs): log par zhugs pa rnams dang /lta ba log par zhugs pa rnam pa dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsu' la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang /'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'chi bag
185b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang /sgrib ba lngas bsgrubs pa rnams dang /bla ma drug la gus par mi gnas pa rnam pa dang /dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug
185b6(dkon brtsegs): parnamapa dang /log pa brgya de la bzhi par dris pa rnamapa dang /gan pyang bu'i dngos pos gan bar gyur pa rnams dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las hU~M lamA la skam ngan pa
185b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa rnams dang /sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang /mtho ris kyi lam la ma phyogs pa rnams dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
186a1(dkon brtsegs): 2//dang bral ba rnams dang /sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song pa rnams dang /bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnamasna dang /dge ba'i chos grongasu spangs pa rnams
186a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams dbyug pas bsdigs 'jigs pas bsdigs nas/mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur te
186a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni de dag mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o//lus dang srog la mi galta bar slob dpon la rim gro
186a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyod nas byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/than chu bum pa glang
186a5(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bru'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu rtag tu gzhug pa'i phyir/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//sdig
186a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba//bskal pa mang po ba rgya mtsho bsten pas na//mi yi nang du skyes kyang bran du 'gyur//'khor ba'i rgyun du yun ring
186a7(dkon brtsegs): dus su 'khor//mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang //de ni bdag gis dka' bar thob gyur te//gnas pa'i yul ni 'thun pa bzang po dang //sangs
186b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung dang dal 'byor de bzhin no//grogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzung ba//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing //byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed/
186b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/de dag bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed//lus ni nyam chung mi rtag mi brtan te//lbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra//sgyu ma lta bu rau gaR+Sha la lta dang mtshungs//rmi lam/
186b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin//srog ni yun thung tshe yang zad par 'gyur//ji ltar sprin dang glog ni me gnas ltar//skad cig du ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur//
186b4(dkon brtsegs): snying po med pas snying po len par byed//gang gis 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa yang //rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa//nga rgyal ri bo ma 'dar gzhom
186b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//dus dang tshod dang man ni nyer gnas kyis//lus la sdug pa thams cad rab spangs nas//srog la tshags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni//nga dang rgyags dang drags pa
186b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs gyur nas//yon tan ldan pa gus bcas rim gro bya//nga dang rgyags pa dregs pa spangs gyur nas//pha dang ma dang bu pho rnams dang ni//'jig rten bla ma mchog tu gang
186b7(dkon brtsegs): grags la//gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog zhugs pa//gang dag bdag dang byang chub 'thun spyod pa//dga' dang
187a1(dkon brtsegs): guswA pa brtan pa bskyed bya ste//rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya//skye dgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal sbyangs//mi mkhas nga rgyal bcad cing 'dul ba'i phyir//
187a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas//rgyags dang nga rgyal ri nI bsgril bar bya//byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byas te//byang chub snying po mchog le gnas
187a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas//bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams brtul te//chu bo bzhi las srog cha gos bsgral bar bya//phyogs bcu'i dag nA mi grong ni ba rnams//rang gi mi gtsang
187a4(dkon brtsegs): bar lhung smad pa la//byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis su//mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab//
187a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan bslob pa bsgrub nus shes//bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum tshogs//mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya//bsam
187a6(dkon brtsegs): gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs//sems 'dul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas//thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te//bla ma thams cad/
187a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni bskor bar bya//de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel//shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab//rang dbang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags/
187b1(dkon brtsegs): to/ byung bur yongasu bkang ba'i snod byin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas sgrib dpon la rim gro dang /bsnyen bkur byed de tha na chu byam pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//gzhan yang shA ri'i buM byeng chub sems
187b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/snyoms
187b4(dkon brtsegs): las can blun pa lkugs par gyur te/lus nag po dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa yang med/las dkar po dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa yang med/las dkar nag
187b5(dkon brtsegs): dang dkar nag gi rnam par smin pa yang med/mi gnag cing dkar ba'i las dang mi gnag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang mdo zhes de ltar lta/de ltar bzod de ltar
187b6(dkon brtsegs): mos pas dge slong lAm/bram ze la btsun pa dag dge ba gang /mI dge ba gang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang /kha na ma tho ba med pa gang /bsten par bya ba
187b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /bsten par mi bya ba gang /bya ba'i rigs pa gang /bya ba'i mi rigs pa gang /ci byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang /me phan pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur//
188a1(dkon brtsegs): ci byas na don dang phan pa dang 'dre bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang /nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus
188a2(dkon brtsegs): byas te/mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa//dbang po myi tshang ba'i mir gyur nas 'di lta bu'i sbyin
188a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas mnyes par ma byas pas bdag mir gyur pa nu yang /long ba/lkug pa/blun pa/rku ba/dig pa/rmongs pa/'on par gyur te/legs par bshad pa
188a4(dkon brtsegs): drang nyes par bshad po'i don shes par mi nus so//bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/'di lta ste dbang po tshang ba//dge ba'i lus thob kyis//
188a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas thams cad kyis nye bar 'tsho bar bya/lus dang srog lnga mi lta bar bya/logs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes
188a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthu yod par bya/slob dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang /mi dge ba gang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang /kha na ma tho ba med pa gang //
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang /mi bsten pa gang /bya ba gang /mi bya ba gang /ci byas na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/ci byas na
188b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes//rus sbrul 'grim pa shing mig chung 'dra bar//mi smi ma ni shin hU~M dka' bar mtho/dbang po dag ni tshang zhing skye mched dge
188b2(dkon brtsegs): mi la yongs su spangs nas ngapa ba Sh+T+rI /'jig rten sbyi ma me rjems byas smonargyam pas na bcos 'ding chags bral ba
189a1(dkon brtsegs): thos/dag dge dang mi dag byas pa'i 'bras bu dag/'jog rten gtso ba bdag gi dus la bab/'gro ba ser sna 'ir gyur ji lta bu/ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna mod par 'gyur//
189a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar g.yo ngan rkam pa tshul khrims 'chal//tshul khrims nor kun bsrung ba ji lta bu//mi ni khro dang 'khrug pa ji ltar 'gyur//khro med bzad pa'i stobasu ji ltar
189a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur//brtson 'phags bsam gtan dga' ba ji lta bu//ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab blun lkugs 'gyur//
189a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'//ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig sems pas//spyod pa bzang po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur//ji ltar 'gro ba kun la
189a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa bgyid//ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren//ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid//byang chub spyod pa sde snod yongasu tshol//phyogs dang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs mtshams rab 'byam zhing rnams na//'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro/phyag 'tshal bsod nams byed po ji lta bu//kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ci
189a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra 'di//slob dpon bla ma dag la bdag 'drig/de yi dus ni de ring nyer gnas te//bla mi'i gnas su gnas las nyan dga' ste//slob dpon yid mgu
189b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa rdo swA hA//samA N+Dam+b+ha smras kyis sems 'ad bstod myur na du//stobs dang bsod na sa yongs par blo gros can//ngos par ma zlog go she skyobs sman 'ad+mo/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yid kyis snod gang chu yang 'bul//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'dri bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub seMs dpe sde snod kyi don gyi byi slob dpon la rim
189b3(dkon brtsegs): gri dang bsnyen bkur byed/za ni chu bum+b+ha paM gAng tsa ma yang 'phrul lo//gzhan yang shA ri'i dri byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de//bdag yun ring por
189b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/snyoms las can/lkug pa'o/gang tshig dang /ye ge da //
189b5(dkon brtsegs): don dang /tshig tu ldan pa dang /chos deng tshig tu ldan pa dang /mya ngan pas 'das pa dang ldan pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang /'gog pa dang zhi ba dang /
189b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /dge slong dang /bram ze dang /mya ngan lngas 'das pa dang ldan pa dang /thams cad la bya ste/de dag spangs nas don dang tshig tu mi ldan bu dang
189b7(dkon brtsegs): ches kyi tshig dang mi ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyi tshig dang yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang /len pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa ni 'di lta
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sted+ma stobs med/brtson 'grus med/skyes bu'i stobs med/skyes bu'i mthu med/skyes bu'i brtul bya med/spyod pa med/rtul ba med/spyod pa lnga/
190a2(dkon brtsegs): mthu med/rgyu med/rkyen med de/sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa yang rgyu mod rkyen med par sems can kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/rgyu med do//rkyen med
190a3(dkon brtsegs): do//sems can rnams rnam par dag pa yang rgyu med/rkyen med par sems rgyun rnam par dag go zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas nas/bdag gis myi dge ba
190a4(dkon brtsegs): las meng po mngon par 'dus byas te/lngas de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa dbang po ma tshang ba'i mi'i lus thob
190a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/de na bdag glen pa/g.yeng ba/dag pa/lkug pa/rmongs pa/blun pa/long ba/'on par gyur pas/gang tshig dang /yi ge dang don du ldan pa nas mya ngan 'das
190a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang /le ni pA dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas so//
190a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyis/lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i bar du byas te/gang tshig dang yi ge dang don du ldan pa nas/mya ngan la
190b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung ba nas kun+da chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyis/'o na bdag gis
190b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams te/'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir lus kyis slob dpon la rim gro dang /bsnyen bkur bya'o//
190b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /khaM ton dang /bsnyen bkur byas pas snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar
190b4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi stobs des nye bar brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyur snyam nas ched du bsams
190b5(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de//tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//'di la de'i cho se nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//
190b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang don dang ldan pa dang //lam gyi yon lag lam bsgom dang /'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang /mya ngan 'das lam snying po can//chos de dag ni yongs
190b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas//gang chos phan pa med pa dang //don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa//chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyon//brtson 'grus dang ni stobs med de//skyes bu yi ni
191a1(dkon brtsegs): many+dzu yang med//shin tu brtulta ba mchog rnams dang //de dgra thams cad mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang mod//pha ma med do do//
191a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du//dkar po dang ni nag po'i las//rnam pararo smin pa kun med ces//de 'dra'i sdig par lta ba drag/yang dang yang du bsnyen pas na//gcig tu mi bzad ma
191a3(dkon brtsegs): rungs pas//sems can dmyal bar yun ring gnas//de bzhin du 'gro'i skye gnas dang //gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te//nam tshe mir ni skyes gyur kyang //
191a4(dkon brtsegs): blun zhing lce ni med par gyur//g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur//dag pa lpag pa rmongs par 'gyur//yun ring sems dmyal ma rungs par//mi shes pas ni rab tu
191a5(dkon brtsegs): ltung //dbang po thams cad phun tshogs shing //bdag gi lus ni rab mdzes pa//yun ring dus na bdag gis thob//'di ni bdag brtson bya ba'i dus//chos
191a6(dkon brtsegs): gang don dang ldan pa dang //mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs byed pa//byang chub lam dang byang chub la//bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i du sa//byang chub sems dpa'i
191a7(dkon brtsegs): sde snod ni//zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste//bskal pa stong phrag bya bar yang //de ni shin tu thob par dka'//sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir//sangs rgyas chos//
191b1(dkon brtsegs): mang 'di dang no//gzhan yang bsam gyis ma khyab la//rab tu 'jug cing gzung bar bya//slob dpon la ni pus bcas shing //bskyon bkur dag ni byas pas na//
191b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams//thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yin//'di lta bu
191b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems bskyod nas//rdza gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
191b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo//gzhan yongad shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o 'di ltar sems bskyed de//
191b5(dkon brtsegs): kye mo'o sems can de dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba lus dang /srog la lta ba'o//don gyis yongasu bskor ba nI lus drang srog la me blta ba'o//don med
191b6(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus dang srog la lha'i/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la me lta zhing nga yir 'dzin po sngon du 'gro bas bdag spyad pa
191b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /dril ba dang /mnye ba dang /bkru ba dang /brdzi bas yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang don med pas yongasu
192a1(dkon brtsegs): /bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/lus dang srog la lta zhing du yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang /bu pho dang /bu mo dang /mdza' bo dang /nye du dang /
192a2(dkon brtsegs): snag gi gnyen mtshams sbed pa dang /dril ba nas yo byad dang longs spyod thams cad kyi bar gyis yongasu bskor ba de ni don med pas yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//
192a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa'i mi sbed pa dang /mngag pa dang /kun tu bsrung ba de ni don med pos
192a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//de la don gyis yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus dang srog la mi lta'i/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang
192a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kyis yongasu bskor ba de ni don gyis yongasu bskor bar zhes bya'o//gzhan yang don//
192a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongasu bskor ba ni 'di lta ste lus dang srog la mi lta'i/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
192a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bsgrub pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin phra bsgrub pa'i bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang don
192b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes yongasu bskri ba ni lus dang srog la mi k+ta yi/byang chu na sa la lta/spyod byang chub kyi semA pA snron du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa dang spyan par smra ba dang /don bya ba dang /
192b2(dkon brtsegs): don 'thun pas sems can thams cad sdud pas yongasu bskor ba de ni don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang don gyis yong su bskor bya na 'di lta ste
192b3(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta'i/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu
192b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi rked pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan ldeg dang /lA me bsgom pas yongasu bskor ba de ni/don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//
192b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhin yang don gyis yong su bskor ban+ti 'di lta ste lus dang sreg la mi lha'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i pha mdong /
192b6(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la rim gro byed cing /bla ma'i gnas la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /'dred pa dang rab tu 'dud pa dang /gus par smra ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /sdang
192b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyis yongasu bkong ba ni/don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang don gyis yong su bskor po ni 'di lta ste/lus dang /
193a1(dkon brtsegs): snog la mo wA ye/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi snyoms sngon du 'gro ba'i dkon+da mchog gsum gyi zhal tu byung pang//
193a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor ba'o//de ltar kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yong su bskor ba/lces deng srog la lta'o//kye ma'o bdag ni dron gyis yongasu
193a3(dkon brtsegs): bskor bas yongs su bskor gyis bdapyad brtson 'grus brtsams la/slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas te/de ltar na snying po med pa'i
193a4(dkon brtsegs): lus las snying po blangs pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs des nye/
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bar brtan pas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de ni shA rI'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nus slob dpon la rim glo dang bsnyen bkur
193a6(dkon brtsegs): byed tha na chu rtswa glong tsam yang 'bul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag ga sungs//
193a7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo kun//lus dang srog la lha ldan zhing //byang chub phyogs la mi lta ste//rnam pa sna tshogs las kyang byed//so so'i skye bo
193b1(dkon brtsegs): dag no//bdag gi don dang chung ma'i don//bu pho dang na bla ma'i phyir//don med pa la chags par 'gyur//dran dang la smra byed mang ba dag/mi mkhas pa ni kun//
193b2(dkon brtsegs): dri ma rigs//rkang bzhi pa dgu gsuM byed de//de dag don med tshogs paru 'gyur//nor dang 'bru rnams rlung brisogs shing //sbyin pa mi byed mi spyod de//don
193b3(dkon brtsegs): med rmugs pa de dag ni//gter gyi ba srungs mar brjod pa yin//'di ni don med chags pa ste//so so'i skye bo de la tshugs//byang chub sems dpa'
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan ni//don la chags shing brtson par byed//lus dang srog la mi l+yA yi//byang chub phyogs la lta byed cing //rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa//don la yongs su tshad
193b5(dkon brtsegs): shes bya//sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus bzod //bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du//thabs dang rab tu ldan pa ni//don la yongs su chags shes bya//pha dang
193b6(dkon brtsegs): ma la bsnyen bkur byed//bla mA nan rabs rjes su bsnyungs//dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal tA byed//don la yongasu chags shes bya//chos kun yang drug bsdus pa 'i//
193b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpe'i lnga snod /klog cing rab tu ston pa ni//don la yongs su chags shes bya//don la chags pa de dag ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis ba sngag pa
194a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/de la brtson dang ldan pa ni//rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'o//de lta bu'i sems bskyed nas//rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//bla
194a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams la bsnyen bkur byed//snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
194a3(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'o bu lo//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
194a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bka' blo mi bde ba ste/slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mi mthun par 'dzin pas de dag khong du mi chud do//ci khong
194a5(dkon brtsegs): du mo chud ce na 'di lta ste/slob dpon gyi nor khong du mi chud do//slob dpon gyi nor grang zhe na 'di lta ste/dad pa'i nor dang /tshul khrims kyi nai raM dang /thos pa'i
194a6(dkon brtsegs): nor dang /khrel yod pa dang /ngo tshar shes pa'i nor dang /gtong ba'i nor dang /shes rab kyi nor de dag ni slob dpon gyi nor zhes bya ste/de dag khong du ma chud pa ni rab tu
194a7(dkon brtsegs): dbul ba zhes bya'o//bdag ni bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi rjesu bstan pa dang 'thun par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni shin tu bka' blo bde ba
194b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/slob dpon gyi rjesu bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin khong du chud par byed do//ci khong du chud ce na 'di lta ste/slob dpon gyi nor ro//byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon
194b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi nor gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangaso//slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad du bka' blo bde bar rig nas/
194b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to//rab tu ston to//rab tu 'chad do//rab tu gzhog go rnam par 'grel to//rnam par 'byed do//gsal
194b4(dkon brtsegs): bor go bar byed do//yang dge bar rab tu ston to////bam po bcu pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbul ba
194b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su chod pa khong du chud par 'gyur te/'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//de de ltar sems bskyed de bka' blo bdo zhing slob dpon gyi bstan pa
194b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'thun par 'dzin pa ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyu ro snyam pa nas slob dpon gyi rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do//tha na chu rdza grang tsamA yang 'bu'o//
194b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la bsnyen bkure dang rim gro byed do za na chu
195a1(dkon brtsegs): gang tsam yang 'bul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo //
195a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' blo mi bde sems can gang //mi drang skya dang g.ye ngan cing //bla ma rnams dang mi mthun pa//tshig bzhin du ni byed par 'gyur//bstan pa dang ni mi mthun cing //
195a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' blo mi bde shes gyur nas//drang srong no ro ni gang yin pa//de ni de la mi ston to//dad pa'i nor dang tshul khrims nor//khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i nor//thos pa'i nod/
195a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gtong nor dang //shes rab nyid ni nor bdun pa//nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni//mi zad pa yi gtir bdun te//snod ma yin par rig nas ni//de ni de la mi ston
195a5(dkon brtsegs): to/sems can gang dag rnam pa kun//sangs rgyas chos ni snod gyur cing //g.yo med tshig 'jam sgyu med la//bka' blo bde zhing rab 'thun pa//sangs rgyas kyi ni byeng
195a6(dkon brtsegs): chu ba phyir//lus dang srob la mi lta bar//gus dang bcas pas chos 'dod cing //brtson 'grus rtsom par rab tu snrums//tshul 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba yi//snod
195a7(dkon brtsegs): duM ru rlig gyur nas//chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pa//'dren pa yang dag rab tu ston//gang la byang chub gnas pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po'i nor//byang chub
195b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snga snod ni//rgyas par rab tu ston par byed//chos rnams thams cad bdag med de//mtshan med stong pa'i mtshan nyid can//srog kyang med cing 'gyur ba med//
195b2(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med de kun gzhi med//chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis//ma skyes shing ni mtshan nyid med//byung ba med cing grub pa med//mtshan ma med pas phye ba te//
195b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gang bka' blo bde zhing mi 'gral ba//bstan pa la ni rje su 'thun 'dzin pa//de dag la yang rgyal ba rang byung rnams//thar sgo slob shes rang gi spyod yul ston
195b4(dkon brtsegs): dad nor tshul khrims nor dang khrel yod dang //ngo tsha shes dang thos gtong shes rab dang //de la nor de rnams ni kun 'gyed cing //bdun po mi zad chos kyi mdzod kyang
195b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byeng //mi 'gal blo bde zhing rje su 'thun//dge ba'i bshes gnyen snyam du rtag bsams nas//bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba'i phyir//bla ma dag la bdag
195b6(dkon brtsegs): gis rim gro bya//dri lta bu'i sems ni bskyed byas la//snying rje dga' ba rgya cher rab bskyed de//kham snod dang ba chu yis bkang ba yang //skom pa dag la nye bar sbyin
195b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya//shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la lus kyis rim phra
196a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bston bkur byed do//blun chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'dul lo//dge ba rtsa ba des chos b+ha ni thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe nA/myung du dag
196a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang /slob dpon gyi bsdogs pa brjod par 'gyur ba dang /nan tan+ta gyis bsgrub kyi log pa'i nan gyis mya yin pa dang /chos kyi phyir sdug
196a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyis gzhan du phyogs par mi 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mir gyur pan chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang cho
196a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi thob par 'gyur to//bzhi gang zhe na/skye bo mang po'i rjesu bsgrubs nis dkar po'i chos la gnas pa dang /sbas shing bzhag pa'i gnas skye bo mang po mgu ba
196a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /rab tu dga' bar byed pa myur du thob pa dang /sems dpa' bzhin du nyin mtshan zad par 'gyur ba dang /kun nas ldang ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/bde
196a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyuraro//de ltar gyur pa na chos bzhi thob par 'gyur ba te/
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/lha'i 'khor gyi stan mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /lha'i 'khor thams cad de'i gdong du blta zhing ci bshad pa de dag thos nas shes par bya'o snyam du
196b1(dkon brtsegs): som gyur bad+mad/dbyung ba smyo dang /do du myu ba gan yang da byud dun da zhug tu d+hA dun tshum yang sa shong gcod pa'i phyong ga/
196b2(dkon brtsegs): na du /de byung m+b+hi de rje b+hu 'i mas da 'drod byu sh+tsa /smye
196b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sIng gyur pa na chos kyi sgra brjod stong phrag dpag tu med pa thod par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs bcad pa 'di dag gi spangs so//
196b4(dkon brtsegs): me snyan ni mgrin par 'gyur//mAn yi mngon par phyug rgyas nas//gang+gA dag chos 'di 'chad pa la//sa rnams de la lta ba 'gyur//mkhas pa mau sna ba hA
196b5(dkon brtsegs): /sbyin gyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur//badz+ra khyon dogan 'dri 'ong shing //gzhal mad khang yang yid nga ba'ang //g+ha yi 'jig rten gnas 'dzas te/
196b6(dkon brtsegs): srid par 'dusalogang gis sgyur ba ra shA / bdu 'byung/mi yi 'jig rten nas /na du
196b7(dkon brtsegs): brim dgal gus byas pas//dam la rdzug /gam pa med pa'i sems kyis su//bram dgal gus rgyas pam//gnas zin pa ni dr-i
197a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams//rgya cher rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur//dga' ba dang ni gus pa yis//smod gang tsam gyi chu byin na//lha dang mi dang klu rnams kyis//mchod pa//
197a2(dkon brtsegs): drag tu 'os pa yin//de ltar gyur pa na gzhan yang chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/sngon gyi los mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
197a3(dkon brtsegs): gis skyes pa rab tu shes pa dang /de na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'bri ba yang rab tu shes pa dang /de nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang
197a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes pa dang /lha'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yong dag par rab tu dga'
197a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas lha'i 'jig rten nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
197a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/de lho'i gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye ba dang /de ming
197a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na btsun par byed pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/de rigs btsun par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /gzugs btsuno par 'gyur ba dang /
197b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims btsun par 'gyur ba dang /de'i 'khor bAtsun par 'gyur ba dang /de'i sems can btsun pa rnams la byams par 'gyur ba ste/shA ri'i bu btsun par byed pa'i
197b2(dkon brtsegs): chos lnga po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste de'i mdza' mi phyed pa dang /lus myur du 'jig
197b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang /de'i longs spyod yongasasu nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar mi nus pa dang /chos kyi mu go 'byung ba na de la chos kyi lo
197b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga pa de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te/lnga
197b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/'di lta ste gang snod stong pa gsog bzhag par 'gyur ba rnams su de'i lag pa gang du bcug pa de dag thams cad rin po ches yongasu gang bar 'gyur te/ngo mtshar
197b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa dang po 'di thob par 'gyur ro//de sgom par gyur na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rdzing bu 'byung ste/ngo mtshar yongasasu rdzogs pa gnyis pa 'di
197b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang de'i lus la gzhan gyis gnod pa bya bar mi 'gyur te/'di ste ste/dug dang mtshon dang mi dang /chu dang mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod
198a1(dkon brtsegs): /sbyin gyis gtso ba med pa ste ngo mtshar yong su rdzogs pa gsum pa 'di thong bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/nang//
198a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/mu ge'i bskal pa bang ma byung ba'im/me'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/chu'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/rlung gi bskal pa
198a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba 'am/skom pa'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/kun tu gdung ba'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba na/'dzam bu'i
198a4(dkon brtsegs): gling du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi de ltar skye ste/de dge ba mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang mthu ming bar 'gyur te/ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa bzhi pa 'di thob par
198a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rje ba de nyid kyis mi dal bar mi skye/ngan 'gror mi skye/sems la 'gyod pas kun nas
198a6(dkon brtsegs): dkri bar mi nus shing /nges par 'byung ba myur du mthong bar 'gyur te/ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga pa 'di thob par 'gyu ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub
198a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de
198b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshos bzhi drang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mthong ma thag tu snying rje chen po 'thob
198b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /de la de'i bu dang bu mo gus pa dang bcas shing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /rga bas bcom yang brnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang /de las kyi
198b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gang byed pa de dag kyang nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du thob par 'gyur te/chos bzhi po de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//gzhan
198b4(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas chos gsum gyis mi 'phrogs te gsum gang zhe na/chags pas mi 'phrogs pa
198b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug gis mi 'phrogs pa ste/chos gsum po de drag gis mi 'phrogs pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de/
198b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ldan pas nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na nang rgyun ring po med pa dang /yan lag skam par mi 'gyur ba dang /longs spong
198b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /rgyal po 'am rkun mo 'am/de ma yin pa'i sems can 'che bar byed pa gzhan gyis sdug bsngal ba dang /gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur
199a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
199a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas/bla ma'i gnas bzhi thob par 'gyur to/bzhi gang zhe na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam por rgyal zhing
199a3(dkon brtsegs): chos can chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rani po che sna bdun ni 'di rnams yin no 'i di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin /
199a4(dkon brtsegs): po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /blon po rin po che ste bdun po de dag go/de'i bu dpa' ba
199a5(dkon brtsegs): brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs can pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong thams par 'gyur ro//gling bzhi pa yang de'i rje su 'brang bar 'gyur de la gus par
199a6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/skar mkhan dang blon po chen po dang /sgo ba dang 'khor dang grong brdul gyi mi dang /ljongs kyi mi dag dang /khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang gus par
199a7(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur te bla ma'i gnas dang po 'di thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags par mi 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe
199b1(dkon brtsegs): na/'di lta ste mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs dang /rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /snas shes par bya ba'i dri dang /lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang /lus kyis shes par
199b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i reg rnams te/de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po la chags par mi 'gyur gyi dad pas khyim nas khyim med por rab tu byung ste myur du mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing //
199b3(dkon brtsegs): de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/bla ma'i gnas gnyis pa 'di rje su thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu gang dang gang du skyes pa thams cad du
199b4(dkon brtsegs): blos mchog tu 'gyur shes rab kyis mchog tu 'gyur/spobs pas mchog du 'gyur//de rgyal por glags par 'gyur ro//'di lta ste 'das pa'i dus na sman chen po zhes bya ba
199b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung ba de bzhin du/de rgyal po'i pho brang gi stan mchog thob ste/de la rgyal po dang gang de ma yin pa gzhan skar mkhan dang blon po chen po dang sgo ba dang 'khor dang grong rdal gyi mi
199b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /yul gyi mi rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/bla ma'i gnas gsum pa 'di rje su thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na lha dang /klu dang gnod sprin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
200a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/tshul khrims dang /ting 'dzin/
200a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/tshul khrims rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/
200a3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/bla ma'i gnas bzhi
200a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de thob par 'gyur te/bla ma'i gnas bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la
200a5(dkon brtsegs): chu bum pa gang tsam phul bas/de lta bu'i yon tan gyi chos tsha de med pa len par 'gyur ro//tshur shog ces byas na 'ang 'ong zhing ji ltar smras pa las 'gal bar mi
200a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis yo byad bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/skye bo ma rlabs kyi yo byad mo yin gyi rgyal po'i yo byad thob par 'gyur drang srong
200a7(dkon brtsegs): gi yo byad thob par 'gyur te/'dod pa spang ba la 'dzud pa 'di lta ste/dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de ni chos kyi yo byad skyes bya'o//gzhan
200b1(dkon brtsegs): rang shA rirI bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gang dang gang du smyos pa na/skyo bu thams cad la skyo ba dran par 'gyur te/de skyob dran pas smyo ba d+mo dang de dag du byang chub kyi sem
200b2(dkon brtsegs): brjed par mi 'byor ba de ni dra pa'i yo byad ces bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa de rdzogs
200b3(dkon brtsegs): pAr sangs rgyas na 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdur bar 'gyur te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yon dang /numakha' lding dang /
200b4(dkon brtsegs): mI 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi mi yin pas kun nas bskur cing mdun ba dar bar 'gyur te/yo byad bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang
200b5(dkon brtsegs): rIri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon gang dang grang las tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa rnyed cing 'dzin par 'gyur te/de tshur shog ces bsgo na yang de 'ong /spong
200b6(dkon brtsegs): shig ces bsgo na yang de 'gro ba dang 'di ni dge ba 'di ni mi dge ba/'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa/'di ni kho na ma tho ba med pa/'di ni bsten par bya ba/'di ni
200b7(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/bya ba 'di ni gnod pa phan pa med pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'o//'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang
201a1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang bde bar 'gyuraro zhes ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du mi dge ba mi byed cing dge ba la bsten te slar mi bzlog cing mi mthun par mi byed pa de dge
201a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan par mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/tshul khrims mthon por byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur/lus mthon por byed
201a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thob par 'gyur te/de'i lus ring zhing lus thams cad rgyas par 'gyur shes rab che bar 'gyur te/shes rab mtho ba shes rab rgya che ba/shes rab yongs
201a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes rab mgyogs pa/shes rab rno ba/shes rab myung ba/shes rab zab pa/shes rab nges par rtogs par 'gyur/lus zhig nas bde 'go mtho ris kyi
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid/
201a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob ste/'di ni ltar mi snang bar
201a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba dang po'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas
201b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ma dang gzhan nyo du rnams dang /lha dang klu dang /dri za dang /gan+dod sbyin dang srin po dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang lto 'phyo chen po dang /mi dang mi
201b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa rnams dang /dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung mi drang ba'i sen gyis kyang rung ste sems can gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar mi nus te/
201b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur pa gnyis pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas skyes pa nas
201b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par bya ste/pha ma nos mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ma dang bi'i sems kyis kyang rung ste gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i byi dor
201b5(dkon brtsegs): byed mi nus te/de kha'i byi dor bya'o snyam pa dang rkang pa gnyis la kha'i sgo 'byung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa de dag 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang rmad
201b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam pa'i ngag mchog dang ldan par 'gyur te/'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos gsum pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
201b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i rtse ba de nyid dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu gzhan gyis ma bzung bar sa la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam dang blta ste de ye shes 'bar
202a1(dkon brtsegs): brnyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dri ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon gru yo med par zos pa ban+d+hapA bas g.yo med pa'i mig thob ste/
202a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' g.yo med pa'i mig de dang ldan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig rnam
202a3(dkon brtsegs): por deg pa mi las 'das pa mthong ngo //de ltar byang chub sems dpas myur ba'i cha dang ldan pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob ste/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen
202a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems kyi tshul rab tu shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon don
202a5(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer ba byas/yid la byas/sems can thams cad kyis bsams shing ri mor byas nas chos la sman du 'du shes pa dang /rin po cher 'du shes pa dang /
202a6(dkon brtsegs): dkon par 'du shes pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes bskyed de/thos pa yongs su bzung ngo //de bas na byang chub sems dpa' myur du rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i
202a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rnyed//rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims la yongasu 'jol ba nas thos pa
202b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar la yongs smra 'jal lo//tshul khrims kyi snod yongasu 'ju
202b2(dkon brtsegs): ba nas thos pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar gyi spyir yi ngas su 'jal lo//sems
202b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa la yongs su 'jal pa nas thos pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i
202b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i bdi la yongs su 'jal lo//sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag par yongasu 'dzul ba nas thos
202b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /tinge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma thong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar la yongs
202b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'jal lo//sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam dang /spyod pa dang nan tan dang /brtul ba la yongs su 'jal lo//sems can thams cang phan tshun
202b7(dkon brtsegs): btsal na gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang thos po nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar dang /sems can thams cad kyi spyi'i tshul khrims
203a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/spyi'i thos pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /shesu rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /gang sems
203a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las/thos pa dang ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong //
203a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar gyi rgyu 'dra ba dang /gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa nas thos pa dang /ting 'dzin dang shes rab dang
203a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar dang /gang sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam dang spyod
203a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /brtul ba de thams cad dang bdag gi bsod nams dang bskrun cing yongs su btsal na bdag dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa yang dag por rjes su mi
203a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo //de yang sems can thams cad kyi rtsa ba la lhag par glanas pa yongs su tshal te/des sems can+da thams cad yongasu btsal na bdag dang mtshungs
203a7(dkon brtsegs): shing mnyam pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo //de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' myur du de'i skad cig de nyid la las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i/
203b1(dkon brtsegs): yA shes skye ste des so grol rtogs pa srid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rnam pa stong rab tu shes te/des thams cad yongs su btsal na bdag dang mtshung/
203b2(dkon brtsegs): shing mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo //bdag bla ma'i granas la gnas par shes shing ma bzung bar sweng+ge dang glang po che'i 'gros lta bus sa la gom pa
203b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun bor te/de byang chub kyi snying po gang na der las kyi sgrib par smin pa mdun du byas nas gnas te bdag ni 'jig rten gyi gtso bo bdag 'jig rten gyi mchog ste/
203b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang rga ba dang /na ba dung 'chi ba mthar bya'o//sems can skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang /'chi bas gzir ba rnams thar bar bya'o//chos bzang po bstan
203b5(dkon brtsegs): por bya'o zhes smras te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas tshig de smras mi thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar byas
203b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/sa g.yo ba 'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed pa yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lha'i rnga yang rgyun mi 'chad par brjong ngo //sa phyogs
203b7(dkon brtsegs): gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas par 'gyur pa'i sau phyogs der 'khor lo tsam zhig mi g.yo'o//chu'i phung po gang la gnas pa'i chu'i phung po de rlung gis
204a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyod par mi 'gyur ro//des thams cad du bltas nas/bdag gi snang bar gyur cing gnas par mthong ngo //de bla na med pa yang dag
204a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de la sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi nus so//'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed
204a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thob par byed pa bzhi pa'o//shA ri'i bu bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ji ltar
204a4(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon gyis tshur shog ces byas na yang 'ong /song shig ces byas na'ang 'gro ba'i phyir ro//de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas yong ba bzhi thob par
204a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa mtshan nyid ma tshang ba med cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
204a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa yang ba dang po 'thob bo//dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong tshur shog ces gsung bar 'gyur te//
204a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong tshur shog ces byas na skra bregs par 'gyur/ngur smrig gyon cing lhung bzed thogs par 'gyur te yang ba gnyis pa 'di 'thob bo//dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang
204b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems can rab tu mkhyen te yang ba blasum pa 'di 'thob po//dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas de
204b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sman ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/yang ba bzhi pa 'di 'thob bo//de dag ni yang ba bzhi ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de
204b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar de legs par zhugs pas slob dpon dang mkhan po la tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul ba'i phyir ro//gzhan yang shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa
204b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de nyid dang ldan pas gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mau dang mtshon dang dug gis tshugs
204b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pa da pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de la bu'i gnas med de pha rol gyis mi tshugs pa bzhi po de dag
204b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro//de yang pha rol gyis mi tshugs pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas ma
204b7(dkon brtsegs): gsan pa'i chos tha na chos kyi tshig gcig tsam yang thos par byed nus pa gnas ma yin zhing de byas med lta bu'i gnas me de sems can thams cad kyis tha na sems
205a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa gcig tsam yang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems rnyed par 'gyur ba'abar du do lta bu'o gnas med //yang shA ro bu dru bzhon ga tsun//
205a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhug pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa la gnas snying rje la gnas/dge' ba lnga gnas/btang snyoms la gnas so//shAr-i'i
205a3(dkon brtsegs): bya sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus som gzugs la mtshan marje 'dzin nus pa ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med lta bu'i gnas med de/gzhan
205a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad med par byed pa'i chos so//lnga gang zhe na
205a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims tshad med pa dang /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thos pa tshad med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang //
205a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba tshad med pa ste/shA ri'i bu lnga po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad med par byed pa'i
205a7(dkon brtsegs): chos so//tshur shog ces byas na yang 'ong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas thogs pa med pa'i ye shes bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/sangs rgyas
205b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtshugs ma thogs//
205b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar byung ba la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthing ba 'jug pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
205b3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems mnyam du bsgrub pa ste/sems mnyam par bsgrub pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan na yang
205b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i ye shes des gzhan la rag ma las gzhan gyi khar ma las par chos thams cad shes te de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po//bsam gyis mi
205b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas rlung dang char rab tu mkhyen te rje su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/sems can ji snyed pas cung zad so sor rjesu myong bar 'gyur te/
