205b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i 'phang du rgyang grags gsumo//de'i steng gige bar snang la rlung sbyin zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste de'i 'phang du rgyang grags lnga'o//de'i steng ga par snang la 'jom pa
205b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste rlung dIkyi'akhor gyi 'phang du dpag tshad bcu'o//dri'i steng gi bar snang la skye bral zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i 'phang ni dpag tshad sum
206a1(dkon brtsegs): cu'o//de'i steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin//
206a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes rab la rton pa ste/rlung gri dkyil 'khor bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad rab tu mkhyen
206a3(dkon brtsegs): to/de la tha ma'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab ces bya ste/gang la sa chen po gnas pa'i chu'i phung po la 'phong du dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad
206a4(dkon brtsegs): yod de/sa chen po'i 'phang du yang dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad do//de ltar shA ri'i bu grangs dang bgrang ba bstan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen
206a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/de na phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te
206a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing bzhus so//de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu'o//de'i 'khor nyan thos ni bye ba khrag khrig sum cu ste thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad
206a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/nyan thos chen po rnams
206b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po yod do//de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgya byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thob pa/don la shin tu
206b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pa/thos pa rgya mtsho chos smra ba stong pa nyid la gnas pa mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/smon pa med pa la gnas pa chen po sha stag 'dus pa
206b3(dkon brtsegs): yod do//de yongs su mya ngan lngas 'das nas dam pa'i chos lo stong du gnas par 'gyur ro//de yongs su mya ngan las 'dus nus lo stong na de yongs su mya ngan
206b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par 'gyur te/de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par 'gyur ro//'di lta ste dper na nga da ltar nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel rab tu rgyas par 'gyur
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes thogs pa med pa ste de bas kyang lhag par de bzhin gshegs par ye shes dpag tu med pa rlung gi dkyil
206b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor yongs su khyab pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su khyab bo//shA ri'i bu steng gri phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod
206b7(dkon brtsegs): la/de na rang sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yod de de dag la sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed do//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes la rton pa ste/
207a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i yang steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa da ltar byung ba
207a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu mkhyen to//de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu tshad med grangs med gzhal du med dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
207a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba de drag rab tu mkhyen te//sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshig pa de snyed kyang rab tu mkhyen to//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
207a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
207a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu dang /
207a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang la rab tu gnas te/chos la rab tu gus pa'i 'du shes dang /ri mor byas te snron du 'du shes pa dang rin po cher 'du shes pa dang /dkon par 'du
207a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes bskyed naso gus pa'i 'du shes dang chos su 'du shes yongs su bzung ba la gnas te
207b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yo shes 'bar bas/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu mang po dang dro bas kyang lhag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
207b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes rgyun mi 'chad dpag tu med grangs med gzhal du med brjid du med pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to//tshur shog ces byas na'ang 'ong ba'i dbang nges se gol gtogs pa
207b3(dkon brtsegs): srid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam par 'chag cing slar yang 'ong ngo //shA ri'i du ngas mos pas thos pa bzung ba
207b4(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis myur du rnam par grol ba thob ste rnam par grol ba des shin tu rnam par grol lo//ci las rnam par grol ce na/sdug bsngal thams cad las shes
207b5(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par grol lo//shA rI'i bu gang laM las gus pa'i gnas bzhi thos pa tsam gyis dad pa thob nas ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar
207b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas de bzhin duganas de lta bu'i tshul du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed na yang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi tshig dang yi ge mi 'dzin kyang de dge
207b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de nyid kyis shes rab byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/shes rab can shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /shes rab can
208a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong zhing phrad nas mnyes par byed pa dang /shes rab can dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba dang /shes rab
208a2(dkon brtsegs): can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/shes rab byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//de
208a3(dkon brtsegs): mang por byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/mir 'gyur ba mang po rnyed pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa mang po dang /dad
208a4(dkon brtsegs): pas khyi mo nAs khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba mang po dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'o tshang rgya ba mang po ste/med/
208a5(dkon brtsegs): por byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag theb par 'gyur ro//de yan lag bzhi rje su 'thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yan lag
208a6(dkon brtsegs): rje su 'thob ste 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du tshangs par 'gyur ba dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa rjesu 'thob/stobs bsngags
208b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rdo su 'thob/sems can yongs rtogs pa'i ye shes rjesu 'brob/rdzu 'phrul gyi spyod yul yang rab tu mkhyen cing lhar bcas pa'i 'jog rten gyi mig tu 'gyur//
208b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//'jig rten gyi ni skyabs dang mig/sems
208b3(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi dam pa ste//gang rig mya ngan 'das 'gyur ba'i//gso ba thams cad rab tu shes//tshur shog ces byas 'ongs 'gyur ba'i//rnam par smin pa 'di
208b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste//nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur zhing //bka' blo mi bder yong mi 'gyur//lha yi nang du myur 'gro zhing //mi yi nang du'ang myur du 'gro//sangs rgyas
208b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang myur mthong zhing //mi khom rnam par spong bar 'gyur//'byor zhing nor yang chen por 'gyur//gter gyi rnams ni mang mthong zhing //gang du lag pa bcug pa
208b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams//thams cad rin chen gang byar 'gyur//yan lag brgyad kyi chus gang ba'i//rdzing bu rab tu bsags par 'gyur//nam yang mya ngan mi myong ste//bka' blo
208b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i 'bras bu 'di//theng po zha bor mi 'gyur zhing //rkang pa 'khums dang 'bub pa dang //yan lag skam par mi 'gyur zhing //yon lag nyams par mi 'gro'o//
209a1(dkon brtsegs): ser mo skur bar mi 'gyur zhing //skyur po zhar bar mi 'gyur ro//glang po'i mgo ltar mi 'gyur te//bka' blo bde ba'i 'bras bu 'di//de ma
209a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag rgyas shing dkur//lcags kyi sdong po 'dra bar 'gyur//rab tu mdzes shing blta na sdug/kha dog ldan zhing mdzes par granas//lha yis mngon par
209a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'gyur//mi rnams shin tu sti steng byed//klu rnams kyis ni mngon mchod 'gyur//bka' blo bde ba'i 'bras bu 'di//ngan 'gro thams cad
209a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas ni//mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur//myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste//bka' blo bde ba'i 'bras bu 'di//mi des sems can thams cad kyi//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rnams thams cad rab tu shes//gom pa dag ni bdun bor bas//'jig rten dbyangs kyis go bar byed//de yi ye shes mchog 'gyur zhing //shes
209a6(dkon brtsegs): rang dag kyang mchog tu 'gyur//rnam par grol ba mchog 'gyur te//sems can rnams ni kun gyi mchog/shes rab kyis ni shes rab sbyong //shes
209a7(dkon brtsegs): rab ye shes rnam par grol//sangs rgyas kun gyis brnyes pa yin//shes rab kyis ni rang bzhin shes//ye shes kyis ni shes bya shes//gang dag
209b1(dkon brtsegs): /sa pa ma sh+tsa spyad//thams na da dul du/na myu 'gyur//'di 'dra dge ba 'di dag gi/don no khyod la ngas bshad //de n+ti mos pa chung ngu ma//sems
209b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen rnams kyi don ma yin//gti mug gis ni rmongs pa dang //sdig pas mngon par grAr+b+hes noms//zhe sdang khro ba bskyed byas na ste//chos la gus pa
209b3(dkon brtsegs): //num zhi sems can mos chung //'di 'dra ba yi chos 'byung ste//de ni phy-i lding gcig la gaN+DIg/gus pa byud pad+ma mi 'gyur te//gang
209b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can mi gus shing //'gro ba'i nyes pa yid dga' ste//kun nas nyon mongs somos kyis kyang //de dag bdag cag dgra bcom 'dzor//gnas pa
209b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rgas pa dang //rgas shing 'khogs pa gtogs pa dag/de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe//srid pa'i tha mar gyur zhes zer//gnas brtan gA
209b6(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyas pa dang //rgas shing 'khogs pas gtugs pa dag/dgra bcom bsod snyoms thos myur nas//sems can dmya m+b+ha b+ha myung du 'gro/dI dag tshu
209b7(dkon brtsegs): rab dgan na//dgra bcom rab ltar ga la 'gyur//dad pas mchod rten byed 'gyur to//de dag ngan 'gro rnam su 'gro//shA ri'i ltar tshul khrims spyo
210a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems drapa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la bsnyen bkur dang /rim gro byed pa ni 'di 'dra ba'i phan yon de
210a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang /de bas kyang lhag pa dpag tu maud bsam gyis mi khyab tshed de med pa thob por 'gyuraro//de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas
210a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dbang du gyur pa/tshul khrims yongasu dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//de la tshul khrims yungasu dag pa gang zhe na//
210a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba yin/gzhan
210a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rdzas la mi rku ba yin/gzhan gyi chung ma spangs pa yin/sems can thams cad la mi slu ba yin/gzhan gyi g.yog 'thun pa la phra ma mi zer ba yin/tshig drug po
210a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i phyir ngag mi rtsub pa yin/tshig bsdams pas tshig kyal pa sbyangs pa yin/gzhan gyi longs spyod la nga yi du mi 'dzin pas brnab sems med pa yin/tshig/
210a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan par smras pa bzod pas gnod sems spangs pa yin/lha gzhan mi 'dod pas log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems
210b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya ste/bcu
210b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ma shes pa mi 'dod pas ma nyams pa'i tshul khrims yin/ngan par skye ba yongs su spangs pas skyon med pa'i tshul khrims yin/nyon mongs
210b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'dres ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims yin/gcig tu dkar po'i chos rnam par spel bas sla bsre med pa'i tshul khrims yin//
210b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bas rang dbang gi tshul khrims yIn/mkhas pas ma smad pas bsngags pa'i tshul khrims yin/nyes pa thams cad mi sgrub
210b5(dkon brtsegs): bas ma smad pa'i tshul khrims yin/dbang po bsrungs pas shin tu spras pa'i tshul khrims yin/dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi phyir shin tu bsrungs pa'i tshul
210b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims yin te/shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rnam pa
210b7(dkon brtsegs): bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/bcu gang zhe na/rung ba'i tshod shes pas 'dod pa nyung ba'i tshul khrims yin
211a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa spong bas chog shes pa'i tshul khrims yin/lus dang sems rab tu dben pas nan tan gyi tshul khrims yin/'du 'dzi la smod pas
211a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon par gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin/bdag gi khor lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yon dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul khrims yin
211a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi gdong du mi lta bas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i tshul khrims yin/lha dang mi rnams la mi slu bas ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa'i tshul khrims
211a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/rang gi sems nges par rtogs pas bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul khrims yin/pha rol gyi sems bsrungs pA sau gzhan gyi 'khrul
211a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la nyes par mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin/bsdu ba'i dngos po rje su mi gtong bas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin te/shA ri'i bu
211a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i
211a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tha ma'i sems med pas sangs rgyas la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin/dam pa'i chos
211b1(dkon brtsegs): bsrungs pas chos la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin/'phags pa 'dus pa la gus pas dge 'dun la dad pa'i tshul khrims yin/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'//
211b2(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas 'dud pa'i tshul khrims yin/byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs bsags pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten po'i tshul khrims yin/
211b3(dkon brtsegs): mi dge bo'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spong ba'i tshul khrims yin/sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pas byams pa'i
211b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yin/nyams thag par gyur pa'i sems can yongasu smin par byed pas snying rje'i tshul khrims yin/chos la dga' zhing rab tu mos pas dga' ba'i
211b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yin/rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pas btang snyoms kyi tshul khrims yin te/shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcu po de dge gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
211b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya'o//shA rI'i bu gzhan yang rnam pa bcus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag par rig par bya ste/bcu gang zhe
211b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/sems can yongasasu smin par byed pas sbyin pa'i tshul khrims yin/sems kun tu bsrungs pas bzod pa'i tshul khrims yin/mi bzlogs pas brtson 'grus
212a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims yin+da/bAsam gtan gyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs par byed pas bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims yin/thos pa dang tshul
212a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis mi ngoms pas shes rab kyi tshul khrims yin/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas thos pa yo su tshol ba'i tshul khrims yin/rtag
212a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes so sor rtog pas lus la mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin/sems la sgyu ma lta bus so sor rtog pas srog la yid mi ston pa'i tshul khrims yin
212a4(dkon brtsegs): thog ma nas tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzog sa par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin/tshul grims thams cad yongasu bsngo
212a5(dkon brtsegs): bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa'i tshul khrims yin te/shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcu po dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongasu dgra par
212a6(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims shin tu yongasu dge pa'i byang chub sems dpas lha dong me'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa myong bar mi 'gyur ba
212a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do//'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas mi shes pa gang yang med de//des sems can thams cad longs spyod dang nye bar spyod
212b1(dkon brtsegs): bzlab pang po b+h+yod bya gang yang yod do//rba waT+Ta na dz+nyAn mo mdza' bdu gyur 'a gang yang yod do/del byung chub snams dpa' 'ang khro ba sad du/
212b2(dkon brtsegs): gang sa byang chub sems dpa' ma dang par 'gyur ba gaudz+nyAn du rmA bai d+hi gang yang med//de sems can grang sa yang mer 'odu gis maM bskyed pa med do//de sems
212b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun gyi ngos na sems can gang la yang phar 'du shes mi bskyed pa med de//de sems can gang la yang yid rton pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed pa med do//de 'dus byas ste
212b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang mi rtag par 'du shes mi bskyed pa med do//de thams cad du 'du byed du gtogs par shes nas lus dang srog la mi lta ste/tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'i
212b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis dri skad gsungs te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/
212b6(dkon brtsegs): skyon pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo //tshul khrims 'di la gang gnas pa//slob pa yi ni chos sku dang //dbyangs dang kha dog gzugs rnams ni//de dag lani
212b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed mi dka'//'dongs gang dmus long mi 'gyur la//zhwa skur zhar bar mi 'gyuraro//'byung ba rnam par dag 'gyur zhing //de yi lus ni mdzes par 'gyur//stobs/
213a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyutshe gong na maHche ste//gzo brjod rje zhing gso brjod dag/shes rab dang ni brtson 'grus so//sdug can bdud ni sprug par byed//rgyu //
213a2(dkon brtsegs): yis ni mngon mchod cing //lha klu rnams kyis bkur bsti byas//the tshom thams cad chad par 'gyur//de dag byams pa shin tu bsgoms//tshu lo khrims phung
213a3(dkon brtsegs): po rab gnas nas//gsod par byed kyang 'jigs pa med//grags pa chen po chos spyod pa//ngan 'gro dag tu mi 'gro'o//sems can thams cad gnyid log kyang
213a4(dkon brtsegs): snyom pa med cing mi nyal te//phyogs bzhi dag ni kun tu yang //legs par spyad po yongasu tshol//tshul khrims phung por gnas pa dag/rin chen mchog dang chung
213a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang //bdag gi sha yang rab gtong zhing //byang chub lam ni kun tu tshol//sangs rgyas chos ni bla na med pa//mchog gi chos rnams yongasu tshol//'jig
213a6(dkon brtsegs): rten dag gi mgon gyur zhing //mchod rten dag ni sbyin par 'os//gshe shing yongasu spyod pa dang //nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod//bzod pa nyid la rab
213a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing //bzod pa yi ni bsngags pa brjod//mi bden pa ni mi smra ste//ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed//byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni//sa 'di dag
213b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang g.yo bar byed//sangs rgyas chos la nem nur myed//lha gzhan dag ni rab tu spong //rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//lha gzhan yod par mi 'gyur ro//
213b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshon dag dang ni dug rnams kyis//phan tshun gnod par byed pa yi//snrums ni byed par 'gyur ba dang //de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do//sems can sdug bsngal
213b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong na//bskul pa byed pa mang por yang //bdog gi don ni mid gyur kyang //yal bar 'dor bar mi 'gyur ro//don rlud nA ni mdza' bo zhes//phan
213b4(dkon brtsegs): tshun du ni rab tu smra//don ni byed par ma gyur na//gcig la gcig ni gsod par byed//'dzam bu yi ni gling 'di dang //sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu//rin chen bkang
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ste sbyin byas nas//rtag tu bdog gi grogasu 'gyur//gang dag mtshon rnams rnon po yis//yan lag nying lag gcod pA yi//sems can dag ni thams cad la//
213b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni mnyam par rab tu 'jug/sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams phyir//byis pa rnams kyi chos spong ste//chos la shin tu gnas gyur pas//tshul khrims rtag
213b7(dkon brtsegs): ku dag par 'gyur//rjes kyi rjes 'thun chos zhugs nas//byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod//sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir//rig gsum bdud rtsi rab tu sbyin//
214a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims phung por gnas byas nas//chos rnams thams cad mngon par bslabs//mkhas pa lha dang bcas pa yi//'jig rngan na ni mchod par/
214a2(dkon brtsegs): 'os chos rnams kun la the tshom med//bzo kun la yang rab tu mkhas//sems can bsam pa shes gyur nas//snyan pa'i tshig 'di smon par byed//
214a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims phung po rnam sbyangs nas//byang chub dam par sangs rgyas te//shing mchog drung du 'dug byas nas//sdig can bdud ni skrag par byed//nyi zla
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ni snang ba ltar//gzo brjid drag po 'od byed pa//de ltar sems can mchog 'gyur zhing //shes rab kyi ni mig las byung //sems nan rnams la
214a5(dkon brtsegs): lag byin te//srid pa la ni lam rnams ston//rtag tu gsong por smra 'gyur te//de dag la ni phrag dog med//bdag dang ra ni tshin gzhan dag kyang //mang //
214a6(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ni myur du gtong //de ni brgya lam byang chub mchog/gtong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no//dud dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs//bdenA pa'i tshig lnga
214a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas//tshul khrims phung por rab gnas pas//de dag la ni sgyu medo//brdzun zer ba dag 'ongs gyur nas//sbyin zhing bya zhes zer yang ni//bden pa'i
214b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig la gnas pas na//dad pas de la drad par 'gyur//phan tshun gcig la gcig smra ba//chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms rnams/'di bzhin smras te ma yin yang //de la
214b2(dkon brtsegs): yid ni 'khrug pa med//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes
214b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do//sems can thams cad la pha mar 'du shes bskyed do//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yon tan med par 'du shes bskyed do//tshor ba dang rnam par rig pa la
214b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med par 'du shes bskyed do//de mnyam po dang mi mnyam par yang sems kyis mngon par mi bsgrub po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te sems kyis mnyam
214b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa na mya ngan las 'das pa sems las 'das par 'gyur ro//sems kyis mi mnyam par byed na ni chags pa'i sems su 'gyur bas ches mi mnyam par 'gyuraro//
214b6(dkon brtsegs): mig dong gzugs lA brten nas migi rnam par shes pa skye ste chags pa'i sems bskyed nas 'gagos pa de'i bag la nyal gyis sems de'i rang bzhin du skye ste/mi bden
214b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dmigs pa la mi bden pa'i sems sdugo zhes rtog ste/de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o//mi sdug pa'o zhes mos pa byed pa ni rnam par grol ba'o//rnam par krol ba
215a1(dkon brtsegs): gdan pa de zad pa'o//tsa zad con gang zad pa deni 'dod chagasu zad bu/zho byung zad dag gto mug zad pa'o//du n+d+ha phyo zhe na/'dod chags skad//
215a2(dkon brtsegs): cig gis zad par 'gyur te/'dod chags kyang gzhan la zad pa yang gzhan zhig yin du zin na 'dod chags yang dag pa nyid 'gyuraro//de ltar 'dod chags yang/
215a3(dkon brtsegs): drug pa ma yin pas zad par 'gyur ba yung shA ri'i bu 'dod chags ni tshul bzhin ma yin po'i yid la byed pa las byung ba kun tu rtog pas phye ba ste/gang kun tu
215a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa de ni mi rtog//rtog pa sbyangs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/de la 'dod chags med pa ni yang dag pa ma yino//gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de la sdug
215a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal med yongasu gdung ba me do//gang yongasu gdung ba med pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o//gang yang drag pa ma yin pa de la gdung ba med/de ni bsil bar
215a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin pas de la 'dod chags med//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mya ngan las 'das pa ni sems dang ldan pa ma yin te/'di ltar 'dod chags
215a7(dkon brtsegs): zad par byed par 'gyuraro//mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'dod chags zad pa ste/de ltar 'dod chags kyang gzhan mya ngan las 'das pa yang gzhan te/gang gzhan yin pa
215b1(dkon brtsegs): deni pha rol bas kyang pha rol pha rol bas kyang phyi rol gang yin pa de na mkhas pa rnams yongasu tshol to/yongs su tshol ba ni snying po mi dmigs so//gang skyong po med//
215b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gsob bo//gsob gang yin pa de ni gsob po//gsob gang yin pa de ni stong pa'o//nas stong zhe na/bdag dang bdag gi dang //rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang
215b3(dkon brtsegs): ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis stong ste/gang sems can+da me ba de ni srog med pa ste//de las 'dod chags mi skye//zhe sdang mi skye gAti mug mi skye'o//ci
215b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pas nga zhes bya ba 'am nga'i zhes bya ba 'am/'di ni nga 'di ni nga'i zhes ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa log pa 'di 'byung zhe ni/nga yir 'dzin pa las mngon
215b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa 'byung ste de la mngon par 'du byed pa ni bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/lus kyis mngon par 'du byed do//ngag gis mngon par 'du byed do//
215b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis brtags nas drugra rtsub po smras te de nas phyir lus kyis gnod par byed do//de ltar bdag dang /gzhon du 'du shes pa la 'du shes 'dzin par 'gyur
215b7(dkon brtsegs): ro/rtagazhan yang shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni 'du shes kyi mdud pa yin te shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'du
216a1(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzo rje dus na sa dun byung ba da par mi spyod pa'is sa rgyun gang yang rnyi smra sbyin /ma na rnams cad gnA bAs
216a2(dkon brtsegs): dan pa kyi sems sbyin sa d-i shes /ni gi mas byed ni pa rlung du shes pasas sa/ na
216a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i ma rgyan mas kyang byu hU~M ma na sbyin pa byung du ni Sh+ma
216a4(dkon brtsegs): khring sa ga tu kyid med pa sa rgyas mi khyab pa de'i dris da'i rkyen mchag gi tshig can nis bye ba de bzhin pa shebyas pa dag
216b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na meng pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
216b2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du zhugs so//de'i nyan thos bye ba khwag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i 'dus pa
216b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po byung ngo //yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa rnyed ces bya ba zhig rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa ste/kha
216b4(dkon brtsegs): dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/de btsa sau ma thag tu mas bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin/phyas bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin/mdza'
216b5(dkon brtsegs): blo dang nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams kyis bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong byin/pha ma'i gnyen bshes kyis kyang bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gnyen gyi g.yog tu byin//
216b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i phas khang pa gsum byedadu bcug pa 'di lta ste/dpyid sa dang /dbyar sa dang /dgun sa byaso//byang chub sems dpa' dus bzhin du khang pa'i steng na 'dug ste gang ni
216b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa der sel snyan thogs pa brgya stong du ma 'ongs nas bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed//rol mo'i sgra phyung ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'du shes skyes//sgra 'gags ma thag tu sgra 'di dag ga
217a1(dkon brtsegs): las byung /glang du byung /gung nas 'gags/gang du 'gags shes yong su tshol te//de mtshan mo 'du shes kyang mo sgra/nyon no 'du shes kyang mi skye zhing gzhan du ni rtog par 'dugs skye
217a2(dkon brtsegs): de mngon par mi dga' ba'i du shes skye'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa de lo stong phrag bzhi bcung nam yang yid rol mo la chags par ma gyur to//lo stong phrag bzhi 'dud
217a3(dkon brtsegs): nam yang 'dod pa la ma spyad//de nyid na de khyim na gnas bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi rnams la bsam gtan byed mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas de khyim de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang
217a4(dkon brtsegs): las bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin
217a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po cung zad cig zhu'o snyam pa dang /shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi nyin par yongasu mya ngan las
217a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das te/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i drung du phyin nas dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes dris na de la dge slong na re rigs kyi bu de bzhin ga
217a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes zer ro//de yongasu mya ngan las 'das zhes thos nas/sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing brgyal te kha bub tu sa'i steng du 'gyel nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
217b1(dkon brtsegs): smas so//'jig rten sgrol mdzad 'di lta bu//chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin//bag med glan su bdag song nas//bdag nyid yongasu bslus par gyur//bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gis//de
217b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'byung 'gyur na//mgon po bdag gis ma mnyes byas//bdag gi skyabs 'gyur su zhig yod//bdag la sangs rgyas ma brjod pa//ma ni bdag gi dgra yin
217b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam//skyes ma thag tu de yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba sgeg/gang gos 'dod la bdag sbyar ba//pha ni bdag gi dgrang sems te//de dag dbang du gyur pa na//
217b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po ma mnyes byas//'di ltar sangs rgyas gsung sgra ni//yan lag drug cu bdag ma tho so//bdag gi sangs rgyas ma mnyes byas//bdag la nyams pa chen po
217b5(dkon brtsegs): byung //'jig rten phran mdzad thugs brtse de lta bu//chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin pa ni//bag med pa yis de ring du 'das te//rkang gnyis gtso bo bdag gis ma
217b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyes byas//bskal pa khrag khrig bye ba phrag brgyar yang //sangs rgyas brgya lom mthong ba'adra rnyed par dka'//bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas phyin pa ni//rgyal ba
217b7(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dir bdag gis ma mnyes byas//skyes ma thag tu sangs rgyas ma brjod po//pha dang ma ni de rang dgra yin snyam//gal te rgyal ba bzhugs pa mthong gyur nas/
218a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes rnams nyan cing mchod pa bya ba zhig/bde klu shegs mya ngan rangs nas padod 'ongs pas//de bzhin gshegs kyi yan lag drug cu //
218a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag kun+da dang ldan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba//rgyal ba de dag bdag gis dang ma thos//mye dran 'das nas 'dir ni bdag phyin+d+ra pa//de ring bdug la nyams pa
218a3(dkon brtsegs): po byung //sngon gyi sangs rgyas bdag gis rtag bstan pa/gya nom chos rnams bdag la mi ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' des byon/
218a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas myur du langs te/bcom ldan 'das mchog gi tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga l+ya ba der song /
218a5(dkon brtsegs): byin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i khri le ngu zhing lan brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nasas phyogs bcig tu 'dug ste/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//sems
218a6(dkon brtsegs): con mchog ni yang drag ste//yang dag chos rnams bstan pa mdzad//byang chub dam pa mchog gi phyir//bdag gi sems ni yang dag skyes//shes rab chen
218a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag gsung //de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste//rgyam po khyud kyi tshe 'dra ba//bdag gi shes pa'ang de 'dre'a' gyur//bdag sngon stobs kyang chud pa ste//
218b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab zhan pa bdud kyi phyogs//khyim gyi gan snga na mchis pas ni//mi yi gtso bo ma mnyes bgyis//sngon ba gyis bsod nams mchis pas ni//de bzhin gshegs bad//
218b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mthong //tshe sna rnams bdag la mi ston pas//de phyir shin tu sdug bsngal lo//lha dang klu ye mdun du ni//bden pa'i tshig rnams bdag gis brjod//
218b3(dkon brtsegs): ci ste bdag ni yang drag tu//ji skad smras pa bzhin gyur te//ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe//glang po chen po doni gzigs pa//yang dag nyid kyi chosde ston pa//mi mchogs sangasu
218b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi//mi khom par ni mi skye zhing //skyes nas 'dod pa bsten mi 'gyur//bud med dngos por mi 'gyur zhing //bdud kyi bcing ba bcad par bgyi//mngon
218b5(dkon brtsegs): som du ni chos ston pa//sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag tu blta//mthong nas rab tu dad par bgyi//dad nus pasti stang rim gro bgyi//bdag gis gang smras tshig 'di ni//yang
218b6(dkon brtsegs): dag bden par 'gyur zhe na//bdon pa desnga na sangs rgyas 'di//byang chub bzhin du bzhugs par shog/tshig 'di rnams ni smras pa dang //de bzhin gshegs pa co gar
218b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs//lha rnams bye ba phrag stong gis//de tshe rab tu gos rab gtor//de ni rab tu yid dga' nas//bar snang la ni 'dug gyur te//bar snang la yang 'dug nasu//
219a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyul sa drol tshogs rgyad bskad//snang bar gyur ba phad pa'i thugs//rdzu 'phrul rjod pa dam pa ga spyad/mchog chos rnams chos
219a2(dkon brtsegs): ba sangs rgyas smra su po mgon po dran//des tshigs su bcad pa de dag spros nas//'khor rnams rgya cher tshim par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
219a3(dkon brtsegs): smras so//bdag ni mi gtses lung bstan te//'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas 'gyur//bdag gi rjesu slob kyis la//de bzhin gshegs la rim gyis//bdan
219a4(dkon brtsegs): la rjes su thugs brtse'i phyir//mya ngan 'das pa'ang bzhengs gyur na//'jig rten mgon po bsam mi khyab/su zhig sangs rgyas dang mi byed//de bzhin gshegs pa
219a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga dis dge ba rtswa ba bskyod do//mcho de ba dang rim gro byas nas dge ba rtsa ba de nyid kyis de nas shi 'phos pa dang ngade 'gro mtho ris su skyo ste//de bskul pa bye ba phrag
219a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi shur ngan 'gro log por ltung bar ma song ngo //bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'dod pa la nam yang yongs su ma spyad do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed
219a7(dkon brtsegs): chub rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang rim gro cher byas te thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/de bskal pa tha ma la dus
219b1(dkon brtsegs): tha ma bdag gi dngos po la ma thob pa'i/rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
219b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rig pa dung zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes hU~M 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na myed pa lce dang myi rnams rje ston pa srungs rgyas bcas
219b3(dkon brtsegs): ljoldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das sA la'aM rgyal po'i chu'i ched nI bsgral pa bye ba phrag nyi shur gyur to//shU ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
219b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sa la'i rgyal po'i nyin thos 'dus pa ni gnyis 'byung ste//nyan thos 'dus pa gcig la ni dge slong bye ba phrag nyi shu yang do//nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni dag
219b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ljon par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha
219b6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu son pa'i bar du'o//yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur to//shA rI'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan
219b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni lo stong phrag bcur gnas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so//bskal pa bye ba phrag bdun//
220a1(dkon brtsegs): dun 'gror nAm+b+ha yang ma song skye//bskal pa bya ba nyi shur yang //'dod pa dag la yong ma bston//de yo byar du sangs rgyas no//stong phrag bdun rnam+b+ha
220a2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das//der ni tshangs par spyod spyad de//chos 'dod par yang rtag tu gyur//de phyis byang chub sangs rgyas nas//rgyal po sA la'i dbang por gyur//bye ba stong phyug
220a3(dkon brtsegs): srom cu rnams//byang chub mchog la rA hUM bkad//srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas nas//bskul pa bye phrag nyi shAr ni//sgog
220a4(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams la chos bstan te//stong phrag dag ni bzhi bcu dang //gzhan yang bye ba nyi shu spyad//thams cad zag zad drang srong gi/dge 'dun de tshe do la byung /
220a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //rang bsrel shin tu rgyas par gyur//mchod rten stong phrog drug cu dang //bye ba dag kyang der byung ngo //mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos//
220a6(dkon brtsegs): lo ni stong phrag bcur gnas te//rgyal ba'i bstan pa thos nas ni//su zhig de la dang mi byed//sangs rgyas kyi ni chos thos nas//mkhas pa su dag nem nur med//
220a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste//myur du mya ngan 'das la reg/shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la /
220b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mar 'du shes bskyed de/'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa nA mar 'du shes pas spong ngo //zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa ni phar 'du shes pas spong ngo //shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
220b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la mi mthun pa mang du gnas pa yin te/de 'dod chags kyi phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'dod pa la
220b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi mthun pa bskyed do//de 'dod pa dang 'dod pa'i mthun pa yang rab tu shes so//de la 'dod pa gang 'dod pa'i mi mthun pa gang zhe na/'dod pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gis she
220b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i gzugs la mngon par chags ni ni 'dod pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni gang rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra la mngon par chags pa'o//de bzhin du sbyar te
220b5(dkon brtsegs): gang snas shes par bya ba'i dri dang //lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang /lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya ma mngon par chags pa de ni 'dod pa zhes bya'o//de la gang ma don
220b6(dkon brtsegs): par tshigs pa de ni lhag par zhen pa'o//gang lhag par zhen pa de ni kun tu sbyor ba'o//grong kun tu sbyor ba de ni mngon par 'grub pa'o//grang mngon par 'grub pa de ni 'ching
220b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/de yang yang dag pa ma yin pa 'drid pa'o//de ltar kye ma'o//sems can 'di dag ni yang dag po ma yin pa 'drid pa'i 'tshong bas bcings pa ste/bcings pa/nges par
221a1(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa/shin tu nges par bcings pa'o//cis bcings zhe na/gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa ni bcings shes bya ba nas sgra dang dri dang
221a2(dkon brtsegs): dang reg gi bar gyi 'ching bas bcings pa de ni bcings shes bya'o//gzugs kyi 'ching ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus thob pa'i gzugs de la gang bdag du 'du shes
221a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //srog tu 'du shes pa dang /gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang //rtag par 'du shes pa dang /brtan par 'du shes pa dang /ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang /rjes su
221a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang /ril por 'du shes pa dang /gong bur 'du shes pa de ni gzugs kyi 'ching ba zhes bya'o//yang gzugs kyi 'tshong po gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus
221a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa de la rim gro bya'o snyam nas de bdag la byams pas chung ma la mngon par chags par byed de/gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings nas 'dod pa
221a6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod thob pas mi dge ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed de 'dod pa'i nyes pa mi shes so//de la 'dod pa'i nyes pa gang zhe na/nyes pa dag la 'dod pa dang /nyes
221a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'dod pa med mod kyang /gang ngan song du gzhol ba'i 'dod pa'i nyes pa de dag bstan par bya'o snyam mo//de la ngan song du gzhol ba'i 'dod pa'i nyes pa gang zhe na/
221b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la brten pa ni sdig pa mi byed pa cung bud med de/de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal yongs su bzung bar myi 'gyur bu grang yang med ces bu shad do//de ltar shA/
221b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu brtags na ji ltar bdag gi chung ma lta bu dgrar gyur pa ni gzhan gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
221b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni smre shes dang ldan no//sems can thams cad ni mi shes pa ste/gang ye shes dang ldan pas smad pa de ni rab tu yang dag pa'o//gang mi shes pas yongs su zin pa de ni/
221b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin no/ mi shes pas gang yongs su bzung zhe na/'dus byas yongs su bzung ngo //bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongasu bzung ngo //des de ltar yongs su bathung //

221b6(dkon brtsegs): gcod//tshul khrims kyi bar du gcod//bsam gtan gyi bar du garjod//mtho ris kyi bar du gcod//mya byin las 'das pa'i brar du bcod pa'o//bran pho dang bran mo
221b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dang /bu pho dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su 'dzin pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/bu pho dang bu mo dang chung ma
222a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dgar gyur pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o//sems can dmyal bya dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jog rten yongs

222a5(dkon brtsegs): da /shes rab kyi nor dang /gtong ba'i nor dang /khrel yod pa'i nor dang /ngo tsha shes pa'i nor nA po'i bar du gcod pa'o//chung me dang bu dang /bu mo yongs su
222a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ni ma dad pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o//chung mA dang bu dang bu mo yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nas ser sna dang /'chal pa'i shes rab dang /

223a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bkram po'i sa'o//chung ma ni pha rol gnon par byed pa dang 'dra'o//chung ma ni log bya'i las kyis rab tu gzir ba'o//ci'i phyir chung ma zhes bya zhi na//

223b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa zhes bya'o//de'i phyir bud med ces bya zhe na/nyes pa mang zhing sgyu mtha' yos pas de'i phyir 'dri ni sgyu ma ste bu med ces bya'o//gang bud med kyi dbang du song ba de dag

224a1(dkon brtsegs): ga sems mi banA ba/sems rab tu g.yo zhing mi brtun pu s+pho'u ya snyoms/spre'u dang mtshungs pa/sgyu ma smyon pa la mkhas pa ste/

226a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhen/nyams par 'du shes pa dang /g.yang slar 'du shes pa dang /phyis khung du 'du shes pa dang /rtag tu zlos nye bar dpyod cing 'du shes bya'o//

226a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i rigs kyis bus kha dog rgyus pa'i bud med mthong na 'od shes bzhi bskyed de/nyams par 'du shes pa dad /g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang /phyis khung

226a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/me 'dri ba la mar 'du shes pa dang /sring mo 'dra ba la sring mor 'du shes pa dang /bu mo 'dra ba la bu myor 'du shes paM ste 'du shes 'dogasu mo bskye

227a1(dkon brtsegs): par de ni tshul bzhin ma yin dzin//'dod chags sems ni kun nas langs//'di ni 'byung las gyur pa ste//'byung ba che la ji ltar logs/chos

227a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med skyes bu med//shodang+ga las skyes pa med/shed bu mod byed pa po med/tshor dab po med pa de la de ltar byed pa po med pa'i chos la su zhig chags par 'gyur/min
227a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sa'i chu bur dang 'dra ste rang bzhin gyis snying po med pa'o//chu'i chu bu ral yang bdag med sems can med/srog med gang zag med/skyes bu med/shed las skyes pa med
227b1(dkon brtsegs): shed bu med/byed pa po myed tshor ba po med/de ltar byed pa med g.yo ba med pa'i chos la su zhig chags par gyur/mig 'di ni smig rgyu dang 'dra stso las dang nyon mongs pa dang /
227b2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa las byung ba'i//smig rgyu la yang bdag med sems can med srog med/gang zag med skyes bu med/shid lus skyes pa med/shing bu medo byed pa po med tshor ba po med/
227b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa'i chos la smra zhig chags par 'gyur/mig 'di ni rgyu shing dang 'dra ste rang bzhin gyis snying po med pa'o//chu shing la yang bdag med sam
227b4(dkon brtsegs): tsun mod pa nas su zhig chags par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o//myig 'di ni sgyu/ma dang dra phyin ci log lngas byung ba'o//sgyu ma la ltung bdag myed sems can med pa nas su
227b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig chags par 'gyur gang du chags par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o//mig 'di ni rmi lamA dang 'dra ste/mi badren pa yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba'o//rmyi lam la yang bdang /
227b6(dkon brtsegs): med sems can med pa nas su zhig chags par 'gyur gang du chags par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o//mig 'di ni blag chu dang 'dra ste rgyun gyis kha na lus pa'o//b+hag chal yang
227b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med/sems can med pa nas su zhig chags par 'gyur gang du chags par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o//mig 'di ni gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste/las kyi gzugs pa

228a2(dkon brtsegs): mig 'di ni sprin dang 'dra ste/gr-isi lAM bAr 'khrug pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do//srin la yang bdag med sems can med pa nas su zhig tshigs par 'gyur gang du chags

228b6(dkon brtsegs): med gang zag med/skyes bu med shing las skyes pa med/shed bu med byed pa po med tshor ba po med de/de ltar byed pa po myed cing rkyen 'dus pa las byung ba de la su
228b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig chags par 'gyur gang du chags par 'gyur/de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i skye mched thams cad la yang rgyas par bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sgyu
229a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyis mi 'phrogs te/de lta bu'i gnas medado//de chos thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bla yin
229a2(dkon brtsegs): no//shA ri'i bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems
229a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad du srog chags la gsod par mi byed de srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la gnod pa ma yin na//srog gi phyir/
229a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam pa thams cad du ma byin par mi len te/gzhan gyi longs spyod lu mi rku ba yin no//srog gro byir yang rnam pa thams cad du 'drod pa la ldog par gau yems
229a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mi bskyen te/gzhan gyi chung mu lA snying chags par mi byed do//srog gi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smai ste sems can thams cad la mi slu ba yin no//bdag gi
229a6(dkon brtsegs): galog gis chog pas phra ma'i tshig mi zer ba yin no//srog gi phyir yang phra mo'i tshig med pa yin/tshig gzhan mi smra bsdu tshig tshod bzung ba yin/sog gi phyir
229a7(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi bskyed pas gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems med pa yin/srog gi phyir yang ngan du smra ba dang ngan du brjod pa'i
229b1(dkon brtsegs): dang du R+sha pas m+b+ha / bad du yin/sangs rgyas sgyu//bas song bas phyir yang ldog par lta bla ma spyod de lha gzhan mong pa smon/das shes gzhan mA rlub rang /
229b2(dkon brtsegs): bas ma nyims pa'i tshul khrims yin/dran par skye ba yongs su spangs pas skyon med pa'i tshul khrims yin/'gro ba ngan pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang ma 'dres pas
229b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims yin/chos dkar po gcig tu rnam par 'phol ba sra bras med pa'i tshul khrims yin/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bas rang dang
229b4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshul khrims yin/'gro ba la mkhas pas mA smad pas bsdigs pa'i tshul khrims yin/dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas shin tu bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims
229b5(dkon brtsegs): yin nananyes pa thams cad du mi skye bas ma smad pa'i tshul khrims yin/dbang po'i sgo bsdams pas shin tu sbas pa'i tshul khrims yin/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
229b6(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pas rnam par bsgrags pa'i tshul khrims yin/rung ba la chog shes pas 'dod pa nyung ba'i tshul khrims yin/skrod pa la dga' bas cho go shes pa'i tshul
229b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims yin/lus dang sems rab tu dben pas nan tan gyi tshul khrims yin/'du ba la mi dga' bas dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin/gzhan gyi
230a1(dkon brtsegs): gdod du mi lta bas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i tshul khrims yin/bdag gi kha nu las pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas sbyangs pa'i
230a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshul khrims yin/lha dang mi rnams la mi bslu bsu ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa'i tshul khrims yin/sems can thams cad lo mi 'tshe rdzobs byam

230a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims yin/rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bas btang snyoms kyi tshul khrims yin/rang gi sems nges par rtogs pas bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog
230a5(dkon brtsegs): pA'i tshul khrims yin/gzhan gyi sems rjes su bsrung bas gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la nyes par mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can yongs su
230a6(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shan tu bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khong khro ba med pa'i tshul khrims
230a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dge ba'i chos mi bzlogs pa'i tshul khrims yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su
230b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i tshul khrims yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas thos pa rab kyi tshul khrims yin/byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs bsags pas dge ba'i bshas gtsun la brtan/
230b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims yin/lam ngan pa yongs su spong pos sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims yin/mi rtag par 'du shes so sor rtog pas lus la mi lta ba'i
230b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yin/yid mi rton pas srog la mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yin/bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pas mi 'gyod pa'i tshul khrims yin/rab tu sbyor ba shin tu yongs
230b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag bsra bcos ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims yin/lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pas yongs su gdung ba med pa'i tshul khrims yin/'dod chags dang bral bas
230b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rgod pa'i tshul khrims yin/bsgrub pas mi snyems pa'i tshul khrims yin/cang shes pas mu cor du mi smra ba'i tshul khrims yin/khro ba med pas dul ba'i tshul
230b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims yin/nye bar zhi bas zhi ba'i tshul khrims yin/ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin las 'gal bar mi byed pas bka' blo bde ba'i tshul khrims yin/bsdu ba'i dngos po rjes su mi gtong
230b7(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i tshul khrims yin/rang gi nor rab tu mi 'jigs pas chos rjes su bsrung ba'i tshul khrims yino//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
231a1(dkon brtsegs): draba' mkhas pa ni 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' de la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyang po spyod pa rnams bdung dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bus mi thul
231a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/phas kyi rgol ba gzhan dag gis kyang mi thul ba yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' gdul

231a5(dkon brtsegs): dang du len pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas/grang po dang che ba dang /bkras pa dang skom pa dang /rlung dang nyi ma dang sbrang bu dang sha sbrang dang /sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang /ngan
231a6(dkon brtsegs): du smra ba dang /ngan du brjod par tshig gi lam la bzod pa dang ldan pa yin no//lus la tshor ba byung zhing skyes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /shin tu drag po dang /rtsub pa dang /tsha ba dang /

231b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing btsud/tshig rnaM pa dang dag rlu za mig smra ba de la shA ri'i ba du khri byu hAzhe sdang dang /gaN+DI mug dang sbyi sngas yongs su gying ba ma skyes so//de sta ltung bar zhugs

231b5(dkon brtsegs): shi bi dang mi snyan par zer ba cher rab tu gnas pa de dag las de 'dra ba'i rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub ste/ga shi bdod mi snyan zer nga rnyed par 'gyur

232b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi yi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gron bu dang /gser dang nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang mun shel dang /byi ru dang gser dang dngul gyis yangs

232b6(dkon brtsegs): gau shI ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ci bdag la pha rol gshe 'am mi snyan par zer ni/sangs rgyas dang byang chub dang chos dang dge 'dun yid la
232b7(dkon brtsegs): byed dam zhes bdag gi mthu shes par bya ste/gal te yid la byed na legs/yid la mi byed par gyur na des rnam grangs du mar sangs rgyas sam byeng chub bamatsha
233a1(dkon brtsegs): sum dge 'dun yid la bya'o//yid la mi byed na de drug kyang gnod sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub dang chos dang dge 'dun yid la mi
233a2(dkon brtsegs): byed bdag kyang yid la mi byed na/bdag dang sems can de dag tu khyad par ci zhig yod tha dad pa ci zhig yod/dka' bar spyod pa ci zhig yod kyis/de dag dang bdag

233a4(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bdag la bskul bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag ni sems can gcig bzung la sems can thams cad btang ba ma yin gyi bdag gis bla na med///

233a6(dkon brtsegs): te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bdag la rigs kyi bu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs te/sems can thams
233a7(dkon brtsegs): cad la chos ston par mkhyen to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyis gzigs pa chags pa med pa thogs pa med pas/sangs rgyas bcom
233b1(dkon brtsegs): ston 'das kyis bdag mkhyen te/gal te bdag gnod sems kyi dus na btang snyom sum gyur cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub dang chos dang dge 'dun yid la myi byed na de ni bdug ng+ga rmA/
233b2(dkon brtsegs): tshechetshe//shar phyogs kyi dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grad+hI 'bye ma dang mnyam pa gang da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs
233b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyus bcom ldan las de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu des 'di ltar sems bskyed de/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
233b4(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can thams cad la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du bdag gis semaso bskyed pa mkhyen te//yang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang shar lho dang /
233b5(dkon brtsegs): nub dang nub byang dang byad shar dang /de bzhin du snying dang 'og gi phyogs dang de ltar phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
233b6(dkon brtsegs): ying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa gang de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par
233b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs so zhes padage bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad la chos ston cing bzod pa'i
234a1(dkon brtsegs): /bsngags pa brjod par bya'o zhes sems bskyod pa da mkhyen gyis dro bas na song go'i sgra bsgrags la bdag wa'i sgra bsgrogs pa ni mi bya'o//kye ma'o 'di lha
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/seng ge'i sgra/de ni bzod pa'i stobs shes par byed pa'o//kye ma'o 'di lta ste wa'i sgra de ni ga she ba dang mi snyan par zer ba'o//sems can 'di dag ni sems can gang
234a3(dkon brtsegs): don byed na sems can de yang de'i don byed do//bdag kyang sems can gang gis don byas pa de'i phyir de'i don byed par gyur na de la khyad par ci zhig yod/tha dad pa ci zhig
234a4(dkon brtsegs): yod dka' bar spyod pa ci zhig yod/sems can 'di dag ni sems can gang gnod par byed na de la sems can de yang gnod par byed do//bdag gis kyang sems
234a5(dkon brtsegs): can gang gnod par byed na bdag kyang de la gnod par byed de gnod pa'i phyir gnod par byed na de la khyad par ci zhig yod dad pa ci zhig yod dka' ba spyod pa ci zhig yod par
234a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur////bam po bcu gnyis pa//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar slob ste sems can 'di dag thams cad ni phan tshun du mi
234a7(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba de dag nor thob pa ni mdza' bar shes gnod par byas na ni gcig la gcig gsod par byed do//bdag ni sems can gyi don la tsham tsham med de/bdag la
234b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod par gyur kyang bdag sems can gyi don bya'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//bskal pa bye ba mang po brgyararA/
234b2(dkon brtsegs): bradag la gnod par gyur kyang ni//sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong na//yal bar bor zhing mi 'dug go/don rnyed na nI mdza' bo zhes//phan tshun gcig lo gcig sgra
234b3(dkon brtsegs): yi/don rnams byed par mi 'gyur na//phan tshun du ni gnod par byed//nga dang rtag tu mdza' bya zhes//'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad dang //sangs rgyas zhing rnams rinra
234b4(dkon brtsegs): po che rnga 'ba' zhig bkang ste sbyin byed dang //gang dag mtshon ni rnon po yis//yan lag nying lag gcod pa yi//sems can rnams ni thams cad la//mnyam pa ni
234b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sems su bya//ga shaM dang mo snyan zed pa dang //ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod//bzod pa la ni rab gnas nus//bzod pa dag gi bsngags pa brjod//dug ldud

235a1(dkon brtsegs): na/bsgral pa rjod khrag rdzog pan+d+ha b+hU b+h+r-i du dra b+hUb dang mtshan 'an sa shong 'gron da yud nam+b+ha dang 'argyur ma spyar nasmos na rlung nga smra sa byu/

235a4(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba khang khro ba zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bar+b+ba stod du bsgribs pa'i dge ba'i rtsu ba 'joms pa ste yang phyir bdag gis bsgral pa bad+d+ha stong du dag bu bsgrub blor byung ni //
