255b4(dkon brtsegs): byed nas khye'u de bor te bros pa dang /bud med gzhan 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang byer ro//dri nas shA ri'i bu bud med de dag ring zhig tu phyin pa dang slar log te blta zhing
255b5(dkon brtsegs): lho 'am klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am/lha ma yin nAm/nu mkha' ldi dam mi 'am tsi 'am/lto 'phye chen po 'am/grul bum 'am/'byung po 'am/shi za
255b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/mi dang /mi ma yin pa 'am/'di su zhig shes par bya'o snyam mo//shA ri'i bu de nus khye'u des bsam pa/kye ma'o bud med de dag ni bde ba las bros par gyur to/
255b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di smras so//nga ni khyod kyi don 'dod kyis//gnod pa 'byung gis mi 'jigs shig/khyod ni lam ngan zhugs pa las//ngas ni rab tu thar par bya//
256a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod rnams de las 'jigs par byed//dgra rnams kyis ni mdun du bdar//log par lta bar lung ba las//dus ni khyod rnams dgrol bar bya//
256a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u de'i me dang phyas skye bo phal po ches tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas khye'u de ga la ba dar dong ngo //de nas khye'u des rang gi ma dang pha la
256a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//nor dag dang ni 'bru dag rnams//khyim na rgya chen yod pa dag/myur du bdag la sbyin par gyis//bdag ni sangs rgyas nyan
256a4(dkon brtsegs): thos so//'jig rten gsum kun dkyil 'khor na//rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//de 'dra ba ni gad yang medo//bdug ni de yi nyan thos so//srog chags
256a5(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan pa'i phyir//chos rnams yang dag rabs sgron gang //rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//bdag ni de yi nyan thos so//gang gi sku la skyes tshan gyi//
256a6(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba//rnam gzigs 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad//bdag ni de yi nyan thos so//bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du//u dum wa ro'i me tog
256a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar//yang dag shin tu thos dka' ba//bdag ni de yi nyan thos so//de ltar shA ri'i bu khye'u de pha dang mas gser bye ba phrag nyi shu byin nas khye'u 'di ni khyod kyi pha ma'i nor
256b1(dkon brtsegs): skyon gyis gang la sems dang par gyur pa de la skyon pa b+hin cig nas de skad smras nas de'i tshe tshogs su bcad bu 'di dag ga sgras so//'di ni khyod kyi pha yi nor//de ni khyod khyim sa/
256b2(dkon brtsegs): no//gang du sems ni ngang gyur par//khye ru yis sbyin pa byin par gyur//dbyig rnams dang ni gser gyi rnams//khyim 'di ni ni yod pa dag/de dag myur du khyer gyis te//ga
256b3(dkon brtsegs): du sems dang der phul cig/melA cha dang ni gdang ba dang //byug pa phreng ba spos kyi rnams//dga' bzhin du ni khyer gyis la//glang 'du sems dang 'bul bya smra shog/sangs rgyas
256b4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang dge 'dun ni//bla na med pa'i bsod nams zhing //srog chags kun lnga phan pa'i phyir//de dag la ni sbyin pa byin/shI ri'i bu de nas khye'u des rang gi pha dang mya la slar tshigs
256b5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//rnam par gzigs pa 'jig rten mgon//de yi drung du bdag mchi ste//srog tshogs kun la phyin pa'i phyir// shin tu rgyas pa'i mchod pa bgyi/
256b6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang ni me dag las//gang dag bde ba 'dod pa rnams//bdag ni gang du 'dod pa yi//rjes bzhin du ni kun gshegs shig/shA rI'i bu de nas khye'u des bzhin du phyogs
256b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni re brnyas nas rangashi pha ma la gyi yab yum bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yid dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dgal
257a1(dkon brtsegs): bad+mor mchi'o zhes de dag smras pa dang /de skye bo mang pos thos nas/de dgu 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar na skyes nas nyin zhag gcig kho na lon pa'i khye'u/
257a2(dkon brtsegs): phra ma la smra zhing rkang gis 'gro bzhig go snyim nas/de srog tshogs bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur te/khye'u 'di lta 'amo//klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri zu 'am/l+h+wa ma
257a3(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/na mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am ci 'am/mi 'am/mi ma yin pa 'am/gang yin shes par bya'o//snyam mo//de nas khye'u de srog cha gos brgyad khri bzhi stong po dra
257a4(dkon brtsegs): dngag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ngo //yang shA ri'i bu khye'u de
257a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba na steng gi bar snang las gdugs stong phrag bcu byung nas de dag gis de'i lus bskyabs te/'di lus la rlung dang nyi mas gnod par ma gyur par byed do//yang khye'u de 'gro ba
257a6(dkon brtsegs): na steng gi bar snang las gser gyi dra ba bres par gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i las kyang 'das pa'i me tog gi char dang phye ma'i cher rab tu phab bo//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na
257a7(dkon brtsegs): bsil ba'i rlung lha'i dri dang ldan pa langs so//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam spos chus btab par gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na las gser gyi glegs bam go yogs mar
257b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam bus mo nub tsam du lha'i me tog chal par bkram par gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na rdzing bu stong phrag du ma byung ste rdzing bu de dag kyang yan lag brgyad
257b2(dkon brtsegs): dring ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang bA la me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu tA da /pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pe sgra 'byin par gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba nA lam gyi mu
257b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu bkrigs par gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i sil snyan mang po 'khrol bar gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gyi g.yas g.yon rin po ches kun
257b4(dkon brtsegs): tu gang bar gyur to//yang khye'u de 'gro ba na mdun du me tog gi srang zhig byung bar gyur te de la rkang pa 'dor zhing bteg pa dang mi snang bar gyur to//de nas khye'u de yud tsamu zhig lam du
257b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags de slar bltas nas tshogs su bcad de smras pa/rigs pa mi rigs nam yang mi 'grogs te//nga yi lam ni rgya chen tshul 'di gud na yod//khyod ni mi rigs pa ni
257b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa ste//rigs pa rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar bya//bskal pa khrag khrig mang por 'das kyang ni//brgya lam drug na mi yi lus thob cing //brgyu lam dag na sangs rgyas 'byung
257b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te//dad dang shes rab dag kyang brgya lam thob/shA ri bu khye'u des tshogs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gis legs
258a1(dkon brtsegs): /sgo zhes bya ba byin te/logs so logaso shes rab che//khyod kyis smras pa mchog yin gyis//mi rigs rnams ni phyi nas 'od//grogs po rigs pa khyod
258a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhud cig/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u des lha rnams las slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa//khyod kyis rigs shes smras pa dang //khyod kyis mi rigs shes smras pa/
258a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa'i don ni ji lta bu//mi rigs don kyang ji lta bu//shA ri'i bu de nas lha de dag gis khye'u de la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'dod pa'i longs spyod
258a4(dkon brtsegs): glagrang gnas pa//de dag mngon byung spyod yul min//de dag mi rigs rmongs pa ste//de dag sems can dmyal lam gnas//'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs byas nas//
258a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par ni rab byung ba//'jog rten 'dri na de dag rigs//de dag rigs shes rab tu bshad//shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u des lha de dag la slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa//
258a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rig shes bya ba de//khyed kyis de no mi shes so//ji ltar mi rigs shes bya ba//ngas ni de dag rib tu shes//de ltar shA ri'i bu khye'u de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
258a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la tshogs su bcud pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//'jig rten dag gi don phyir spyod//rigs gsum bdud rtsi rab
258b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa//glang po chen po seng ge che//rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'jig rten snang mdzad shin tu dkon//'jig rten mgon+da po 'od mdzad po//u dum wa ra'i me tog
258b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin//kha dog ldan zhing dbyibs mdzes pa//'jig rten 'di ni nye bar gces//'phags pa'i lam lA mi mkhas twa//sa yi steng ni dmus long bzhin//lam ngan par ni
258b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rgyug/mi mchog khyod ni ci 'dra bar//bdag ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur//me gsum dag gis tshig pa yi//sdug bsngal ba las sems can dgrol//srogs
258b5(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya po 'di kun yang //bdag gi slad du mchis pa lags//'di dag la ni tshes bstan cing //byang chub mchog la da gong du gsol//de nas shA ri'i bu khye'u nges tshigs
258b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs chos ston pa de la/'di skad
258b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang /srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
259a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra zigs la 'di skad ces gsol to//com ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mu 'ongs pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/
259a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cing 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs chos ston pa bzhin du chos ston par gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan
259a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po dri dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
259a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog
259a5(dkon brtsegs): du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/de dag gi
259a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par song ste/nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid spu skongs nas
259a7(dkon brtsegs): slar log ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to//shA ri'i bu de nus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i zham 'bring ba dge slong des bcom ldan
259b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/sten las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nus pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa le
259b3(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga lA ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
259b4(dkon brtsegs): la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//bcom ldan ci rgyu byed gshegs ci rkyen gyis//gang phyir 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum mdzad de//rab tu mdzes shing shin tu dkon
259b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba//rnam gzigs sangs rgyas mAchog la bdag zhu'o//rgyu ma mchis shing rkyen ma mims par ni//rkang gnyis gtso bo 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//'jig rten phan
259b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thugs brtsi 'dzum mdzad po//'di yi rgyu rkyen gang legs bdag la gsungs//thub chen gyi ni spyan sngar mchis pa yi//srog chags brgya skyong mchis pa 'di dag
259b7(dkon brtsegs): rna ba blags te mchis shing nyan 'tshal na//de dag thugs brtse'i slad du mgon pos gsungs//khyod kyi srog chags kun gyi mig lags te//khyod ni gnas skyabs mgon
260a1(dkon brtsegs): dang dpung gnyen lags//khyod ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod//'jig rten phan pa mdzad cing thugs brtse ba//khyod kyis 'das la rtag tu ye
260a2(dkon brtsegs): shes 'jug/khyod kyis ma 'ongs thams cad rab tu mkhyon//sangs rgyas zhing na cung zad ci mchis pa//byung ba dag la'ang the tshom mi mnga'o//de bzhin gshegs pa
260a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum ye shes ldan//chos kyi rje ni thams cad 'dzin pa'i gsung //'jig rten mgon po 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di//rgyu rkyen gang lags bdag ni khyod la zhu//khyod
260a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dir ni the tshom thams cad chod//khyod ni chos kun la yang the tshom med//yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung 'byin cing //srog chags mya ngan zug rngu bsal du
260a5(dkon brtsegs): gla stsol//rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba'i sems rgyas nas//sor mo bcu rnams thal mo rab sbyar te//'dzum pa mdzad 'di rgyu rkyen gang lags pa//chos rje khyod la bdag
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di zhu'o//shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des zham 'bring ba dge slo
260a7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong khyod kyis khye'u 'di mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/
260b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya yamasam/sa samasamasamathas na caH thas ma
260b2(dkon brtsegs): /kA' sprul pa/dge slong khye'u 'dis rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir/sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la chos gos dang /
260b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms dang //mel cha dang /ne bre'i gsos sman dang /yo byad kyis bsti stang byas/bla mar byas rim gro byas/mchod pa byas//de nas khye'u 'dis rdzogs pa'i byung
260b4(dkon brtsegs): chung btsal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas khrag khrig drug brtul tshangs par spyod pa spyad de//dge slong khyod kyis srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/
260b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo //bka' stsal po srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di dag ni sngon khye'u 'di'i pha mar gyur to//dge slong khye'u
260b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis 'di lta bu'i smon lam btab par gyur te gang dang gang du skyes pa na gang bdag gi pha mar gyur pa de dag bdag gis byang chub la dgod do//yang gnyis su ni de dag bud
260b7(dkon brtsegs): med kyi dngos por mngon par ma grub cig ces byas pas de dag de ltar khye'u de'i rjes su skyob pa'i tshul gyis bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
260b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis zham 'bring ba dge slong de la tshogs su bcad pa//
261a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di drug gsungs so//dge slong khyod kyi mdun nu khyo'u 'di dang //srog chags stong gnas mchog tu dga' snyoms kyis//ji ltar chos kyi bdug po 'di bzhin du//
261a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces sgra khyod kyi mthong ba ste//dge slong 'dis ni sngon gyi tshe rlabs la//lhar bcus 'jig rten dag la phan pa'i phyir//'jig rten rnam 'dren bye ba khrag khrig kyang //
261a3(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag drug cu bzhi la ri mor byas//byang chub mchog 'di la ni re ba'i phyir//de ni sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag bcu yi//bstan pa la ni ched du rab byung nas//de nas
261a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyad pa mchog spyad do//khyod kyis srog chags brgya stong brgyad cu bzhi//nga mdun 'dug pa de dag kun mthong ngam//de dag sngon chad 'das dus yangs pa ra//de ye
261a5(dkon brtsegs): mar ni gyur pa sha stag go/gang dang gang skyes da yi ma ru gyur pa//thams cad bdag gis byang chub mchog la dgod//ci nas bud med dngos por ma gyur zhes//des ni smon
261a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'di 'dra btab par gyur//de dag thams cad de yi rjes skyob cing //byang chub kyi ni saumus la gzhol bar 'gyur//'di dag rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog 'gyur zhes//
261a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni ngas lung bstan par bya//ma 'ongs dus na ji ltar spyod 'gyur zhig zhing mchog tu ni ji ltar 'gyur ba dang //de dag sngon gyi spyod pa rab shes te//nga yi phyir ni
261b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ngas bshad //dwe skad lung bstan pa ni thos gyur nas//rnam par gzigs pa 'jig rten spyod pa la//lha dang klu dwang de bzhin mi rnams dang //srog chags bye bA rnam
261b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dga' bar gyur//shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u de dag dga'o mgu rangs rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas//rings pa'i tshul gyis rang gi pha ma gang na ba der song ste phyin
261b3(dkon brtsegs): nas rang gri pha ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//srog chags brgya po de dag kun//sngon ni badrog gi mar gyur te//thams cad byang chub rab zhugs na//khyod kyi
261b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni gang du 'jug/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u de'i pha mas khye'u de la slar tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag slas rje so//khyod kyis de dag ji lta ba//de ltar nga yi sems
261b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste//dra ni thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur//'dril nga ni the tshom med//gang du skyes par nga ma bral//khyod la gnas ni 'di sbed gis//ji ltar byang chub nga 'thob par//rtag tu
261b6(dkon brtsegs): nga ni dran par gyis//shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u des rang gri ma bskyed par byed pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//ji snyed bdag gis bskul ba rnams//de dag thog mar sangs
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur//bdag ni skyes bu kha lo bsgyur//'jig rten sgron mar phyis 'gyur bgyi//shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i du na bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la khye'u
262a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung ba gzhan yin pa sgyum du the tshom dang yid gnyis za na de de lA m+bi l+yA'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po 'di ni de'i tshe de dus com ldan//
262a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi bstan po la khye'u der gyur to//de phyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu lag
262a3(dkon brtsegs): par lhung bar ma song ngo //bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying rje can+da zhes bya bar 'gyur te/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs las mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i dus na de'i yab ni grags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste dper na dri ltar de'i yab zas gtsang ma
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no//de 'i yum mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni//'di lta ste dper nang ltar nga'i yum sgyu ma bzhin no//de'i dus na de mya ngan med ces bya ba'i sras su gyur pa ni/'dul skye
262a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na da ltar nga'i sras sgra gcan zin bzhin te//de byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de byang chub thub pa la
262a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni lo brgya bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas de'i 'od kyis dpag tshad stong phrag bcur khyab par 'gyur ro//de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad rgya
262b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ro//nga nyan thos bye ba phrag ba r+b+ha dang /b+ha ba khrag khrig da /khwag zhog pargya spyong /'as pa 'byu ste/8nyan thos b+he ba na dgra tsum pa 'ba' th+liMg+h+ra ste/zag bzang ba tsun /
262b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/rnam par thor pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag ste/shA ri'i bu dgra gcom pa de dag dkon mchog gsum
262b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa thob par yongs su brjod pa 'byung ba de snyed de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du 'byung ste/thams cad kyang sngon mar gyur pa sha stag go/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos bstan to//
262b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can gyi don byas nas/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par
262b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par 'gyur te/'di lta ste dper no dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no//shA ri'i bu 'di ni skyes bu dam
262b6(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par brtags pa/skyes bu dam pas lta ba/tshul khrims ma mnyams pa/skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus mi zlogs pa ste/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
262b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos rjes su dran po'i sems bskyed de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus rab tu brtsam par bya ste/grangs kyi bgrang ba de snyed du btsal
263a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar bya'o//bskul pa de stong du ni 'khor bar mo bya'o//zhos de ltar mi bya'i/shA ri'i bu bsam gyis mo khyab pa'i go rgya ba ste/
263a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/'khor ba'i mtha' ma'i mtha' ji tsam par bdag 'khor bar bya'o/yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus lhod par mi bya ste/brtson
263a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mi ldog pa rtul ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtulnga ba gang zhe na/brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
263a4(dkon brtsegs): ni/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba lnga brgal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
263a5(dkon brtsegs): lngal blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtul ba mi nyams pa'o//dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten
263a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mes yongs su gang bra la brgal zhing yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/brgal zhing 'gro bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa'o///
263a7(dkon brtsegs): gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mas yongs su gang ba las brgal zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phyir 'gro bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
263b1(dkon brtsegs): brtul ba ma nyams pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtul pa ma nyam swA ba ni/gang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir brtul ba bskyed pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan
263b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtul po ma nyams pa ni gzhan yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir brtul ba bskyed pa'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'
263b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa ni mi lhod pa dang /brtan pa dang /mi ldog pa dang /bsam pa dge ba dang //snying rje chen pos rab tu non pas rtag tu sems can gyi don la brtson cing
263b4(dkon brtsegs): brtul ba bskyed pa'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa ni gang gom pa 'dag cing 'dor ba na yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ste/
263b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun mngon sum du byed cing sems can la lta yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi 'gro ba'o//shA rI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
263b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa ni grang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i semasna skyes shing byung ba rnams byang chub tu bsngo ste/de'i dge ba'i rna ba dri mi zad par 'gyur te/shAshA'i bu 'di lta ste dper
263b7(dkon brtsegs): na rgya mtsho chen por song ba'i chu ni bar mdor chung za bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/shA ri'i bu byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bar mi dang zad par mi 'gyur te/
264a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o//shu ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems drapa'i brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa yang dag par zhugs/
264a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sdud cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sdud pas de'i phyir brtson 'grus brtul ba mA nyams pa zhes bya'o//
264a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar slob ste/sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa dang /slob pa dang mi slob pa'i bsod nams
264a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po ji snyed pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sas do nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa dang /bsod nams de dag thams cad gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ba spu'i khung//
264a5(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig yongs su 'grub bo//ba spa'i khung du thams cad gtogs pa ji snyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag thams cad kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i chos sbyin byas nas
264a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur ro//de lta bu'i mchod sbyin brgyas ni sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par 'grub bo//de ltar 'jug pas mtshan thams cad kyang mngon par
264a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bo//mtshan thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin lasems kyi mdzod//
264b1(dkon brtsegs): sku yongs su 'grub po//mdzod spur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de dag las/brgya phrag stong du bsgres pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni de bzhin gshegs pa
264b2(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tor dbu'i gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba'i skyes bu chen po de'i mtshan mngon par 'grub bo//gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de dag las
264b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya stong du bsgres pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung yongs su 'grub ste/mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung des mtha' las
264b4(dkon brtsegs): mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po ji lta bar mos shing 'dul ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad do//de ltar dka' bas
264b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub kyang bdag gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ste/mtha'
264b6(dkon brtsegs): yes mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su spangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis go bar bya'o//zhes spro zhing gi cha mI 'dir ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i pac+doMn 'grus brtul ba mi nyams pa'o//
264b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dang /
265a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pas ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha//
265a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/brgya phrag stong gi cha'am/char rab bgrang bar ram/rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te de ltar gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham+ba
265a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa dang /de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong
265a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin du bskal pa brgyas
265a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/rgyas par mtha' yas mu mang
265a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa de dag gis ni/

265b1(dkon brtsegs): ram/bru grang bar ram/rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//ye shes la 'jug pa 'di thos nas mi dang mi skrag par mi 'gyur zhing ye shes de la 'jug par mos pa bskyed de/brtson 'grus
265b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsom zhing pri dang rgyus pa dang /rus pa dang /lpags pa dang /sha dang khrag dang /lus yongs su bskams par gyur kyang bla'i/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma thob kyi bar
265b3(dkon brtsegs): du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ni brtson 'grus brtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar slob ste/sems can thams
265b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'das pa'i sems ji snyed pa de dag sems can gcig gi sems gcig tu zhugs par gyur la/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems de tsam du tshad med cing
265b5(dkon brtsegs): mang bar gyur te/gang sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdadadu dang gti mug dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gang ba'i sems can de dag sems can gcig gi sems
265b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par gyur la/rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad de ji snyed kyi nyon mongs pa mang po tshad med par gyur kyang /de la bdag gis de 'dra ba'i shes rab dang /ye sha
265b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs yongs su btsal bar bya/'bad par bya/brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ste/ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi kun tu
266a1(dkon brtsegs): gdung pa dang /zhe sdang gi kun tu gdung bu dang /gti mug gi kun tu gdung ba de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya/dug med par bya/gzhol bar/
266a2(dkon brtsegs): bya/dkrol bar bya/thal bar bya/mya ngan las 'dis pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam du gang de lnga rdul bra de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba
266a3(dkon brtsegs): mau nyams pa bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtul bu mi nyams pa ni lus kyi las dge ba la gnas pa dang /ngag gi las dge
266a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pa dang /yid kyi las dge ba la gnas pa dang /brtson 'grus gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lus dang ngag dang sems dang ldan pa'o//lus dang

266b1(dkon brtsegs): thams ca sdud pa'o//de la gang gnas pa gang zhe na/gang snyoms can thams cad la phan 'dogasu pa'o//'jug pa ni 'khor bas yongs su myi skyo ba'o//gnas pa ni khams
266b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum mi dri mig sra pa'o//'jug pa ni nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o//gnas pa ni sbyin pa mi snyoms pa'o//'jug pa ni tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa'o//gnas

267b1(dkon brtsegs): spyo //'dun sams ldan 'grus sa gyu//dang rgyan 'grus la rnam pa dang /'ad pa dang rtul bde na byung chub sams dpa btsun grusanas blam ma du

268a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/shA ri'i bu yod do//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar n+tir+N+Na bu lags/bde bar gshegs pa ji m+WAr dzI lta bu lags/bka' sprul pa/shA ri'i du

268a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa nyams par 'gyur ba'o//shA ri'i bu chos dang po 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni/

269a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/pha ma la chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang /sring mo la chos kyi bar chud byed pa dang /mdza' dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams

269a5(dkon brtsegs): da'i byang chub kyi bar du yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'o gyur ba'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsung
269a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dge 'dod pa nyung ba dang 'thun pa yo byad bsnyungs pa dang 'thun pa/thos nas mi dad cing gzhan yang lta ba de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa
269a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la smod cing mnyes par mi byed de smad pa'i 'gro ba nyid du 'gro ba'o//smad pa'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can/
269b1(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i spyi gnas dang /gA shin+da rje'i 'jig rten dang /mtha' 'khob kyi yul mo dang /yan lag nyams pa dang /klaklo dang /log par lta ba'i sems can
269b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du skye ba ste/shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed pa nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
269b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'di lta ste/blon po dang /dri ma yin pa'i
269b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gzhan stobs chen po la brtan par 'gyur te/de dbang phyug gi dbang gis skye bo mang po la gshe shing brgyad de tshig ngan pa drug po spyod de/phyis 'dogs shing 'thing slad byed de//
269b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi nyes pa spyod pa de dang ldan pas/dran song du 'jigs su rung ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu chos lnga po 'di dang ljon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni
269b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang mi brten dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang mi 'thob ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang chud
269b7(dkon brtsegs): gson/sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang rjes su slob par ma'i gyur ste/bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du
270a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par+ya 'chang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//las ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/
270a2(dkon brtsegs): des ni shes rab mi 'phel 'gyur//blo yang myur du ma rung 'gyur//mi mchog rnams ni mnyes mi byed//de na sems can srub ste//pho brang 'khor gyi bklubs pa ltar//mi dge
270a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de dag gis//'jig rten mgon po mi mthong ngo //bdag gis phrogs shig long shig ces//sems can rnams la 'jigs bskyed de//nyes pa'i las rnams
270a4(dkon brtsegs): byas gyur nas//mi mchog rnams ni mnyes mi byed//dge slong dang ni dge slong ma//tshul khrims nyams byas sdug bsngal 'gyur//sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed//
270a5(dkon brtsegs): dedol dal pa rnyed par dka'//pha dang ma dang chung ma rnams//chos spyod pa yi bgegs byed do//myur du chos kyang mi thos shing //gti mug gis ni bsgribs par 'gyur//
270a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung bar 'gro ba la//bar du gcod par byas gyur nas//sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed//de la dal ba mi 'byung ngo //gang du stong pa nyid bsngags pa'i//'dri
270a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yi chos thos nas//khro ba dag gi nyes lon cing //'di ni chos min zhes kyang smra//bar chad 'di dag thams cad kyis//bcu drug char yang mi 'gro'o//dam pa'i
270b1(dkon brtsegs): rjechos la smad byas nas//dmus long rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi mthong //mthong du zin kyang dang mi 'gyur//bud med ma ning dmus long dang //
270b2(dkon brtsegs): khyi dang bung bu rnams su 'gyur//gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub dang //byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dag/bar du gcod pa rnams spangs nus//bzang po dag gi lam rnams
270b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom//pha dang ma ni tshis 'di la//yang dang yang du sbyor ba dang //sems can thams cad rab 'byung bar//myur ba nyid du len du bcug/ma ni chos la sbyor byas na//myur du bzang
270b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'gro bar 'gro//rab tu 'byung bar bsngags pas na//myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya//shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na sangs rgyas
270b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed//dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi rten//dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang mi 'a thob//ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba rnams kyang chud za
270b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed//sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang rjes su slob par mi 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang deg par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon//
270b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'chal pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa dang /dam pa'i chos la ni mi spyod pa dang /snyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa la chags
271a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bdag tu lta ba'i thibs po dang /gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang /ser sna bskyed pa ste/shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos
271a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brton pa dang /gong ma bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
271a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste khyi ltogs pa keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa blangs nas da
271a4(dkon brtsegs): srang gi sgo na gnas te kha chus gos pa de 'cha' ba las//de nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /khyim bdag
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyi ltogs pa de logs su 'ong ba khyi des rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsams tA/'di ni bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po
271a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'phrog pa zhig go snyam nas/de shin tu zugs shing mig tshug su blto la brang bsnyer te skad cher zugs par+N+Na shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam+b+ha du sems/skyes bu de keng rus
271a7(dkon brtsegs): sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa 'dod pa yin nam/gsol par+d+ha bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
271b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyi de ci'i phyir shin tu zhugs shing mig tshugasu blta la brang ba ster te skad cher zugs/gsol pa/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi kha zas rau
271b2(dkon brtsegs): zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go snyam ste/shin tu zugs shing mig tshugasu blta la brang bskor te skad cher zugs so//bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gang khyim gyi
271b3(dkon brtsegs): ser sna la brtson pa bshad pa dang /gci bas kun tu bskor ba la chags pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di lta bu'i dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed nas/
271b4(dkon brtsegs): des chud zos par byed pa de dag ni ngas khyi dang 'dra'o zhes brjod de/de dag 'ba' zhig gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta bu'i brjod pa'i gnas byed pa ma yin gyi
271b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshol ba de dag ni
271b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sha yang yongs su gtod na/gzhan gyi khyim la rtog cing basbyin pa'i phyir phrag dog dang /ser sna byed par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos///
271b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu bzhi pa//yang shA ri'i bu skyes bu gti mug de dag 'tsho ba'i phyir zang zing dang bran dang /'jig rten gyi zang zing lhur byed cing zas dang srog lhur byed pa rtog cing
272a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i phyir/gzhan gyi khyim dag la phrag dog dang ser sna bskyed par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu de wAr brtson pa'i dge slong mthong n+ya phrag dog dang sar sna
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/bdag ni sngan chad 'dir shes na bye ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig/'di ni bdag dang sngon 'thams pa zhig yin na phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer
272a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gal te de'i khyim bdag de drug gis lhung bzed dang chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /mal starA dang /na ba'i gsod skad dang /yo bya
272a4(dkon brtsegs): kham blangs par gyur pa rnams sngon ni bdag dang dam bcas par gyur mos kyi phyis 'angs nas sbyin par mi 'byur grang snyam nas/de de la nyes pa gsum bskyed de/gsum
272a5(dkon brtsegs): ga shi na/gnas la nyis pa bskyed de/gnas de nas 'gro'o snyam sams pa dang /shes par bya ba ma yin pa shes shing shes par bya ba mi shes la gleng rlung rjong
272a6(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa yang mi ban+d+han+da p+na dang /de khyim pa la nyes pa bskyed b+h+rUM ste/dge slong de gnas klas ma brjod par bya'o//gsum gang blun/kaunas sbyin smra pa ba pa da /
272a7(dkon brtsegs): nyams mi dga' ba brjod cing kyis gtod par byed pa dang /mi bdun pa'i gtam zer zhing skyes skyes bu dom pa ma yin pa 'di dag g.yo byed de nis yid rten du
272b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bas dam bcas par bya ba'i chos yang dag pa rab tu ston pa ste/shA ri'i bu da ltar na khyim la ser sna byed pa chos dkar po yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o//yang shA ri'i bu khyim
272b2(dkon brtsegs): lo ser sna byed pa la gnas pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis sdom pa dang /sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su btang bar 'gyur te/sdom pa la
272b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i rjes slob par mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/shA ri'i bu sngon byung
272b4(dkon brtsegs): pab 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
272b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar ga/shegs pa 'jig rten
272b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so//de'i nyan thos kyang
272b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zadag /nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur
273a1(dkon brtsegs): bya nas snyoms kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sh+tsa stag go bar du'o//yang de'i tshe khyim bdag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba
273a2(dkon brtsegs): phyug cing nor che la longs spyong che zhing /longs spyod meng ba/bdag dbang ba mang ba/nor dang yo byad mang po dang ldan zhing /'gron bu dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /
273a3(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dang /pe DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shelo dang /byi ru dang /dngupa dang /sa la sbram mang po dang ldan pa/bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las/byed pa dang zhor shas 'tsho ba

273a5(dkon brtsegs): na sdug pa khe dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa sdom pa zhes bya ba dang /sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/de gnyis dus gzhan zhig nA khang thog
273a6(dkon brtsegs): tu dong bar gyur to//sh+tsa ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po
273a7(dkon brtsegs): do snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bsnams lhung bzed bsnams te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdor nas//
273b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer der gshegs pa dang /mdzes pa dga' bar gyur pa/dbang po zhi ba/yid zhi ba/mchog tu dul ba dang /zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/shin tu dul zhing
273b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/dbang po dul zhing sbas pa/glang po ltar rab tu dul ba/mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med lnga gsal ba/gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu sa lI sbrum bya
273b3(dkon brtsegs): ri lta bu/rin po ches yongs su gang ba'i mtsho lta bu/lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lha bu/yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
273b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyang ma nas byon pa khye'u de gnyis kyis mthong ngo //shA ri'i
273b5(dkon brtsegs): bu de nas gang sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu des dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bo tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon
273b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags pa'i rgyal po sngar mthong nas/des nu bo de la smras pa/sems can gyi rgyal po 'di lta bur mdzes pa nu bo khyod kyis sngon nam yang res 'ga' mthong ngam/nges
273b7(dkon brtsegs): phu bo la phu bo sems can gyi rgyal po mdzes pa 'di lta bu bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yab mi mthong ngo zhes de skad smras pa dang /des nu bo nga ni 'di dang 'dra ba 'gyur bar bya'o zhes
274a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad smras so//shA ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa lnga tshig su btsud pa 'di dag smras so//sdom pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin//'dra bar ni
274a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag bsgyur te//bdag ni de bas mang ba yi//dge slong dge 'dun bsdu bar bya/byang chub kyi ni lam gyi phyir//zas dang skom ni mi bza'o/sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste/
274a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med//sems can kun gyi mchog 'di ni/skur mang dbus na zla ba bzhin//mthong na dad par su mi 'gyur/khyim nas mi 'byung su
274a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig yod/shA rI'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//tshig tu bya bas mi 'gyur gyi//skra bo che ni ma 'byin/
274a5(dkon brtsegs): cig drA ni tshig tu mi smra ste//'tshang rgya gang myur shes par bya/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras//

274a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba//ser sna can gyi rtags yin no//bdag ni mi smra mi bya ste//bdag gtong nor lte ga la zhig/khyim 'di dag ni khyod kyi'o//nga ni byang chub lam phyir
274b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro/khyim dang na nI b+h+r-i kyi s+ho//bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' ba'o//sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan//'di 'dra ba dag mthong gyur na//lbu ba nyams pa mya gtogs pa //

274b3(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa'i//'jig rten snang mdzad rab tu dkon//bskul pa bye ba stong du yang //de ni thos pa shin tu dkon//nam mkha' dag po'i zla ba ni//sa l-i l+h+wam
274b4(dkon brtsegs): mer 'dug pa ltar//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas//dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byis/'od zer stong pa'i nyi ma ni//bair snang gnas ni lha deg//de bzhin sangs rgyas srang

274b6(dkon brtsegs): mdun du byas//sku yi gzi brjid 'bar ba ni//'gro ba 'di dag rnams la snang //gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs can te//rkang gnyis dam pa de mdzes so//lha dang klu dang mi rnams
274b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rdzu 'phrul dag gis rab bsdud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas//chos 'phrul dag ni rnam par ston//sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams mtshan mchog
275a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bdag po 'dri 'dra mthong nas ni//byis pa ma bslabs pa dag ma gtogs par//theg pa da man la su zhig 'jug par 'gyur//shin tu dkon pa
275a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mdzes byung ba//mi mchog 'di ni bdag gis mthong bas na//byang chub phyir ni mngon par zhugs gyur nas//bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du nye brla 'gro//shA ri'i bu
275a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bdag ni le lo'i lAm dag nus//sangs rgyas drung du mi 'gro ste//khang jig
275a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas phyi rol tu//bdag gi lus 'di mchong bar bya//bdag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas//srog la lta bar mi bya ste//ye shes mchog 'di yongs btsal zhing //sangs

275a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni khyim gyi skas las babs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bo tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa ga la
275b1(dkon brtsegs): ba der stong ngo //yang shA riSh+Ti bu khyo'u sdom pa ni khyung thog de nas mchongs nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pA ga la ba der shin tu myur du song ngo ///
275b2(dkon brtsegs): khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa phyi nas song ngo //shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas bcom ldan 'das de la na bza' srang bya ba ri ba phul te/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
275b3(dkon brtsegs): to//bdag ni gzugs rnams tshol ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas na bzlo' 'bul ma lags//mi mchog dag ni ci 'dra bar//de 'dra bar ni 'gyur bar bgyi//ye shes phung po ldan

275b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra ba rA//de 'dra bar ni gyur par shog/khyod kyis chos gang mkhyen pa dang //gang la zhugs pa re lha de baM//byang chu
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa sangs rgyas nas//bdag ni chos de ston par shog/bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas na bza' mchog 'brel ma lags kyi//lhar
275b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir//byang chub mchog gi zhi ba mngon par tshal//gnyis su med pa'i chos mchog der gnas shing //pha rol rgol ba kun gyis rmi
276a1(dkon brtsegs): gla yos pa//chos de nyid ni mngon par 'tshal ba'i phyir//sang+yas rgyus la ni na bza' mchog 'bul lo//rtar bcos 'jig rten dag la sman po'i phyir/
276a2(dkon brtsegs): gang na skye rgan 'chi ma mchis shing //mya ngan dang ni smre sngags ma mchis pa//zhi ba'i chos de bdag ni ston par shog/gang na 'dod chags zhe sdang ma mchis shing //
276a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug ma mchis sred pa ma mchis pa bsil dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pa de//bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas ston par shog/gang la khyod zhugs sems can lhaklu
276a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang //de ltar sems dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa//bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog/gang gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba/
276a5(dkon brtsegs): dang //phyogs bzhi dag nA kun tu snang ba dang //mun po chen por 'od zer phung lta bu'i//bsil dngos bdud ni de la reg par sho//'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi
276a6(dkon brtsegs): khams dag dang //de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag mi granas//dga' dang mi dga' thams cad rab dben pa'i//chos kyi dam pa de ni bdag sngon shog/shA ri'i bu/
276a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags de la
276b1(dkon brtsegs): shI lcam gas rA ba zung cig phul lo//phub nas kyang tshogs su btsud pa 'di dag glasol to//sems can rnams kyi gnas brtan nas//dpung gnyon mgon du gyur par/
276b2(dkon brtsegs): shog/ngan pa'i lam du mi mchi zhing //rtag tu lam rnams ston par shog/byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di//'dod pa nam yang bstan ma gyur//'dus byas dag
276b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab spangs nas//rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung rlud 'gyur//'jig rten snang mdzod mthong nus kyang //rkang gnyis dam pa mchod par 'gyur//srog chags kun lnga phan
276b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//byang chub dam pa yongs su btsal//srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//me tog phreng ba spros rnams dang //rgyal mtshan dag drang gdugs rnams kyis//
276b5(dkon brtsegs): glang po chen po bkur bustir bgyi//srog chags kun lnga phran pa'i phyir//chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang //malwa ston rnams dang gding ba yis//sangs rgyas
276b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mchod pa bgyi//srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//rnga dang dung dang rnga chen dang //sil snyan dag dang pi wang gis//'jig rten snang mdzad mchod par shog/
276b7(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang //dus kyis ma phye bza' ba rnams//de dag gis ni 'jig rten mgon//sgrub pa bdag gis mchod par bgyi//srog chags kun la phan pa
277a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir//mchod pa brgya tshon bgyis gyur nas//de nyid du ni rab byung ste//tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad//srog chags kun gyi mgon du dag
277a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma gyur//yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas pos//bdag gis srog chags bye ba de nyid dgrol//dman
277a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'phags min mchog tu smad pa yi//'dod pa dag ni nam yang bsten ma gyur//bag med thams cad yongs su spangs gyur nas//bdag ni rtog tu bag yod gyur par
277a4(dkon brtsegs): shog/mi khom brgyad lam nam yang skye ma gyur//rtag tu dad pa'i rigs su skyes gyur cing //skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la//mthong nas de la bdag
277a5(dkon brtsegs): ni dad par shog/de 'dra'i ye shes de ni botsal ba'i phyir//dang ba'i sems kyis mo tog phreng ba dang /byug pa dag dang rdza rnga rnga chen dang //rnga dang gling bu dag gis ri mor
277a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi//bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi//mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur na//myur du 'dod pa spangs te rab byung lA//tshangs par spyad pa bdag ni spyod par
277a7(dkon brtsegs): shog/de dag sa phyogs gang du 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i
277b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad pa'i glu dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der/tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyar dpag tshad bzhi 'phang du
277b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad byed pa byas te/de dag gris gtsug lag khang do byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo//phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags
277b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//gnas pa gang la khyod ni bzhugs gyur pas//sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po gang bsngags pa//gnas pa de ni bcol bar bgyi
277b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir//gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la dbul//gnas pa dag ni gang la rtag bzhugs na/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi//sems ni srog chags bye bas
277b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal ba'o//spyod pa de ni bdag gis brtsal bar bgyi//spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni//yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang //mchog bzhi rnams kyi so so yang dag
277b6(dkon brtsegs): rig/spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/de dag gi sad gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de dang /dge
277b7(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsti steng byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed de/de dag gis gtsug lag khang der de bzhin gshegs pa dge
278a1(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun du bcus pa la bsti sbyang byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi drung du skra dang khwa spu bregs
278a2(dkon brtsegs): nis gos ngur smrig bgos te drad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/dge ba'i chos tshol bra la brtson par gyur te//dge ba'i chos tshol ba la yid brtson/
278a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de nas gcig gis smras pa/'jig rten mgon po 'od byed par/bdag ni dang po sngar gyur cig/gcig shos kyis smras pa/ded dpon mi yi gtso bor yang
278a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dang po sder gyur cig/de nas shA ri'i bu gang sdom pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
278a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas yi dri ma bcas po//ston dag la yang mi 'dug cing //bdag ni mal du mi nyal lo//srog chags rnams kyi don 'tshal
278a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir//bdag gis byang chub lam btsul lo//bdag nyid kyi yang lus dang ni//srog kyang yongs su sbyangs dgyis te//le lo dag ni kun spangs nas//byang chub dam
278a7(dkon brtsegs): po btsal bar bgyi//sha rnams dang ni de bzhin khrag rnams dang //lpags pa dang ni rgyus skams srog bor te//le lo thams cad yongs su spangs bgyis nas//
278b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi//shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa lnga gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bdag cag gnyis ni 'dus gyur nas//srog chags kun le phran pa'i phyir//byang chub spyod pa rnams spyad cing //brtson
278b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dam pa brtsam par bya//lus rnams dang nI de bzhin srog bor te//sha dang khrag ni de bzhin skams gyur kyang //srid pa stong du khyod kyi rjes slob cing //byang chub mchog/
278b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya//gang du chos kyi bdag po bzhugs mdzes pa//ye shes dam pa yongs su btsal bya zhing //dgon pa'i gnas kyi ri dang chu drung du//the tshom
278b5(dkon brtsegs): mid par brtson 'grus brtsam par bya//shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' snom pa dang /sdom pa la gnas pas lo stong du lan 'ga' yang /tha na se gol ba rtogs pa
278b6(dkon brtsegs): srid du yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to//lo stong du lan 'ga' yang nyil lo//snyam du nyal ba'i sems ma bskyed do//lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'dug go snyamra du
278b7(dkon brtsegs): stan 'dod par ma gyur to//de gnyis bshad pa dang gci ba'i tshe ma gtogs par lo stong du lan 'ga' yang btsog tsog por ma 'dug go//na mkha' zab na yang 'greng bzhin du
279a1(dkon brtsegs): /kham glasam+b+ha gas ts+tsha TI zhing chu bor gang tsam yang 'byung ngo //de gnyis kyis lho spyod du ldan 'gu' yang khyu zlas 'dod pa 'am/bkres na myur du kha zas rnyed par//
279a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas de las lhag par ma zos so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du kha zas za ba nu lan 'ga'i yang kha zas la
279a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ra ba dang sbyar ba dang /bro ba dang /tsha ba dang /kha ba dang /bska bar tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'du shes ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du bsod snyoms
279a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa la nged la bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/khye'u 'am/bu mo 'am/su zhig ces lan 'ga' yang gdong du ma bltas so//de gnyis kyis
279a5(dkon brtsegs): lo stong gi bar shing gi drung na gnas shing de la gyen du lan 'ga' yang ma bltas so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang chos gos gnyis su ma brjes so//de gnyis
279a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma brtags//'tshe ba'i rnam pa
279a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa ma brtags so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du len 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zla ba la song ba 'am/nyi ma la song ba'am/pha la song ba 'am/ma la so
279b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/spun la song ba 'am/sring mo la song ba 'am/nye du la song ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong 'das pa'i bar du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa
279b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang khyim la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du la ni 'ga' yang zla ba 'am/nyi ma 'am/skar ma'i gzugs sam/bar snang la gyen du ma
279b3(dkon brtsegs): bltas so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang rtsig pa 'am/shing la ma bsnyes so//de gnyis kyis lo stong du ldan 'ga' yang mar ram/'bru mar gyis lus ma bsku so//
279b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mar dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed
279b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig kyang lus la skyo ba ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
279b6(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus shes lus la ngal ba ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang lus na ba 'am/sems na bar ma gyur to//de dag
279b7(dkon brtsegs): gis lo stong 'das kyi bar du nam yang skra breg par sems ma bskyed do//gzhano de na/rgyal po bzhi 'ongs nas mgo la byugs te sgra khyer nas phyir dod do//de dag skra khyer nas
280a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten 'jugs so//de dag gis lho stong gi bar du rgyal po chen po de dag 'ongs pa dang /song ba la nam na yang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i sems ma
280a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du grib ma bab na nyi ma dang /nyi mas phog na grib ma'i sems ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du grang ba'i dus na len 'ga' yang
280a3(dkon brtsegs): lus la g.yog pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed do//de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'jig rten gyi tshig ma smras so//yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na ngan pa rmongs byed ces bya
280a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bdud cig byung ste//'di lta ste/dper na da ltar gyi nga'i bdud sdig can bzhin no//shA ri'i bu bdud dran pa rmongs byed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i 'chags sar la
280a5(dkon brtsegs): gri so gtams pa byas par gyur pa dang /des ral gri'i so de lta ral gri'i sgor 'du shes bskyed nas des bdag ni bag med pa la gnas so//bdag ni bag med pa la
280a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas so//zhes sgra phyung ba dang /sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to//de ltar shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
280a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas pa dang /steng gi bar snang las bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya phrag stong gis kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' shi phos su
280b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur to//shi 'phos su ma gyur to zhes sgra byung ngo //shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa de ltar 'chags pas sems bskyed pa'i rjes su zhugs te yang shA ri'i bu lha dang /
280b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas sgra gnyis pa phyung ba de byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas ma thos so//gang lha'i sgra dang /gang sdom pa'i sgra de gnyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas
280b3(dkon brtsegs): ma thos te/shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis spyod lam de lta bu dang /spyod pa de lta bu dang /nan tan de lta bu dang /snying rje chen po de lta bu dang /rtul ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur te//
280b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
280b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /de nas lha zhig 'ongs nas rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes sbran te/de gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes thos
280b6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das de'i khri gang na yod pa der song ste/'grang bzhin du thal mo sbyor nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mig mi 'dzums par blta ste/byams pa dang ldan zhing 'gran
280b7(dkon brtsegs): zla med pas gus pa rjes su dran par byas te/de dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang bas 'greng bzhin du/'chi ba'i dus byas so//de dag de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig
281a1(dkon brtsegs): rten du smras so//de gnyis tshangs par gyur nas slar log ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mchod rten
281a2(dkon brtsegs): byas nas lo bzhi khra'i bar du mchod rten gyi yo byad kyi las byas so//de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi gdugs zin par shes nas lho bdun khri'i bar
281a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar te gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de la phyag byed do//de dag tshe'i mthar phyin te shi 'phos nas yang 'dzam+bu'i gling nyid du skyes te/
281a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su mi'i mngal du tshe mar skyes so//de gnyis skyes ma thag tu gcig gis gcig dran nas bdag cag bag yod pa la gnas par bya'o//bdag
281a5(dkon brtsegs): cag bag yod pa'i mchog bsgom par bya'o zhes smras nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'byor dang rgyas shing rtag tu lo legs pa'i//yid 'ong rgyal po'i
281a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs su bdag cag skyes//bag med rgyags pa rab tu spangs bya ste/byang chub dam pa rab tu bsgrub par bya//'dod dang longs spyod de bzhin rgyal po'i srid//yid brtan mi rung
281a7(dkon brtsegs): ring por mi thogs te//byang chub dam pa yongs su tshol ba ni/mkhas pa de la 'dod pa mi bskyed do//srog chags pan phyir byang chub gang zhugs pa/'di dang longs spyod la
281b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod mi bskyed//myur du 'dod pa spangs shing rab byung nas//tshangs par spyod pa dam pa mchog spyad do//sngon 'das dus ni shin tu rgyas bya nas//lha rdzas dag dang mi yi bzang po dang //
281b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan ldi ge bsten gyur kyang //de la nam yang ngoms pa mi rnyed do//de phyir rgyal srid rgyas dang gnyen tshogs dang //'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag spangs byas te//lus
281b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas ni myung du rab tu byung //byang chub phyir ni brtson 'grus brtsamya prar bya//de gnyis skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra bar gyur nas sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
281b4(dkon brtsegs): bgros nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste lo nyi khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//de nas shi 'phos nas slar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so//tshangs
281b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas slar yang 'dzam+bu'i gling du skyes so//yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus no de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri
281b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de de gnyis kyis mnyes par bya ste/de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngung
282a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrog pags te dang bas khrim nas khyim myed par rab tu //da gnyis rab tu byung nas/khyo bya ba chos par spyod pa spyad do//shArin bu rnam gas /
282a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas khri mnyes par byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sdom byas thams cad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//byang chub sems dparo sdom pa laM gnas pa ni/de bzhin
282a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gcig gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//de la sha ri ri bu gang byang chub sems dpa'o sdom pa zhes bya ba de sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
282a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba rigs pa dang /
282a5(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa bde bar gshegs po 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ste/de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gnas so//de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //shA
282a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas shes bya ba de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'ab rab byang chub thob pa de'i 'khor los bsgyur
282b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rgyal por gyur te/des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' drang /bsod snyoms dang /malnga stan dang //
282b2(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti steng du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas so//de nas shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshis
282b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'barau des rgyal po de 'ongs par mkhyen nas rgyal po de la bskul ba'i phyir/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa
282b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gsungs so//sangs rgyas chos rnams 'thob pa la//brtson 'grus dam pa mchog yin te//'dod la brkam pa'i sems can rnams//sems can don byed shin
282b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dkon//'dod la brkam pa'i don rnams kyang //de ni mkhas pa'i don ma yin/khyod ni don med gnas pa ste//mchog gi don ni chol ma yin//ra nyid dang ni khyod
282b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid du//sngon ni spun du gyur pa ste//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur bsgrub ces//de ni bdab cag dam bcas so//ngas ni byang chub theb gyur te//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo
282b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor la ltos/khyod ni khyim dang chung ma dag/rtag tu bsrung zhing gnas pa yin//mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la yid mi rton//'dod pa 'di dag ngan zhes rgyal bas gsung//
283a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dag ni bag myed don spyod de/da pyir don min rtag tu rnam par sma sa//blo gros dran pa don med khrur khyer te//khyed ni don med pa la rab tu gnas/
283a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dag gis 'byung bar rab tu bsngags//'dod yon sdug bsngal 'thob byed mi shes so//bcom ldan 'das nges tshigs skyo bcad pa de dag gis de bskul pa
283a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /dbul ma bltas/chung ma la yang ma bltas/tshang dpon dang /blon po dang /pha dang ma dang /mkhyer gyi rgyal po dang /grong brdal dang /ljongs dang /rgyal
283a4(dkon brtsegs): srid thams cad la yang ma bltas//nor bu'i phung po thams cad la yang ma chags par stan+da las langs te/bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sdang 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcod pa

283a6(dkon brtsegs): chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/khyim med par ni rab byung nas//dgon pa rab dgon bstan 'gyod cing //phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi//byis pa smra ba sdig pa yi//
283a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa phyir yang mi bstan te//de la gnas par gyur pas ni//bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur//'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang //thams cad rnam par spangs bya
283b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten paku b+h+yo bstan pa la//de nyid bdag ni rab tu 'byu //byang chub phyir ni spyad pa spyad byed na//mkhas pa slu zhig 'dus byas yid rton byed//gang du bdag gis 'dod la zhugs
283b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas//brtson 'grus ba rnams kyang byang chub reg ma gyur//dri bas 'dod pa'i yon ton bdag spangs te//longs spyod pa de dang rgyal snyed bde spangs nas//rgyal ba'i bstan lnga tshang
283b3(dkon brtsegs): du ba byang la//byang chub mchag pIng brtson 'grus pa rnams par bgyi//des tshig smra bcad pa de dag smras nas//bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi drung du skye dang kha spu thogs te gos ngur smrin
283b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gros nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //rgyal po mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung bar shes nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu dang dusu khyim nas
283b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa byas nas/de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i rgyal
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bo skyes so//de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phros nas bskul pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasu pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin
283b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs spyod ces bye ba 'jig rten du byung ste/rig pa dong zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
284a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba'i bar du skye de la bya ba tshong bar gnas so//de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrug khrig chong pa'i nyan thos chen po 'dus par gyur to/thams cad
284a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag sbyong
284a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bkod do//chos bstan nas sems can tshad myed grangs med pa'i don byas te yongs

284b1(dkon brtsegs): tsho la 'jigs pa gsum 'byung bar shes par byar//gsum gang zhe na/gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir sgra/kun tu smra ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge slong guzha na mthong na phrag dag/
284b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ser sna bskyed cing khong khro bo'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na/des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/dmyas long gis b+h+yon btub pa

284b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//mir skyes na yang mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i yul phyogs su skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung b.raro 'gyur/khong khro ba mang bar 'gyur/dmus long du 'gyur/gzhan gyi
284b6(dkon brtsegs): dring 'jog cing skur pa mang bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyimuSh+ma phrag dog dang ser sna skye ba de'i tshe//de dag 'jig
284b7(dkon brtsegs): me 'di gsum yid la bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ongs byang chub sems dpa'
285a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag la de ltar rnyed pa logs par rnyed de/de bzhin gshegs pas khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bu bshad pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan
285a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag nyan thos rnams la yang khyim gyi ser sna las 'byung ba legs par bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar bar
285a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba lags kyi bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lags so//bdag cag gcugs ma mchis pa'i 'khon mi 'chal te/bdag cag kyang skur pa 'debs pa 'tshal

285b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi skyabs kyi phyir yun ring por blta ba dang /dus ring por blta bar 'gyur zhing //de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas yongs su 'dri bar byed de/de 'di lta

290a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshong 'dus dang /ri khrod stong phrag mang po byung ste/grong khyer chen po dang /tshong 'dus dang /ri khrod stong phrag mang po de dag thams cad kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
290b1(dkon brtsegs): borgya brag stong mang pos gang bar gyur to//yang de'i tshe nang chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/sems can phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/lus rul pa dang /lba ba dang /
290b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras dang /me dpal dang /g.yan pa dang /rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /bad ka ni gyis yongs su rgyas par gyur to//de nas sman pa brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi
290b3(dkon brtsegs): nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par byed do//shA ri'i bu de nas sems can de dag g.yo ba ma rnyed do mgon med skyabs med nas sgra cher byung ba/lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang /
290b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyinu dri za srin po dang //me dang mi ma yin pa dang //bdag cag nud las zur byang gang //badrag cag sdug bsngal thar byed la//nor rnams thams cadra sbyin par bya//de'i

297b6(dkon brtsegs): dag nang chen por mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang /sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gris yongs su gang nas/nad chen po gsum po de dag
297b7(dkon brtsegs): gi sman gsum mi shes te/'dod chags kyi nad chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes/zhe sdang gi nad chen po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi
298a1(dkon brtsegs): shes/gti mug gi nad chen po'i spyan chen po rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rab tu m+bi shes te/kye ma'o sman pa de dag ni nAd gzhan dang gzhan
298a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gso nus kyi nad thams cad ni glaso bar mi nus te/kye me'o sman pa de dag gi sman de ni re shig gso nus pa yin gyi gtan du gso bar byed pa ma yin no//de bas na
298a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis ni sman pa de dag gis rjes su bslab par mi bya'i//bdag cag ni sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mkhas pa bla na med pa sman pa'i
298a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po nad thams cad gso bar byed pa de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o//bdag cag gos nad thams cang gso bar bya'i nad gzhan dang gzhan dag gso bar mi bya/
298a5(dkon brtsegs): bodag cag gis re shig gso bar mi bya ste/bdag cag gi gtan du gso bar byed par bya'o//gang gis sgra thos pas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur

302a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rtogs pa'i sa sa rgyas rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba byon nas chos kyi sgo'i chog brgyad po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rgyas kyi

302b4(dkon brtsegs): lte ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sengs rgyas kyi thegs pa dang thegs pa chen po bla na med pa dang theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas so//de yang 'chi kar mir skyes pa

302b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa dang 'dra ba de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de ltar rab tu byung nas dge slong chos kyi bla ma de dran pa'i
303a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs bskyed pa dang shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas slar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon du gyur to//shA ri'i bu de ltar
303a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong chos kyi bla mas the tshom gcod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid li spyong drug khri tshang byur grong drung grong khyer dang grong brdal dang ljong

303a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur slar skyes te de btsas ma thag tu lha zhig gis kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems can dran pa thob pa 'di skyes so//
303a6(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'i 'jig rten du sems can dran pa thob pa 'di skyes so zhes sgra byud nas/de'i mang dran pa thob pa dran pa thob pa zhes btags so//de dbang po yongs su smin

304a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan par gyur to//de de na tshwa ji tsam du thub par 'dug nas dri nas shi 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skyes te gang

304a3(dkon brtsegs): cu po de dag kyang de nyid du skyes nas de'i g.yog tu gyur to//de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthar

304b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyurgyas dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //shA ri'i bu gzhon nu de g.yog dang bcas pa srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad nus bskor te/mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

304b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/gzhon nu dpa' bas byin g.yog dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang de nas shA ri'i bu bcom

304b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bston to//de nas shA ri'i bu shin tu mthor gshegs gzhon nu dpa' bas byin de sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam de thos nas dad pa rab tu thob bo//de sems dad par gyur nas/

304b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs des/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bas byin 'di nga'i 'og tu bla ni med pa

305a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du byung ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//bcom

305a4(dkon brtsegs): bzung nas de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar
305a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed thub par gyur to//de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med pa
305a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung ste de'i nyan thos 'dus pa re re yang khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/dgra be com pa 'ba'i zhig go/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mang du thos te gzungs bcangs bklags kun chub
305b1(dkon brtsegs): par byas pas mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du byung ba'i bar du'o//shA ri'i bu de bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par
305b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i brtson 'grus ma

305b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol po la brtson 'grus ma nyams pa 'di ni byang chub sems
305b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de la brtson pas byang chub sems
305b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de la gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po brtson na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la
306a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa rnams las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas//
306a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/dben pa las skyes po'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa dang
306a3(dkon brtsegs): dpyod pa nye bar zhi zhing yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
306a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//shA ri'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran
306a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags po rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa
306a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//shI ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bde ba yang spangs te/snga nas
306a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yi ni sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i
306b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de de ltar skams mnyam par bzhag pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byung ba nyon mongs pa med pa nyo ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
306b2(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gyur nus ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong la bsam gtan gyi las kyang byed do//de la byang chub sems dpa'i byes ma gtan gyi las gang zhe nA/gang mngon par shes pa

306b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas dang rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya bar mngon par shes pa ste/'di dag ni mngon par shes pa

306b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi lus yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sem sde dpa' de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang
306b7(dkon brtsegs): ba nyon mongs pa med pa/nye bo'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug par byed de/de lta'i

307a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dang dun 'gro dang bzang blo dang ngan pa rnams mthong ste/kye sems can 'di dge lus kyis nyes par spyod po dang ldan pa/ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan
307a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa/log par lci ba ste/de dag logs par lta ba'i lhas yang dag par bye
307a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log pAr ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro//sems can 'dri dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa

307a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dgu par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du spyi'o zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji lta rU ba sa nas
307a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du shes so//de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsogs pa shin tu rab tu shes so//shA ri'i du
307b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/gzugs su snang ba thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ste/gang klu thams cad kyi
307b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang dri za thams cad dang /lha ma yin thams cad dang /slob pa thams cad dang /dgra bcom pa thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas tha~Md
307b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha'i mig de bas lho'i mig gang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pA shin tu dam pa/shin tu rab/shin tu bzang ba/shin tu gsal ba/'od gsal ba/nges par
307b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i lam thams cad kyis nges par 'byung ba/gang lha'i mig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/ngan pa

307b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa na spyod pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa de dag thams
307b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skyo ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso//de dag gi las kyi rgyu yang rab tu shes so//de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang rab tu sheso//de dag

308a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhing gi bgrod pa de dag thams cad kyang mngon sum du mthong bas mthong ngo //mthong
308a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa de'i bu sngo ba 'grub par 'gyur ro//de'i
