308a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo //mthong nus kyang gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gi cho ga dang spyod yul dang /spyod pa dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin dang /spyod lam gyi gnas dang /chos

308a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de'i mig de ni gzugs thams cad mthong bas sgrib pa med pa'o//de'i mig de ni gzugs thams cad la mi chags pas chags pa

308b3(dkon brtsegs): mig de ni sgrib pa'i chos rnams la kun nas ldang ba med pa'o//de'i mig de ni chos snang ba rnams la chos snang ba thob pa'o//de'i mig de ni rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul

308b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po rnams kyis nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'o//de'i mig de ni sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong bas khong khro ba med pa'i
308b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid do//de'i mig de ni sems kyi 'khrug pa dang bral bas rnam par dag pa'o//de'i mig de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas dri ma med pa'o//de'i mig de ni
308b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mi 'dor bas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'o//de'i mig de ni chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral bas chags pa med pa zhe sdang med pa'o//

309a2(dkon brtsegs): khro ba med pa'o//de'i mig de ni tshul khrims 'tshal pa rnams la khong khro ba med pa'o//de'i mig de ni gnod par sems pa rnams rjes su bsrungs pa'o//

309a4(dkon brtsegs): ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams la shes rab kyi mig sbyin pa'o//de'i mig de ni lam nor bar zhugs pa rnams la lam ston pa'o//de'i mig de ni mos pa chung
309a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la sangs rgyas rgya chen po ston pa'o//de'i mig de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya chen pos mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa byang chub kyi
309a6(dkon brtsegs): snying por mngon par byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba ste/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lha'i mig gi mingon par shes pa'i ye
309a7(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis mngon sum du bya ba
309b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni gang /mngon par shes pa dang ye shes kyi las yongasu rdzogs pa ni gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam
309b2(dkon brtsegs): bar dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas mi dang mi ma yin pa gnyi ga'i sgra yang thos te/dri phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag ni gang la la sgrar krugs
309b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i sgrar 'am/klu'i sgra 'am/gnod sbyin gyi sgra'am/dri za'i sgra 'am/lha ma yin gyi sgra'am/na mkha' lding gi sgra 'am/mi 'am ci'i sgra 'am/lto 'phye chen po'i

309b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad de'i lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis rig ste/tha na srin bu dang /phye me le ba dang /sbrang bu dong /sha
309b7(dkon brtsegs): sbrang gi sgra 'am/sems can de dag gi sems kyi dmigs pa dge ba 'am/mi dge ba de dag gis dag gi las 'byin pa de thams cad kyang rab tu shes so//ngag gi/
310a1(dkon brtsegs): las gang dge ba'i rgyu 'dzin pa dang /ngag gi las gang mi dge ba'i rgyu 'dzin pa de yang rab tu shes so//gang 'dod chags bag la nyal las
310a2(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba'i ngag gi las 'byung ba dang /gang zhe sdang bag la nyal las chags pa'i ngag gi las 'byung ba dang /gang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang bag la nyal ba las rmong
310a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag gi las 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so//gang gti mug bag la nyal las chags pa'i ngag gi las 'byung ba dang /gang 'dod chags bag la nyal las chags/

310a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes thogs pa med pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso//de lha'i rna ba des 'phags pa rnams dang /'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi sku rnams thos te///
310a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra la rjes su chags pa yang med 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra la khong khro ba yang med de/de 'phags pa rnams kyi rtswa la
310b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byams pa chen po rab tu rnyed do//'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra las ni snying rje chen po rab tu rnyed do//de sgra thams cad kyis sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su

310b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa thos te/thos nas kyang dran pa'i snod mi brjed pas thams cad kun tu 'dzin to//kun tu bzung nas kyang mi brjed par byed cing

310b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa nyanakyang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am kun nas bkris te 'dug par yang mi byed do//yang shA ri rI bu sangs rgyas
310b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa ngas phyi med par kun 'dzin to//gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra zlos pa de yang dusu drang dus ma yin par sbyong zhing ston te/de zhes
310b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi dus la ma bab pa 'am/skal ba mnyam por bstan pa'i chos bstan pa'i dus la bab kyang 'jog ste thos kyang mi ston to//de chos kyi dus la bab pa ma 'khor
311a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi dus la bab na gcig slob pa yan chad la yang chos ston to//lung bstan pa yang dag ba la'ang gzhan la gnod par mi byed do//lung bstan/
311a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag pa ma yin pa don dang ldan na gzhan la phan gdags pa dang 'thun par thabs la mkhas pas rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir lung ston to//sgra'i rnam
311a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta bu thos par dga' ba de lta bu'i sgra thos so//sgra'i rnam pa ji lta bu la mi dga' ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam pa mi thos so//'khor gang la chos ston pa na byin gyis
311a4(dkon brtsegs): brlabs kyi sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pas sgra rab tu shes so//de la sems ca na gang dag chos cang shes pa de dag gis nI de'i chos thos so//
311a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag cang shes pa ma yin pa de dag gis ni chos de mi thos so//de'i rna ba'i khams de chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag pa yin/de'i rna ba'i
311a6(dkon brtsegs): khams de bdag gi khams kyis rnam par dag pa yin/sems can gyi khams kyis rnam par dag pa yin no//de'i rna ba'i khyams de sgra de ji lta ba bzhin gyi
311a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig thos pas shin tu rtogs pa yin no//gang 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sgra de dang /smra ba sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i phyir chos

311b6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sems kyang rab tu shes so//de 'das pa'i sems shes pas sems ca na 'di'i sems kyi rgyu ni rgya che ba'o//sems can 'di'i sems kyi rgyu ni rgya 'bring ngo //
311b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di'i sems kyi rgyu ni rgyu chung ngo //sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o//
311b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'dir dbang po rnams ni brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'di'i dbang po
312a1(dkon brtsegs): /rnams ni byasam gtan gyi bsnam pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'di dang po rnams ni shes rab kyi bla rnam pa dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'di'i dang dag/
312a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni byams pa'i rnam pa'o//sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni snying rje'i rnam pa'o//sems can 'di'i dbyung po rnams ni dge' bu'i rnam pa'o//sems can

312a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa'i rnam pa'o//sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rnam pa'o//sems can 'di ni rgyu 'i stobs can te/rgyu'i gtso bo dge ba dang ldan
312a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//sems can 'di ni rkyen gyi stobs can te rkyen gyis gtso bo'i rgyu dang ldan pa'o//sems can 'dri ni rgya'i stobs can yin yang rgya'i gtso bo'i dge ba dang
312a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin te//sems canaM 'di ni sbyor ba'i rgyus rigs dA ma'i bar skyes pa'o//sems can 'di ni sbyor ba'i stobs can yin na yang dge ba rgya chen po'i rgyu
312a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ldan te/sems can de ni rgyu'i stobs bskyed pa'i rgyus rigs chen por skyes pa'o//sems can 'di ni bsam pa dag la sbyor ba ma dag pa'o//sems
312b1(dkon brtsegs): can 'di ni sbyor ba dag la bsam pa ma dag pa'o//sems can 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag lnga bsam pa yang dag pa'o//sems can 'di ni bsam pa yang ma dag lnga sbyor ba ya
312b2(dkon brtsegs): ma drug pa'o zhes sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu dang skye ba'i rgyu'i rnam grangs kyi sems kyi thos pa la 'akra shA ri'i bu de ltar grang sems can thams cad kyi 'odas
312b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i/dbang po la sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang /de dag la ci rigs par chos ston par shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o
312b4(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can 'dri ltar smyon pa'i rgyu ste ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshul khrims kyi rgyur 'gyur ro//sems can 'di da ltar tshul khrims kyi rgyu ste ma 'ongs pa'i dus
312b5(dkon brtsegs): na sbyin pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//sems can 'di da ltar bzod pa'i rgyu ste ma 'ongs pa'i dus na br-irtson 'grus kyi rgyur 'gyur ro//sems can 'di de ltar brtson 'grus kyi
312b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu sti ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bzod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//sems can 'di de ltar 'jog rten pa'i spyod pa yin la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa po'i rgyud
312b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni da ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ste/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na theg pa chen po'i rgyu las skyes
313a1(dkon brtsegs): //nga'i dbang po rnams su 'gyur ro//sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni sgyur+yanyan thos kyi thig du'i sgra las spros pa ste/ma 'ongs pa /
313a2(dkon brtsegs): narlung sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'i dbang po rnams su 'gyur ro//sems can 'dir dbang po rnams ni da ltar theg pa chen po'i rgyu las skyes pa ste/ma 'ongs
313a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes par 'gyur ro zhes phyi ma'i mtha'i sems la 'jug pa shes so//shA ri'i bu de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can tham/
313a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dbang po rnams kyi rgyu las skyes pa gang dang rnam pa gang dang rkyen du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu las skyes pa dang /de'i rnam pa dang de'i rkyen rnams yang dge/
313a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de sems can yongs su mi smin pa thams cad la de'i sems la 'jug pa'i shes pa'i bar du skyo bar mi byed de/de'i chos
313a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar chos ston to//de 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston kyang chos nyid las byas so zhes byed pa ma yin no//gang da ltar byung po'i sems can tham/
313a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dang chos rnams 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/'dod chags dang bca
313b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems
313b2(dkon brtsegs): su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang med pa'i
313b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang zhe sdang med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji
313b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug med pa'i sems kyang grati mug dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//shA ri'i bu de ltar kun nas nyon mongs
313b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dang gang gis sems can gang dang gang gis sems bsgribs pa de thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/shes nas kyang nyon mongs pa las
313b6(dkon brtsegs): gdon pa'i phyir de la de lta bur chos ston to//'khor gang gi nang du 'gro yang thog ma nyid du 'khor de dag thams cad la rnam par lha'o//rnam par bltas nas sems can
313b7(dkon brtsegs): rnamapa lidiHji lta bur rig pa de lta de lta bu'i chos ston to//shA ri'i bu de ltar gang sems can de dag gi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa de thams cad rab tu
314a1(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems lhur byed pa'ang ma yin la/gzhan gyi sem+bas ltar byed pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar
314a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rgyun ni ye shes kyis rig pa'o//sems kyi rgyun ni dran pas rig pa'o//blo gros kyis reg pa'o//sems kyi rgyun ni rtogs pas rig pa'o///
314a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyun ni shes rab kyi rig pa'o//sems kyi rgyun ni blos rig pa'o//sems kyis rgyun ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
314a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bcad pa dag la dri ma med pa 'od gastsal ba/kha na ma tho ba med pa mi rtsub pa/rnyog pa med pa chos thams cad snang bar rig pa'o//
314a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i rje su zhugs par rig pa'o//sha ri'i bu de ltar gang de lta bu'i chos la sems shes pa 'jug pa
314a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems mngon par shes pa dang ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
314a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ni gang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni gang zhe na/shA ri'i bus
314b1(dkon brtsegs): 'odi la byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mA lus pa thams ca na/sems can thams cad kyi skyo ba gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang ba/
314b2(dkon brtsegs): dang lnga dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu dang skye ba brgya dang skye ba stong dang /skye ba brgya phrag stong dang /skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /skye ba stong
314b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag du ma dang /skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /chags pa'o bskal pa dang /'jig pa dang /chags po'i bskolnga pa dang /'jig po'i bsku
314b4(dkon brtsegs): pa du ma dang /'tshogs pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /sems can 'di sngon che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu byung ste/ming ni 'di
314b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya rus ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/khe dog ni 'di lta bu/cha byang ni 'di lta bu/dbyibs ni 'di lta bu/zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za zu/yun ni 'di
314b6(dkon brtsegs): srid gcig tu gnas nas/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes te/de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir
314b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes so zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//de ltar na bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnamo pa dang bcas pa dang /yul phyogs
315a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//de bdag gi sngon gyi mtha' nas bzung spro sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//sems can gzhan
315a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi mtha' nas bzung ste sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//de rang gi dge ba'i rtse ba sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba yang rjesu
315a3(dkon brtsegs): dran no//gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtse ba'i rgyu yang rjes su dran no//de rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub tu bsngo bar byed do//sems can gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
315a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang sems can rnams rjes su dran par byas nas/byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do//gang sngon gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu de yang mi rtag pa dang //
315a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang /bdag med par ston to//de mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal bri dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa la rton pa dang /gzugs kyis dregs
315a6(dkon brtsegs): bI ma yin longs spyod kyis dregs pa ma yin g.yog gis dregs pa ma yin/dbang phyug gis dregs pa ma yin/'khor los bsgyur ba 'dod pas dregs pa me
315a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/brgya byin 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/tshangs pa 'dod pa dregs pa ma yin/'jig rten skyong ba 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/skye ba thams cad 'dod pas
315b1(dkon brtsegs): dregs pa ma smin/'dod pa dang rgyal po'i srid dang /dbang phyug gi bde ba thams cad 'dod pa'i blo gas can ma yin te/gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin pur bya rA /
315b2(dkon brtsegs): bsems bzhin du srid pa 'dzin pa ni ma gtogs so//de ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang /bdag med pa la rton pa dang /sngon gyi nyin mongs pa'i spyod/
315b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la khrel zhing ngo tsha bar byed/smod par byed de/da ltar byung ba'i dngos pos srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do//de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
315b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing rgyas par byed do//da ltar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i
315b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ba spangs te/sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos kyi rorigs dang /dge 'dun gyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i stobs kyis
315b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngo ste/de dran pa de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o//shin tu rigs pas mi g.yo'o//bas mi gtan yongs su
315b7(dkon brtsegs): spang ba byas pas ma brtags pa'o//zhi gnas kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pas gnod pa med pa'o//lhag mthong gis shin tu yang dag par zin pas 'khrul
316a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//mngon sum gyi phyir phal pa ma yin pa'o dran pa ma nyams pa'i phyir brjod pa med pa'o//bsnod nams kyi tshogs rgyun+da po bstsags
316a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir myong ba chen po'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tsho gas bsogs pa'i phyir pha rol
316a3(dkon brtsegs): tu song ba ste/de ltar dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i stobs kyis 'das pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams brjed pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ston
316a4(dkon brtsegs): g+hu gnas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi los yongs su rdzogs pa'o////dam po bcu drug pa//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
316a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba shes par mngon par shes pa ni gang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa ni gang zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byed
316a6(dkon brtsegs): chubo sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /sems dang spyod pa'i ti nga nge 'dzin spong ba'i
316a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa ste de 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang /sems dang spyod pas rab tu zin pa'i chos rnams 'dod pa dang /skrag par
316b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang /dbang bskur ba dang rtswa/phrul TI rka pa bzhi po 'di dag shin tu yongs smra bsgom+b+ha b+hU'i b+hir+ya dzA 'phrul+yA rnams mngon du thob pa yin te/dwe rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe phrul
316b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba rnam pa du ma myong ngo //de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag kyang sems can la blta ba'i phyir yod su goms pa yi no//de gzugs sam/stobs sam/byin gyis
316b3(dkon brtsegs): brlabs sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul gang gis sems can+da rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu 'phrul de nyid nye ba ston to//de gzugs dang /kha dogs sna
316b4(dkon brtsegs): ba gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba de dang de nyid ston te/spangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /kha dog tu snang ba 'am/
316b5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba 'am/nyan thos kyi gzugs da kha dag tu snang ba 'am/brgyu byin gyi gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'i mi/tshangs pa'i
316b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba 'am/'jig rten skyong ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'i sgra/'khor las bsgyur b+ha'i gzugs dang kha dag tu snang bar 'gyur/
316b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon yang gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba/tha na drod 'gro'i skye gnas kyi gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i
317a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba de nyid sems can rnams la nye bar bstan nas chos ston to//de'i stobs snyoms pa dang /khro ba dang
317a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyugs pa lhur byed pa'i sems can rnams stobs gang gis 'dul bar bya ba'i stobs do nye bar ston to//ji tsam srid med kyi bu chen po'i stobs tsam+ba mam/ji tsam
317a3(dkon brtsegs): srod med kyi bu chen po'i stobs kyi gzhi cha tsum mam/ji tsam srid med kyi bu chen po'i stobs kyi byung tsam mam/ji tsam srid med kyi bu chen po'i stobs rangs
317a4(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam mam/ji tsam stobs gang gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'phang du dpag ched stong phrag brgya drug nu zhing du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi snang yod pa so mo gnyis
317a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis blangs nas 'phen te/'di lta ste dper na skyu ru ra 'bru gcig blangs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs
317a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che ba/'di ltar yangs po/'di'i chu'i phung po nas bzung ba/
317a7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du lag mthil du bzhag la/bskal par 'dug cing spyod lam thams cad kyang ston pa de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs
317b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang /khro ba dang rmugs pa m+WAr byed ma'i sems can rnams la stobs skyems pa dang /zlo ba dang rgyags pa gzhi lnga ba'i phyir chos ston to//de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pan
317b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis byin gyis brlabs kyis ye shes 'thob ste/byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes des gang byin gyis brlabs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te rgyu mi tsho chen po phyugs
317b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes kyi chu tsam du byin gyis brlabs na de phyugs rjes kyi chu tsam du gnas so//gal te phyugs rjes rgya mtsho chen po tsam du gyur cig tsa na yang de rgyu mtsho chen por 'gyur ro//ga/
317b4(dkon brtsegs): te bsreg pa'i bskal pa chu'i phung por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na yang de bzhin du chu'i phung por 'gyur ro//chus 'jig pa yang mes 'jig par gyur cig
317b5(dkon brtsegs): ces byin gyis brlabs na de de bzhin du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te tha ma dang rab dang 'bring gi chos rnams kyis gang dang gang byin gyis brlabs pa'i byin gyis brlabs/
317b6(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur te/gzhan du ma yin no//de'i byin gyis brlabs de ni dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/brgya byin nam/bdud dam/tshangs
317b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/'jig rten 'di ni gang gis kyang chos dang 'thun pas bskul ba 'am/bskyod pa 'am/mi snang bar byed mi nus te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma
318a1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so//de byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bskyed pa ngos dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bla rgya chen po sna tshogs pa lhur byed pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston
318a2(dkon brtsegs): to/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang nyams pa med pa'o//bdag nyid dbang ba'o//bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i yul las shin tu 'dres pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug
318a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//sems can rnams la mi 'tsho bar sbyor ba'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad bsags pa'o//bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mo phyed pa ste/'di ni byang
318a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i
318a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa ni gang /ye shes ni gang zhe na/gang lha'i mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di na mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gzugs su snang ba rnams la
318a6(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'i chos nyid du shes kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o//gzhan yang shA ri'i bu gang sgrar grags pa thams cad thos pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa
318a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//gang nyes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' brjod du med pa 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhin yang gang sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa 'di/
318b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang sems 'gog par yang shes la 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gang sngon gyi mtha' la
318b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med par dran pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gang zhing thams cad
318b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang zhig nam mkha' lta bur shes pa la 'jug pa 'dri ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gzhan yang btsun pa'i chos 'jug pa 'di ni mngon
318b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang chos mnyam par mthong ba 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gzhan yang grang 'jig rten thams ca dri chags par 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes
318b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'dre ba 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gzhan yang gang brgya byin dang tshungs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni
318b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar mngon par shes pa de dag dang //
318b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'di ni mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar nyon mongs pa'i sems g.yeng ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i
319a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi tshogs dang sems kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyang de tsam mo//sems can thams cad kyi sems g.yeng ba ji snyed pa de tsam du byang chu/
319a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi yan lag gi tshogs yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam yang dag par blangs te/de la gnas pa de
319a3(dkon brtsegs): na mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste/sems can mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//sems mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//bsam pa mnyam
319a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//sbyin pa
319a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag
319a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o//byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa'o//sems can thams cad gang
319a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa ste/gang mnyam pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa de ni snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chos
319b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa ste/mnyams pa de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa dang /smon pa med pa
319b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dang mnyam pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa'i mnyam pa de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//rang gi sems mnyam pa
319b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//phan 'dog pa dang gnod par byed pa thams cad la sems sa dang
319b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa/sems chu dang mnyam pa/sems me dang mnyam pa/sems rlung dang mnyam pa/sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa/mi mtho ba/mi dma' ba/gnas pa/
319b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gnas pa/mi g.yo ba thob pa/spyod lam thams cad dang mnyam par gzhag pa/spyod lam ma bcos pa rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/mi rgod
319b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi g.yeng ba/mi 'phyar ba/mu cor mi smra bI/tshig mu 'chal ba/don shes pa/chos shes pa/dus shes pa/tshod shes pa/drod shes pa/'jig rten thams cad dang /
319b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa/'jig rten dang ma 'dres pa/'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa//nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/'du 'dzi dang bral ba
320a1(dkon brtsegs): /spyad yul dben pa ste/de lta bu'i chos lnga gnas pa/mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang myi 'dor ba 'jig rten gyi byung thams cad du yang
320a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang grangs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bus ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/gang lo snyoms par 'jug pa
320a3(dkon brtsegs): nasems can la lta bas snying rje chen pos dmigs pa'i sems nye bar 'brel par byed pa 'di ni de'i thubs so//lci ba dang rab tu zhi ba la snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni
320a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub pa 'dri ni de'i thabs so//gang chos gang la yang nye bar 'brel par mi byed pa 'dri ni de
320a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na chos thams cad 'dzin pa la ltos pa de ni de'i thubs so//gang chos kyi dbyis dbyer med pas bsam gtan byed pa'idzini
320a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi sku rgyan mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang chos kyi sku lo gnas nas bsam gtan bred pa 'di ni
320a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang /dbyangs dang /sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs la sems pa de ni de'i thabs so//gang brjod du ma/
320b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid kyis sam gtan byung ba de ni de shes rab tu//gang snrums par 'jug bla na sems rdo rje wA bAr byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i thabs su//glung dran pa mo gurlung
320b2(dkon brtsegs): bas bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i
320b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs so//gang sems can thams cad bdag med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang bsam gtan byed pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams lhag par dmigs
320b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang rtsa ba med pa dang /granas med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
320b5(dkon brtsegs): drug pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang zhing na mkha' dang mnyam par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na byang chub kyi
320b6(dkon brtsegs): snying po'i rgyun bkod pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang snyoms par 'jug pa na chos kyi
320b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la dmigs par byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang bskor ba yang med ldog pa yang med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//byang chub
321a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag gi tshogs ji snyed pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa na btang snyom su byed pa dang mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//nye ba'i nyon mongs pa
321a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa yongs su gdung ba med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang bsam gtan gyi bde ba chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa dang /'du shes chags pa med pa 'du
321a3(dkon brtsegs): shes yongs su shes pa dang /'du shes thams cad sel ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nges par gyur pa de la bsam gtAn dang bsam gtan med par
321a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bur zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad mi
321a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o//bdud thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du nye bar gnas pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de ltar na 'di ni thabs 'di ni
321a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//zhes bya'o//
321a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa las nyams pa med par 'du shes su gyur pa'i las rnams kyang byed do//mngon
321b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pas kyang rnam par rol la bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su ston to//mngon par shos pa la yang rab tu gnas la/'jug pa chen po la yang 'dzud par byed do//de
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa de ni ye shes byed de'o//'jig rkyen las 'das pa'o//nges par 'byung ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'i//bya ba thams cad la rnam pa'i mchog thams tsa dri dang ldan pa
321b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mngon par shes pa de ni shes rab byed pa'o//'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni zad pa'i rnam
321b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o//namakha' dang mtshungs pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su gzugs thams cad kun tu
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mthu'i sgra byung mnyam pa nyid kyis sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ngo //de'i mngon par shes pa de ni rang bzhin mngon sum
321b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mthu dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su gno du pas bsgral pa zung
321b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu snyan cing gzhan la mngon du phyogs po mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//de
322a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pad+ma n+ti dus las mi 'da' bas dus las sdod pa'i phyir zag pa zang pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su slong ba'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni//
322a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'o//'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la nges par 'byed de'i cha dang 'thun pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
322a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi gting dpag dka' ba'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni zab mo'i don to//bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po 'dzin
322a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gzhol ba'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang 'thun pa'o//de'i
322a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o//de'i mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang bas dbang bskur ba thob pa'o//shA ri'i bu
322a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa ni shes pas byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi nga rgyal gyis byas pa ni ma yin no//mngon par shes pa mnyan/
322a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de sems yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su byang ba dang /'od gsal ba dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /shin tu dul ba dang
322b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu zhi ba dang /shin tu sbyang ba byas pa dang /bsam gtAn dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pas kyang bsnams bzhin du skyes te/btsongs///
322b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du skye ba ma yin/bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba ma yin/bcings bzhin du 'byung ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i/kun rtog pa las
322b3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o//de ni nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad las grol ba'o//de ni phyin ci log gi rtse mo'i gnas las grol ba'o//de bas nA de grol bzhin du skye/grol bzhin
322b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'chi 'pho//grol bzhin du 'byung ngo //de skye yang theg pa chen pos phongs par yang mi 'gyur la//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyuraro//
322b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed/mi dmigs la/chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug go/de ltar na sangs rgyas
322b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos dang /chos thams cad ni chos kyang ma yin la/chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o//chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed pa dril bgrang ba gang
322b7(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las shin tu 'das pa'o//gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos dang /chos ma yin pa la mngon/
323a1(dkon brtsegs): par chags par mi byed pa'o//mngon par chags pa med pa de ni/chos thams cad kyi don to//gang don la rlom sems su byed pa de ni
323a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i gnod pa chen po'o//gang don la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i mdun na ni don nam dron ma yin pa mi gnas so//don mthong ba las gang du'ang blo thogs par mi
323a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/de'i blo thogs pa med do//gang blo thogs pa med pa de yongs su mi 'dzin to//gang yongs su mi 'dzin pa de mi chags so//gang mi chags pa de
323a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas med do//gang gnas med pa de nyams pa med do//gang nyams pa med pa de'i rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'o//gang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yod pa de la gti mug
323a5(dkon brtsegs): med do//gang gti mug med pa de la nga'i ba med do//gang la nga'i ba med pa de la rtsod pa med do//gang la rtsod pa med pa de dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa de lhag pa'i
323a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang mtshungs so//gang lhag pa'i na mkha' dang mtshungs pa de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin//
323a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//gang thams cad du gtogs pa de ma yin pa de la kha dog med/mtshan ma med/dbyibs med do//
323b1(dkon brtsegs): gang kha dog med/mtshan ma med/dbyibs med pa de'i rjes su gtogs pa ni de 'dra'o//de'i rjes su gtogs pa ci 'dra bar gtogs pa'ang de 'dra'o//ci'i phyir rjes su gtogs pa dang /
323b2(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/gang gi phyir rjes su gtogs par bya ba dang /gtogs par bya ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rjes su gtogasde pa dang /gtogs pa
323b3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o//de ltar rjes su gtogs pa dang /gtogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes
323b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang zhe na/gang byams pa dang /bdag med pa nyid dang /snying rje dang /sems can med pa nyid dang /dga' ba dang /srog
323b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid dang /btang snyoms dang /gang zag med pa nyid dang /sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i sems nyid dang /tshul khrims dang zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /bzod pa dang /mi zad pa'i sems
323b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang /brtson 'grus dang dben pa'i sems nyid dang /bsamo gtan dang nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang /shes rab dang spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /dran pa nye
323b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa dang dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /yang dag par spong ba dang skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang //
324a1(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /dad pa dang chags pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /dran pa das byung gyi sems nyid dang /tI 'dzin dang snyoms par zhugs
324a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems nyid dang /shes rab dang dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang /stong pa nyid dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang byang chub rab tu
324a3(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba dang /lam bsgom pa dang bsgoms pa'i sems nyid dang /zhi gnas dang nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang /lhag mthong dang mthong ba bri bA med pa dang /'phags pa'i
324a4(dkon brtsegs): badren pa bsgom pa dang /shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /thog ma nas dag pa nyid dang dam pa'i chos yongs su
324a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang /mi skye ba lnga bzod pa dang mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sems
324a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang /mtshan rnyed pa dang mtshan med pa'i sems nyid dang /byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang khams bsam gyi snying po'i sems nyid dang /bdud tshar gcod pa dang sems
324a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid dang /byang chub dang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis rtog pa'i sems nyid dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang ldog pa med
324b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems nyid dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa'i sems nyid dang /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'i sems nyid de/shA ri'i bu de ltar na rjes su
324b2(dkon brtsegs): btogs pa dang /gtogs pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ni 'di dag dang gzhan dag ste/de'i phyir ngo mtshar dang /rmad du byung ba'i
324b3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag de 'dra zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu de la bsam gtan zhes bya ba ci zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de bzhin
324b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de la ma chags pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni bdag bde ba la ma chags pa'i
324b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir myong ba med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtAn ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'
324b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam gtan ni 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las mi ldog pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems can
324b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa sbyong ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir//
325a1(dkon brtsegs): nad khyo la ng+gA da/b+h+ya n+ya sa m+b+ha rnams sa sgra gtanan pa ga spyod du byas snro Sh+mA /
325a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa rnams cad shes smra'o//byang chub sems dpe' rnams kyi sem gtan ni nyan thos dadrung ring sna sa na sa kyi snyoms par la ga pa rol gyis nin rje
325a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsamA gAtan ni shin tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir mi bskyed pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
325a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan ni byug chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa'i phyir gnyen po'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni 'jig rten thams cad las
325a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi mchog go/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir sems can la bsams
325a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin du 'gro bal//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bus ma gtan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul zad mi shes pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi'
325a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir mngon par 'phags pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
325b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan no lamathams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dbang byed ba'o//byang chub snrums dpa' rnams kyi bsnam gAtAn nI ye shes che ba nyid kyi phyir khyab pa ste/shAri'i bu de dag ni byang chu//
325b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bus mi gtan no//shA ri'i bude la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi sngon du 'gro zhe na/'di lta skye sems sngo par
325b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//sems ci gcig pa'i sngon du dgro ba'o//sems gnas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//sems zhi gnas kyi sngon du 'grob//ting du 'dzin gyi dbyung
325b4(dkon brtsegs): snron de grI ba'i//ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs kyi sngon de 'gro ba'o//yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro bya'o//bas ma gtAn dang /rnam par tha rA 'i sngon du 'a
325b5(dkon brtsegs): mther gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//'gog pa dgra'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//dge ba'i chos kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o//nyon mongs pa'i dag
325b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba sngon du 'gro ba'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yos su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi
325b7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o//de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag dang zhi bar byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/shA ri'i bu 'dzin
326a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
326a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par bstan po'i phyir/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
326a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gau tan dang ni rnam thar pha rol phyin//pad+ma chu yis gos pa med pa ltar//yid ni chags med dag pa'i 'jig rten na//bskal mang rgya mtshar rtag tu spyad pa
326a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod//gang du ting 'dzin pha rol son pa yis//rnam par snang mdzad zhi ba ting 'dzin dang //zla 'od ces bya ting 'dzin rnam dkod pa//de nyid glog gis rab tu brtson pa
326a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /mngon par 'phags dang de bzhin sems pa dang //dri ma med dang snang ldan ting 'dzin dang //yon tan 'od dang grub 'od mya ngan med//chos rnams thams cad
326a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dbang bsgyur dang //chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos pa dang //ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang phyug ri rab dpa'//dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang //dam chos
326a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' shin tu rnam dag dang //gzhan gyi sems la rnam spyod ting 'dzin dang //dam chas dkon mchog ting 'dzin 'od zer 'dzin//rgyal mtshon rtse mo dpung rgya
326b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen rmongs sel//bdudan+ti stongs rnams 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin dang //stobs bcu dang no stobs lus mngon 'phags dang //kun bcud chags mod ces byu
326b2(dkon brtsegs): tAd+ya 'dzin dang //lhag ni sgron mi bdud sbyin bsgrags pa dang //sA 'dzin legs par gnas de'i ting 'dzin dang //ri rab sgra ni dang rgyal ba mi 'pham dang //ye shos
326b3(dkon brtsegs): sbron dang de bzhin mig gnod drung/rgyal ba thams cad dran pa'i ting 'dzin dang //chos dran dang ni yon tan ye shes 'jug/stong par 'jug dang de bzhin

334a7(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor shing gtsang la mkhas//shin tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni//thos nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur//'jig rten la ni snang
334b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas//byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod//shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi

335a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byod la mkhas//bslabs pa don la khong du chud par byed//de dag dkar po'i phyogs nirtag par spyong //nag po'i phyogs na rtag tu spyong bar byed//dam

341a5(dkon brtsegs): ber dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/kun tu rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /mtshan ma dang /dmigs pa dang /mthong ba dang /thos po dang /dran pa dang /

341a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /gnod sems dang /brtson 'grus dang /le lo dang /bsam gtan dang /g.yeng ba dang /shes rab dang /'chal ba'i
341b1(dkon brtsegs): nas pa la tu byan du rgyugs dang //ma mthun pa'i phyogs /shes pa / pa'i ba shAm+b+has nga ldan rtog tu ma gnas/sa pa dang /mdus par/
341b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ag par i pa dang /dge ba dang /mi dpe bya dang /kho na mtho ba dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /'khor ba deng mya ngan lus 'dus pa nas chos rnams cad kyi gnan
341b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i bar dang lhun cig d+hA mi gnas/zhing sna tshogs dang /sangs rgyas sna tshogs dang /sems can sna tshogs dang /nos sna tshogs nas su rtogs thams
341b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni cigs myiganas/mi shes pa dang shes pa dang /rnan par shes pa dang /kun rdzob dang /don dam pa nus sems can thams cad kyi mtshan mi yi
341b5(dkon brtsegs): nga kun ga tu legs/ myed byengasa'adi rje/ma myed dang/sa su nas 'di sa
341b6(dkon brtsegs): mas cad dang /seM sa rnam par gus pa'i gnas da/zhi bar dang sman cig tu ma~M gan de dag nga gzhan yang sa byas la spyong ba'i chos dpag tu ming
341b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab de nog 'dus byas kyi spyod pa thams cad nga
342a1(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu mi gnas hA/shA ri'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodado//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
342a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas
342a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/chos thams cad la mkhas pa rjes su 'thob bo//de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste phung po la mkhas pa dang /khams la mkhas pa
342a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /bden pa la mkhas pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa dang /rton pa la mkhas pa dang /rnam par shes
342a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /ye shes la mkhas pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang /lam la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang bcu ste/
342a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o//de la phung po la mkhas pa gang zhe na/gang 'di
342a7(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyi dper bya ba bstan pa 'di lta ste/lbu bo rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang /smig rgyu lto bur bston pa dang /nu bur lta bur bstan pa dang /chu shing lta bur
342b1(dkon brtsegs): snun pa dang /sgyu ma sgyu zur bstan pa dang /rmel mASh+Ta thur ban pa dang /zag nAm+b+ha bu bstan pa dang /srog po lta ba bstan pa dang /gzugs pa rnyan lta bur bstan du/
342b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni U b+h+rU~M bu ste/lbu ba lA yang bdag med//sems can med/sgrog med/gang zag med/skyes bu meng+ge/shed bu dang /shud las skyes pa med de/
342b3(dkon brtsegs): lbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyid de'i rang bzhin te/gang de lta ma/khas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//tshor ba ni gyi chu bri lta bu ste/chu bur la yu
342b4(dkon brtsegs): badrug med/sems can med/srog med/gang zag med/shed bu med/shred las skyes pa med/skye ba po med de/chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba yang de'i rang
342b5(dkon brtsegs): zhin te/ga de la m+b+ha las pa 'di ni byung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//'du shes ni TI ka rgyu lta bro ste/sgeg tshu la yang bdag med/sems can med pa nas skyes pa'i bar du
342b6(dkon brtsegs): med de/smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gdu yin pa 'du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin te/glang dri la mkhas bye d+ha ni phung blo la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//du byed rnA swA ni hU~M shing lta du
342b7(dkon brtsegs): chu shing la mang bdag ning sems can med/srog med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/gdadi
343a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bla ste/sgyu ma la yang bdag med/sems can med srog med/
343a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med/shed bu med/shed las skyes pa med/skyes bu med/byed pa po med/tshor ba po med pa ste/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang
343a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang de yin te/gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang phung po rnams shes b+hA ba ni 'jig rten yin te/'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i
343a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid do//'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gung yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no//yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste mi rtag
343a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang bzhin dang /sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/phung po yang de'i rang bzhin no//gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de ltar na byang chub sems pa
343a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po la mkhas pa shes rib kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la khyams la mkhas pa grang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos kyi khams de nI sa'i khams mdo kyi chos kyi kham
343a7(dkon brtsegs): sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin//chos kyi khams ni chu'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams ni ma'i khams mod kyi chos kyi 'am
343b1(dkon brtsegs): tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams ni rlung gi khams mod kyi chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/
343b2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams sgra rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yino///

343b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi
343b5(dkon brtsegs): khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams rnam par bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//chos kyi khams dang bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so//
343b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshungs so//'khor ba'i khams dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshungs so///
343b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams dang na mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs/mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/'dus byas
344a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams su 'jug pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir de la byashad pa dpag tu me da /gang khams la 'jug pa des rab
344a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de ltar na khams la mkhas pa'i byub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la byang chub sems
344a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/'dri la mig bdag dang bdag gis spyong pa de byang chub sems dpa' mig gi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
344a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched lnga mkhas pa'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyor te/de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid bdag dang/
344a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis stong pa de byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/dge ba sogs pa'i phyir grang skye mched
344a6(dkon brtsegs): la kun spobs pa dang /sna tshogs stsogs pa de dag stsogs par mi byed cing dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'jug ste/da ni byang
344a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o//'di ni mig gi skye mchod do//'di ni gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med/

344b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye mched ni gang lam sdud par byed pa'o//'phags bla ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gud lam gtong bar byung po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni sam+b+ha
344b5(dkon brtsegs): can lom la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la snying rje chen po 'thob cing /lAm gyi skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/da ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o///

344b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/'di lta ste sdug bsngalo shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa'o//

345a5(dkon brtsegs): badren pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/'di lta ste kun rdzob gyi bden pa dang /don dam pa'i bden po dang /mtshan nyid kyi bden po'o//de la kun rdzob kyi bden
345a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /yi ge dang /sgra dang brdar bstan pa ste/de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o//de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/gang la
345a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyu ba yang med na yi ge lta ci smos te/de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//de la mtshan nyid kyi bden pa gang na na/'di lta ste mtshan nyid thams cad
345b1(dkon brtsegs): tshan nyid gcig lnga mtshan nyid gcog pa ni mtshan nyid med para'o//dal byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chang pas mi spro//don dam pa'i badren pa mngon du byung bar

345b6(dkon brtsegs): la nyal rgyu sred pa las byung ba'i lta ba de ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o//gang srid pa'i rgyu lta ba de la yang sgro mi 'dogs mi len mi snyems pa de ni kun
345b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//gang phung po lnga rnams shin tu zad pa'i phyir 'gog pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba/phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ba/da ltar byung bar mi
346a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de ni 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa//
346a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la yang reg par byed la/rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa yang thob par byed pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o///
346a3(dkon brtsegs): gang bden pa shes pa de la rnam par rtog pa dang /sems can yongasu brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o///
346a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba ste/de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang /blos rig pa nyid de sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//
346a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang gis kun 'byung bar shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//gang tshor ba gtong zhing mo tshor ba
346a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor bar byed pa dang /'gog pa la yang so sor rtog la tshor ba 'gog pa yang mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i

346b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//de ltar rtogs nas bdon pa de gzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang/

346b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa gang yang med cing /glang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni zad pa 'grog pa shes pa zhes bya'o//gang de ltar tshor ba dang /'jal ba dang /yongs su tshor ba dang /

347a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rkyen shes pa dang /'dus pa shes pa dang /mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /brten pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dbyer med

347a5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa rtogs pa shes pa dang /smon pa med pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa la mngon par 'du byed par shes pa dang /tshul

347b1(dkon brtsegs): dodang /da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad du shes pa dang /phung po rnams la sgyu ma shes pa dang /khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa dang mtshungs par shes pa dang /ru/
347b2(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang /nang zhi ba shes pa dab+h+r-i/phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba shes pa dang /yul la yul med par shes pa dang /dran //

348a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa thams cad shes pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang
348a4(dkon brtsegs): don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa ste/chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams
348a5(dkon brtsegs): cad ma lus par stong pa ste/stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no//chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/mtshan me med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/
348a6(dkon brtsegs): don no//chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no//chos thams cad ma lus pa rnam par phye ba ste rnam pa
348a7(dkon brtsegs): phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no//chos thams cad ma lus par sems can med/srog med/gang zag med pa ste gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni
348b1(dkon brtsegs): don no//gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/gang don ston pa de ni gnas med pa ston pa'o//de ni mi zad pa ston pa'o//
348b2(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba rjes su yid rang ba yang dag pa de kho na gzhan ma yin//
348b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//de la chos so so yang dag/
348b4(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa gang zhe na/gang dag pa dang mi dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang /
348b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i cha dang 'thun pa dang /'khor ba dang /
348b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang /byang chub kyi mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang /
348b7(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yong chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems
349a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang /bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang /'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang /'dod chags chung ngu spyod pa rnams dang /
349a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi ltung ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang /mtha' mar rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang /da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spyod pa rnam
349a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ste/sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang /phyi rol tu 'dod chags la nang du 'dod chags med pa dang /nang du'ang
349a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags med/phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags med pa dang /nad dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang /gzugs la 'dod chags la spu la 'dod chags med pa dang //
349a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra la 'dod chags la/gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang //gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags pa dang /gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chag med pa dang /dri la 'dod chags med pa dang /dri la 'dod chas
349a6(dkon brtsegs): le reg la 'dod chags med pa dang /reg la 'dod chags la ro la 'dod chags med pa dang /rag 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang /dri la 'ang
349a7(dkon brtsegs): chags med pa dang /de ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/gzug la de'i sgras 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong /zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la
349b1(dkon brtsegs): ga spyong/ ga ts+tsha rnams nan spyong/rnamA ma pA d+mab rnams kA zla zugan su ga dag sa spyong pa ban zla na gastan
349b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa shes pa dang /de ltar rig par bstan pa shes pa dang /mI mang mi nyung bar bskrun pa shes pa dang /'dod pa las yang dag par 'dri per shes pa dang /
349b3(dkon brtsegs): snod kyi khyad par shes pa dang /'bras bu yod par bstan pa shes pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par
349b4(dkon brtsegs): rlig pa gli na na/gang skad thams cud la skad med par 'jug pa shes pa dang /lha'i skad dang /klu'i skad dang /gnod sbyin gyi sgrad dang /dri ba'i gang dang /
349b5(dkon brtsegs): me maci'i skad dang /lho'i phye chen po'i slad dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i skad dang /'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sad dang /sgra dang dbyis
349b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams las skad des de dag la chos 'chang ba ste/de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o//de ltar ches de
349b7(dkon brtsegs): dag bsdu bar bya'o//de ltar chos de dag rjes su rgyun chags par bya'o//de ltar chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis spel bar bya'o//de zhig gcig gi bla dwags shes/
350a1(dkon brtsegs): /cho ga gnyis pa'i bla dwags shos/chog mang po'i bla dwag s+ya shaste/bud med kyi tshig shrIs+thA/skyes pa'i tshig shes/ma ning gi tshig nas/
350a2(dkon brtsegs): smrasmra pa'i tshig sheste/rgyus pa'i tshig shes/spyad pa'i tshig shes/spyod pa'i tshig shes/'das pa'i tshig shis/ma 'ongs pa'i tshig shim+b+ha/daltar
350a3(dkon brtsegs): bi'i tshig shes/yi ge gocig gis sgro btags pa shes/yi ge mang pos sgro btags pa shes te/de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/
350a4(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'khrul ba ma yin/bzlos pa ma yin/brtags pa ma yin/don gsal ba'i ye shes yongs su byung ba ste//
350a5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang 'khor yang dag par dga' ba sna tshogs pa/zab pa/zab par snang ba/kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/b+ha dag gi sems mthong ba'i shes
350a6(dkon brtsegs): la rag lus pa/sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba/sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o///
350a7(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/gang tshig bzang ba mi gnas par lung bstan pa/ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/slobs pa
350b1(dkon brtsegs): myur bya/spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/spobs pa rmongs pa/spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/spobs pa yongs su mi nyams pa/spobs pa mi 'gal ba/spobs
350b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsod pa med pa/spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/spobs pa zab pa/spobs pa sna tshogs pa/kun rdzob dang don dam pa la spobs
350b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab thams cad la gnas pa'i spobs pa/dran pa nye bar gzhag
350b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong
350b5(dkon brtsegs): la spobs pa/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /bden pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spong
350b6(dkon brtsegs): pA/theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la spobs pa/tshig mi lkug pa'i spobs pa/tshig mi rtsub pa'i spobs pa/tshig

351a3(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba'i spobs pa/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la chos ston to//de'i chos bstan pa de yang 'byung bar byed pa/de byed pa'i sdug bsngal

351a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste don lnga ston gyi tshig 'bru lnga ma yin pa dang /ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la

351b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru gang na na/cho ga 'bru zhes bya ba gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni//
351b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /sdom pa dang /des brtan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang /zhi gnas dang /skur pa ma yin pa dang /rnying pa ma yin par shes pa'o//tshig 'bru
351b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba yongs su bcad pa sgrogs pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la rton pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya dran las 'das pa'i yon tan yongasu sgrogs pa'o//
351b4(dkon brtsegs): don zhes bya ba ni chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni theg pa ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du
351b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni chos tshul gtsog pa rtogs par shes pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni

351b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//de na zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs shing mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gnod sems kyi tha ba dang khro ba dang //
352a1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pa 'joms shing bzod pa dang /nges pa brtan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o//tshig/
352a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni mi len mi gtong ba gnas pa'i brtson 'grus so//tshig 'bru zhes bya
352a3(dkon brtsegs): b+ha na bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'i

352a5(dkon brtsegs): chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'bras
352a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mngon sum du byed pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba drang /kun 'byung ba dang /lam rab tu bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon sum du
352a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o//tshi go 'bru zhes bya ba ni ma rig po la sogs te rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni mi rig pa 'gog pa nas rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o//
352b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis tshogs bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'o//tshig 'bru zhes byu ba ni gang 'dod chagasu dang //
352b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang gauti mug dang cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos snyanu pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rnam par grel pa mi 'khrugs pa'o//tshi ge 'bru zhes bya ba ni sgrib
352b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tu bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan
352b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa mtha' med pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o//don zhes bya ba ni gang rjes 'dod chags med pa dang /'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan bsgrub
352b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub sem dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bslabs pa dang /yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o//don zhes bya
352b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni swerdzas kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o//mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bstan
352b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni tshig 'bru zhes bya'o//sgra dang yi ge dang tshig 'bru thams cad brjod du med pa'i don to//de la drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/gang tshig 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa/
353a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/'di dag nI drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde dag go//nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/drin gang bshad pa
353a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/de dag ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde dgra go/dri ji ltar na chos la rton gyi gang zag lnga ma yin zhe na/gang
353a3(dkon brtsegs): drang ba'i don de ni gang zag gi don yin pas de la mi rton gyi/gang nges pa'i don de ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i/

353a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gang zhe na/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes

354b7(dkon brtsegs): can dang srog dang skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed bu dang /shed las skyes dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po'i sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa/bdag po
