355a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag dang /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo srang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtsa ba dang /lho dang mi'i
355b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten du skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
355b2(dkon brtsegs): sa sA rgyas te/gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob kyi gnas kyis sems can rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'o//de la gang mngon par chags pa
355b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni rton pa ma yin zhes bya'o//de dag rton pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos nyid la rton par bya'i gang zag la ma yino//zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/de la
355b4(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid gang zhe na/'di lta ste mi 'gyur ba sgro ma btags pa mi byed pa rnam par mi byed pa/mi gnas pa gnas pa med pa/rtsa ba med pa thams cad du mnyam pa/mnye pa/
355b5(dkon brtsegs): lAlnga mnyam pa/mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/rnam par mi rtog pa/mi rtsom pa/nges par 'gyur ba thob pa/chos thams cad la
355b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos nyid ces bya ste/gang dag chos nyid de la rton par byed pa de ni khams gang la'ang rton par mi byed de/de byas na chos kyi tshul gyi sgo
355b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rten pa'i phyir chos thams cad de lta bu'i chos nyid yin no//de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi zhes bya ste/de ni bya
356a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rton pA la mkhas bla shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
356a2(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi tshogs ni 'di gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste bsod nams kyi tsha
356a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes kyi tshog so//de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhe na/sbyin pa la sa byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod
356a4(dkon brtsegs): nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /snying rje'i sbyor ba dang /dge
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom pa dang /bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig pa 'chags pa dang /dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang /slob pa tha dang /
356a6(dkon brtsegs): mi slob pa thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems dang po bskyed pa rnamapa dang /spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang /phyir mi ldo
356a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi ring ba dang /'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /
356b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba thams cad kyi rjesu yi rung ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'bugs/
356b2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
356b3(dkon brtsegs): blo dang /sems can byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i la mo ston pa dang /dbul po rnams la longs spyod
356b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis sdud pa dang /nad pa rnams la sman gyi sbyin pa dang /gus par bsnyen bkur byeng ba dang /mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang /ltung ba rnams mi
356b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chub pa dang /sdig pa 'chags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la ba sbyin+da bkur dang /
356b6(dkon brtsegs): ri mo thams cad byed pa dang /slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang /chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i
356b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang /chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag tshad brgyar yang song ste chos nyan pos chog mi shes pa dang /zang zing med par chos 'chad pa dang /pha dang mal
357a1(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byed pa dang /byas pa bzo ba dang /b+h+yas pa shes pa dang /'gyod pa med pa dang /bsod nams bsags pas chog mi shes pa dang /
357a2(dkon brtsegs): lus bsdams shing tshul 'ches pa med pa dang /drag bsdams po'i ngag la tshul 'chos pa myed pa dang /yid bsdams pa'i yid la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /
357a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten btsugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa dang /mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bstsags pas mtshan
357a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sna tshogs bstsags pas dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /nga rgyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang /
357a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis nyes pa thams cad spangs pas ngag brgyan pa dang /blo thogs pa med pas sems brgyan pa dang /mngon par shes pa sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya
357a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /ye shes yongs su dag pas chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis brgyan pa dang /phra ma dang /zho gcod pa dang dbye ba'i tshig yongasu spangs pas 'khor mang po'i brgyan dang /
357a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyis brgyan pa dang /rab tu dga' nas legs so zhes bya ba byi ni nas chos kyi gtam mi 'jigs par byed pa dang //
357b1(dkon brtsegs): sdob pa dang tshod pa rnam par sbyangs shing gus par chos nyan pas 'bras bu yod par zlos 'chad pa dang sangs rgyu sa rnams la dka' thub kyi nags tshul phul bsdu byang chub kyi zhing /
357b2(dkon brtsegs): gi brgyan dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas byang chub kyo snying po'i brgyan dang /las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas
357b3(dkon brtsegs): dang shi 'pho yongs su dag pa dang /rin po che phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong bas lag na rin po che dang /mi zad pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod
357b4(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa dang /khro gnyer med pas mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dad cing bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smra ba dang /sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyoms
357b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang /ma lobs pa la mi brnyas pus 'od mang po gtong ba dang /tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bsags pas skye ba yongs su dag pa dang /lhung
357b6(dkon brtsegs): bA la mi rtsod pas mngal yongs su dag pa dang /dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba dang /rjes su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtog pas gdoni
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mi za bar gnon pa dang /chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi dbang phyug dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon su
358a1(dkon brtsegs): /ba dang /nye tshe bya'i spyod pa mi 'dod pas rgyu chen po'i chos la dad pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor bas bsod nams thams cad
358a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dang /dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /sngon dam bcas po nyams su lon par byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mi smra
358a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
358a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/rgyu gung gis ye shes skye ba ste/de ltar rgyu dang rkyen gang gis
358a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rtogs pa'o//de la rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/chos tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa dang /ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i ba shes gnyen bsten pa dang /sangs
358a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes la rton gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi rton pa dang /de dag la nga rgya la mi byed pa dang /bla ma la dga' ba dang /ston pa la
358a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang /de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis 'di ni bsam pa dang ldan par shes nas/ye shes kyi gtam gang yang mi ston pa med pa dang /snod du
358b1(dkon brtsegs): shos nus bar chud myod par sems rtse gtsug tu chos ston pa dang /dus chos de thos nas chos kyi tshogs lnga brtson par byed do/gang chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed pa/
358b2(dkon brtsegs): de nyid de'i ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson pa yin no//de la chos kyi tshogs la brtson pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba dang /sgra nyung ba dang /srong dang
358b3(dkon brtsegs): tho rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /'bel ba'i don la yongs su rtog pa dang /phyir zhing yongs su tshol ba dang /sems la rnyog pa med pa dang /
358b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa gnon pa dang /ltung ba las 'byung bar shes pa dang /'gyod pa med pa dang /kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /nan tan snying por byed pa dang /chos la gzhol ba dang
358b5(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'bab pa dang /chos la bab pa dang /chos la rtul ba dang /rtag par mgo dang lus la me 'bar ba lta bu dang /ye shes tshol ba de nyid la gnas pa dang /mi
358b6(dkon brtsegs): lhod pa dang /brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang /khyad par du 'gro ba dang /'du 'dzi las dben pa dang /gcig pu dga' ba dang //dgon pa'i bde ba yid la byed pa dang /
358b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang /sbyangs pa las mi 'gyur ba dang /chos kun dga' ba la dga' zhing mos pa dang /'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig le ri mor ma
359a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /'jig rten las lus pa'i chos tsholta ba la dran pa minyams pa dang /tshogs pa la don rnyogs pa'i rjesu 'gro ba dang /blo gros la/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi rjes su 'thun por byed pa dang /mos pa la sdom pa dang /rkyen lnga ye shes kyi rjes su rig pa dang /khrel yod pa dang /dro tsha shes pa'i rgyun dang //
359a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi 'gros kyi rje suM 'gro ba dang /mi shes pa sel ba dang /ma rig pa dang /gti mug gi ling tog sel ba dang /shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa
359a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /rab tu rnam par dkru pa dang /blo rgyu che ba dang /blo ma zhum pa dang /blo rab tu tha dad pa dang /mngon sum du shes pa dang /gzhan la rig ma lus pa
359a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang /rang gi yon tan gyis mi skems pa dang /bai rol gyi yon tan la rtog pa dang legs par bya ba'i las byed pa byu /las kyi rnam par
359a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang 'gal bar byed pa dang /lngas yongs su dag par byed pa ste/da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi tshogs shes bya'o//gzhan
359a7(dkon brtsegs): ying ye shes kyi tshogs ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/chos sgri ba la 'gro ba dang /smyu gu dang /snag cha dang /glegs pa me sbyin pa dang /chos sgrub la chos kyi stan sna
359b1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang /chos sgyu bla la rnyed pa dud bsgyu b+has+t+r-i dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang /chus smra ba la rnaMs krAn+ta byAs+thA ba rI phy-i g.yo med par logs so zhes byung
359b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ste/sbyin pa bzhi po de dag ni ye shes kyi tsho gas stsogs par 'gyur ro//kun bsrung ba bzhi po rnams ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi gang zhen
359b3(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba rnams kyi lus yongs su bsrung ba dang /dge ba bsrung ba dang /yul dang ljongs su 'jug pa la yongs su bsrung ba dang /phan pa'i dngos po yongs su bsrung
359b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/kun bsrung ba ni bzhi po de drug go/nye bar brtan pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos smra ba rnams kyi chos nye bar rton pa dang /
359b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes nye bar rten pa dang /zang zing nye bar rton pa dang /byang chub nye bar rton pa'o//stobs lnga ye shes kyi tshog su 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na//'di lta ste mos pa'i
359b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir dad pa'i stobs dang /thos pa tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /byang chub kyi sems myi brjod pa'i
359b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir dran pa'i stobs dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi ngos la nges par rtog pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/stobs lnga po de
360a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu nags nags su m+b+ham+mAn+d+ho//rgyu khrims ldan yanganas rtogs bsngags pa cu ts+tsha/bzhi n+d+hanA/ na/
360a2(dkon brtsegs): la nges pa'i tshul khrims dang /chos tshol ba'i tshul khrims dang /chos la nges par rtog pa'i tshul khrims dang /byang chub tu bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te/
360a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro//bzod pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste chos
360a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul ba la mngon par brtson pas ngan du smras pa dang ngan du brjod pa'i tshig bzod pa dang /chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rlung dang tsha ba dang /glang ba dang /
360a5(dkon brtsegs): dro ba dang /skem pa dang /bkres pa bzod pa dang /chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas slob dpon dang /mkhan po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /chos tshol ba
360a6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par brtson pas stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos bzod pa ste/bzod pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par
360a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//brtson 'grus bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur to/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste thos pa'i brtson 'grus dang /gzungs kyi brtson 'grus dang /
360b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang /nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/brtson 'grus bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi ye shwe
360b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshigs sogs par 'gyur te//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste dben pa dang /gcig pu dga' ba dang /ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa tshol ba dang /sangs rgyas
360b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes la 'jug pa ste/bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro//shes rab snang ba'i chos 'dri bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs
360b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'chad pa la mi gnas pa dang /rtag pa la mi 'jug pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba dang /bdag med
360b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mos pa ste/shes rab snang ba'i chos bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro//chos 'di bzhi thabs kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste
360b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i rje su 'jug pa dang /mdo sde'i rjesu 'jug pa dang /chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa dang /ye shes kyi rjesu 'jug pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag thabs kyi ye shes
360b7(dkon brtsegs): tshog su 'gyur ro//chos 'di bzhi lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'odi lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
361a1(dkon brtsegs): rlu lam smra sa/s+yA nan+d+ha rgyu sa na Sh+Tasad+ha nA/ bad+mo la da kyu na//
361a2(dkon brtsegs): pU 'aM m+bu su //mi rnams pa d-i 'i gas smig+sa / TI T+Ten+da/disgru bas mye mi nga/
361a3(dkon brtsegs): dodas pa dang /dpyod pas mi ngoms pa dang /ye shes kyis myi ngoms pa ste/mi dmas pa bzhi pa de dag ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang
361a4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi chags ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /zhing thams cad kyi rnas 'grob ste/sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshus su sbyar//
361a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms las kyang ye sh+le
361a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chags su lta'o//de ni'i phyir zhe na/ji tsamad+ma byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa de thams cad ye shes kyi khar lus bye ye shes sngon du 'grub ye shes la rton pa
361a7(dkon brtsegs): de ye shes la gnas pa ye shes can thams cad kyi rten par 'gyur te/bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed do//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyang 'thob/
361b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga yang gzhog par byed do//de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
361b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po tshogs rnam pa de gnyis la mkhas po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye ba ro gzhog pa la mkhas pa gang
361b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar
361b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa bsgom pa dang /tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom
361b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa'o//de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa gang zhe na
361b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pA de lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' la yang so sor rtog/lus kyi phyi ma'i mtha' la yang
361b7(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog/lus kyi de ltar byung ba la yang so sor rtog ste/kye ma'o lus 'di ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste/rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa g.yo ba med pa/byed pa
362a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ba/bdag blo med pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/'dri lta sto dper nu phyi rol gyi rtsa dang /shing grol ba dang /sman dug nags tshal dag rgyu dang /
362a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen las 'byung zhing bdag po med/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du lus 'di yang rtswa dang /rtsig pa dang /shing dang /bong ba dang /mi ga yor lta bu phung po
362a3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang /skye mched yongs su 'dzin pa dang /bdag dang bdag gi 'am/rtag pa'am brtan pa 'am/ther zug gam/mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis stong ste/
362a4(dkon brtsegs): lus de la nga'ir mi bya'i lus snying po med pa dres snying po blang bar bya'o//de la snying po gang zhe na/'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni
362a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku rdo rje'i sku mau byed pa'i sku/sra ba'i sku/'jig rten gosum po thams nAd dang khyad zhugs pa'i sku bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o//bdag gi lus 'di nyes pa du
362a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i skyon tshegs mod kyi/'on kyang nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya'o zhes de so sor rtog pa'i mthus legs par
362a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/'byung ba chen po'i gnas kyi lus yongasu bsrung bar byed de/nga'i lus ni sems can thams cad kyi cir dgos bzad par bya'o//'di lta ste dper
362b1(dkon brtsegs): na phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /mye'i khams dang /rlung gi khams sgo sna tshogs dang /dmigs pa sna tshogs dang /rnam
362b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs sna tshogs dang /yo byad sna tshogs dang /yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba de bzhin du/bdag gi 'byung ba chen
362b3(dkon brtsegs): bro bzhi las gyur pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs dang /dmigs po sna tshogs dang /rnam grangs sna tshogs dang /yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams
362b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nye bar 'tsho bar tsho bar gyur cig snyamo//de'i lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi skye ba dang /shi 'phos kyang mi skye'o//lus sdug bsngal nyid du so sor rtog
362b5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/lus kyi sdug bsngal bas kyang yongs su mi gdung ngo //lus bdag med pa nyid du yong so sor rtog mod kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang mi skye'o///
362b6(dkon brtsegs): lus zhi ba nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi lus zhi ba btang snyom su yang mi lhung ngo //lus stong pa nyid dang /lus dben pa nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi dben pa'i
362b7(dkon brtsegs): mur yang mi ltung ngo //de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na lus la rdzas dang snying por rjes su mi mthong ngo //nang gi lus la yang lus kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas
363a1(dkon brtsegs): pa na nang gi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi go skabs mi 'byed do//de phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa na phyi rol gyi rjesu
363a2(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so//de la lus nyon mongs pa med pas lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa yino//de lus yongs su
363a3(dkon brtsegs): dag nas mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku 'thob bo//de lus brgyan par gyur nas lha dang mi rnams mngon du 'du bar 'gyur te/de ni byang chub sems
363a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bur gzhag pa bsgom pa'o//yung ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshe ra ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran
363a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhug pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' grang ci tshor yang rung ste/de thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/
363a6(dkon brtsegs): de ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang /shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang /thabs kyis rtogs pa'i tshor ba shin tu rtogs pas bde bar tshor bar bag la nyalnga yang byed med
363a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ba yang bag la nyal bar mi byed do//sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas reg nas kyang ngan song du skyes pa thams cad la snying rje tshon po
363b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing khyong khyo bo'i tshor bar dgu la nyal bar mi pyod do//bang ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas rog kyang ma rig pa'i ngag la nyal yang bag /
363b2(dkon brtsegs): nyol bar mi byed do//de tshor ba'i rjes su sod pa'i dran pas bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am+b+ha/pad+me ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshar ba gang
363b3(dkon brtsegs): bayang cod pa de dag lnga 'byung bar lta ba yin no//sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba yongs su shes shing zhi ba'i phyir yang 'jug ste/sems can 'di dag ni tshor ba las 'byung
363b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mi shes pas de dag bde ba'i tshor ba la dga' bar byed/sdug bsngal ba'i tshong ba la zhe sdang bar byed/bde ba yang ma yini sdug bsngal ba yang mA yin pa la rmongs par
363b5(dkon brtsegs): byed kyis drungag ni shes rab dang /ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs pa'i tshor ba tshor ba thams cad so sor sbyangs pa dang /thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongasu
363b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i rtsom pas sems can de dag gi tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i chos bstan par bya'o//ci'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya zhe na/rtogs pa'i tshor pa ni bde ba
363b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//ma rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyuraro//de la rtogs pa'i tshor ba gong zhe na/'di la bdag gamo/sems can nam/srog gam/gang
364a1(dkon brtsegs): /zag gang yang tshor bar byed pa ma chags pa ni tshor ba'o//yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshor ba'o//lon+d+ra pa ni tshor ba'o//phyin ci log ni tshor ba'o//
364a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa ni tshur ba'o//lta ba'i bag lo nyal ba ni tshur+ya ba'o//mig tu 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas yid kyi bar du 'du shes pa ni tshor ba'o//gzugs
364a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas chosu 'du shes pa'i bar du ni tshor ba'o//gang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba
364a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o//grong ma bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la sbyar te/yid kyi bar du 'dus te reg pa'i
364a5(dkon brtsegs): rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yod ma yin pa'i byar du de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang
364a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs kyis tshor ba gcig ste de ni sems gcig pus rnam par rig pa'o//tsho ra ba gnyis te phyi dang nang gi'o//tshor ba gsum ste 'das pa rnam par rig pa dang /
364a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa rnam par rig pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnam par rig pa'o//tshor ba bzhi ste/de ni khams bzhi rnam par rig pa'o//char ba lnga ste de ni phung po lnga yid la
364b1(dkon brtsegs): byubye bar//tshor ba drug ste de ni skye mchod drug yongs su rtog par//tshor ba bdun te de ni rnam par shes pa'i gnas pad+mAn no//tshor ba brgyad de ni log par nges pa'i sbyor ba//
364b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyud do//tshor rab dgu ste da ni sems can gyi gnas dgu'o//tshor ba bcu ste de ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/thams cad ni tshar ba
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ji snyed pa dang yid la byed pa ji snyed pa de thams cad tshor bar bya'o//de bas na sems can tshad med pas tshor ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
364b4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhung gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba skye ba dung 'jig pa dang /gnas pa la ye shes bskyed par bya ste/gang sems can thams
364b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshor ba la tshor ba shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bor gzhag pa'o//de la byang chub sems
364b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhog pa gang zhe na/grang byang chub sems dpa'i mi brjed pa dang /sba ba dang /kun bsrung ba dang /mi gra yeng
364b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//de 'di ltar so sor rtog pa ste/sems ni skyes nas 'jig cing zhu ste mi gnas pa nas nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol tu yang mi 'pho ste/gang bdag gis
365a1(dkon brtsegs): thog mar sems bskyod pa de yang zad rnam par gyur to yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pas de rnyod par mi nus te/somyas grang gis da/
365a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag kyang zad med rnam por gyur yul ni mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas so//gang yang byang chub tu bsngos pa'i sems de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan/
365a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid med pa ste/sems kyis sems rab tu mi shes te/sems kyis sems mi mthong /sems kyis sems mi tshor na gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang /
365a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya ba'i sems de gang yin/gang byang chub kyi sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs//
365a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems de yang bsngo ba'i sems dang mi la grogs/gang bsngo ba'i sems de yang byang chub kyi sems drang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang mye 'grog
365a6(dkon brtsegs): so zhes de de ltar so sor rtog pa dang /mi skrag mI dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur gyi/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rgyu dang
365a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu chud mi za'o//gal te sems kyi chos nyid de lta bu sems kyi rang bzhin nyid yin yang /chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa g.yo ba med pa
365b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa/bdag po med pa ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub kyis bdag gis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o//sems kyi chos nyid de mi 'bri bar bya'o//de la sems kyi
365b2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid gang /bsgrub pa gang zhe na/sems ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ba ste/de la sgrib par byed pa su yang med de de ni sems kyi chos nyid do//gang yang bdog pa thams cad
365b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam pa sgra ba pa'i rgyan du bsngo bar byed pa de ni sgrub par byed pa'o//sems rmi lam dang 'dra ba rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de ni sems
365b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid de/gang yang tshul khrims sdom pa'i tshogs sogs so cog de thams cad myur ba'i mngon par shes par bsngo ba de ni bsgrub pa'o//sems smig rgyu lta
365b5(dkon brtsegs): bu shin tu zad pas zad par 'gyur ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de gang yang bzod pa'i stobs dang /des byang chub kyi rgyan sgrub pa'i phyir bsngo ba de ni de'i bsgrub pa'o///
365b6(dkon brtsegs): sems chu zla lta bu shin tu dben pas dben pa de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
365b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba de ni de'i bsgrub pa'o//sems bzung du med pa mi mthong ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa
366a1(dkon brtsegs): drang ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par gzhag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin du bsngo ba de ni de'i sgrub pa'o//sems gzugs med pa mi mthong ba mi
366a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa rnam par mi rig pa de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang dris pa'i tshig tha dad pa bstan pa thams cad shes pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo
366a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni de'i bsgrub pa'o//dmigs pa sna tshogs la sems skye ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems nye bar sbyor ba de ni de'i
366a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'o//rgyu med pa las sems mi skye ba de ni sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rgyu'i sems bskyed pa de ni de'i bsgrub pa'o//gang
366a5(dkon brtsegs): yul med par sems mi skye ba de ni de'i sems kyi chos nyid de/gang yang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu'i sems nye bar sbyor ba de ni de'i bsgrub pa'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub
366a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems la sems kyis rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o//de sems la sems kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na mngon par shes pa thob pa'i phyir
366a7(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu 'brel par byed de//de mngon par shes pa thob nas sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes te/shes nas kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi
366b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'chad do//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na snying rje chen po thob pa'i phyir sems nye bar 'brel par byed do/snying rje chen po thob pas
366b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba la yongasu mi skye'i//sems la sems kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas pa ni sems zad pa dang sems 'gog par bya ba'i phyir sems gnas
366b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed kyi/'khor ba'i rgyun gyi kun nas sbyor ba rnams kyis sems mngon par sgrub ste/sems kyi dran pa shes pa de ma skyes pa dang /mi skye bo nges par gyur pa la
366b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyis gnas te/nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar
366b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems kyi rgyud de rgyun chags par byed de/sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
366b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya ste/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyis rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom mo//shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems
366b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis chos
367a1(dkon brtsegs): gang mthong ba de dag byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bar mdor rmongs par mi 'gyur te/de chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na gang spong ba
367a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du ma gtogs pa dang /mtshan ma med par ma gtogs pa dang /smon pa med par ma gtogs pa dang /mi skye bar ma gtogs pa dang /mi skyes par ma
367a3(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed par ma gtogs pa dang /dngos po med par ma gtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi mthong ngo //gang rten cing
367a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung bar ma gtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' de chos la chos kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas pa na
367a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong gi/chos ma yin pa mi mthong ngo //de la chos gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag med pa'i don dang /sems can med pa'i don dang
367a6(dkon brtsegs): srog med pa'i don dang /gang zag med pa'i don te/de ni chos shes bya'o//de la chos ma yin pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag tu lta ba dang /sngon du lha
367a7(dkon brtsegs): be dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /chad par lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba dang /'byung bar lta ba dang /'jig par lta ba ste/da ni chos ma yin
367b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o//yang shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni chos so//chos thams cad ni chos ma yin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa
367b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos so//bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i bag la nyal ba'i phyir chos thams cad dro chos ma yin pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos la chos
367b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na chos de dag la gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa gang las byang chub tu mi 'gyur ba dang /gang las sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ba dang /
367b4(dkon brtsegs): gang las lam du mi 'gyur ba dang /gang las thar par mi 'gyur pa dang /gang las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi mthong ste/de chos thams/
367b5(dkon brtsegs): cad 'byung bar shes nas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'thob ste/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang de dag nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma
367b6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/de dag nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes bcos mar 'du shes bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar de dag ni nges pa'i don la yang dag par 'jug ste/nyon
367b7(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa rnams la bsags pa 'am phung po med de/de dag nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub po//nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa byang chub kyi rang bzhin
368a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de yin no//byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa nyon mongs pa'i rlung bzhin yang de yin+ta te/de ltar dran pA nye bar gzhug kyang cung zad kyang
368a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'jog pa med/rab tu 'jog pa medo/mi 'jog pa med de chos nyid de gnas pa nyid du rab tu shes so//de bas na chos kyi dbyings de ni gnas pa nyid ces
368a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//chos kyi dbyings gnas pa gang la gnas pa sems can gyi khams kyang gnas de la gnas so//sems can gyi khams gnas gang la gnas pa na mkha'i
368a4(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang gnas de la gnas te/de bas na chos thams cad na mkha' dang margyangs shes par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de chos lnga chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
368a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi chos la rton pa yin/chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chosu mos par byed de/de zad pa shes pa yang bskyed mod kyi 'dus ma byas pa'i zud pa
368a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon du mi byed/mi skye ba shes pa yang mngon par bsgrub mod kyi sems can la lta ba'i phyir yang skye la/mi skye ba'i mtha' de yang mi gtong ngo //dran pa nye ba
368a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dang dran pa de la gzhog par byed cing /nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed chos su gdag/
368b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad ma lus par dran pa de la 'jog ste/dran pa de yang brjed par mi byed phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du rmongs par mi byed do//chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
368b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o//zhes bya ba de ni bstan pa dpag tu med pa ste/kun du spyod yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par 'dul ba sems
368b3(dkon brtsegs): cen thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa bdud thams cad 'dul ba rang byung ba rtogs pa'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lte
368b4(dkon brtsegs): zhir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom mo//de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ste/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag
368b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
368b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdun te/bdun gang zhe no/'di lta ste dran pa yang dgu byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
368b7(dkon brtsegs): lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang //
369a1(dkon brtsegs): ting du 'dzin yang dgra byung chub kyi yan lag dang /byAtAd sgyums yang dag byang chub ky-i yan+da lag s+thA/shA ri'i bu de dag byang chub sems //
369a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no//de lo dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/dran pa gang gis chos rtogs par byed/chos la so sor rtog
369a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed/chos la dpyod par byed/chos yongs su tshol bar byed cing chos rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang /chos la rnam par rtog par byed de/de dran pa des gang
369a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshon nyid de yang rje su rtogs so//yang chosna rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shrI pa gang zhe na/chos thams cad rang gi chutshan nyid kyis stong
369a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/gang de ltar dran zhing khong chud pa de ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na//
369a6(dkon brtsegs): gang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa ste/nges pa'i don kyang nges pa'i don du/drang ba'i don kyang drang ba'i don du/kun rdzob kyi/
369a7(dkon brtsegs): don kyang kun rdzob kyi don du/don dam pa'i don kyang don dam pa'i don du/brda yang brdang /rnam par gtan la bab pa yang rnam par gtan la bab par chos
369b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ji ltar rab tu dbye bar bya ba de bzhin du de dag rnam par 'byed par byed de/de ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//nga la brtson 'grus
369b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub yon lag gang zhe na/gang chos rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyi dga' ba dang /shin tu spangs po dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /btang snyoms dang /ya
369b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rab tu 'dzin pa dang /spro ba dang /stobs dang /rtul ba dang /mi bzlogs pa'i mos pa dang /mthu dang /brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /lam mngon par rtogs
369b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba la brtson 'grus brtsom pa ste/de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na//
369b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gang dang /chos la dga' ba gang dang /chos la mchog tu dga' ba gang gis sems mi zhum zhing dang ba ste/ma zhum pa'i dga' ba des gang lus sam
369b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang shin tu byang bar byed la/kun nas nyon mongs pa yang sel ba de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dgra
369b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/gang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang /nyon mongs pa shin tu sbyangs pa dang /sgrib pa med pa dang /ting
370a1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin du dmigs pa la sems nye bar gzhog pa ste/de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag//
370a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos shes pa rtogs par 'gyur te/semasna mnyam par ma gzhag pas ni ma yin pa dang /sems
370a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i sems mnyam bA ra ma gzhag pas ma yin te/chos mnyam pa nyid dang chos la gzhol ba
370a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par rjes su chags pa'i kun nas dkris pas rtogs par mi byed de/de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag/byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//de la btang
370a5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/gang yid bde ba dang /gang yid mi bde ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la sems
370a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang /mthon dman du ni mi gnas pa'i phyirab tu mi g.yo ma 'khrug rab tu mi 'khrug yang dag par mi
370a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug/chags par mi byed zhe sdang bar mi byed kyi 'phags pa'i lam de nyid dang 'thun par byed pa ste/de ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o//
370b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag de bdun la mAkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la byang chub sems dpa'//
370b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lam la mkhas pa glang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi lam ni 'di brgyad do//brgyud gang zhe no/'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag
370b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
370b4(dkon brtsegs): yang drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/lta ba gang 'phags
370b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/bdag tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin//sems can du lto ba las langs pa ma yin/srog tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin
370b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin/chad pa dang rtag pa dang /'byung ba dang 'jig par lte ba la sA langs pa ma yin//dge ba dang mi dge bar lta ba
370b7(dkon brtsegs): las langs pa ma yin pa nas mya ngan las 'das par lta ba las langs pa ma yin pa ste/de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na
371a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog gang gis 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa gnas par 'gyur ba'i rtog pa de ldang bar mi 'gyur gyi/rtog
371a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la rtog pa
371a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/de ni yang dgra pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i dgra gang zhe na/yang dgu pa'i ngag gang gi bdag dang gzhan la mi gdung zhing de phan pa'i rjesu sbyor ba'i
371a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang ldan pa yin te/ngag des lam mnyam pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/gang los gnas/
371a5(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par smin pa gnag pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /gang las kar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /gang
371a6(dkon brtsegs): las dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /gang las dkar nag ma yin la rnam par sbyin par mi
371a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba las zad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa ste/de las bdag gir bya ba la rton pa yang dag pa'i las la brtson pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar
371b1(dkon brtsegs): zhus bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba dang /kha bsag mod pa dang /tshul 'tshos pa mod pa dang /thob//
371b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jal ba med pa dang /dgang sla ba dang /gso sla ba dang /cho ga mi lhod po dang /gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang /bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang /kha na
371b3(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba med pa dang /'phags pas gnang ba'i 'tsho ba ste/de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/rtsol ba log par spyod par bshad
371b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug gang nyon mongs pa brag la nyal ba'i rtsol ba de mi 'dod kyi/rtsol ba gang 'phags pa'i lam dang /bden pa la 'jug pa mya ngan
371b5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jog par byed pa'i rtsol ba de'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/dran pa gang
371b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nye bar gzhog pa dang /tha mal pa mo yin pa dang /drang ba dang gya gyu rmed pa dang /'khor ba'i nyes pa dang /skyon la lta ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du
371b7(dkon brtsegs): dren po'i dran pa dang /dran par byed pa dang /'phags pa'i lam mi brjed pa ste/de ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin pang zhe na/yang dag
372a1(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid du mnyam pa/chos thams cad la mnyam pa ste/ting ngange 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na yang dag pa nyid du 'jug ste/gang yang byang chub sems
372a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ting 'dzin de la gnas nas sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du 'jug pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o//'das pa dang
372a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam mi zad pa 'di byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtog nas 'chad pa dang ston pa dang /yang
372a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o//de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste de ni byang chub sem
372a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lam la mkhas pa'o///bam po bcu dgu pa//gzhan yang lam la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin lag
372a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste/yan lag gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ste/de ni lam yan lag gnyis pa zhes bya'o//de la zhi gnas gang zhe na/
372a7(dkon brtsegs): gang sems kyi zhi ba dang /rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /mi g.yeng ba dang /dbang po rnams bsdams pa dang /mi rgod pa dang /ma khengs pa dang /mi 'phyar
372b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /mu cor mi smra ba dang /des pa dang /sbas pa dang /g.yo med pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /gcig pur dga' ba dang /'du 'dzi sel ba dang /dben par dga' ba dang //

372b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang po nas brgyad kyi b.raro du mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste/de ni zhi gnas she sra bya'o//gang zhi gnas kyi tshe gas tshad med pa ste/tshogs de la
372b7(dkon brtsegs): gang rjes su rtogs pa de ni zhi gnas shes bya'o//de la lhag mthong gang zhe na/gang shes rab kyi cha dang 'thun pa'i bsgom pa'i lam ste/chos rnams la g.yo
373a1(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /phung po rnams la sgyu ma'i phyung por mthong ba lo shos pa dang /
373a2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams la chos kyi khams su mthong ba'i shes pa dang /skye mched rnams la grong stong par mthong ba'i shes pa dang /mig lha rab tu rnam par phye ba mthong
373a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi 'gal bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /sems can du lta ba dang bral bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /rgyu dang
373a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mthong ba'i shes pa dang /'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba'i shes pa dang /yang dag pa nyid du 'jug pa la 'jug par

373a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhes bya ba ni rgyus mthong ba med pa dang /rgyu med par mthong ba med pa dang /skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa'i rgyus mthong ba med pa dang /dmigs ri
373b1(dkon brtsegs): tsum+bu nu byung ba med cing lcug pur mthong yang cung zad lhag par mi mdza bya'o//gzhan yang ltag mthong no na thong bas kyang mthong la/bag+h+nA dA yang mi mthong ba s+ho/glag/

373b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mthong de ltar mthong la/mngon par 'du byed par yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa la yang mi gnas te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i

373b6(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed 'bad par byed brtson 'grus rtsom/sems rab tu 'dzin/yang dag par rab tu 'dzeg pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa//
373b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed 'bad par byed brtson 'grus rtsom sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'a'ad
374a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed brtson 'grus rlom sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing 'byung ba

374a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed ces bya ba ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i tshig bla dwags so//'bad par

374a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la so sor rtog pa'i tshig bla dwags so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams myi 'byung ba'i phyir ro//dwe l+yA mi
374a6(dkon brtsegs): dgra ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /shes rab kyi mi mthun
374a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyogs so//de la tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul khrims nyams pa dang /gang gzhan la la tshul khrims nyam
374b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams te/de ni tshul khrims kyi myi mthun pa'i phyog smra shes bya'o//de la ting nge 'dzin gyi myi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na/gang cho ga nyams pa
374b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /gang gzhan la lA sems g.yeng bar byed pa'i chos ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes bya'o//de la
374b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na/'di lta ste lta ba nyams pa dang /gang gzhan lnga la lta bu kun nas ldang ba sgrib par byed pa'i chos gang shes rab kyi phung
374b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs de ni shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes bya ste/de ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o//tshul bzhin yid la byed pa gang gis

375a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad par byed brtson 'grus rlom sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya ba d+ha ni gnas chad med
375a5(dkon brtsegs): po ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag par sgrub par bya ba'i dge ba'i chos tshad med pa'i phyir ro//de la 'dun pa

375a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/de ni yang dag par spong ba gsum pa'o//gang yang dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /nyams
375b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang /chud mi zla bAr bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad par byed brtson 'grus rtsom/snyoms rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog ces bya ba de ni dag

375b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/de ltar khams gsum le mi gnas pa thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa de la zad pa gang yang med de/de ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi pa'o//de ltar
375b4(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag bzhi pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gzhan yang lam la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i

376b1(dkon brtsegs): //dA ltar na dbang po lnga po de dag lhan cig tu 'brel ba ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rtogs par byed/lung bstan pa'i sa yang thob par byed do//'di lta ste/
376b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag mngal na 'dug po bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang porI me gyur gyi bAr du ma la na 'dug pa la lung mi ston pa de bzhin du sangs

376b5(dkon brtsegs): lag lnga ni 'di lta ste dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs so//des dad pa'i stobs

376b7(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ba la la zhig gis chos 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhe sa bral bar byed/'dun pa bzlog par byed kyang /yongs su brtag pa bzung na/'byung

377a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs las 'bral bar mi nus pa de ni dad pa'i stobs so//de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang zhe na/gang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i
377a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang dang gang la mngon par sbyor ba de dang de dag la brtan pa'i stobs kyi mthu thob kyang gnas der ma bsgral gyi bar du stobs kyi mthu de la lha dang bcas pa'i

377a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'am g.yeng bar mi nus te/dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms shing dran pa de yang mi choms pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dang
