377b1(dkon brtsegs): lolhung rtog la de'i bsam gtan dang po'i sgra'i char m+b+ha la sgrib par sti byed pa dang /dge bar rtog pa la yang rnam par rtog/mad ts+tsha bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang spyong
377b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang /de dga' ba dang bde bya skyes te gnas med kyi de'i bsam gtan gsum pa la sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang /de sems can yongs su smin par bya
377b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms pa yang ma yin mod kyi/b+hA sam+b+ha gtan bzhi pa la sgrib par yang mi 'gyur ba ste/de bstim ga tAn
377b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la gnas na bsdam gtan dang rnam par thar pas gzhog par mi nus te/de ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi gtong la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/dri ni
377b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems drapa'i ting nge 'dzin bya stobs so//de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na/gang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'odas pa'i
377b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyis mi tshams pa'i ye shes te/byang chub sems dpa' skyes me thag tu bzo'i ga nas 'jig rten na ji skad spyod pa dam pa dang /dpa' bar byed pa dang /
377b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed dga' ba de dag thams cad slob dpon med por mngon du 'gyur te gang 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag kyang gang gis 'jig rten dag sgrol bar byed do//de dag bya
378a1(dkon brtsegs): /chub sems dpa'i shos rab dang yo shes d+d+ha snro kyi ts+tsha ba lha dang mo rnams kyi mi tshoms pa ste/don+ti byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so//
378a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yan lag lnga pa'i lam gzhan no//de ltar na byang chub semIs dpa' yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//grazhan yang
378a3(dkon brtsegs): mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni mgo gcig pa ste/de ni lam bgrong pa gcig pa'o//'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis/
378a4(dkon brtsegs): su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grogs med par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas go cha bgos pa ste/gzhan
378a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma bstan pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa bdag nyid byed pa bdag gi stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste/de ltar go cha sra ba bgos nas gang sems
378a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyis ma thob bde bdag gis thob par bya'o//gang 'phags pa thams cad dang /gang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
378a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o//sbyin pa ni nga'i grogs ma yin gyi nga ni sbyin pa'i grogs so//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson
378b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang shes rab ni nga'i grogs ma yin gyis du ni de dag gi grogs so//pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bslab par bya ba ma yun gyi pha
378b2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa rnams ngas bslang bar bya'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyus par shes par bya'o//da ni dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyis bslang ba
378b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ngas bslang bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i chos rnams la grogs med cing da gcig pu gnyisu med par rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug nas
378b4(dkon brtsegs): bobadud stobs dang bcas pa btul te/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
378b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes de la nges par rtog pa'i byasam pa'i sbyor ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa gcig pu zhes bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpe'i lam bgrod pa gcig
378b6(dkon brtsegs): phul mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//don byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bgrod la mkhas te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkha
378b7(dkon brtsegs): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/'odi la byang chub sems dpa'
379a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu dben par song ste/nung du yang dgu par bzhug nas 'di ltar sems la rtog pa skyes te/sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di gang las/
379a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur rnam pa dang /de 'di ltar sems te tshul bzhin mA yin pa byung ba'i phyir ma rig pa 'byung //ma rig pa byung ba'i phyir 'du byed 'byung /'du
379a3(dkon brtsegs): byed byung ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'byung /rnam par shes pa byung ba'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'byung /ming dang gzugs byung ba'i phyir skye mched drug 'byung /
379a4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug byung ba'i phyir reg pa 'byung /reg pa byung ba'i phyir tshor ba 'byung /tshor ba byung ba'i phyir sred pa 'byung /sred pa byung ba'i phyir len pa 'byung //
379a5(dkon brtsegs): len pa byung ba'i phyir srid pa 'byung /srid pa 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba 'byung /skye ba byung ba'i phyir rga shi 'byung /rga shu byung ba'i phyir mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dron
379a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo//de yang 'di ltar sems te/ji ltar mi g.yo ba dang /mi
379a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i//
379b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu lngas byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad rgyun lngas byung ba ste/glang yang las kyi rgyu gang dag gis soms can gang dag gi dbang po'i rgyu tshad ma dang /lhag pa'i cho ga'i rgyu chod/
379b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'bras bu'i rgyu 'grub pa dang /de ltar zin pa dang /ma zin pa la gang rgyu 'dus pa byung ba de thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/da ni byang chub sems dpe'i
379b3(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de yang gang 'grag ce no/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gags pa'i phyir ma rigs pa 'gag go//
379b4(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa 'gags pa'i phyir 'du byed 'gags pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig gi bar du 'gago par 'gyur ro//zhes de snyam du sems te/de
379b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang de la shes pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhris pa zhes bya'o//de yang chos thams cad ni rgyu la rag lngas rkyen las rag lasA/'dus pa
379b6(dkon brtsegs): las rag las pa ste/gang rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa la rag las pa de ni bdag gi byin gyi brlabs ma yin/srog dang gang zag gi byin gyi brlabs ma yin te/de la
379b7(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba gang yang med do zhes de ltar sems te/gang de ltar sems pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
380a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub kyi rnam pa'i rkyen du slong bar byed la/rkyen de dag la yang zad pa dang 'gog par so so rtog la
380a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can du lta ba'i phyir byud pa dang 'gag pa ma yin pa yang thob par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o//
380a3(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad la mkhas pa gang zhe na/chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so//de la
380a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la mkhas par bya ste/de la 'dus byas la mkhas pa gang zhe na/gang lus kyi 'du byed dang dag gi 'du byed/
380a5(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyi 'du byed do//gang la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dge bo'i 'du byed kyis 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la 'dus ma byas par rtogs pa thams cad
380a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba de ni 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o//gzhan yang 'dus byas la mkhas pa ni 'di lta ste/gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
380a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams sdud pa'o///
380b1(dkon brtsegs): /gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i shes bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis smod par mi byed cing /pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs thams cad//
380b2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang /zag pa meng ba'i byang chub de la mos paso gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba de ni 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o//gzhan yang 'dus byas la mkhas
380b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang /bsdu ba bzhis sems can rnams sdung bri'o//gang yang snyoms pa med pa'i phyir sems can le bdag med par
380b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dag bsdu ba la mkhas shing 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba de ni de'i 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o//gzhan yang
380b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas la mkhas pa ni gang 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi kun nas sbyor ba rnams yang dag par mi gcod la 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams yang dag par gcod pa dang
380b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu dmigs pa'i sbyor ba rnams rgyun tshigs par byed pa dang /sbyor ba phyogs gcig pa rnams mi spyad par spyod pa de ni 'dus byas la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//
380b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon po med pa'i chos rnams la 'dris par bya ba shes shing mngon sum du mkhas pa dang /byang chub tu gzhan gyi dring
381a1(dkon brtsegs): la ma 'jog cing 'dus ma byas kyang mngon sum+b+ha du mi byud ba de ni 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o//gzhan yang khams gsum na spyod krung khams/
381a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum nA spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi gos pa de ni de'i 'dus byas la mkhas pa'o//gang yang khams gsum las byung ba'i shrIs rab tu shes kyang
381a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i khamasu mi ltung ba de ni 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa'o//gang chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshig bla dgas so//
381a4(dkon brtsegs): gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni shes rab dang mkhas pa med na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/de'i phyir chos thams cad
381a5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa zhes bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do//shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub
381a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/shes rab rnam par 'byed par mtsha
381a7(dkon brtsegs): shing mkhas pa bcu po de dag la yang mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de la shes rab ni gong /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi don ni gang zhe na///
381b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa'o//shes rab ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi mngon sum mo//'phags
381b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i tshad mar gyur pa ni shes rab po//chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mid mar gyur pa'o//shes rab ni lta bar gyur pa
381b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang /kun nas ldang ba dang /sgrib pa dang sgrib par byed pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa'o//shes rab ni 'dod pa dang /tshor ba dang /smon lam thams cad
381b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi smon lam dang dral ba'o//shes rab ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir sim par byed pa'o//shes rab ni chos kyi dga' ba la dmigs pa rnam par mi gcod pa'i phyir rab tu
381b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra' bar byed pa'o//shes rab ni ye shes thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir brten pa'o//shes rab ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas so//
381b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni theg pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'bras bu rtogs pa'i phyir thob pa'i mtshan nyid do//shes rab ni rang bzhin gyis ye shes snang ba rab tu shes pa'i mtshan 'a//
381b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ni chu ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir rab tu sgrol ba'o//shes rab ni yang dag par gyur pa la 'dren pa'o//shes rab ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu 'dzi/
382a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//shes rab ni nyon mongs pa'i brag la nywalnga thams cad dang bar byed pa'o//shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi spyi bo thob pa'i chog go/shes rab ni/
382a2(dkon brtsegs): rang byung ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la dam pa'o//shes rab ni khams gsum dang mi 'dres par rgyu dang bral ba'o//shes rab ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi shin tu bzung
382a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//shes rab ni mtshan mar yongasu rtogs pa thams cad spangs pas smon lam rnam par chad pa'o//shes rab ni mun pa mun nag dang bral bas bag med pa'i gnyen
382a4(dkon brtsegs): bo'o//shes rab ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa blams cad kyi sbyor ba'o//shes rab ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam gnas pa rnams kyi rab tu 'dren
382a5(dkon brtsegs): pApa'o//shes rab ni ma rig pa'i rlung gi mun pa rab rib kyi sprin 'joms par byed pas snang bar byed pa'o//shes rab ni mig la ji ltar mos pa rnams kyi mig thams cad
382a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa'o//shes rab ni ming dang gzugs kyi lam las 'das pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'o//shes rab ni dben pa las byung bas don dam pa'o//shes rab ni//
382a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul ba'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'o//shes rab ni ye shes kyi sgo'i snang ba'o//shes rab ni thams cad du rgyu ba'i mi zad pa'o//shes rab ni na cipa khrel
382b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir 'gal ba med pa'o//shes rab ni len pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed pas thar pa'i lam mo//shes rab ni sgrib par byed pa'i chos
382b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pas ma 'dres pa'o//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
382b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi las dang ye shes kyi spyod pa yang de snyed do//sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi dpyod pa dang /ye shes kyang de snyed do//sems
382b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la 'jug pa'i sgo yang de snyed do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
382b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa shes rab gnas pa'i gnas kyang de snyed de/byang chub sems dpas thams cad bslab par bya ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
382b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ces bya'o//de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/shes rab gang yin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i don kyang de yin te/dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa de ni pha rol
382b7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i don zhes bya'o//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du dpyad par bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par yongs
383a1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to///
383a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la mngon par ma tshogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//zod mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to///
383a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib po med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang //
383a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang /shes rab mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//rnam par nges pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//sems can thams
383a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi khams la 'jug pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//phyir mi ldog pa'i
383a6(dkon brtsegs): sA yong su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//sems can yongasu smin par bya/
383a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//byang chub kyi snying po yang dag par thob pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//bdud thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
383b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don to//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhog par/
383b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bslabs na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu song bar 'gyur ro///
383b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bas na theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bya gzung bar bya//bklag
383b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya/gzhan la yang bshad par bya/rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu
383b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan blangs gzung bklags kun chub par byas gzhan la yang bshad/rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na yon tan bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na//
383b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste tshe rabs gzhan du 'phos nas bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas thams cad la rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/rigs mtho zhing brtson par 'gyur/
383b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags par 'gyur/tshig btsun par 'gyur/longs spyod che bar 'gyur/lha dang mi rnams la phangs par 'gyur/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal ba/
384a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/tshangs par thob par 'gyur/thams cad du byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bcu
384a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gong zhe na/'di lta ste/gcer bu pa'i rtsod pa dang 'dran pa ma yin par 'gyur pa dang /
384a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu mi lta ba dang /sems can du mi lta ba dang /srog du mi lta ba dang /gang zag tu mi lta ba dang /chad par mi lta ba dang /rtag par mi lta bar 'gyur ba dang /
384a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba dang /rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar sems bskyed pa 'thob pa dang /thos pa'i tshig 'bru myur du khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/yon tan
384a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe ni/dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /blo gros
384a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang /mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dal ba phun sum
384a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ste 'dod chags bdo ba ma yin la/de shin tu 'dod chags
384b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gdung bas yangs su mi gdung ba dang /rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ste zhe sdang bad+mo ba ma yin la de shin tu zho sdang gi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang /rang bzhin gyis
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ste gti mug bdo ba ma yin la de shin tu gti mug gidung bse yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ste/yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//
384b3(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste shes rab ngo mtshar du 'gyur/shes rab myur bar 'gyur/shes rab rno bar 'gyur/
384b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mgyogs par 'gyur/shes rab rgya che bar 'gyur/shes rab zab par 'gyur/shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gyur/shes rab ma chags par 'gyur/
384b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing mthong nas tshigs su bcud pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa dang /de bzhin gsheg pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba yongs su zhu zhing tshul
384b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du zhu ba la zhus nas lan ljon par 'gyur ba ste/yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan lon bcu thob par 'gyur
384b7(dkon brtsegs): te ba cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyes par byas par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad lhod par 'gyur ba dang /dris
385a1(dkon brtsegs): /bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad smad par 'gyur ba dang /'du byung thams cad du gtogs pa las yod
385a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /mya ngan ltos 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam mngon du 'gyur
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /'khor ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba dang /sangs
385a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi beka'i rje su zhugs par 'gyur ba ste/yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
385a5(dkon brtsegs): ste snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu gnyen blangs bzung ba klags kun chub par byas gzhan la yang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rib tu bstan na yon tan gyi phan
385a6(dkon brtsegs): yin 'di snyed skyob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de na de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//gang dag mdo sde
385a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa//mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur//chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par 'gyur//tshig kyang khyad par 'phags shing yi ge rdzogs//
385b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhag mad+mo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa//de ni rang dga' shin tu mgu smyos nas//dgra sbyong do ni 'dir yang chos 'chad do//rtag tu chos kyi skyon pa pyod par 'gyur//sems
385b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni med du chos thos nas//kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chad byed pa//nam zhig bdag cig 'di 'dra'i chos snyan cing //mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin par 'gyur zhes zer
385b3(dkon brtsegs): glang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams//chos rnams gleng la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur te//dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags pa dang //bla na med pa'i ye shes
385b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig ston 'gyur//gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa//de ni 'phags pas rtag bsngags rgyal pas gnang //chos tshig legs par bshad pa tshom par byed//
385b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni zos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur//thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed//shes rab ldan pa 'bru la mi snyegs te/don la lta bas rtogs pa 'phel bar
385b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de yi ye shes rtag tu tshad med do//ye shes mtha' yas don kyang mtha' yas te//sems pa mtha' yas dam pa'i don la mkhas//de yi yon tan phyogs
385b7(dkon brtsegs): dang phyogs su dgro//de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'ang dag go//de yi 'dod chags chung la zhe sdang chung //de yi gti mug shin tu rag tu chung //sems kyang shin tu dge
386a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed par 'gyur//de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/longs spyod rnyed nas rgyags par mi 'gyur to//'di la snying po ci zhes don
386a2(dkon brtsegs): la rtog/longs spyod snying po med par rab shes nas//de ni longs spyod mi lta rab tu 'byung //mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas//rtag tu g.yel ba med pa
386a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos rnams thos pas mi ngoms te//chos sbyin pa la ser sno med//'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du//song ste zhu ba zhu byed pas//de phyir de yi
386a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'phel//de la dkar po 'bri ba med//shA rI'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/byang chub sems dpa'
386a5(dkon brtsegs): de la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//de la bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na/
386a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag
386a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsdu bar byed do//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don byed pa dang /don mtshungs pa ste/de dag ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes
386b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste zang zing sbyin pa dang /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /chos sbyin pa ste/de ni sbyin pa'o//de la ston par smra ba gang zhe na/slong ba dang /
386b2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan pa lo snyan par smra ba'o//dri la don byed pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//don 'thun pa ni theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes
386b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa dang /chos de dag la 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can rnams gzhog pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang slong ba la yid dang bar byed pa ste/de ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o//
386b4(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba ni gang slong ba rnams la rim gro byed pa'o//don byed pa ni gang gis slong ba rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba rnams kyi don de yongs su thob par byed pa'o//don mtshungs pa
386b5(dkon brtsegs): ni gang slong ba la don mtshungs pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni bsam pas btang ba'o//snyan par smra ba ni sbyor ba yongs su chad pa'o//don byed pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa
386b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa med pa'o//don mthun pa ni theg pa chen po la bsngo ba'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sems kyis btang ba'o//snyan par smra ba ni dga'
386b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rab tu dga' ba la zhugs pa'i sems mi gtong ba'o//don byed pa ni snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa'i sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o//don mtshungs pa ni btang
387a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms la mthon dman med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsngo ba'i snyoms so//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang chos kyis btsal bar
387a2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod yongs su gtong b.ro//snyan par smra ba ni gang la sbyin par byed pa de chos la 'dzud pa'o//don byed pa ni gang bdag gi don dang /gzhan gyi don yang dag par
387a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'o//don mtshungs pa ni gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir thams cad mkhyen po nyid du sems bskyed pa'o//bzhan yang sbyin pa ni gad nang dang phyi'i chos
387a4(dkon brtsegs): rnamos la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o//spyan byar smra bya ni gang chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi yo shes la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'o//don byed
387a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gang gis don btang ste gzhan gyi don myong bar byed pa'o//don mtshungs pa nyid ni byang chub lag tu 'ong ba la bltas nas gzhan la sbyin pa ni yid mi bde bar
387a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro//de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na/ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o//de la snyan par sla ba gang skye naM/gang zad zing med por chos ston pa'o//don
387a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni gang pha rol la lung 'bogs pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /'chad pa dang ston pa la mi sbyo ro//de la don mtshungs pa gang she na/gang thams cad ma sbyi
387b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang mu bral bar chos la 'dzud pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni chos nyan par 'ongs pa rnams la mi g.yeng bar ston pa'o//de la snyan par smra ba ni gang rgyud ring por yang du//
387b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ston pa'o//de la don byed pa ni gang chos 'dod pas chos smra ba rnams gos dang bral bar gyur tam/bsod snyoms dang mal rtswa dang /na ba'i gsos spyan dang /mo
387b3(dkon brtsegs): byed dang 'bral bar gyur tam/ci dgos par gyur pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o//don mtshungs pa nyid ni lhag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o//gzhan
387b4(dkon brtsegs): yang chos kyi sbyin pa ni gang sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu shes nas chos sbyin par byed bya'o//de la snyan par smra bu ni gang phran pa'i dngos po'i phyir ston pa'o//don byed pa ni
387b5(dkon brtsegs): gang don la rton gyi/tshig 'bru la mi rton pa'o//de la don mtshungs pa ni gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
387b6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'o//snyan par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//don byed pa ni gong ba rnon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po'o//don mtshungs pa
387b7(dkon brtsegs): nibasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gzhan yang smyon pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi'o//snyan par smra ba
388a1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o//dron byed pa ni gang byung chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi'o//don mtshungs pa ni
388a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyo ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byang chub kyi rtsa bo'i gnas so//ston par smra ba ni byang chub kyi myu gu yongs su rdzogs
388a3(dkon brtsegs): bi'o//don byed pa ni byang chub kyi me tog yongs su grub pa'o//don mtshungs par byed pa ni byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub po ste/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
388a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po nam po bzhi'o//bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sna
388a5(dkon brtsegs): ljing byang chub tu spyod de/da ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o//de lta bas na tshad med pa de dag dang pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po da dag
388a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub kyi lo ma zhes bya'o//de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po ngas
388a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyes spring ba la byang chub kyi las de yang bshad/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang brjod do//
388b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po las byang chub kyi lam de thos/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i
388b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan yang thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed par gyur to//de dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed nas/bcom ldan 'das de
388b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'di
388b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/rim gro byas/mchod par/
388b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mo bstan to//shA ri'i
388b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom dang /yid gnyis za na de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i tshe de'i dus
388b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te/ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas po la na bza' dang /bsod
389a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos spyan dang /yo byad rnams kyis la bya ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur bsti byas bla mar byas ma/
389a2(dkon brtsegs): gror byas/mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang ngo bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
389a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma bstan to//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po de tshun chad bskul
389a4(dkon brtsegs): ba grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/sangs
389a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yon lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan
389a6(dkon brtsegs): zlos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad
389a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go//shA ri'i bu yang de'i cha na rgyal po mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/'khor lo bsgyur ba
389b1(dkon brtsegs): cho dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po yul gyi mthu dad brtson pa dang thob pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/dri'i rin po chu sna bdun 'di dag go//'di lta skye 'khor//
389b2(dkon brtsegs): lo rin po che nas/blon po rin po che'i bar du bdun te/mngon par bturtul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o//shA ri'i bu rgyal po midzes par snang ba de'i pho brang ni grong khyer
389b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser zhes bya ste/shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su tshur ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su zheng du ni dpag tshad bdun yod
389b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /badri ba dang /lo legs pa dang /dga' ba dang skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar gyur to//yang de'i tshe na tshong dpo ni shes rab bzang zhes
389b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang bas yongs su gang ba'i bar du rgyas par byas te/sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sngon gyi
389b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo //shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dkon mchog yan lag des tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pa
389b7(dkon brtsegs): la brtogs nas/kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzed byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung ngo //kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang sangs
390a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur to snyam du dgongs te/snod du gyur par mkhyen nas/tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba drer gsheg/
390a2(dkon brtsegs): te phyin nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krungs su bzhugs nas/byang chub kyi lam yang bro shang/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
390a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yong brjod//shA ri'i bu de bas na tshang dpon shes rab bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po rnams
390a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam 'di yid thos/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang thos nas/dga' ba dang mgu ba dang/
390a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur to//de dga' ba dang mgu ba dang mchog tu dag dang rgya chen po thob nas bcom ldan 'jam de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
390a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo stong du 'di lta ste/na bza' dang /bsod
390a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang /mal cha dang na ba'i gsos smon dang /yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/bla mar byas pasti stang byas/mchod par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag
390b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag nges/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
390b2(dkon brtsegs): lung ma bstan to//shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpo ni shes rab bzang zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tshom dang yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o//de'i tshe de'i
390b3(dkon brtsegs): yu na nga tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya bar gyur to//ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchogro yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo steng
390b4(dkon brtsegs): dri na bzar dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas
390b5(dkon brtsegs): te/byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
390b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mau bstan to//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dkon mchog yin
390b7(dkon brtsegs): lag tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //yang de'i tshe rgyal po dgra thul zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/shA ri'i
391a1(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyal po dgra thul gyi grong khyer pad+ma nAn zhes bya ba/'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/dga' ba dang /skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba zhig
391a2(dkon brtsegs): yod do//shA rI'i bu rgyal po dgra thul gyi bram ze mar mi bdug ces bya ba/shIng sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang byung ba'i bar du
391a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gang ba zhig byung ba de rgyalnga po dgra thul la dben zhing phangs sdug cing yid du 'ong ste/mthong na mi mthun pa med de/shA ri'i bu bram ze mar me'i bdag shings
391a4(dkon brtsegs): la chen po lta bu la rgyal srid phyed byin no//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste rgyal po mar me'i bdag po rgyal po phyed byed pa chos kyis byed de/chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//yang
391a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po mar me'i bdag po las bu gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa shin tu bzang po kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lus skyes bu
391a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste/de'i lus thams cad las 'od byung ba ni 'di lta ste/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba bzhin to//
391a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so//shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag gis bram ze'i mtshan mkhan ltas shes pa rnams bsags nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mar
391b1(dkon brtsegs): mo mdzad bstan pa dang /de dag gis de byung chub tu lung bstan to//de ltar rgyal po slar ma'i bdag des rgyal bu gzhon nu mar ma mdzad ma mya dag lu gtad do//shArI bu donapa/
391b2(dkon brtsegs): ring po me lon par rgyal bu mar me mdzad gzhon nur mkhas par gyur to//shA ri'i bu de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'og man gyi gnas nas mi snang bar
391b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad gral ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' mur me mdzad la bskor ba byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems
391b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mor mi mdzad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ni//yon tan 'byung gnas gyur po med//drang srong rgyal mtshan gnas nas ni//
391b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur//lang 'tsho myur du 'gro ba ni//rlung gi shugs las lhag par mgyogs//rga ba de ni gzugs 'jig ste//'jig rten yid du mi 'ong ba//
391b6(dkon brtsegs): grogs po rgas pa mthu nyams ni//rab tu 'byung por dka' ba ste//khyod ni shin tu drar la bab//khyod ni btsal ba'i dus yin no//legs so legs so shes rab tshe//legs
391b7(dkon brtsegs): so legs so blo gros tshe//myur du mngon par byung na legs//thung bstan byang chub rtogs par gyis////bam po nyi shu pa ste bra ma'o//shA ri'i bu de nas
392a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdzad la bskul ba dang /dad pas khyim nus
392a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par rab tu byung nas de nyid kyi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de nyid kyi nub mo de ltar bcom
392a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
392a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi bar du gyur pA che ba dang dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa mngon par byung nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po mar me bdag gis byin gyis ma
392a5(dkon brtsegs): brlabs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de nyid kyi nub mo rgya cher sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur
392a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du che ba dang dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang /tshigs su bcad pa thos so//shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po dgu thul gyi rgyal po mar me bdag la khyod kyi sras rab tu byung
392a7(dkon brtsegs): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bdag gis thos te/bdag ni khyod kyi sras mar me mdzad mthong bar
392b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtsa ba'i slad du bdag gi drung drug shogs su gsol/dristi mi gshogs na bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yin/
392b2(dkon brtsegs): lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o zhes pho nya btang ba dang /de nas shA ri'i bu rgyal po mar me bdag gis rtsis pa dang /blon po dang skye ba dang /'khor rnams brtsegs te/de ltar gyur
392b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag bzlas pa dang /de dag gis lha de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gsol na bcom ldan 'das de ni thugs rje che nu bas thugs rjes dgongs te rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du
392b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par 'gyur te/rgyal po dgra thul kyang 'dir mi mchi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag blon po dag dang 'grogs te/bcom
392b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to//de skad gsol nas bcom ldan
392b6(dkon brtsegs): 'des de bzhin gshegs pa mur me mdzad kyis rgyal po mar me'i bdag po la de bas na rgyal po chen po thugs brtse ba'i phyir rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs so zhes bka'
392b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to//shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lha rdzas mchog gi rgyal po'i pho brang du ji srid dge bar bzhugs nas/dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag
393a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs gcig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs//rgyal po mar me'i bdag po yang dpung gi tshogs
393a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te zham ring thog thab tu 'brang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzod 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i
393a3(dkon brtsegs): gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bkur bsti byed cing bdag gi yul gyi bar du zham ring byas nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs
393a4(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/mchi ma blags nas slar log pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
393a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gshegs par rgyal po dgra thul gyis thos so//de nas
393a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan te/sa gzhi dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag la bseg ma dang gyo mo dag sel du btsud de bsal nas phyag
393a7(dkon brtsegs): dar dang chag chag 'deb su btsud do//spos chu'i cha ga chag kyang 'deb su btsud do//me tog bkram pas pus mo nub tsam du phyin par bya ba byed du btsud do//bdug pa'i snod
393b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang bdag pa byas so//gos rin po che sna bdun gyi bla ra bas/sel snyan sna tshogs kyang dkrol du spyod do//de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan nas
393b2(dkon brtsegs): gang rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun nA me tog dang dri dang byug pa yod pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig ma bcing shig/de thams cad bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la dbul zhing mchod
393b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las su gyis shig/la la zhig spyong dam 'tshong na de ni chad pa chen pos bcad do zhes sgra bsgragaso//de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
393b4(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te me tog dang /dri dang phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /

393b6(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma can nas phyir byung ngo //pad+ma can gyis bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
393b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa mir me mdzad de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /dri dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /
394a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/blon po dang 'khor dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang bcom ldan

394a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med sems rangs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhum 'bring du 'byung ngo //yang de'i tshe na gangs kyi ri'i ngos la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba g.yog bram ze gzhon nu
394a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya yod pa klog tu 'dzud pa'i mkhan po sngags 'chang ba rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /shes gsal dang bcaso pa dang /yi ge rab tu da
394a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas pa dang /sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshig re zhing lung bstan po dang /'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang /mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang /skyes bu chen po'i

394b2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu rtogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang /slob dpon du gyur par yongasu shes pa zhig yod do//shA ri'i bu de nas bram ze gzhon nu sbyin zhe
394b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar rig byed lobs nus/mkhan po la kye mkhan po bdag gis rig byed lobs te/bdag ni yul du mchi na bdag gis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /kye skyes

394b6(dkon brtsegs): dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor bsdus nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du phyin to//bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun brgyan par mthong ngo //mthong nas ni ning
394b7(dkon brtsegs): lcob te/kye skyes bu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can 'dir ci'i dga' ston zhig g.yos par gyur zhes smras pa dang /des gzhon khyod kyis mi shes sam/de ring bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
395a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtswa bzhi dang thabs

395a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bram ze gzhon nu sbyin gyis bu mo de la kye bu mo chu nas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed par gyur zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /des phyogs che ge mo zhig na phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa nas bdag
395a7(dkon brtsegs): gis kar sha pa na lnga brgyas nyos so zhes smras so//de nas bram ze gzhon nu sbyin gyis bu mo de la me tog chu las skyes pa 'di dag ji tsam gyis nyos pa bzhin du ngal tshong shig ces de skad
395b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras nas/des de ltar mi rung ngo zhes smras nas/des 'o na gnyis khyod la zhog lA nga la dkur sha pa na lnga brgyas nyor byin cig ces smras nas/des 'di dag gis ci bya zhes smras pa dang //

395b3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo thong khyod de skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod pa'o//bu mo bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med pa ni bskal pa grangs med pas bsgrub dgos te/de'i
395b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'di ltar ste 'gron bu dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byi ru chen po dang /gser dang /dngul dang ldan pa dang /rta dang glang po che dang /bong bu dang /

396a1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu 'byung ba'i dus dang /tshod du 'gyur na khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod kyis khyod nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad ma byed cig ces de skad ces smras pa dang /des gal te khyod

396b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog go drung du ri dgas kyi lpags pa gding ngam zhes 'phya zhing bting ba yang rtul bar byed do//de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin phyogs kyi mtha' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ri dgas kyi
396b2(dkon brtsegs): lpags pa bting ste/dgongs shig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kun nas spyan ri dgas kyi lhogs pa 'di la zhabs gzhag par mdzod cig ces sems bskyed
396b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis dgongs nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyi ri dwags kyi lpags pa la zhabs bzhags go/de des bram ze gzhon nu sbyin

396b5(dkon brtsegs): man da ra ba dang /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+mo dang /lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor lha'i sil snyan

397a1(dkon brtsegs): lha ste bram ze gzhon nu sbyin sems dang nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar lo bcu gnyis ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu bti nas/bdag ma
397a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur zhe na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/bdag la

397a7(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i gzigs pas gzigs te/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de la dge slong dag ral pa rnams la rkang pa mi bzhag shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di ni
397b1(dkon brtsegs): bskul pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//zhes bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu de ltar zlum nI'i

397b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brjod du med pa mngon sum du byed do//de mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

397b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuro zhes lung ston pa dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang byang dang /de bzhin du shar dang lho'i mtshams nas/steng dang 'og gi bar dang phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
397b6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma bas lhag pa dag gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
397b7(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes bya bar lung ston pa mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u sprin lung bstan pa thos nas dbugs phyin par gyur te/na mkha'i dkyil de nas babs nas
398a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar mo mdzad de'i drung du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/chungs par spyad pa spyod do//shA ri'i bu khyud na ts+tsha
398a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du de ltar dgas shing the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de de'i tshe de'i dus ni bram ze'i khye'u sprin
398a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur pa de yin te/ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de la me tog ut+pa la lnga gtor te/ral pa yang gting ngo //shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang
398a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ste snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan par bya/blang bar bye/gzung bar bya/
398a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang brjod par bya/rgya cher yang dgu par rab tu bstan par bya'o//gang 'di mtshan ma med pa'i spyod pa'i nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kaur
398a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ngas mngon par shes te/'das pa'i dus nu mar me mdzad kyi pha rol na ngas dkar po'i chos kyi spyod pa gang la mi spyad pa de gang yang med do//'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
398a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag gis lung ma bstan to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nga mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod par gyur to//gang gi tshang gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi
398b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa/dmigs pa med par spyod pa/ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bsgrub pas gnas pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma
398b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes nga lung bstan to//shA ri'i bu de ltar ngas de bzhin gau sh+ya pa//
398b3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mdzang ma thag tu spyod pa
398b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las 'das te/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba khong du chud do//maphong ma thag tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par shes so//de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'ad
398b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA
398b6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bsten to//lung bstan ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po//bzod pa rab tu thob pa ji lta bu zhe na/gang 'di gzugs rab tu mi rnyed par
398b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang /phung ba dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi chos thabs
399a1(dkon brtsegs): //nAd dbyA tu mi rnyed par brjod pa rab+hA tu po//yang bzod pa rabya tu thob bya zhes byu b+ha 'di ni brjod pa med pa'i rgyus rab tu thob pa'i tshig bla dgas so//dun+ya'i phying nan/
399a2(dkon brtsegs): 'arjod pa rab tu thob pa'i chos de la ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kun tu myi 'byung //si so skye bo'i myos rnams ma yin/slob pa'i chos rnam snga ma phyin/pirlos pa'i chos rnams ma
399a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ma yin te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo //chos thams cad mi 'byung bas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob ces bya'o//
399a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad thob pa dang mying mi dmigs pas de'i phyir bzod po rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o//bzod pa de yang mtshan ma thams cad dang dmigs pa thams cad kyis skad cig pa yin
399a5(dkon brtsegs): te/de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/de la ni mig med do//myig la smras pa med do//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/rna ba myed sna med lce med lus med yid med/yid la smras pa
399a6(dkon brtsegs): med de/mi zung ba'i yul de ni bzod pa/'gro ba med pa'i yul don bzod pa ste/de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bring bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bsnyen 'i rgyung
399a7(dkon brtsegs): du thob par 'dod pa dag gis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa spyod pa/dmigs pa med par spyod pa shin tu mnyan
399b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya/blang bar bya/gzung bar bya/kun chub par bya/gzhan dag la brjod par bya/rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o//yang de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du/
399b2(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gyi bu mos byin zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur to 'dug pa des/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang byang chub
399b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas stan las ldangs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bo de logs
399b4(dkon brtsegs): su thul mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag la khyim bdag dgra bcom pa thob ste/'di ni rmi
399b5(dkon brtsegs): shi tha ma'o zhes de ltar 'jug par bgyis de skad ces rjes su bstan mod kyi/bdag bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos rnam grangs 'di dang /sangs rgyas kyi
399b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas 'di snyam du gang 'dri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po 'di ni mchog/gtso bo dam pa/mchog
399b7(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi nom pa/bla na med pa'o snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das las kyang bdag gis rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos rnams kyis mchog gang yin pa de bskyed par bya'o zhes mngon sum du
400a1(dkon brtsegs): zasu//myangon sum du bzung nas/bdag 'di snyam du rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos bzung ba ma mchis pa/nga'i bla ma mchis pa/yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams kyis chos
400a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mchog gtso bo//mchog rab gya nom pa/bla na med pa'i chos de yang dag par bsgrubs te 'jug go snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du theg pa thams cad kyi nang
400a3(dkon brtsegs): na ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med par gnas pa lags te/de bzhin gash+ye bI bag pa ni theg pa gang ji snyed laM de dag gi mchog tu brjod pa nas bla na med pa'i bar du brjod pa ste/bcom
400a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi 'od dang /phan pa dang
400a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i slad du de smon chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bcas pa la yid bslab par bgyi
400a6(dkon brtsegs): sum bgyid do//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi blo mis byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mis byin bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa
400a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni yid ches par dka' ba bsgrub par dka' ba'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid ches par dka' zhing bsgrub par
400b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba lags kyang /bcom ldan 'das de dang 'thun par brtson 'grus brtsams te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bgyi'o//ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag
400b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te sems bskyed pa gang gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
400b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus par gyur la/sems bskyed pa re re yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lan re ro zhing yang
400b4(dkon brtsegs): mgo gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed chas par gyur kyang de ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu mi gtong ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam
400b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'dis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar spro na gang bde ba'i yo byad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i slad du zhe
400b6(dkon brtsegs): na/bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni ji ltar bskol pa byi ba brgya stong du tshig gi kyang khong du chud par sla ba mi lags te/de ltar rgya che ba'o//
400b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag kyang de ltar rgya che ba'o//de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//de ltar mtshungs pa ma mchiso//de ltar dpag tu ma mchis//de ltar grangs ma mchis so///
401a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa yang de ltar chags pa ma mchiso//de nas tshod dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis de'i cha tshog su bcad pa 'ang
401a2(dkon brtsegs): dag smraso//bskal pa bye ba stong rnams//bdag ni byang chub sems bskyed cing //sdug bsngal kun gyis gtses gyur kyang //sems can rnams ni mi btang ngo //sems
401a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ni lan re zhing //mgo yi phung po ri rab kyi//'phang tsam mthon por gyur pa dag/thams cad gcod pa spro bar bgyi//srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir//byang chub 'di la
401a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dug go/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'dra//de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/theg pa chung ngu pheg pa dman//nyan thos theg pa spangs nas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'dra//
401a5(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/theg pa 'di ni theg pa che//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchog ces bsngags//bzung bar 'os pa gzhan ma mthong //de bas bdag ni byang chub mos//gnod
401a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa rnams la skyob//ngan 'gro gsum las thar par bgyi//de yi phyir ni sangs rgyas dag/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'di snyam du
401a7(dkon brtsegs): sems te/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu dag shes la/gang bu dang chung ma dag chos 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug na//'di ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyamanA//
401b1(dkon brtsegs): de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste/chung ma bdun
401b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /khye'u bdun dang /bla mo bdun dang /zan po bdun dang /zan ma bdun dang lhan cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs te rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la bste/
401b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pas/rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ba dang /rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mis
401b4(dkon brtsegs): byin g.yog dang bcas te/rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces mis byin khyod g.yog dang bcas te rings
401b5(dkon brtsegs): shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis gar cha zhes 'dzer ba dang /smras pa/skyes bu khyed cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril
401b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor te 'dun du bdar nas/rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yang dag par rab tu ston te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag gi sngon dang /
401b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag g.yog dang bcas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
402a1(dkon brtsegs): deg la ba der song ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par byed pa mi shes pa lhag pA te khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen pa/
402a2(dkon brtsegs): dag yongasu bsgrub par 'dod na tshur shog 'dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das de'i gan du dong ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya che ba rgya che ba dag gi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o//de ltar rgyal
402a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi mi rnams mis byin gyi tshig de thos nas/srog chags khri phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma bdun dang /khye'u bdun dang /bu mo
402a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang /bran pho bdun dang /bran mo bdun dang lhan cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs nas srog chags stong phrag bcu po de dag dang /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang lhan
402a5(dkon brtsegs): cig tu me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rnga dang /rol mo'i sil snyan dkrol te/bcom ldan
402a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ras bcos bu zung stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras//sems can dam pa mi mchog gang
402a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa//byang chub mchog tu rnam par dag pa spyod//mtha' yas gzigs pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/de la de ring bdag ni mchod par bgyi//gang zhig sngon gyi skal pa mang
402b1(dkon brtsegs): por spyad//srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub btsal//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbang mchog brnyes//de la de ring bdag gis mchod par bgyi//bu dang bran bcas nye du'i tshogs
402b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcos//srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub tshol//srog chags stong po 'di dang lhan cig tu//sangs rgyas dang ni chos la skyabasu mchi//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis
402b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
402b4(dkon brtsegs): gan du mchis pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag lags ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams
402b5(dkon brtsegs): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang lags pa dge
402b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar de dag la chos bstan du gsol/'di lta ste da ltar bcom ldan
402b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chos 'di dag zos par gyur cig/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo bdun po de dag dang /khye'u bdun dang /bu mo bdun
403a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /bran po bdun dang /zan mo bdun dang /srog chags khri po de dag dang /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gla stsol to//
403a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdog cag la dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/dang nas ji srid 'tsho
403a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo //skyobasu mchiso//mngon par dad do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par//
403a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//'di lta ste da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bzhin du bdag cag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas//
403a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la chos bstan par bgyi'o//'di lta ste de ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la gdams ngag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das
403a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di lta ste da ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar pa mdzad pa de bzhin du/bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar pa///
403a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis sil snyan gyi sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do//srog chags khri po de dag dang /tshong dpon gyi
403b1(dkon brtsegs): bra mis byin chung ma dang /khye'u bdun dang /bu mo bdun dang /zan po bdun dang /bran mo bdun dang /g.yog thams cad dang /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan rtag tu bcom ldan/

403b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dud pa skyes nas srungs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo'i cha
