403b6(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas thams cad thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la
403b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tsha lo//steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongasu ma bzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te/dper na sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma'i tshang bzhin
404a1(dkon brtsegs): du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /
404a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khri po de dag dang /chos nyan du sngar lhags pa las srogs chags drug stong tsam zhig dang dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi/
404a3(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo //rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bzhis mdun gyis
404a4(dkon brtsegs): bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to//bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dgu gis kyang lha'i me tog mnad rab dag gtor to//
404a5(dkon brtsegs): me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsigs pa brgyud nur gyur to//de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po steng gi bar snang la gnas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu
404a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang dad pa dang /gus pa dang rjes cher byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i dad pa mkhyen/tshong dpon gyi
404a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mis byin dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/de'i tshe 'dzum po mdzad de dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyor ro//de nas tshe
404b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dgra' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bA der log su thal mo sbyar nas bcom
404b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu
404b3(dkon brtsegs): gligleng ljags rkyen gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu
404b4(dkon brtsegs): mis byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang /khye'u bdun dang /bu mo bdun dang /bran pho bdun dang /bran mo bdun gyis de la mchod pa byas te/bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par
404b5(dkon brtsegs): lhung bar mi 'gro ste/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
404b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas de dpon zhes bya ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur/rim gror byed par 'gyur/
404b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed par 'gyur/de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo de la tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyi chung ma bdun dang /khye'u bdun
405a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /bu mo bdun dang /bran pho bdun dang /blun mo bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus las gyur te/skyes pa'i lhas
405a2(dkon brtsegs): thob nas byang chub sems dpa' mis byin dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyuraro//de dag bsgral pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
405a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
405a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms shes bya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi zhim 'bring ba gang yin pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ming tha dad par
405a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ro//rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong byed par bgrang bas
405a6(dkon brtsegs): smras te/bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas/bAsti stang du byed par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur/ri mor byed par 'gyur/mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro//
405a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par ngo tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
405b1(dkon brtsegs): drug par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'gyuraro//srog chags khro bo de las srog chags bzhi brgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa
405b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas nas de'i tshe yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyuraro//lhag ma rnams ni bsgral ba gang kA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba
405b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag stong mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur/ri mor byed par 'gyur/mchod pa byed par 'gyur/thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa
405b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegasde pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo mtshur zhes bya bar
405b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang ming 'thun par 'gyuraro//srog chags drug stong po de dag las srog chags stong nI du yongs su mya ngan la sna 'das te dam pa'i chos nub nas/mtshon gyi bskal
405b6(dkon brtsegs): byar ma ni 'das/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni ma byung ba'i dus der sems can rnams kyi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dus de na rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te/
405b7(dkon brtsegs): srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par byas nas bisti stang du byed par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur/ro mor pyod par 'gyur/mchod pa
406a1(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyuraro//gang zag gi mchog byams pa de yang mnyes par byas nas bAsti stang du byed par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur//ri mor byed par 'gyur/mchod
406a2(dkon brtsegs): pa byed par 'gyuraro//de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas lus kyi mtha ma bdag gis lus kyi tha mo thob nas dge ba'i
406a3(dkon brtsegs): rdza ba rnams kyis bskul te/dang pra khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyuraro//srog chags khri po las srog chags mthong ba skyes pa stong
406a4(dkon brtsegs): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//lha'i bu khrag khrig drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa skyes so//kun dga'
406a5(dkon brtsegs): bo byis pa rnams ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang dad pa dang /gus pa dang /rjes bskyed par mi byed/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung
406a6(dkon brtsegs): dus 'di lta bu'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'das pa la yang reg go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso//sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas//'di 'dra/
406a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yi dpal thob ste//de phyir gang la byin pa ni//'bras bu che ba'i ston la mchod//gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang //gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi//ring srel yungs 'bru tsam
406b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa//de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba mthong //gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang //gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi//ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa//sems kyang mnyam la//
406b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mnyam//mnyam pa'i semasu byas nas ni//gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa//de ni rnam par sbyin pa mnyam//mtshungs par byang chub 'tshang yang rgya//bde bar gshegs pa'i lam
406b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste//ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad//mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam//de yang de la mi dkon no//sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang //sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog gri/
406b4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir mchog la dad byas nas//de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu 'gyur//mchod pa dam pa byas nas ni//myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin//chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad pa//rdzogs pa'i
406b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur//mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi//chos la brten par 'dod pa de//mdun pa drag po bskyed par bya//mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no//'khor lo bsgyur/
406b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po dang //tshangs pa dbang byed gyur nas ni//yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang //mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i hU~M
406b7(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bso na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
407a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag gas/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bskyed de/shin tu mnyan par bya/blang bar bya gzhan dag/
407a2(dkon brtsegs): la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam/blangs sam/bzung ngam/kun chub lnga byas/
407a3(dkon brtsegs): sam/gzhan dag la brjod dam/gzhan dag la rgya tshor yang dag par rab tu bstan na/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no//tshad
407a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa yin no//bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud par brtson pa yin no//shA ri'i bu gang 'di byung
407a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi lam yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod
407a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go/shA ri'i bu ngas
407a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslabs nas yang dag par chad pa rje su thob bo//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag
407b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu ston pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges par byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa rnam pa rnams//
407b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi tshad med po'i'o rjesuM thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pas dpag tu med pa rjesu thob bo//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rje su thob pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad lnga shin tu gnas pa'o//de
407b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs//las kyi las dang rnam smin gyis//rnam par smin pa shes par bya//las smin rnam smin ma yin kyang //de bdedzin
407b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das//gang la shes pa med pa yi//'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal te//de phyir shes rab bskyed nas ni//'dus byas kun las rnam par 'grol//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
407b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bro dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
407b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i
407b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u te/'dus pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho///'di la sho lo ka stong phrag drug bam po nyi shu yod do////rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rin dra bo d+hi dang /
408a1(dkon brtsegs): shI lin dra bo d+hi dang / rgya chen po zhad d+ha ra ma tA shI las bsgyud cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa zhes
408a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba theg pa chen po'i med//bam po gcig pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom
408a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/nang du yang //
408a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jog pa las langs te/dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste thal mo sbyar nas/gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
408a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar
408a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po gcig tu ma 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa yongasu dkar ba/tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste mngal
408a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis/legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig dang /ngas khyed la rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das la
408b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshu po zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces
408b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//dga' bo sems can rnams ni mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa'i tshe rgyu dang rgyun phun sum tshogs par gyur ne ni lus len par 'gyur gyi/gal te phun sum tshogs
408b3(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur na ni lus len par mi 'gyuraro//de la rkyen dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste pha dang ma gnyis kA yang chags pa'i sems byung bar gyur la/bar ma do'i
408b4(dkon brtsegs): phung po yang mngon du gyur cing skye ba'i gnas yongasu tshol bar byed kyang /pha mo de dag gi 'du 'phrod snga phyir gyur cing dus gcig tu byung por ma gyur tam/so so'i lus la nad rnams
408b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur na yang mngol du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro//gal te ma'i mngal na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kun dang khrag gis nye bar non par gyur tam/tshig pus nye bar rlon
408b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur tam/mtshams shas gang ba 'am/sman gyis gang ba 'am/dpung gnas 'dra ba 'am/grog mo'i rkyad pa badra ba 'am/rnga mo'i kha 'dra ba 'am/shing rta'i tshigs bzhin
408b7(dkon brtsegs): sogs khar 'dug pa 'am/shing rta'i srog shing lte bur 'dug pa 'am/shing rta'i lte ba'i kha lta bur 'dug pa 'am/shing lo lta bur gyur pa 'am/spa lta bur g+hu gyur 'khyil bar
409a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/mngal gyi nang nas kyi gram skyes pa lta bur gyur tus//bachu dang khrag srung du 'jog cing skad cig ud tsam yang 'dug tu mo gar+b+hab par gyu b+h+ya/
409a2(dkon brtsegs): thuzung du 'dzag par gyur tam/mngal gyis lam rtsub par gyur tam+b+ha/steng du yangs par gyur pa'am/'og tu yangs par gyur pa 'am/lto ba 'am/zab pa ma yin pa'am/
409a3(dkon brtsegs): nas zags pa 'am/mtho ba 'am/dma' ba 'am/thung zhing dog pa 'am/nang sna tshogs dang bcas par gyur nA yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur//gal te pha mtsho rigs btsun
409a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la/bar ma da'i phung po bsod nams chung ba dang /bar ma du'i srid pa'i tshe rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur lapa
409a5(dkon brtsegs): ma bsod nams chung bar gyur teme/gnyis ka bsod nams dang ldan yang phan rgyun blad par byur ba'i lngas bsags par ma gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur//'di ltar
409a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mdo'i phung po dma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba na thog ma kho nar phyin ci log gi sems rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur to/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta sgra pha ma gnyis
409a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'i tshe/gal te por gyur pa zhig yin na ni ma la ni chags pa skyo bar 'gyur la/phal ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/pha'i khu ba byung na 'di ni bdag yin na snyam du sems//
409b1(dkon brtsegs): glal te mor 'gyur ba zhig yin na ni pha la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ma lnga ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ma'i khu ba byung na 'di ni bdag yin no snyam du sems blo dag gal to
409b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i zhe sdang dang chags pa'i sems skyes par ma gyur na mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang dga' bo ji ltar me'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste pha ma yang
409b3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur/dus kyo zla mtshan yang rjesu 'thun par gyur/bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon du gyur la gong ma lta bu'i skyon mang po yang med cing las kyi rkyen dang
409b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ldan par gyur na mngol du 'jug par 'gyuraro//'di ltar bar ma de'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa na/de yang rnaM po gnyi su 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe na/bsod nams dang mi ldan
409b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o//bsod nams dang ni ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems byung nas yul mthong bar gyur pa na 'di
409b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/deng bdag ni rlung dang grangs dang gnam rmugs pa dang /char 'bab pa dang skye bo mang po'i ce tsa dang /mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang phrad par
409b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes zhes deng bdag rtswa'i khyim dang /lo ma'i khyim dang rtsig pa'i drung dben par 'jug par bya'o//yang na ri dang nags stug po dang brag phug
410a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag du 'jug par bya'o snyam du sems te/gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i sangal du 'jug par da/
410a2(dkon brtsegs): gang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa de yang 'di snyam du deng bdag ni rlung dang grang ba dang /gnem rmugs pa dang /char 'bab pa dang skye bo mang po'i ca co dang /mang po'i mthu
410a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis gnod par byed pa deng phrad par gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas/khang pa rtsegs ma'i steng du 'dzeg pa 'am/yang thog mthon po'i steng du
410a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa 'am/gzhal ming khang gi nang du 'jug pa 'am/khri la 'dug par bya'o snyam du sems te/gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas/ji ltar mthong
410a5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/dga' bo 'di lhur bar ma de'i phung po de thog ma kho nor mngal du 'jug pa
410a6(dkon brtsegs): glang yin pa de ni mang mer po zhes bya ste/pha ma'i mi gtsang ba dang 'das pa'i las la brten nas lus len par byed kyang /'di ltar las de dang pha ma'i rkyen rnams
410a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis so so nas rang bskyed par mi byed kyi 'dus pa'i mthu stobs kyis lus len par byed pas/'di lta ste dper na snod kyi nang du zhos bkang nas/skyes bu'i
410b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba dang /thag pa la sogs pa la brten te/mar byung ba yang rkyen rnams las dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mar
410b2(dkon brtsegs): mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin te/'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthus mngal du lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyuraro//dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/rtswa sngon po dang ba glang gi lci ba dang rgyu shugs
410b3(dkon brtsegs): dang zho la brten nas so so nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba'i re re'i nang du srin bu mi dmigs kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyi srin bu skye bar 'gyur te/srin bu de dag skye ba na so so nas rten ji lta ba
410b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du kha dog sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar por 'gyuraro//de bzhin du pho mo'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'od skye bar yang rkyen rnams kyi nang du btsal na dmigs par
410b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur mod kyi/'on kyang rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar yang lus yang dag par len par mi 'gyuraro//lus 'di skyes pa na pha mo'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ngo bo nyid tha mi
410b6(dkon brtsegs): drad par 'gyur te/'di lta ste sa'i khams kyis ni slu ba'i bya ba byed do//chu'i khams kyis ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do//mo'i khams kyis ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do//rlung gi khams
410b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do//mer mer po'i lus de gal te sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan lo chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/'di lta ste dpor na phyi dang thal ba skam
411a1(dkon brtsegs): po bcangs pa bzhin du 'dur ma gtub par 'gyuraro//gral te chu'i khams 'ba' zhog dang ldan la sa'i khams med par gyur na ni 'di lta ste dper na/'bru mar/
411a2(dkon brtsegs): ram/chu'i rang bzhin snum zhing gsher ba 'am/slu ba med pa bzhin du bo zhing gyes par 'gyur//gal te sa dang chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la me'i khams med par gyur na ni
411a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/dbyir tsha ba'i dus su shwa'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis phog pa bzhin du rul zhing myags par 'gyuraro//gal te sa dang chu dang me'i khams dang
411a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan la rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/'di lta ste dper na khur ba mkhan nam de'i slob ma mkhas pas/khur ba btsos nas dbugs kyis bus te/ci dang ci
411a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas de dag nang khong stong du byed pa/gal te rlung gi stobs med par gyur na mngon par grub par mi 'gyur//de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag kyang
411a6(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun gcig la gcig brten cing yongasu gzung bas rnam par bzhag pa yin pas de'i phyir mer mer po'i lus pha ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /las kyi rlung gi rgyus skye bar 'gyur
411a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na dmigs par mi 'gyur yang 'dus pa'i stobs kyi lus yang dag par len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste
411b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na sa bon skur pa yongasu gtsang ba legs par sdus pa srin bus ma zos pa/ma rul cang ma chog pa dang /ma gus pa dang /bu ga med pa zhig gang la la zhog gis zhing bzang gshin pa
411b2(dkon brtsegs): btsal te/sa bon de btab na ci nyin zhag gis myu gu dang sdong bu dang /yal ga dang lo ma grib ma dang bcas pa dang /me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan
411b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni 'di ltar mi 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen las rim gyis skye bar 'gyur gyis/dus gcig tu
411b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur te/de lta bas pha ma las byung bar gyur pa'i lus 'di rkyen rnams kyi nang nas btsal na yang dmigs por mi 'gyur mod kyi/'on kyang tshig
411b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyis skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mi shel gyis nor bu blangs nas nyi ma la bzhag ste/lci ba skam
411b6(dkon brtsegs): po nor bu dang mi ring por bsten pa las me 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lci ba dang nyi ma 'od so so nAs me 'byin par mi nus kyang /phan tshun mi 'bral bas rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung bar
411b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do//pha ma las byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/'di lta ste mar mar po'i lus gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang
412a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste/ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus blangs nas/sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa la yang ngas bsngags
412a2(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod par mi byed na/yun ring por srid pa rnamasu 'khor bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/'di lta ste dper na mi gtsang ba ni nyung na yeng mnam na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos
412a3(dkon brtsegs): te/de bas na mer mer po'i lus nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dag la su zhig sred cing chags par byed/gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar lus de ma'i mngal nA gnas pa yang zhig bdun phrag
412a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur te/zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mar mer po zhes bya ste/lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang ba
412a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/'di lta ste dper na/zho ma chags pa dang 'dra bas zhug bdun gyi bar du mngal gyi nang du bcos rab tu bcos nas/'byung ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par grub par
412a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do//zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun sdud ces bya ste/rlung shin tu phra mo des ma'i rtsi ba logs
412a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yon pa dang g.yas pa bus te/mer mer po'i lus kyi mtshan ma rim gyis snang bar byed pas/de'i dbyibs zho ska ba 'am mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/nang du bcos rab tu bcos pas

412b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod kha zhes bya ste/rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nung po gang yin pa de mthar gyis mkhyags shing ltar ltar por byed pas de'i dbyibs ni sman bsdongs
412b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i gtun bu 'dra la thung zhing chung ste/mngal gyi nang du btses rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis 'brel par byed do//zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la

418a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rjesu bstan pa dag la mngon par yid ches shing yang dag par blangs pa zhig yin na ni/rgyu dang rkyen nges gal te mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang gong du bstan
418a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bu'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi mngon par grub pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur zhing gya nom sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas/byad bzhin mdzes pa dang /
418a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rnams dang ldan zhing tshig smras pa rnams mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te/de lta bas na dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis khyad par du 'phags
418a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'bras bu rnam par sman pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//dga' bo de lta bu'i lus de yang gal te pho yin na ni ma'i mngal na g.yas phyogasu tsog pur 'dug
418a7(dkon brtsegs): la/lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i sgal tshigs log su bltas te 'dug go/gal te mo yin na ni rtsib logs g.yon phyogasu cog par 'dug go//lag pa
418b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs te/ma'i lto ba la kha bltas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og/zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na nang du bcos rab tu bcos shing gnas lnga kun tu bcings pas 'di
418b2(dkon brtsegs): lte ste dper na rgyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang 'dra'o//gal te de'i mas shin tu mang du thos shing /shin tu nyung ngu tho saM sam/gal te zas shin tu dngar ba 'am/shin tu rtsub pa 'am/
418b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ska ba 'am/shin tu snum pa 'am/shin tu lan tshwa bro ba 'am/shin tu kha ba dang /shin tu sbyar ba dang /shin tu grang ba 'am/shin tu tsha ba dag zos par gyur

418b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/de bas na ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po dag gis rab tu gzir bar rig par bya'o//ngas mir gyur pa'i sdug bsngal
418b6(dkon brtsegs): yang med tsam du bstan pa yang de 'dra na sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dpe byad dka' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
418b7(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di lta bu la rab tu mos par byed/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur te/

432b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/'di snyam du dge slong mang po 'di dag ni bdag yongasu spangs pas lhan cig tu mi gnas na/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi phu nu yin pas cis kyang smad
433a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do snyam du bsams nas de'i thad du song ste lhan cig 'dug pa dang /dang tshe chu dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yang myur du langs te song ngo //des smras pa/
433a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo dge slong gzhan rnams ni bdag spong ba'i rigs na/khyod kho bo'i phu nu yin na ci'i phyir bdag spong bar byed/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/yang dag par de lta
433a3(dkon brtsegs): bubu'i don dang ldan mod kyi/'on kyang khyod ni lam gzhan du 'gro la bdag kyang lam gzhan du 'gro bas de'i phyir phan tshun byol ba yin no//smras pa/gang ni kho bo'i lam yin/gang
433a4(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod kyi lam yin/smras pa/khyod ni lhar skye bar mos nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu gnyer ba'i phyir 'dod pa kun nas nyon mongs pa rab
433a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bsal ba yin no zhes de skad smras pa zos pa dang /shin tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyis bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen
433a6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis sngon chad sems can dmyal ba mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma mthong lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
433a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis nga'i chos gos kyis grwa nas zung shig/des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su
433b1(dkon brtsegs): mngag yang yamam mam mthamachaca pa aNaH sa satsham thasam samaba.amam ma tha.a na Na/Thas mamatham mas tham mtham ya gsas pam thagatham tham am mayaH sa yamaH tham ma ThaH kacam
433b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams la ltas shig/tshe dang ldan
433b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bos kyang de bzhin du song ba las sngar ni chu bo b+hi ta ra ni mthong ngo //de nas mthar gyis ral gri lo mo'i nags dang /bkang gci'i 'jam dang /me mar mur gyi gnasu phyin te/de dge
433b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs te rnam par bltas pa las/sems can mang po sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bdag mthong ste/kha cig ni skam pas lce dang so dang mig phyung ba dang /kha cig ni sog les lus
433b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang /kha cig ni ste res rkang lag btub pa dang /kha cig ni mtshon cha shag ti dang /dgra staM so gnyis pa dang /be rgas bskrun pa dang /kha cig ni lcags kyi tho bas 'chog par
433b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /kha cig ni lcags kyi thu lum khar bcug pa dang /kha cig ni ral gri lo ma can dang /ljon shing ral gri lo ma can la 'dzeg pa dang /gtun gyis brdungs pa dang /rang thag
433b7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'thag pa dang /zangs kyi ka ba la 'ju ba dang /ljags kyi khri la 'dug nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo //kha cig ni lcags zangs mi lce rab tu 'bang ning
433b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khol ba rab tu tsha ba'i 'od byung ba dag tu sen tshod pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyi dngos po myang ba dag mthong ngo //gzhan yang lcags zangs stong par khol zhi'i me lce rab tu 'bar zhing tsha ba
434a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa zhig mthong ba dang /shin tu skrag bas dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma kye rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir lcags zungs gzhan rnams ni sems can 'chad
434a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed la/lcags zangs 'di 'ba' zhig ni stong par khol zhes dris pa dang /des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi gau cung dga' bo zhes bya ba de ltar skye bar smon nas/sems
434a3(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa la yang dag par spyod pas/lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas re shig bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang /de shi ba'i 'og tu lcag so zangs 'dir 'jug par
434a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/de'i phyir dong bdag cag lcags zangs me sbar nas bsdad pa yin no zhes smras pa dga' bos thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa skyes nas ba spu langs te/
434a5(dkon brtsegs): lus las rdul byung nas/'di snyam du 'dis gal te bdag dga' bo yin par shes par gyur na ni gson po kho nar zangs kyi nang du bor bar 'gyur snyam du bsams
434a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu bros te song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba
434a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/des kyang snying rje ba'i tshul du mchi ma blags te ngus nas/lce lkugs pa bzhin du sked phra mo phyung nas/mthong lag sau zhes gsol to//bcom ldan
434b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong /des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
434b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/dga' bo mir skye bar smon pa dang /lha'i 'jig rten yongasu tshol bas tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pa la nyes dmigs de lta bu yod pas/de lta bas
434b3(dkon brtsegs): na dang khyod kyis mya ngan las 'odas pa yongasu gnyer ba'i bsam pas tshangs par spyad pa bya'i lho'i skye ba la mngon par dka' bas rab tu brtson par mi bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa
434b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas de tsha ba'i sems kyis tsang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas
434b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i khams nas mi snang bar gyur te/slar rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/nang gi
434b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma rnam pa gsum yod de/'di lta ste 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gang yin pa ste/de dag ni spang bar bya ba yin pas/yongasu spangs pa la rab tu brtson
434b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing bslab par bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhugs gnas ring por ma lon par rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gdul ba'i
435a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul tsam par gshegs na sa gang+gA'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo
435a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan
435a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis dge slong rnams phyogs gcig tu 'khod par mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ngo la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/
435a4(dkon brtsegs): tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu dkar ba/tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/mngal du 'jug pa

435a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshalo zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo ma'i mngal dang ldan par gyur kyang mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/
435a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yod/'jug par mi 'gyur ba yang yod/ji ltar skye ba len cing ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/gal te pha ma gnyis 'dod pa'i sems kyis lhan cig
435b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrig pa yang spyod par gyur/ma'i mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar gyur/dus kyi zla mtshan dang yang ldan par gyur pa la bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na/de'i cha
435b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du 'jug par rig par bya'o//de la bar ma do'i phung po'i dbyibs de yang rnam pa gnyi su 'gyur te/kha dog sdug cing mdzes pa dang /kha dog mi sdug cing mi mdzes pa'o//
435b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni mi sdug pa yin te/'di lta ste dper na sdong dum tshig pa dang 'dra'o//dud 'gro rnams kyi bar me de'i srid pa'i kha dog ni
435b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na dud pa dang 'dra'o//yi dgas kyi bar ma nga'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste dper na chu dang 'dra'o//lha dang mi rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste dper na gser gyikha
435b5(dkon brtsegs): dog dang 'dra'o//gzugs kyi khams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni dkar por 'dug go//gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la ni bar ma do'i srid pa med de 'di ltar de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir ro//

436a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /yid btags rnams kyi thad kar lta zhing 'gro'o//sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa ni mgo thur du blta'o//bar ma do'i sred pa thams cad
436a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas/nam mkha' la 'gro zhing lha'i mig bzhin du skye ba'i gnas thag ring po yang mthong bar nus//de la dus kyi zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di
436a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gang yin pa'o//dga' bo bud med kho cig ni zhag gsum dang /zhag lnga dang /zla ba phyed dang /zla ba gcig lon nes zla mtshan dang ldan

436a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang /byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang /bza' ba dang btung ba mi bsod pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag ni zla mtshan 'ongasu zin kyang myur du 'chad par

436b3(dkon brtsegs): khu ba me byung ba dang /mo'i khu bo byung la pha'i khu ba ma byung ba 'am/gal te gnyis ka ma byung bar ma gyur na thams cad meng la len par mi 'gyur//gal te ma yongasu dag par

438a4(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'byung ba bzhin du pha ma'i mi gtsang ba'i khu ba dang khrag las mngon par grub pa'i lus mer mer po yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//gzhan yang dga' bo dpe rnam

438a6(dkon brtsegs): med mod kyi/'on kyang rtsa la brten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skye sa nas lus kyi kha dag kyang sngon por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/dga' bo phyi'i khu ba dang ma'i

438b1(dkon brtsegs): srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba ba glang gi lci ba yang srin bu ma yin/ba lang gi lci ba las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/'on kyang ba lang gi lci ba la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus

438b4(dkon brtsegs): gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/'on kyang rgya shug la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas lus kyi kha dog kyang dmar por gyur pa de bzhin du/dga' bo
438b5(dkon brtsegs): pha'i khu chu dang /ma'i khrag gis lus mer mar po yang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o//'di lta ste dper na zho la brten nas srin
438b6(dkon brtsegs): bu skye bar gyur pa lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur ba zhes bya ba nas rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa lnga 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du yang rgyas par sbyar ro//
438b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon yang dga' bo pha ma'i mi gtsang ba la brten pa'i mer mer po'i dbang gis sa'i khams mngon du snang bas ni sra ba'i bye ba byed do//chu'i khams mngon du snang bas ni gsher ba'i
439a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byed do//me'i khams mngon du snang bas na dro ba'i bya ba byed do//rlung gi khams mngon du snang bas ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do//dga' bo gal te pha ma//
439a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba'i lus mer mer po de sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/skams te gyes par gyur pas/'di lta ste dper na lag pus phyi dang
439a3(dkon brtsegs): thal ba skam po la sogs pa bcangs pa bzhin du 'gyuraro//gral te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la sa'i khams med par gyur na ni bro bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste dper na babrung
439a4(dkon brtsegs): myamyur ram chu lta bur gyur pa zhig na/chu'i khams kyi dbang gis ni sa'i khams gyes par mi 'gyur la/sa'i khams kyis dbang gis ni chu'i khams po bar mo 'gyuraro//dga'
439a5(dkon brtsegs): bo bral te mar mer po'i lus sa dang chu'i khams dang ldan par gyur la/me'i khams med par gyur na ni rul zhing myags par gyur te/'di lta ste dper na daphyir gyi dus su sha'i
439a6(dkon brtsegs): gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa bzhin du 'gyuraro//dgu' bo gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang chu dang me'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni 'phel
439a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rgyas par mi 'gyur te/'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyis las kyis rgyu byas nas phan tshun gcigs rkyen gcigs rgyu byas pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur bas pa'i
439b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' mthamacham tshams sanamams ma/amaHthas naN/Shas mamatham maka'am kam ma yas/
439b2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyis ni rten pa byed do//chu'u khams kyis ni sdud par byed de/me'i khams kyis ni yongasu smin par byed de/rlung gi khams kyis ni 'phel bar byed de/dga' bo 'di lta ste
439b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na khur ba mkhan nam/de'i slob mas khur ba legs par bcos nas dbugs kyis bus nis rgya tshor 'phel zhing nang khong sdong du byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no//'di lta ste
439b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du nang gi lus kyi 'byung ba chen po sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams las kyi stobs kyis 'phel por byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par
439b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//dga' bo pa ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po'i lus 'byung ba yang ma yin/pha'i bskyed pa las kyang ma yin/ma'i mngal las kyang ma yin/las las
439b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma yin/rgyu las kyang ma yin/rkyen las kyang ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang rgyu rkyen mang po 'di dag 'tshogs pa'i dbang gis mngal 'grub par byed de/'di lta ste dper na
439b7(dkon brtsegs): sa bon sar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa sra zhing snying po dang btsos pa bu gu ma byung ba shin tu legs par sbas pa zhing gshin po la btab nas rlan gyis
439b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/gdod myu gu dang /sdong bu dang /yal ga dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rim gyis skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/dga' bo sa bon de
440a1(dkon brtsegs): yang rkyen 'dus pa dang bral ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du phra ma 'ba' shig dang /las 'ba' zhig dang /rkyen gzhan 'ba'//
440a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig las mngal du skye ba thob pa ma yin gyi/pha ma'i khu ba dang /khrog dang /rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis mngal mngon par 'grub par rig par bya'o//dga' bo 'di
440a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongasu 'tshol ba'i phyir nor bu me shil khyer nAs nyi ma la bzhag ste/ba lang gi lci ba skem po'i steng du bzhag na/gdod
440a4(dkon brtsegs): me 'byung bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du pho ma'i khu ba dang khrag dang rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa la brten pa'i phyir gdod mngal mngon par 'grub pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//pha ma'i/
440a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba las mer mer po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o//tshor po dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming
440a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/de ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o//ming dang gzugs kyi phung po shin tu smad par bya ba'i srid pa rnam su skye ba len par byed pa'i'adi rtsa ni ngas phyogs bcu zad pa
440a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam mo maM/skad cig tsam du yang bsngags pa brjod par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/srid pa rnam su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal chen po yin pas so//
440b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na skyugs pa na ji ltar chung yang mi rnam par byed pa de bzhin du srid pa rnamasu skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chung yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o//nyo bar len pa'i phung po lta ba
440b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni skye ba dang /gnas pa dang /'phel ba dang /nyams shing 'jig pa dang ldan te/
440b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal yin no//gnas pa gang yin pa de ni na ba yin no//'phel ba dang nyams shing 'jig pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi yin te/de lta bas na dga' bo
440b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang zhig srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir srid pa'i ro bskyed nas/ma'i mngal na nyal zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par nyam su myong bar byed/gzhan yang dga'
440b5(dkon brtsegs): bopo 'di ltar ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang ngong bsdu na zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad yod par rig par bya ste/zhag bdun phrag dang po'i tshe ma'i mngal mi gtsang ba thog
440b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i gan su nyal bas/'di lta ste dper na zangs rab tu tsha ba'i nang du bcos shing bsngos pa bzhin du lus kyi dbang po dang rnam par shes pa lhan cig tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong
440b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya'o//de'i dbyibs ni 'di lta ste dper na 'bras kyi khu ba 'am/zho'i pri sa ma dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du bcos rab tu bcos pas na/so'i
441a1(dkon brtsegs): bam sra ba nyid dang /chu'i khams gsher ba nyid dang /me'i khams dro ba nyid dang /rlung gi khams yang zhing g.yo ba nyid gdod mngon du snang bar 'gyuraro//dga' bo zhag
441a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na mi gtsang ba'i gan su 'di lta ste dper na zangs kyi nang du btsos shing rdos pa bzhin du lus kyi dbang po dang rnam paro shes pa lhan cig tu
441a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba na ma'i mngal nas kun tu reg pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis rang byung nas mngal dri la reg pa gang yin pa de ni nur nur po zhes
441a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de'i dbyibs ni zho sko ba 'am/mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du btsos rab tu bcos pas na/khams bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyuraro//dga' bo
441a5(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la'ang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ma'i mngal nas mdzod kha zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis byung nas mngal de la reg pa gang
441a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni ltar ltar po zhes bya'o//de'i dbyibs ni 'di lta ste/lcags kyi thur ma 'am/srin bu grol ma 'dre ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du btsos rab tu btsos pas na khams
441a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyuraro//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ma'i mngal nas nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las//
441b1(dkon brtsegs): las byung nas mngal na gnas pa'i nAka rngu rab tu 'bang ba 'byung bar byung ba gang yin pa d+ma ma khyung 'gyur byas byung //de'i dbyibs ni bong ba 'am/mche na 'dra ste/zhag bdun kyo bar dun//
441b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba nas khams bzhi pa dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur zhes bya bo'i bar du snga ma bzhin no//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la'ang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ma'i mngal
441b3(dkon brtsegs): nas yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung ngos mngal la rig par gyur pa na mtshan ma lnga po 'di lta ste dpung pa gnyis dang /brla gnyis dang /mgo'i mtshan
441b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon du 'byung bar byed de/'di lta ste dper na dbyar gyi dus su char 'bab pa'i tshe ldan shing dang /nags tshal rnams yal ga dang lo ma rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du
441b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma lnga po dag rab tu snang bar byed de/dga' bo zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal la rig par gyur pa ni/
441b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/dpung po gnyis dang /pus mo gnyis 'byung bar byed de/'di lta ste dper na dbyar char 'bab pa'i rgyu rtsi shing yi la ga skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du
441b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma bzhi po dag rab tu snang bar byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bdun pa lo ma'i mngal nas 'khyil por byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mang po de la reg par gyur
442a1(dkon brtsegs): pha na mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste lag pa'i bol gnyis dang /rkang pa'i bol gnyis 'byung bar byed de/'di lta ste dper na lbu ba 'dus pa 'am/nya lcibs
442a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mtshan ma bzhin bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'gyuraro//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngalo nas bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/
442a3(dkon brtsegs): rlub des mngal de la reg par gyur pa na mtshan ma nyi shu po 'di lta ste lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo bcu bcu thog ma kho nar snang bar byed do//'di lta ste dper na dbyar char 'bab pa'i//
442a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ljon shing gi rtsa ba dang por skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin no//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal
442a5(dkon brtsegs): la reg par gyur pa na mtshan mo dgu po 'di lta ste mig gnyis dang /rna ba gnyis dang /sna gnyis dang /kha dang /bshang ba dang gci ba'i b+ha ga gnyis snang bar byed do//dga'
442a6(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ni ma'i mang pa nas sra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/des mngal na gnas pa sra zhing brtan par byed do//zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe ma'i
442a7(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas gzhan ra kun tu skyo bzhe bya ba'i rlung 'byung nas rlung des mngal gyi gnas bus nas rgyas par byed de/'dzi lta ste dper ma rgyal pa bus pa rgyas par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin
442b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mamathas thamamams mtshams samamacasamasama.atshamam thamacam/thas mams ma mamaya kasas pas mabs la tham sayam yasam mas
442b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu//bam pa gnyis bya//dgar ba zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas bu ga snang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu 'byung ste/rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na mngal nga
442b3(dkon brtsegs): snong du byed pas bu ga dgu po dag rab tu snang bar 'gyur te/gal te ma 'gro ba 'am/'greng ba 'am/'dug pa 'am/nyal ba 'am/las dag byis par gyur na/de'i tshe rlung de 'khyil ba nyid
442b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong stong du gyur nas/bu ga rnams mithar gyis cha bar byed do//gal te rlung de steng gi phyog su song na ni steng gi bug 'byin par byed la/gal te 'og gi phyogs song ni ni 'og gi bu
442b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par byed de 'di lta ste dper na mthar ba 'am/de'i slob mas spyad pas bris pa na stong dang 'og tu drung rgyu zhing rlung gi bya ba byos nas 'gag par gyur po ji skyed pa bzhin ni//dag
442b6(dkon brtsegs): bo zhig bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la nI ma'i mngal nas yon po'i sgra zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung ngos mngam bris pas g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi rgyu ma rnams 'byi
442b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed do//'di lta ste dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten te bsnol ma riganas/zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe gzhan yang sru brgyus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste mngal
442b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi no ngo nyid du lhag tshad med par tshigs sum brgya sum cu bskyed par byed do//gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis gnang brgya rtsa gcig 'byung bar byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag
443a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu gsum pa la ni mi ma san+ta snga ma'i rlung de nyid kyi stobs kyis bkres pa dang skom par shes par byed pas/mas zas shing 'thungs par rwa ji snyed pa dag
443a2(dkon brtsegs): lte bar zhugs nas de'i lus la phan 'dogs par byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal nas skud pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na
443a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de'i rtsa rgyus stong bskyed par byed de/nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi mdun na gnaso//nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi rgyab na gnas so//nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi
443a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yas phyogs na gnas so//nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na gnas so//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas pad+ma zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung/
443a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/mngal na gnas pa'i de'i lus la rtsa rgyu ba rnam pa nyi shu bskyed nas/ro rnams bzhibs par byed de/de yang lus kyi mdun na lnga dang //lus
443a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyab na lnga dang /lus kyi g.yas na lnga dang /lus kyi g.yon na lnga yod do//rtsar rgyu ba de yang ming sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pas/ming ni sa ga zhes
443a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bya/stobs shes kyang bya/brtan pa zhes kyang bya/mthu dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o//kha dog ni sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /sran ma dang /mar dang /
443b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar dang /zho la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang /gzhan yang kha dog mang po phan tshun 'dres pa gang yin pa'o//dga' bo rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag re re la yon lag/
443b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod pas/gcig tu bsdus na dbugs bzhi pa'i rtsar rgyu ba brgyad brgya yod par 'gyur te/lus kyi mdun dang /rgyab dang /g.yas dang /g.yon gyi phyogs re rel
443b3(dkon brtsegs): yang nyis brgya nyis brgya yod do//dga' bo rdzir rgyu ba brgyad brgya po de dag ri ra la yang rtsar rgyu ba'i yan lag phan tshun 'brel ba brgya brgya yod pas/gcig tu bsdus na stong phrag
443b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu yod par 'gyur te/stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi mdun na yod do//stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi rgyab na yod do//stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yid do//stong phras
443b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod do//dga' bo DUr rgyu ba stong phrag brgyud cu po de dag la yang bla ga mang ba yod pas/bu ga gcig dang gnyis dang ldan pa nas/bug bdun gyi
443b6(dkon brtsegs): bar dang ldan pa yang yod do//de dag re re la yang spu'i khung bu re re dang so sor phan tshun 'brel te/'di lta ste dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba la bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no//dga' bo

444a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sna'i skye mched gnyis dang /kha'i sgo dang /med pa'i bra ga dang /snying gro khor khor yug dang /bza' ba dang btung ba dang /bca' ba dang myangs pa rnams
444a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par gyur pa'i gnas rnam par 'jog cing /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed de/'di lta ste dper na/rdza mkhan nam de'i slob mas 'jim pa'i gong bya blangs
444a4(dkon brtsegs): te/'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam pa dbyibs tha dad po spel zhing rnam par 'jog pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis kyang de bzhin du

444a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal nas 'bri gau dong zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /kha'i sgo dang /mid pa dang /snying gi phyogs dang /
444a7(dkon brtsegs): zlas 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnams kun tu dang bar byed cing dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i gnas thogs pa med par byed de/'di lta ste dper na khye'u dang bu mo mkhas pa
444a8(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa blangs nas/'bru sar dang thal ba dang /sa'i phye ma zhib mo dag gis byi ror byas nas gsal bar 'gyur ba
444b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du las kyi rlung gis dbang gis skye mched rnams rnam par 'jog cing thogs pa med par byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal nas dri ma med
444b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/mngal ni gnas pa de'i skye mched drug po de dag yongasu dag par byed de/'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin chen pos khebs
444b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rlung drag po langs nas bus te phyogs bzhir gtor por gyur na 'od dang ldan zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dga' bo las kyi rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gan
444b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i dbang po drug yongasu dag par byed pa yang de zhin du rig par bya'o//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ni ma'i mngel na gnas pa de'i dbang po bzhi po mig dang /rna ba
444b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /sna dang /lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag mngon par 'grub par byed do//dang po ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe/thog ma kho nar dbang po gsum thob par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/
444b6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog dang yid kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o//dga' bo zhig bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ni mu'i mngal nas shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des
444b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa de'i rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te sor mo'i rus pa nyi shu bskyed par byed do//rkang pa g.yas pa la brtan te rus pa nyi shu dang /rkang po'i rting pa'i
445a1(dkon brtsegs): rus pa bzhi dang /rje dar gyi rus pa gnyis dang /pus mo'i rus pa gnyis dang /bAr+Ya'i rus pa gnyis dang /rkyad pa'i rus pa gsum dang /long
445a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rus pa gsum dang /sgal tshogs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang /rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bskyed par bya'o//gzhan yang lag pa g.yon pa la brten te
445a3(dkon brtsegs): sor mo'i tshogs kyi rus pa nyi shu dang /lag pa g.yas pa la brten te sor mo'i tshigs kyi rus pa nyi shu bskyed par byed do//gzhan yang lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi
445a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /dpung pa'i rus pa gnyis dang /brang gis rus pa bdun dang /phrag pa'i rus pa bdun dang /gnya' ba'i rus pa bzhi dang /'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang /
445a5(dkon brtsegs): so'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /mgo'i rus pa bzhi bskyed par byed de/dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na gzugs mkhan nam/gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma
445a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas/sngar ni shing sra ba la de'i dbyibs byas nas/de'i 'og tu srang bus bcings te/phyis 'jim pa rnams bskus nas gzugs brnyan mngon par
445a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnams rnam par 'jog pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//dga' bo de dag zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la
445b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ya yam mthamamathamatha la tshams samamamasamamam amaman thas na Na/sa mas mkhas ma ma mam a yam ma
445b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po skye ba'i grangs ni nyes brgya yod par rig par bya'o//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal na sa yang dag
445b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la sha bskyed par byed pas 'di lta ste/dper na zhal zhal mkhan nam/zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas
445b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jim pa legs par sbyar nas rtsig ngos la zhal zhal byed pa bzhin du las kyi rlung nges sha bskyed par byed pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu
445b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa la ni ma'i mngol nas kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'bya ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i khrag bskyed par byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa la
445b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ma'i mngal nas yongasu dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa bskyod par byed do//dga' bo zhig bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi
445b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni ma'i mngal nas kun tu 'phyo ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag
445b8(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas grong khyer 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sha dang khrag rab tu dang bar byed do//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag
446a1(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skye ba mngon par 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung ngos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sgra dang spu dang sen mo rnams
446a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed do//de dag thams cad kyang rtsa rgyu so rnams dang phan tshun 'brel par blta bar bya'o//dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas sman
446a3(dkon brtsegs): yon po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i skra dang spu dang sen mo rnams mngon par 'grub par byed do//dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de tshe ribs
446a4(dkon brtsegs): snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/sor snas longs spyod ba dog pa rnams 'phangs shing shin tu brtan par mngon par zhen nas/sbyin pa
446a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar mi byed pa dang /pha ma dang mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /bla mi'i gnas rnams kyis rje su bstan pa dag mnyan par mi byed pa dang /lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyis

446a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas/gal te 'jig rten pa rnams 'di ltar ring pos mdzes par 'gyur na ni de mthung bar 'gyur ro//gal te thung ngus mdzes
446b1(dkon brtsegs): pang gyur nan dang por 'gyur ro//gal tu zlum pas mdzes par gyur na ni da phra bar 'gyur//gal te phra mos mangs par gyur na ni de sbom por 'gyur//gal tu yan lag dang nyang lan
446b2(dkon brtsegs): pan nun theg nye bar mdzes par gyur na ni de thag ring por 'gyur//gal te bag ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni de zag nye bar 'gyur//gal te mang pos mdzes par gyur na ni de du

452a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang srini bu'i rigs gong ma dang ming 'thun pa lnga yod de/rtsi bo logs g.yon pa la gnas nas g.yon pa la za bar byed do//gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs
452a7(dkon brtsegs): mdun du 'bigs pa dang /rgyab tu 'bigs pa dang /brten par 'bigs pa dang /'bigs te gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar

452b3(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs brtan pa dang /nye bar brten pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/zhu ba'i gnas lo gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do//srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang /phung po'i kha
452b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /dra ba'i kha dang /khye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do//srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang /byed pa chen po dang /dbyibs

452b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do//srin bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod de/rkang pa la gnas nas
453a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la za bar byed do//dga' bo yongasu skyo bar bya ba'i lus 'di 'dra ba 'di la ni srin bu'i rigs 'di lta bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtag par nyin mtshan du za bar byed pa/
453a2(dkon brtsegs): des na lus la gdung ba dang /rab tu gdung ba dang /nya mo chung zhing rma ba dang /bkres pa dang /skom par byed cing gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ljon

454a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang /tshangs par spyod pa la brtson zhing le la mi bya ba dang /don gyi spyod pa dang /chos

466a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /nyon mongs pa mi bskyod pa gang yang med de de'i gnas med do//dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs
466a2(dkon brtsegs): de rtags pa zhig yin nam/'on te mi dag pa zhig yin/btsun pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lagaso//dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na nI ci de
466a3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba zhig yin nam/'on te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin/btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lagaso//gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos
466a4(dkon brtsegs): can yin na/nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs 'di ni bdag nyid yin no//bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no//gzugs ni bdag
466a5(dkon brtsegs): gi ba yin no//bdag ni gzugs la gnaso zhes khas len par byed dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so//'di ji snyam du sems/ci tshor ba dang //
466a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa de dag rtag pa zhig yin nam/'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/btsun pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lagaso//
466a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ci bde ba zhig yin nam/'on te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin/btsun pa sdug bsngal ba lagaso//gang mi rtag cing sdug
466b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/nga'i 'phags pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni tshor ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bdag nyid yino//bdag ni tshor
466b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la sogs pa dang ldan no//tshor ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bdag gi ba yin no//bdag ni tshor ba la sogs pa la gnaso zhes khwas len par byed dam/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
466b3(dkon brtsegs): lagaso//de lta bas na ji tsam du gzugasu gyur pa 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/rags pa'am/phra ba 'am/bzang po 'am
466b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa 'am/thag ring ba 'am/thag nye yang rung ste/ji tsam du gzugasu gyur ba thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /gzugs kyang
466b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ma yin la/bdag kyang gzugs la gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji tsam du tshor ba dang //
466b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes par gyur pa 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs po 'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/bzang ngo /
466b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ngan pa 'am/thag ring ba 'am/thag nye ba yang rung ste/de dag thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /de dag kyang bdag king ma yin la
467a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa mA yin par legs par so sor brtag par bya'o//de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis nga'i nyan
467a2(dkon brtsegs): thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni 'di ltar gzugs la so sor brtags nas/yongasu skyo ba skyes pa dang /gzhan yang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang //
467a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la so sor brtags nas yongasu skyo ba skye bar 'gyuraro//gal te skyo bar gyur na mngon pa ro zhen par mi byed do//mngon par zhen pa med pas rnam par grol ba thob/
467a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyuraro//rnam par grol nas bdag rnam par grol snyam du shes pas 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad do//bya ba byas pas
467a5(dkon brtsegs): yang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyuraro zhes sgrogs par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags par bya'o//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangaso 'di bka' stsal pa na/
467a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to//dge slong lnga brgya po rnams ni zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
467a7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba thob par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/gang la mnyam bzhag sems med pas/rnam dag ye shes med pas
467b1(dkon brtsegs): no//gang zag rnams ni spong mi 'gyur//de bas khyod kyis nan tran bsgrubs//khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag bsgoms la//phung po skyo 'gag shes par gyis//rnam dag gal te rdzogs gyur na//lha
467b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyis dga' bar 'gyur//mdza' bshes lhan cig 'brel dga' zhing //phan tshun 'drul zhing chags pa dang //thob dang grags pa mngon zhen pa//dga' bo khyod kyis kun spongs shig/
467b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dang ni rab byung la//brtun cing bshes ni mi byed par//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'das soms la//sdug bsngal mthar ni phyin par byos//dang po mer mer por las ni//sha yi chu bur
467b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur//chu bur las ni ltar ltar skye//ltar ltar po las mkhrang bar 'gyur//mkhrang pa rnam par gyur nas ni//mgo dang yan lag bzhi skye bas//rus pa 'dus nas lus grub
467b5(dkon brtsegs): po//thams cad las kyi rgyu las byung //mgo thad rus pa dgu 'du zhing //'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis 'brel te//so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan//de yi rtsa ba'ang de bzhin no//rna rtsa gnya/
467b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rus pa dang //rkan dang sna yi rus pa dang //brang dang srid pa'i rus pa ni//bsdus na rus pa nyi shu yod//mig la rus pa bzhi yod do//phrag pa byin pa zung gnyis yod//lag pa
467b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang sor mo rnams//bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod//ltag rgyab rus pa brgya yod de//sgal tshigs la ni sum cu gnyis//'di dag kun la rtsa yod pas//de yi grangs ni cha bzhir
468a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ya mamatsham mam pathamatham katsham sa sanam thamam saca aman ma tha.an Na/thas mamatham mas tham mam ma khams kam thagatham Tham thamam/ma mayan tham yamaH tham ma Thama.anam
468a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rus pa ni lnga yod//phan tshun 'brel ba bcu gsum yod//rtsib logs g.yon 'brel skye ba yi//rus pa dag ni bcu gsum
468a3(dkon brtsegs): yod//rus pa'i lu gu rgyud 'di dag/gsum gsum dag ni phan tshun 'brel//gnyis gnyis dag ni tshigs ldan te//lhag ma gzhan ni 'brel pa med//g.yas g.yon brla ni gnyis
468a4(dkon brtsegs): po la//bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod//lus dang 'bral ba'i rus pa ni//bsdom nu sum cu rtsa drug yod//dus tshigs phan tshun 'brel na ni//sems can lus ni grub yin zhes//
468a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yis//bden tshig rab tu gsungs pa yin//rkang mthil nas ni mgo bo'i bar//mi gtsang 'dres shing mi brtan pa//de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs
468a6(dkon brtsegs): pas//nyams chung 'dam bu'i khyim dang 'dra//rus pa 'ba' zhig gzer bu med//sha khrag kun tu bskus pas na//shing mu'i 'khrul 'khor rab 'dra zhing //sgyu mas skul pa'i
468a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan 'dra//lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni//lpags pa gsher bas g.yogs pas ni//gnas dgu rma yi sgo yod pas//de lta bur ni blta bar bya//kun nas
468a8(dkon brtsegs): gcin rgyag mi gtsang ba//rtag tu gang zhing 'dzag pas ni//dper na bang ba dong rnamasu//'bru rnams sna tshogs bkang bltar//lus 'di yang ni de bzhin te//mi gtsang sna tshogs
468b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gang //rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor g.yo bas na//nyams chung snying po ci yang med//byis pa skye bo rtag tu tshugs//mkhas pa dag ni zhon mi byed//mchil snabs rdul ni rtag
468b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bab//rnag khrag dag ni rgyun tu gang //zhag ser 'o ma lhan cig 'dris//glad rgyas dag ni glang po gang //snying khar bad kan rgyun tu 'byung //nang gi zhu dang ma zhu'i granas//glad
468b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang ni lpags pa dang //snying dang nang grol glo mchin dang //'di la sogs po'i rul myags dang //mi gAtsang rnams dang lhan cig gnas//sdig pa'i lus ni 'jigs rung
468b4(dkon brtsegs): bas//'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na//shes med 'dod la zhen pa yi//blun po rtag tu 'phang bar byed//'di 'dra'i mi gtsang lus 'di ni//grong khyer rnying pa 'dra ba pa na//nyin mtshan nyon
468b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs rab gzir cing //skad cig mi gnas kun tu 'khyam//rus pa'i grong khyer rtsig par byed//sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal bskus//'dod sdang gti mug mtshon bkye nas//ci rigs
468b6(dkon brtsegs): par ni brgyan par byed//rus pa'i grong khyer skyug bro ba//sha khrag 'brel zhing 'dus pas no//rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis//phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung bar byed//dga' bo khyod
468b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis shes par byos//ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin//nyin mtshan rtag tu dran byos la//'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed//gal to 'dod pa spong 'dod na//rtag tu de bzhin rab bsgom
469a1(dkon brtsegs): la//rnam grol yongasu tshol bar gyis//myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'da'//bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka'
469a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
469a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin nas/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob
469a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas bdag nyid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/tshig su bcad de smras pa/gus sems khrus ni bslab pa dang /chu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang //bsod nams rnams
469a5(dkon brtsegs): ni bsgrub pa na//rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin//de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces smras pa thos pas/thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur nas/the tshom bcad pa'i
469a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'dis sngon sug las ci bgyis na/de'i rnam par smin pos lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog
469a7(dkon brtsegs): lto bur gyur la/mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing bcom ldan 'das kyis slu bas sor bzhis thung bar gyur/ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon
469b1(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs rtse bar dgongs nas/mthus 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lus bsgral te/thabs kyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa la rnam par bzhag pa
469b2(dkon brtsegs): bkas bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong dga' blo sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongasu smin pas na/
469b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin no zhes gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher dka' stsal nas/tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang //la sa byis chud zar
469b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te//rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pA nu//lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin//dge slong dag khyod nyon cig/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na skye
469b5(dkon brtsegs): dgu rnams ni tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
469b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/bla na myemed pa skyes bu 'dul byi kha lo bsgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/drug
469b7(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer mnyen ldan rgyal po'i pho breng 'khor du gshegs nas mnyen ldan gyi tshal na zhug so//de'i tshe
470a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi gcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang/
470a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongasu bzla ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar bskul nas thabs kyis mthar thug pa'i mya ngan
470a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dbyingasu rnam par bzhag go/de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyan ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/'di ltar chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba/mi dang skye bo mang po
470a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyurgyas pa/lo legs shing bde ba/g.yo sgyu dang chom rkun med cing nad dang bral ba/ba lang dang rA lug dngo sa lu dang /bu ram shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/rgyal po
470a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i g.yas khyim gyi nu bo zhig yod pa yang shin tu 'dod pal mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to//rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te mnyen ldan gyi tshal
470a6(dkon brtsegs): na bzhugs par thos pas/btsun mo dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi
470a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi ge tam kun tu
470b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan cing bzod bstod pasu/khyad byar du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to//de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhon cing khyim nas 'byung du ma brngub pa dang /de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu dang /gzhan yang snga//
470b2(dkon brtsegs): nas lhan cig rtse rtse ba'i grogs po dag gis/kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shug 'di ltar rgyal po'i gzhon nu shing btsun mo'i 'khor dang /blon po dang /skye bo mang po dang bcas te
470b3(dkon brtsegs): dbye'i ni gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste/gus pas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/'di ltar khyod kyang mi'i lus
470b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu thob par dka' ba las ded thob par gyur na/ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cingasas nas sgro yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang /des kyang de skad du sgrub thos pas shin
470b5(dkon brtsegs): tu nga che bar gyur nas/de dag gis rjes su 'brangs te lhan cig dong ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i gcung dge slong ngas mang po de drug dang lhan cig 'grogs te dong ba mthong nas/
470b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci'i phyir mi 'di gcig phywa khridi nas lhan cig 'grogs te/'gro zhes dris pa dang /de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib du smras so//dge slong des smras pa/bdag ni bcom ldan
470b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi gcung yin te/sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i yul rnams la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/smyon pa chen pos thugs rjer dgongs nas/mthus

471a4(dkon brtsegs): bar shin tu dang ba'i skye bar 'gyuraro zhes smras pas/de dag kyang lhan cig 'grogs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar drong ba dang /bcom ldan 'das des kyang de la

471a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang
471a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig tu sang gi gdugs la bdag gi snum por sro khang du khrus la gshegs par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyang cang mi gsung bar gshegs
471a8(dkon brtsegs): pa zhal gyis bzheso//des kyang zhal gyis bzhis par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te song do//de nas rgyal po ga la ba der song ba phyin pa dang /
471b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la lus gus pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smra so//rgyal po chen po bdag cag bcom ldan 'das pa la ba der mchis nas/chos zlos pas shin tu dad ba skyes nas 'dod
471b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul rnams la yongs skyo ba'i sems skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par sri khang du khrus la gshegs
471b3(dkon brtsegs): par gsol ba las de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs brtse bar dgongs nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes te/bcom ldan 'das dI ni lha dang mi rnams kyi
471b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa lags nasgras kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams phyag dar byas nas chug chag btab ste/mdzes par bgyi ba'i rig so zhes smras pa
471b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs na bdag gis grong khyer mdzes par bya mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas bzlog
471b6(dkon brtsegs): par dka' ba ltas/deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni yang dge bar ngo mtshar rkyen snyam du bsams nas/nu bo shin tu legs kyis khyod song la khrus kyi yo byad
471b7(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos pa sbyor cig dang /ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong khyer brgyan par bya'o zhes smras pa/rgyal po'i nu bo yang shin tu dga' bar gyur te/rgyal po la byang byas te sa las langs
472a1(dkon brtsegs): song //de nas rgyal pos blon pa rnams lha bsgo ba/kye khyed nag dredang la zong khyud du rnyil chen po bsgrags te phyogs 'di skad du sang bcom ldan 'das dro
472a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer du gshegs kyis grong khyer na gnas pa dang /yul so so nas lkugs pa'i skye bo rnams so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la lam dang srad rnams
472a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag da byas te chag chag btob nas/me tog dang /spos dang /dri rnams thogs te/ston pa chen po gshegs pa su zhig ces sgo shig/blon po rnams kyis kyang
