472a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /bong ba rnams bsal te/smos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas/bdug pa dam pa rnams kyang bsregros/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
472a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan mang po yang btsugs te/me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bskyed mos tshul dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du byas so//de'i tshe rgyul ma
472a7(dkon brtsegs): nu bos kyang spos chu dang /spos mar la sogs pa sbyar te/khri bshams nas gdan yang bting ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong khyer du
472b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya yam ma nyam mthamachatha ya 'tshams mtshamathas ma maH/aman na tha.a na Na/Thas mamatham mtham kham mnyam ma ka'am pam tham sam tham thams/tham ma yam pas yaH tham mas Na khamam
472b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs su nye ba dang /rgyal ba dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po dang /btsun mo dang /sras dang /sgrub myang po rnams grong nas byung ste/de banan gshegs pa bsdu nas/rgyung ring ba
472b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te zhwa 'bring byas nas/grang khyer du gshegs pa dang /de'i tshe rgyal po'i nub des kyang bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs par spyan drangs te/
472b4(dkon brtsegs): spos tshul sogs pa phul nas sku bsil bar gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus yongs su brnyan
472b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba dang /rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to//sku bsil nas na bza' bsdums pa dang /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mog
472b6(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag byas nas 'di skad du deng bdag gis bsod namos kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa cung zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan
472b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di dong tha dad pa med pa'i gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gcung 'di 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags de
472b8(dkon brtsegs): las mthus yongs su bzlas te/shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
473a1(dkon brtsegs): gnang du gyur nas/gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur te/'di myur bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur na yang
473a2(dkon brtsegs): mthus sred pa'i chu bo zab mo lus yongs su bzlas te/mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bzhol bar gyur cig nyes smon lam btab po//dge slong dag khyod kyis
473a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po mnyen ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems ni de ltar mi g+haste/de ni dge ba sbyong dga'
473a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid yin no//'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs sa khang dug shegs par gas la nas/sa rmyi la sogs las
473a5(dkon brtsegs): la gyi/shin tu drang bas sbyin lam btib pa de'i dge ba'i rgyus/ded bzhin gshegs pa'i gnang du myur nas/lus gser kyi khyu dag ltar gyur ba dang /
473a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las des mthus ste/m+ba n+taste khyim med par rab tu byu nas/mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa shin
473a7(dkon brtsegs): chu bi de ba'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa yin no//de nas 'kho mdza ba rnams the tshom du sbyar nas/ya bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa che dang ldan
473b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu mngon par grub pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'dis las mngon par
473b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhin te/sngon 'das pa'i dus su ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor meng bA/yo byad kyis brel
473b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa zhig gnas pa de la bskyed mos tshul me tog dang 'bra ste bu rgyas shing chu mig dang /'bab chu dang /ljon shing dang ldan pa rab tu byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os
473b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig yod de/de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten du byung nas/dben pa na gnas pa yod pas/nam 'jig rten du sangs rgyas mi 'byung
473b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/'di 'ba' shig bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te/de nas rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing /ri brag gi grong khyer der phyin nas/phan tshun kun tu
473b6(dkon brtsegs): brtags te gnas btsal ba las de'i skyed mos tshul du phyin pa dang /skyed mos tshal dri srung ba'i mi so 'phags pa de mthong nas/bde bar gshegs sam ma nyel
473b7(dkon brtsegs): bso ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so//des na nam gyi gung 'thun la me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /bskyed mos tshal
474a1(dkon brtsegs): /bsrung ba'i mis mthong nas/'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog grub pa'o snyam du bsdams nas/de nas nub mo langs
474a2(dkon brtsegs): te/khyim bdag ga la ba der song nas 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po dang dga' ba chen po bskyed cig/bskyed mos tshol na 'phags pa zhig bdag gi thad du gshegs nas///
474a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo 'das pa las de ni spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing /rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs po zhig pas/'od zer chen po bskye nas bskyed mos tshal gyi
474a4(dkon brtsegs): nang kun tu gsal bar byas so zhes smras pa khyim bdag gis thos nas/myur zhing rings par bskyed mos tshal du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyog byas nas/
474a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du 'phags pa ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba logs na/thugs brtsi bar dgongs te bskyed mos tshal 'dir
474a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs su gsol/bdag gis rnam par bsod snyoms sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang /des kyang de gus pas gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te
474a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas nas/bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to//dus gzhan
474b1(dkon brtsegs): zhag na 'di snyam du bdag ni lus rus pa 'dri ni 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni thob par gyur pas/mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs
474b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/gtan du ma skye ba mngon sum du bya ba rigs so snyam nas/nam mkha' la mngon pa ro 'phags te/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdzu 'phrul mngon
474b3(dkon brtsegs): par bstan te/'od zer chen po bkye nas steng du 'bar ba dang /tsha ba dang /'og tu 'bab pa la sogs pa bstan te/lus 'di spangs nas rnam par shes pa skye bar
474b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang /lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//de nas khyim bdag des rus bu blangs nas dri'i shing thams
474b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis bsregs te/'o mas me bsad nas rus pa lhag mA ma lus par bsngos te/bum pa gsar pa'i nang du bcug nas mchod rten brtsigs te/gdugs dang /
474b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams brtsegs nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pas dri'i chu gyi nom pa sum cu gtor te/mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog cig ces smon lam/
474b7(dkon brtsegs): botab po//dge slong dag khyed kyis de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa/de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/de ni dga' bo 'di nyid yin no//'dis mchod pa
475a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog byas pa dang gus pa dang shin tu dang ba bskyed pa'i las kyi dbang gis dang 'dir mtshan mchog khyad par du 'phags pa sum cu mngon par grub pa rnam par
475a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa myong bar gyur pa yin no//de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tshom skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga'
475a3(dkon brtsegs): bos las ci bgyis na/gal te 'di rab tu ma byung zhing khyim na gnas par gyur na gdon mi zar stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dis bgyis par 'gyur

475a5(dkon brtsegs): smin par gyur pa'i tshe/gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rgyas par gong mo bzhin du sbyar te/dge slong dag sngon byung ba

475b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de gzhan yin po snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/dga' bo 'di nyid

476a3(dkon brtsegs): bar ma gyur na/de bzhin du stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la dbang bsgyur ba byed par 'gyur ro//de nas 'khor mang po rnams
476a4(dkon brtsegs): the tshom du gyur nas/yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon lngas ci bgyis nA/nyan
476a5(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sgom pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni smon lam gyi stobs

476b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di skad du bdag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa los/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod kyang /tshe 'di nyid la mngon
476b3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa ci yang med pas/bdag gis 'dir tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis mi 'ongs pa'i dus na/bram

476b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes lung bstan pas/bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i stan pa las/khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas//
476b6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bston pa las/dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i
